OriginString: ...One Cup for me...
String: ...给我来一杯...

OriginString: ...and one for you.
String: ...还有一杯给你。

OriginString: *Gulp*, *Gulp*...Ah! That hit the spot!
String: *咕咚*、*咕咚*...啊！真够劲儿！

OriginString:
Sorry, Franny.
I knew I couldn't avoid it forever.
String:
"抱歉，弗兰妮。
我知道这事迟早躲不过。"

OriginString: It's still hard for me to believe that you're dead. When I came here, part of me thought that it was just a ruse to get me back.
String: 我还是很难相信你真的死了。来的时候，我甚至想过这该不会是你骗我回来的把戏。

OriginString: I was ready to punch you in the face, hahaha!
String: 我都准备好要揍你一拳了，哈哈哈！

OriginString: *Gulp*, *Gulp*...
Are you perhaps wondering why I haven't asked anyone how you died?
String: 你是不是奇怪我怎么不问你是怎么死的？

OriginString: ...I guess I don't want to know.
String: ...我只是不想知道。

OriginString: That witch wife of yours didn't mention it once. That's all I need to know.
String: 你那个女巫老婆只字不提这件事。这就足够说明一切了。

OriginString: I choose to believe that you died peacefully in your sleep at the ripe age of 30.
String: 我宁愿相信你是在三十岁那年寿终正寝，在睡梦中安详离世的。

OriginString: *Gulp*, *Gulp*...
...I'm sorry, Franny.
String: ...对不起，弗兰妮。

OriginString: For leaving...
String: 就这样离开...

OriginString: For avoiding you for ten years.
String: 躲了你整整十年。

OriginString: ...You never know how stupid you are until it's too late.
String: ...人总是要到无法挽回时，才明白自己有多愚蠢。

OriginString: *Gulp*, *Gulp*...
...Did you resent me, Franny?...
String: ...你恨我吗，弗兰妮？...

OriginString: ...Did you only write to me because you had no better choices?
String: ...你联系我只是因为没有更好的选择吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>*GULP*, *GULP*,*GULP*...haaaaah...
String: <?shakeScreen>*吨吨吨*...哈啊...

OriginString: ...It doesn't matter.
String: ...这些都不重要了。

OriginString: I remember your dream...our dream.
String: 我记得你的梦想...我们的梦想。

OriginString: An Adventurer Guild...A home for people like us.
String: 一个冒险者公会...像我们这样的人的归宿。

OriginString: Known and respected far and wide.
String: 声名远播，受人敬仰。

OriginString: ...I swear to you Franny...I will make it a reality.
String: ...我向你发誓弗兰妮...我一定会让它成真。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>What are you doing here?
String: <?whiteFlash>你在这儿干什么？

OriginString: Obviously, I'm here to pay my respects to my husband, you slow-witted moron.
String: 废话，当然是来祭奠我丈夫，你这反应迟钝的白痴。

OriginString: Tsk! Talk about bad timing.
String: 啧！来得真不是时候。

OriginString: You can come back when I'm done.
String: 等我完事了你可以再来。

OriginString: Who knows when you're done? I'm staying.
String: 谁知道你要多久？我就待这儿。

OriginString: *sigh* Fine. Then stay! I really don't want to argue with you here of all places.
String: *叹气*行吧！那你待着！我实在不想在这种地方跟你吵架。

OriginString: ...So are you really not going to leave?
String: ...所以你当真不打算走？

OriginString:
This again?
No. I'm not going to leave.
String:
又来这套？
不，我不会走的。

OriginString: You know that this has nothing to do with you, right? The Adventurer Guild was something Franny and I thought of. It was before we even met you.
String: 你明白这事和你没关系对吧？冒险者公会是我和弗兰妮的构想。那时我们甚至还不认识你。

OriginString: You have nothing to do with it.
String: 你与此毫无瓜葛。

OriginString: You out of all people are saying that to me?
String: 你居然有脸对我说这种话？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Where were you the last ten years when we built this up?
String: <?shakeScreen>过去十年我们打拼的时候你在哪里？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Where were you when he put in countless efforts to raise the Guild from nothing?
String: <?shakeScreen>当他白手起家建设公会时你在哪里？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Where were you when he struggled to keep the Guild alive?
String: <?shakeScreen>当他苦苦支撑公会生存时你在哪里？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Where were you when he passed away?
String: <?shakeScreen>当他离世的时候你又在哪里？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I was here! From the beginning to the end. Not you!
String: <?shakeScreen>是我！从头到尾都守在这里。而不是你！

OriginString: You call yourself his friend? Don't make me laugh!
String: 你也配自称是他的朋友？别笑死人了！

OriginString: I don't know why he made you his successor.
String: 我不知道他为什么选你当继承人。

OriginString: I only know that any stranger on the streets would have been a better choice than you!
String: 我只知道街上的陌生人都比你强百倍！

OriginString: HMPH!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 哼！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Midnight! I guess it's time to close the doors.
String: 午夜了！该关门打烊了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh! Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>啊！公会会长！

OriginString: Hello Tavi! Are you closing?
String: 晚上好塔维！要打烊了吗？

OriginString: I was hoping I could still get some ale for the night.
String: 本来还想讨杯麦酒当宵夜呢。

OriginString: I can still serve you if you'd like.
String: 如果您需要的话，我还可以招待。

OriginString: I'd appreciate it. Thanks.
String: 那太好了。多谢。

OriginString: Wait a moment.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 请稍等。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Here, Guild Master!
String: 给您，公会会长！

OriginString: Thanks.
String: 谢啦。

OriginString: *Gulp*, *Gulp* Ahhhhh! This one is pretty good.
String: *咕咚* *咕咚* 哈——！这杯真不错。

OriginString: ...Hard day, huh?
String: ...今天很辛苦吧？

OriginString: It was.
String: 是啊。

OriginString: It had to be if you just show up now.
String: 难怪这个点才过来。

OriginString: Nah, that wasn't the reason. I just don't like to drink with too many people around.
String: 那倒不是。我只是不喜欢人多的场合喝酒。

OriginString: So you just waited until no one else was around to drink?
String: 所以专门等到没人才来喝？

OriginString: Pretty much.
String: 差不多吧。

OriginString: I had the impression you were more sociable than that when you were around the adventurers.
String: 可你和冒险者们相处时看起来挺开朗的啊。

OriginString: I'm their Guild Master. Of course I need them to like me.
String: 我是他们的公会会长。当然得让他们喜欢我。

OriginString: ...Please don't tell them that.
String: ...这话可别告诉他们。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hahaha, are you already getting drunk?
String: <?shakeScreen>哈哈哈，你该不会是已经醉了吧？

OriginString: Of course not! It takes far more than that before I even start to become drunk!
String: 开什么玩笑！这点酒连微醺都算不上！

OriginString: Doesn't it feel kinda lonely to drink by yourself?
String: 一个人喝酒不觉得寂寞吗？

OriginString: I'm used to it. I drank alone the last ten years.
String: 习惯了。过去十年我都是一个人喝的。

OriginString:
...That's an awfully long time. 
And before that?
String:
...那可真是够久的。
在那之前呢？

OriginString: ...Before that...I used to drink with Franny.
String: ...在那之前...我都是和弗兰尼一起喝。

OriginString: You mean the former Guild Master?
String: 你是说前任公会会长？

OriginString:
Yeah...
But he's dead now...
String:
"是啊..."
"但他现在已经死了..."

OriginString:
...You know what?
Just give me two more bottles of ale and I'll just drink in my room.
String:
“...要不这样？
再给我来两瓶麦酒，我回房间自己喝算了。"

OriginString: There is no reason for me to keep you from going to bed any longer.
String: 没理由再耽误你休息了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I can't let you do that.
String: <?whiteFlash>这可不行。

OriginString: This isn't a takeway place, Guild Master! If you want to drink, you have to do it here!
String: 这里可不是外卖店，公会会长！想喝酒就得在这儿喝！

OriginString: But...I have a counter offer.
String: 不过...我有个提议。

OriginString: I'll go and get another cup and we can drink together.
String: 我去拿个杯子来陪你喝。

OriginString: ...You don't have to do this.
String: ...你不必这样的。

OriginString: Why not? Don't tell me you're afraid that you can't keep up with me?
String: 为什么不？该不会是怕喝不过我吧？

OriginString: I mean you're awfully loose-lipped after just one cup of ale.
String: 毕竟你才喝了一杯就开始话多了。

OriginString: I'll be a lousy companion.
String: 我会是个糟糕的酒伴。

OriginString:
Hey! I'm part of the Guild too! That means just like with your adventurers you need me to like you too!
So you have to try harder than that!
String:
喂！我也是公会的一员！就像你需要冒险者们喜欢你一样，你也得让我喜欢你才行！
所以你得更努力些！

OriginString: For example you could start by saying that my drinks will also be on your tab.
String: 比如先说好我的酒钱也算在你账上。

OriginString: ...Fine, you win. I'll try and have a nice time with you. And just so you know, I don't think you can keep up with me.
String: ...好吧，你赢了。我会试着和你好好相处。 不过先说好，我觉得你可跟不上我的节奏。

OriginString: I've hardly ever seen anybody who could drink me under the table.
String: 能把我喝趴下的人可不多见。

OriginString: Then how about we make a bet? The first one to vomit has to pay the drinks of the winner?
String: 那打个赌如何？先吐的人要替赢家付酒钱？

OriginString: Deal! This will be easy.
String: 成交！这太简单了。

OriginString: You're underestimating me, Guild Master!
String: 你太小看我了，公会会长！

OriginString: ...Really? So that's what happened in the end? That seems farfetched.
String: 真的？所以事情的经过就是这样？这听起来太离谱了。

OriginString: Hand on heart. It's exactly as I told you.
String: 我以良心担保。事情经过就是我说的那样。

OriginString: Hahaha! And then my husband had to walk all the way back to the dormitories without his pants! And I was like "Honey, I think at this point you can just walk straight. You're doing a poor job of hiding your manhood."
String: 哈哈哈！然后我老公就只能光着屁股一路走回宿舍！我当时就说：""亲爱的，都到这地步了你还遮什么遮啊，你那活儿根本藏不住好吗。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Pfft! Hahaha *cough*, *cough*. Damn, I shouldn't have taken a sip in that moment.
String: <?shakeScreen>噗！哈哈哈*咳*，*咳*。该死，我就不该在这时候喝水的。

OriginString: ...And I told Franny: "Franny! I'm 99% sure, he has no sick grandmother and we're just walking into an ambush!".
String: ...然后我对弗兰妮说："弗兰妮！我百分之九十九确定，他根本就没有生病的奶奶，我们这是自投罗网！"。

OriginString: And then what happened?
String: 然后发生了什么？

OriginString: We walked into an ambush!
String: 我们果然中埋伏了！

OriginString: You...you shtopped drinking. That's not...fair.
String: 你...你居然停杯了。这不...公平。

OriginString: Dat'ss cause you're behind a cup. Ughh....You need to drink fisht before I continue.
String: 那素因为你杯子里还有酒...呃...你得先喝完这杯鱼酒，我才能继续喝。

OriginString: Ugh...my head...
String: 呃...我的头...

OriginString: ...Tavi are you...Urrrgh...still alive?
String: ...塔薇你...呃...还活着吗？

OriginString: ...uggghhh...doesn't feel like it.
String: ...呃呃呃...感觉不像还活着。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...
String: <?whiteFlash>...

OriginString: Why are the both of you lying on the ground?
String: 你们俩为什么躺在地上？

OriginString: Oh! Fiola! Hi! I...<?shakeScreen>*bleurgh*
String: 噢！菲奥拉！嗨！我...<?shakeScreen>*呕*

OriginString:
HAH! I WON!
Urgh....<?shakeScreen>*bleurgh*
String:
哈！我赢了！
呃....<?shakeScreen>*呕*

OriginString: Wonderful...Just wonderful...
String: 太好了...真是太好了...

OriginString: Please, Falken! Please do this for me!
String: 求你了法尔肯！请帮我这个忙！

OriginString: Are you sure about this?
String: 你确定要这么做？

OriginString: Yes...I've been watching him and I don't think he had a proper meal for days now.
String: 是的...我观察他好几天了，他好像一直没好好吃饭。

OriginString: He's already starting to look pale. If we don't do something he'll collapse.
String: 他的脸色已经开始发白了。如果我们不做点什么，他会垮掉的。

OriginString: And that's why you want me to deliver him the food you made for him...
String: 所以你想让我替你送你给他做的饭...

OriginString: ...and tell him it's from me?
String: ...然后告诉他这是我自己做的？

OriginString: Y-yes. If it's from me, he might not eat it...
String: 是-是的。如果是我送的，他可能不会吃...

OriginString: Why me?
String: 为什么是我？

OriginString: Y-You're friends, right? I thought he might listen to you.
String: 你-你们是朋友对吧？我觉得他可能会听你的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak> Not the "I personally made a homemade lunch for you and it's not weird"-kind of friends.
String: <?shakeScreenWeak> 但还没到"我亲手做了爱心便当给你一点都不奇怪"这种朋友程度。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Please Falken! I'm worried about him! If he collapses and I did nothing, I will never forgive myself!
String: <?shakeScreen> 求你了法尔肯！我很担心他！如果他倒下而我什么都没做，我永远都不会原谅自己！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh! Falken. It's good to see you!
String: <?whiteFlash>噢！法尔肯。很高兴见到你！

OriginString: ...Hi Eden.
...You look kinda pale, you know?
String: ...你看起来有点苍白。

OriginString: Is it that obvious?
String: 这么明显吗？

OriginString: I have to confess I've been preoccupied lately and haven't had much time to rest.
String: 我得承认最近心事重重，没什么时间休息。

OriginString: What about food?
String: 那吃饭呢？

OriginString: I'd be lying if I said I had much.
String: 老实说吃得不多。

OriginString: I...actually brought food for you.
String: 我...其实给你带了吃的。

OriginString: Oh, really? That's really nice of you.
String: 真的吗？你太贴心了。

OriginString: ...These look like they're handmade.
String: ...这些看起来是手工做的。

OriginString: ...Yes...I made it.
String: ...嗯...是我做的。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh! I see...
String: <?whiteFlash>噢...原来如此...

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>*whispers* 
*Do you think that...* 
*I always thought they were kinda close* 
*Handmade even*
String:
<?shakeScreen>*窃窃私语*"
*你看他们* 
*我一直觉得他们关系不一般*
居然是亲手做的

OriginString: Thank you, Falken! I'll be eating it later.
String: 谢谢你法尔肯！我等会儿就吃。

OriginString:
G-Good.
...Good.
String: 好...很好。

OriginString: Well, I think it's time for me to...
String: 那个，我该走了...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...
String: <?whiteFlash>...

OriginString: (...You want me to make sure that he'll eat it?)
String: (...你是要我看着他吃完？)

OriginString: *sigh* Eden? You're free right now, right?
String: *叹气* 伊登？你现在有空吧？

OriginString:
Well, I guess there is nothing urgent to take care of right now.
Why?
String:
"好吧，看来现在也没什么紧急的事要处理。
怎么了？"

OriginString: ...I want you to eat the food I made for you, right now.
String: ...我要你现在就吃掉我给你做的食物。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>*Even louder whispers* 
*I knew it!* 
*Isn't that sweet?*
String:
<?shakeScreen>*更大的窃窃私语*
*我就知道！*
*太甜蜜了吧*

OriginString: Well, I don't think it's neccessary...
String: 我觉得没必要这样...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Just do it!
String: <?shakeScreen>给我吃！

OriginString: ...Okay...
...You know, Falken. You're a really nice guy, but...
String: ...法尔肯，你知道吗，你人真的很好，但是...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Just shut up and eat the damn food! And don't you dare ever let me see you go without food again.
String: <?shakeScreen>闭嘴赶紧吃！再让我发现你不吃饭试试！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Y-yes, sir!
String: <?shakeScreen>是、是！

OriginString: (Are you happy now?)
String: (现在满意了？)

OriginString: (I wonder how Emily is currently doing.)
String: (我很好奇艾米丽现在怎么样了。)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>!!!!!
String: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>!!!!!

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>E-EMILY!
String: <?shakeScreen>艾...艾米丽！

OriginString: After a short trip to the temple.
String: 在去神殿的短暂旅程之后。

OriginString: Phew! That was a close one!
String: 呼！好险啊！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> What the hell happened? They said you were poisoned!
String: <?shakeScreen>到底怎么回事？他们说你中毒了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Is someone trying to kill you?
String: <?shakeScreen>有人要谋害你吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No! No one is trying to kill me! The truth is...
String: <?shakeScreen>不！没人要害我！其实是...

OriginString: ...I might have tried eating a poison gland...
String: ...我可能尝了尝毒腺...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...What?
String: <?whiteFlash>...什么？

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>I-It's perfectly normal! You see, alchemists used to do that all the time!
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>这-这很正常！你看，炼金术士以前经常这么干！

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>They would try out the ingredients to better understand the alchemical properties!
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>他们通过试吃原料来更好地理解炼金特性！

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>I've done it a lot in the past! I'm pretty resistent against poison! Anyone else in that situation would have instantly died instead of getting paralyzed!
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>我以前经常这么干！我对毒药很有抗性！换别人碰到这种情况早就当场暴毙而不是只是麻痹了！

OriginString: ...Please stop looking at me like I'm insane...
String: ...别用看疯子的眼神看着我...

OriginString: ...How did you manage to survive so far?
String: ...你到底是怎么活到现在的？

OriginString: ...You're starting to sound like my mother.
String: ...你说话开始像我妈了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>With good reasons, young lady!
String: <?shakeScreen>这不无道理，小姑娘！

OriginString: I hope from now you'll never try to ever eat any of these ingredients here again!
String: 希望你从今往后再也不要去碰这些原料了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>But I need to if I want to be a better alchemist! It's important for my work!
String: <?shakeScreen>可我想成为更好的炼金术士就必须这么做！这对我的工作很重要！

OriginString: Then at least promise me not to eat the poisonous ingredients.
String: 那你至少保证不吃有毒的原料。

OriginString: But they're the most delic...
String: 但它们是最美...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I mean the most important ones of all!
String: <?whiteFlash>我是说最重要的一类！

OriginString: ...What was that? What were you going to say before that?
String: ...刚才说什么？你本来想说什么？

OriginString: ...I have no idea what you mean, mom - I mean - Guild Master!
String: ...我不知道您在说什么，妈——我是说——会长大人！

OriginString: It sounded like you actually like to eat...
String: 听起来你好像真的很爱吃...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Oh right! I still needed to do some errands!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>啊对了！我还有杂事要办！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen> Hey!
<?shakeScreen> We're not done talking, young lady! Come right back here!
String:
<?shakeScreen> 喂！
<?shakeScreen> 我们还没说完呢，小姑娘！快回来！

OriginString: Now we have to take the path to the west.
String: 现在我们必须走西边的路。

OriginString: Be careful. There is another patrol ahead.
String: 小心点。前面还有一队巡逻兵。

OriginString: We've almost reached the hideout. We only have to follow the path in the north.
String: 我们快到藏身处了。只要沿着北边的小路走就行。

OriginString: *Whistling a carefree tune*
String: *吹着无忧无虑的曲子*

OriginString: ...What are you doing?
String: ...你在干什么？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>G-Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>公、公会会长！

OriginString: Hmm? Is someone there?
String: 嗯？有人在吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Fast, Guild Master! We have to hide!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>快躲起来，会长！我们得藏好！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: W-wait!<?shakeScreen>
String: 等、等等！<?shakeScreen>

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>I guess it was just the wind.
String: ...<?whiteFlash>大概只是风声吧。

OriginString: Will you tell me now what you're doing? Because it seemed like you were spying on Me'can.
String: 现在能告诉我你在搞什么吗？看起来你好像在监视梅肯。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Of course I was spying on the merchant! Look at him!
String: <?shakeScreen>我当然在监视那个商人！你看看他！

OriginString: *Continues whistling an innocent tune*
String: *继续吹着天真无邪的小调*

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I've tried for so long to find any info about that man but nothing! I've found nothing!
String: <?shakeScreen>我花了这么久调查那个男人，却一无所获！完全找不到线索！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Even worse than nothing! I have the suspicion that he is actually messing with my investigations.
String: <?shakeScreen>比一无所获更糟！我怀疑他根本就是在干扰我的调查！

OriginString: How so?
String: 怎么说？

OriginString:
...
For a while I thought he was my grandmother...
String:
...
有一瞬间我还以为他是我奶奶...

OriginString: ...You have to give me the details to that.
String: ...这个你得详细说说。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>N-Nevermind that!
String: <?shakeScreen>别、别提这个了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>How could you let such a suspicious person freely roam around here?
String: <?shakeScreen>你怎么能让这么可疑的人在公会里自由活动？

OriginString: "Said the mysterious hooded woman, incapable of seeing the irony in her statement."
String: 说这话时，这个神秘兜帽女完全没意识到自己的话有多讽刺。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>T-This is different!
String: <?shakeScreen>这、这不一样！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>W-wait! Something is happening.
String: <?whiteFlash>等、等等！有情况。

OriginString:
Looks like nobody is watching. Let's contact HQ.
*Pulls out a scroll*
String:
看来没人注意。联系总部吧。
*拿出卷轴*

OriginString: <?grayFlash>Message!
String: <?grayFlash>通讯！

OriginString: ...Can you hear me?
String: ...听得到吗？

OriginString: Good. Good. I like to report that they still don't suspect a thing.
String: 很好。很好。报告：他们仍未起疑。

OriginString: Yes, everything is ready for tonight's operation. Everything is in place.
String: 是的，今晚行动一切就绪。所有安排都已到位。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-I knew it! He's trying something!
String: <?shakeScreen>我、我就知道！他要搞事情！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We have to regroup and discuss how to respond to this threat!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们得集合商讨对策！

OriginString: Meet me at my secret hiding spot!
String: 到我的秘密据点集合！

OriginString: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen><?fadeOutNPC>Wait! I don't even know...*cough*, *cough*!
String: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen><?fadeOutNPC>等等！我都不知道...*咳*、*咳*！

OriginString: (She's gone.)
String: (她已经消失了。)

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Hello, Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>你好啊，公会会长！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>M-Me'can!
String: <?shakeScreen>梅、梅肯！

OriginString: ...You knew we were here, didn't you?
String: ...你早就知道我们在这儿，对吧？

OriginString: Very much so.
String: 当然啦。

OriginString: And the scroll you used earlier?
String: 那你刚才用的卷轴是？

OriginString: Just a magical scroll that creates a short bright light.
String: 就是个会发强光的魔法卷轴而已。

OriginString: So, you were just messing around?
String: 所以...你纯粹是在恶作剧？

OriginString: Guilty as charged.
String: 我认罪。

OriginString: ...You know that one day she is going to snap, kidnap you, and interrogate you, right?
String: ...你知道她迟早会爆发，把你绑起来严刑拷问的，对吧？

OriginString: And the first two words that'll come out of my mouth will be: "Worth it!"
String: 到时候我开口说的第一句话肯定是："值了！

OriginString: *sighs* Why do we keep having this conversation?
String: *叹气* 我们为什么老要谈这个？

OriginString: I'd be perfectly fine if we drop it.
String: 我巴不得别再提了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>The hell we will! The adventurers keep complaining about you!
String: <?shakeScreen>想得美！冒险者们都在投诉你！

OriginString: I mean did you really have to make them run laps around the training ground for each mistake they made?
String: 我是说...有必要每犯个错就让他们绕训练场跑圈吗？

OriginString: I mean in your eye everyone makes ten mistakes.
String: 在你眼里每个人都能挑出十个错来。

OriginString: I'm just making sure that they'll make it as adventurers. You know as well as I do that even a single mistake could cost them their lifes.
String: 我只是确保他们能活着当冒险者。你和我都清楚，一个失误就可能要了他们的命。

OriginString: But they'll hate you!
String: 但他们会恨你的！

OriginString: So what? I don't care what they think about me!
String: 那又怎样？我才不在乎他们怎么想！

OriginString: ...Do you really want to make everyone your enemy?
String: 你真的想让大家成为你的敌人吗？

OriginString: I'm worried about you, Astrid.
String: 我很担心你，阿斯特丽德。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Why do you care?
String: <?whiteFlash>你为什么要关心这个？

OriginString: I mean, we've known each other for years now. We're friends, so of course I'm worried.
String: 我是说，我们认识这么多年了。我们是朋友，我当然会担心。

OriginString: ...We're not friends. We're colleagues at best.
String: ...我们不是朋友。最多算是同事。

OriginString: And even that doesn't mean much.
String: 就连这层关系也没什么意义。

OriginString: ...I'm tired of this conversation. Come to me if you really have something important to talk about.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...我厌倦这场对话了。真有要事再来找我。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...*sighs*
Finally, another day of horrible training is over.
String: 终于结束了这地狱般的训练日。

OriginString: You can say that again.
String: 说得太对了。

OriginString: Did it seem to you like that tyrannical woman was in an even worse mood than usual today?
String: 你不觉得那个女暴君今天心情比平时还糟吗？

OriginString: How I am supposed to tell? Her default emotion is angry.
String: 这怎么看得出来？她平时就一副生人勿近的样子。

OriginString: I'm really tired of that woman letting out her frustration in the training sessions.
String: 我受够她把怨气发泄在训练课上了。

OriginString: Me too. But you know what?
String: 我也一样。但你知道吗？

OriginString: I still prefer her training sessions over those with that cripple "Falken".
String: 比起那个残废"法尔肯"的训练课，我宁愿上她的。

OriginString: Feels wrong to learn something from someone who would just fall in a real battle.
String: 向一个实战中肯定会倒下的人学东西，感觉太不对劲了。

OriginString: Yeah, what's up with that? I'm pretty sure I could take him on in a fight. And I'm supposed to learn from somebody like that?
String: 就是，凭什么啊？我觉得我都能打赢他。居然要向这种人学习？

OriginString: Anybody could take him on! Hey, how about next time when we see the cripple, we embarass him by...<?shakeScreen><?fadeOutNPC>
String: 谁都打得过他！嘿，下次见到那个残废时，我们不如这样羞辱他...<?shakeScreen><?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...
String: <?whiteFlash>...

OriginString: A-Astrid!
String: 阿...阿斯特丽德！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What the hell was that punch for?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你突然打人干什么？！

OriginString: ...How about before talking about taking on a cripple you try fighting a one-eyed, huh?
String: ...在讨论怎么欺负残废之前，不如先试试挑战独眼龙如何？

OriginString: Here are some more bandages.
String: 这里还有些绷带。

OriginString: Thanks Tavi.
String: 谢了，塔维。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Careful! It stings!
String: <?shakeScreen>当心！会疼的！

OriginString: Serves you right! Getting into a fight with the adventurers. What were you thinking?
String: 活该！谁让你和冒险者打架的。你到底在想什么？

OriginString: None of your business what I was thinking.
String: 我在想什么不关你的事。

OriginString: ...What are you smiling about?
String: ...你笑什么？

OriginString: ...I've just remembered the last time I bandaged you like this.
String: ...我突然想起上次这样给你包扎的时候。

OriginString:
At that time you were still an adventurer and it was just coincidence that no one else was there to treat your wounds. 
So in the end, I decided to do it myself.
String:
"那时候你还只是个冒险者，碰巧没有其他人在场给你疗伤。"
"所以最后，我决定亲自来处理。"

OriginString: I first thought that you just started a fight because that's how you were but I was surprised when people told me you stood up for a fellow adventurer who was being harassed.
String: 我起初以为你打架是因为本性如此，但听说你是为被骚扰的同伴冒险者出头时，我很惊讶。

OriginString: Was it something like that this time also?
String: 这次也是类似的情况吗？

OriginString: You have no reason to believe that.
String: 你没理由相信这个。

OriginString: I think I know you long enough now to know that. You might not think that we are friends but I still think I know you well enough to know that you wouldn't start a fight without a reason.
String: 我想我认识你够久了，能明白这点。你可能不觉得我们是朋友，但我还是足够了解你，知道你不会无缘无故打架。

OriginString: ...You don't know that...You will never know that.
String: ...你不了解...你永远不会了解。

OriginString: If you believe in people, you'll just be disappointed.
String: 如果相信别人，你只会失望。

OriginString: ...You have to let it go, Astrid. They're gone. He is gone...
String: ...你得放下，阿斯特丽德。他们已经不在了。他已经不在了...

OriginString: ...About earlier...when I said we're just colleagues.
String: ...关于之前...我说我们只是同事的事。

OriginString: ...Maybe...we're more than that...
String: ...也许...我们不止是那样...

OriginString: ...So we're friends?
String: ...所以我们算朋友了？

OriginString: ...Good aquaintances...
You're really not making it easy, are you?
String: 你还真是不肯轻易松口啊。

OriginString: Hey Barret! I need you repair something for....
String: 嘿巴雷特！我需要你修个东西...

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>?!
Oh, Majika! You're also here?
String: <?whiteFlash>？！噢，玛吉卡！你也在？

OriginString: Indeed, Guild Master. It's tea time after all.
String: 当然，公会会长。现在是下午茶时间。

OriginString: (Now, that I'm looking. The two of them are really currently drinking tea together.)
String: （仔细一看，他们俩确实正在一起喝茶。）

OriginString: Etiquette demands that I ask you if you'd also like a cup of tea.
String: 按礼节我该问你是否也要来杯茶。

OriginString: Well, uh...I...
I'll just interpret that as an affirmative to save us both time.
String: 我就当你是默认了，省得浪费时间。

OriginString: Barret, would you kindly?
String: 巴雷特，有劳了？

OriginString: ...<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...Here Guild Master.
String: ...给，公会会长。

OriginString: ...Uh...thanks.
<?whiteFlash>It's good! Where did you get the tea leaves?
String: <?whiteFlash>好喝！这茶叶哪来的？

OriginString: Grew it in my garden.
String: 我花园里种的。

OriginString: ...You...have a garden?
Yes.
String: 对。

OriginString: I see...(I can not read this guy.)
String: 这样啊...（完全看不透这家伙。）

OriginString: I have to say, I'm quite surprised to see you two spend time together. I didn't really think you had anything in common.
String: 说实话看到你们俩在一起挺意外的。没想到你们有什么共同点。

OriginString: Why not? Barret here makes excellent tea and is also an excellent conversation partner. Unlike most people, he does not extensively talk about trivial matters that is of no concern.
String: 为何没有？巴雷特不仅茶艺精湛，还是个出色的谈话对象。不像多数人总爱喋喋不休地谈论无关紧要的琐事。

OriginString: (Do you actually converse at all?)
String: （你们真的有在交流吗？）

OriginString: Are you two...perhaps an item?
String: 你们俩...该不会是一对吧？

OriginString: It is disconcerting to witness the propensity of younger generations to assert unsupported theories without a foundation in empirical evidence.
String: 年轻一代总爱在缺乏实证基础的情况下妄下论断，这种现象实在令人不安。

OriginString: Uh...what?
We're not an item.
String: 我们不是一对。

OriginString: (Couldn't she just have said that?)
String: （她直接这么说会死吗？）

OriginString: And it's also worth noting that that we have both already married and have families of our own.
String: 另外值得注意的是，我们都已经成家立业了。

OriginString: I see...<?shakeScreen>Wait, what!? You are?
String: 这样啊...<?shakeScreen>等等，什么！？你们结婚了？

OriginString: Yes. I have a husband and a son. They're both living in Cragmond right now.
String: 是的。我有丈夫和儿子，他们现在住在克雷格蒙德。

OriginString: Wife and daughter. Wife died years ago.
String: 妻子和女儿。妻子多年前去世了。

OriginString: Daughter lives with son-in-law and granddaughter in a village not too far from here.
String: 女儿和女婿还有孙女住在离这不远的村子里。

OriginString: ...I..uh see.
String: ...我...呃明白了。

OriginString: Considering our advanced age, our familial composition should not come as a surprise to you, Guild Master.
String: 考虑到我们的年纪，会长您对我们的家庭构成不该感到意外。

OriginString: I...guess not. I just never thought about it.
String: 我...猜也是。只是从没想过这茬。

OriginString: Although, I have to say, that I would never have imagined that you of all people settled down.
String: 不过说真的，我完全没想到你会安定下来。

OriginString: Believe me Guild Master, when I say that I did not plan on it, when I first met my husband.
String: 相信我会长，当初遇见我丈夫时，我可没这个打算。

OriginString: I rather disliked his advances on me but even mountains can slowly get whittled down by water.
String: 起初很反感他的追求，但水滴石穿，连高山也会被慢慢磨平。

OriginString: I feel like I have so many questions.
String: 我感觉有太多问题想问了。

OriginString: *sighs* This is why Barret is the only one here I can have a decent conversation with.
String: *叹气*所以这里只有巴雷特能正经聊天。

OriginString: Don't translate
String: Don't translate

OriginString: I can see the dragon! He's just a bit further up!
String: 我看到龙了！就在前面不远处！

OriginString: Now go and slay it!
String: 快去干掉它！

OriginString: Me? I will be staying here and give you support.
String: 我？我会留在这里给你们支援。

OriginString: Moral support that is.
String: 精神上的支援。

OriginString: Now go and make it epic!
String: 快去创造传奇吧！

OriginString: <?screenShake>Guild Master! Have you seen Zoldak anywhere?
String: <?screenShake>公会会长！你看到佐尔达克了吗？

OriginString: Eh... No?
String: 呃...没看见？

OriginString:
By the gods! Where is that man? I've looked everywhere and can't find a trace of him!
I'm worried if he's alone by himself.
String:
"诸神在上！那家伙跑哪去了？我到处都找遍了，连个影子都没见着！
真担心他一个人会不会出事。"

OriginString: Zoldak? I think I saw him leaving the Guild this morning. He mentioned going on patrol against evil or something like that.
String: 佐尔达克？今早我看见他离开公会了。他说要去巡逻除害什么的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What!? Why didn't you stop him?
String: <?shakeScreen>什么！？你怎么不拦住他？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-I didn't think it was that big of a deal.
String: <?shakeScreen>我...我觉得这没什么大不了的啊。

OriginString: He's not a child, Eden. He seems to still be fit for his age, and besides, the area around here is pretty safe.
String: 他不是小孩子了，伊登。以他的年纪来说身手还算矫健，而且这附近挺安全的。

OriginString: I'm sure there's nothing to worry about. He'll probably be back in no time without any issues.
String: 肯定不会有事的。估计他很快就会平安回来了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>M-Mr. Eden! Some travelers just carried Zoldak back to the Guild! He's injured!
String: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>伊、伊登先生！有旅人把佐尔达克抬回公会了！他受伤了！

OriginString: T-They say he fought a bear bare-handed!
String: "听-听说他徒手和熊搏斗过！"

OriginString: ...Now that I'm thinking about it, I was never much of a gambler.
String: ...现在想想，我从来就不是个赌徒啊。

OriginString: Great work, boy! I'm back on my feet, ready to fight evil once more!
String: 干得好小子！我又能站起来了，随时准备继续惩奸除恶！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>You will not! What the hell were you thinking? Didn't I tell you to stop doing these 'patrols'?
You nearly died today!
String: <?shakeScreen>你休想！你到底在想什么？我不是说过别再去"巡逻"了吗？今天差点就送命了！

OriginString: B-But it was for a just cause! I saw some travelers being chased by a bear, and I had to intervene!
String: 可、可这是正义之举啊！我看到有旅人被熊追赶，必须出手相助！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>By fighting it bare-handed?
String: <?shakeScreen>所以就徒手和熊打架？

OriginString: W-well, it didn't seem necessary to kill it. So, I thought I could maybe simply chase it away through intimidation.
String: 那、那个...我觉得没必要杀死它。所以想用威慑的方式把它吓跑。

OriginString: I guess that didn't really work out, did it?
String: 看来这招不怎么管用啊？

OriginString: No, it did not. In fact, I could swear it was laughing at me.
String: 确实不管用。说真的，我发誓那熊当时在嘲笑我。

OriginString: In the end, I did manage to chase it away, but not before sustaining serious injuries.
String: 虽然最后还是把它赶跑了，但自己也受了重伤。

OriginString: I have to admit, that's kinda impressive.
String: 不得不承认，这还挺厉害的。

OriginString: Please don't encourage him, Guild Master!
String: 会长，请别鼓励他了！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Uh... Excuse me?
String: <?whiteFlash>...呃...打扰一下？

OriginString: And you are?
String: 你是？

OriginString: W-we're the travelers who were chased by the bear.
String: 我、我们是被熊追赶的旅人。

OriginString: You were the ones who carried Zoldak back! I'm sorry! I forgot to thank you for that.
String: 是你们把佐尔达克带回来的！对不起！我忘了向你们道谢。

OriginString: N-no, no, no! We're the ones who are grateful! If it weren't for your friend here, we might have ended up in the belly of the beast.
String: 不、不、不！该说谢谢的是我们！要不是你们这位朋友，我们可能已经葬身熊腹了。

OriginString: For that, you have our gratitude, sir Paladin.
String: 为此，我们向您表达谢意，圣骑士先生。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>There is no need! It is my duty to help anyone in need.
String: <?shakeScreen>不必如此！帮助需要帮助的人是我的职责。

OriginString:
...*Sighs*...
I'll drop the issue for now, Zoldak. I just want you to be more careful.
String:
...*叹气*...
佐尔达克，这事我暂时不提了。只是希望你以后多加小心。

OriginString:
Helping is all well and good, but you also need to think about yourself more.
Promise me that you won't put yourself in danger like that anymore.
String:
"帮助别人是好事，但你也要多为自己想想。"
"答应我，以后别再这样让自己陷入危险了。"

OriginString: ...I...<?whiteFlash>cannot promise that.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...我...<?whiteFlash>不能保证。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>W-What?! Come back here, Zoldak!<?fadeOutNPC>
What do you mean by that?
String: <?shakeScreen>什-什么？！你给我回来，佐尔达克！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...(It's like he's obsessed with helping people.)
String: ...（他简直像是沉迷于帮助别人。）

OriginString: Now watch me do it.
String: 现在看我的示范。

OriginString: <?grayFlash>(Luana demonstrated an impressive advanced sword technique combined with a fire spell. After the attack hit the unfortunate target, a wooden dummy, there was nothing left but burned pieces.)
String: <?grayFlash>（露安娜展示了一套令人印象深刻的进阶剑术与火焰魔法的组合技。攻击命中那个倒霉的靶子——木制假人后，现场只剩下一堆燃烧的碎片。）

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>T-That was AWESOME!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>太、太厉害啦！！！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Miss Luana! Can you watch me perform that technique from yesterday and tell me if it's good?
String: <?shakeScreen>露安娜小姐！能请您看看我昨天学的那招练得怎么样吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No! Watch me cast that Ice spell I've learned just for you!
String: <?shakeScreen>不行！先看我施展特意为您学的冰系魔法！

OriginString: ...She certainly seems popular with the adventurers.
String: ...她在冒险者中人气真高啊。

OriginString: That's because she's a good teacher. The way she teaches is easy to understand, and she pays good attention to where the adventurers make mistakes.
String: 因为她是个好老师。教得通俗易懂，还会仔细指出冒险者们犯错的地方。

OriginString:
Her own skills with magic and the blade also make them respect her a lot, and yet, despite all of that, she doesn't act superior with anybody.
It's only natural for them to cling to her like moths to a flame.
String:
"她精通魔法与剑术的本事也让大家对她敬佩有加，但即便这样，她也从不对任何人摆架子。"
"大伙儿自然都像飞蛾扑火般黏着她不放。"

OriginString: I see...
String: 原来如此...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>You don't seem happy about it.
String: <?whiteFlash>你看起来不太高兴。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>W-what?! W-why would you think that?
O-of course, I'm happy that my friend is so popular and gets so much attention!
String: <?shakeScreen>什、什么？怎、怎么会！朋友这么受欢迎我当然开心啊！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Am I worried that she might find other friends and lose interest in me? Of course not!
String: <?shakeScreen>担心她交到新朋友就不理我？才没有这种事！

OriginString: ...Okay, maybe I'm a little worried.
String: ...好吧，可能是有那么点担心。

OriginString: Never thought you'd be the possessive type.
String: 没想到你占有欲这么强。

OriginString: ...She's just that special. For a long time, I had no one else I could call a friend.
String: ...她对我很特别。在那之前，我从来没有能称为朋友的人。

OriginString:
No offense, but you two look like you're from two completely different worlds.
How did you meet?
String:
"无意冒犯，但你们俩看起来像是来自两个完全不同的世界。
你们是怎么认识的？"

OriginString: You don't have to say it if you don't want to.
String: 不想说可以不说。

OriginString: ...No. I think I need to tell you this... Although... I'm afraid of how you might react...
String: ...不，我觉得应该告诉你...只是...怕你知道后的反应...

OriginString: It was a long time ago, when I was more of a kid than an adult. In a time where I was still...
String: 那是很久以前，我还是个毛头小子的时候。那时候我其实...

OriginString: ..*breathes out* ...<?whiteFlash>an assassin...
String: ...*深呼吸* ...<?whiteFlash>是个刺客...

OriginString: ...You don't seem surprised.
String: ...你好像不惊讶。

OriginString: ...Considering your skills, I can't deny that that possibility might have already crossed my mind.
String: ...以你的身手，我确实考虑过这种可能性。

OriginString: ...Are you disappointed in me?
String: ...对我失望了吗？

OriginString:
I'd be lying if I said that I didn't hope my hunch was wrong but... that part of your life is behind you, isn't it?
Then I'll just leave it at that.
String:
"要我说不希望自己的预感出错...那肯定是假话。不过...那段往事对你来说已经翻篇了，对吧？"
"那我就不多说了。"

OriginString: It happened during one of my assignments. I was still young, and despite my talents, I made a mistake that nearly cost me my life.
String: 这件事在我的一次任务中发生了。我还是个年轻人，尽管有点天分，但我犯了一个差点让我丧命的错误。

OriginString:
It was Luana who found me collapsed on the streets and took me into her home and tended to my wounds. 
If it weren't for her, I might not even be alive anymore.
String:
是露安娜发现我倒在街上，把我带回家疗伤。
要不是她，我可能早就不在人世了。

OriginString: It took me months to recover, and in that time, I tried to get closer to her. Not because I was actually grateful, but because I thought an amicable relationship would make my life easier, trying to stay low at their home while recovering.
String: 我花了几个月才康复，期间试图亲近她。倒不是真心感激，只是觉得搞好关系能让我在她家养伤时过得轻松些。

OriginString: ..However, I actually ended up caring for her.
String: ..可到头来，我是真的在乎她了。

OriginString:
She was such a talented girl at a young age, and that's why she was so all alone. Jealousy and envy isolated her from those around her.
Maybe that's why she clung to me so easily when I showed a little affection.
String:
她小小年纪就才华横溢，正因如此才会如此孤独。嫉妒与猜忌让她与周围人格格不入。
也许这就是为什么——当我稍显温柔时，她就如此轻易地依赖上我。

OriginString:
...And maybe that was the same for me.
Just like her, I never had anyone close. We were just two lonely people who found each other.
String:
...或许我也是如此。和她一样，我从未与人亲近过。
我们不过是两个相遇的孤独灵魂。

OriginString:
Even after I recovered and left, I would occasionally secretly return to her, just to spend some time with her. 
I, of course, never told her really who I was or what I did,...
String:
即便痊愈离开后，我仍会偷偷回来看她，只为多陪陪她。
当然，我从没告诉她我的真实身份和所作所为...

OriginString: ...but I wonder if it was out of secrecy or out of fear of what she might think of me.
String: ...但说不清是为了保密，还是害怕知道她会怎么看待我。

OriginString: However, it all came out in the open with my last target. We were on opposing sides. The Crownguard started to become aware of our existence and tried to protect the target I was supposed to kill.
String: 直到最后一次任务让一切曝光。我们站在对立面。皇冠守卫察觉了我们的存在，开始保护我的刺杀目标。

OriginString: I actually managed to get to my target but...when I saw Luana on the opposing side,I...just couldn't do it.
String: 我本已得手...但看到对面的露安娜时...我下不了手。

OriginString: Not in front of her.
String: 至少不能当着她的面。

OriginString: I thought that that would be the end of it. I would be apprehended, and my relationship with Luana would come to an end.
String: 我以为一切都结束了。我会被捕，和露安娜的关系也将终结。

OriginString: However,...instead she let me go. And that decision cost her everything. Her position, her titles, her fame...everything she has ever worked for.
String: 然而...她却放走了我。这个决定让她失去了一切。地位、头衔、名誉...所有奋斗得来的东西。

OriginString: Soon after I left "them" and never saw Luana again. I was too ashamed to face her and just continued to look out for her from afar.
String: 不久后我离开了"组织"，再没见过露安娜。我无颜面对她，只能远远守护。

OriginString: Well, until, you know..."they" found out about her.
String: 直到...你知道的..."他们"发现了她的存在。

OriginString: I can see now why she's important to you.
String: 现在我明白她对你的意义了。

OriginString: ...You understand, right Guild Master? She has every reason to resent me for what has happened... and the only reason we were friends was that she had no one else.
String: ...你理解吧，会长？她有充分的理由恨我...而我们成为朋友仅仅是因为她别无选择。

OriginString: ...Maybe I'm worried because I know that I don't deserve her.
String: ...或许我担心的正是知道自己配不上她。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>What are you two talking about?
String: <?whiteFlash>你们在聊什么？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>L-Luana! I... eh... we...
String: <?shakeScreen>露、露安娜！我...呃...我们...

OriginString: We just talked about how much Rogue loves you.
String: 在说罗格有多爱你。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>G-Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>会、会长！

OriginString: I know. And I love her too!
String: 我知道啊。我也爱她！

OriginString: Ungh....
(I think you have nothing to worry about, Rogue.)
String: (看来你根本不用担心的，罗格。)

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Hm? Why is everyone gathered around like this?
String: <?whiteFlash>嗯？怎么大家都围在这儿？

OriginString:
...Bai...
We need to talk about your drinking.
String:
...白...
我们需要谈谈你的饮酒问题。

OriginString: That reminds me that I haven't had a drink for the day yet.
String: 你这么一说我才想起来今天还没喝呢。

OriginString: ...The day has just barely begun...
String: ...现在天才刚亮...

OriginString: And so?
String: 所以呢？

OriginString:
...*sighs* Bai; we've actually gathered here because we think that your drinking is becoming... 
...a problem.
String:
...*叹气* 白，其实我们聚在这里是因为觉得你喝酒已经
...成了个大问题

OriginString: A problem? How so?
String: 问题？怎么说？

OriginString: You keep passing out in the tavern, and I constantly have to let you sleep here on the floor because no one can wake you up.
String: 你总在酒馆醉得不省人事，我只能让你直接睡在地板上，因为根本叫不醒你。

OriginString: And anyone who tries to get too close to you to carry you to a bed gets a punch in the face.
String: 而且谁要是想把你抬到床上去，就会挨你一拳。

OriginString: Did I...?
String: 我有吗...？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Yes, Bai! It was my face!
String: <?shakeScreen>没错白！打的就是我的脸！

OriginString: Half the time you come to the training ground, you're drunk! And then you just start running around, beating up adventurers and calling it training.
String: 你去训练场有一半时间都是醉醺醺的！然后就追着冒险者打，还美其名曰特训。

OriginString: Hehehe, that's funny. I bet they get better at running away, though.
String: 嘿嘿嘿，真好玩。不过他们逃跑的本事肯定见长吧。

OriginString: Well...they do,<?shakeScreen> but that's not the point!
String: 是...他们是跑得快了，<?shakeScreen>但这不是重点！

OriginString:
We're worried about your health, Bai. Drinking so much booze can't be good for your liver.
We all just want you to live a little bit healthier and longer.
String:
"我们很担心你的健康，白。喝这么多酒对你的肝脏不好。"
"我们只是希望你能活得更健康、更长久一些。"

OriginString: ...Why are you really here?
String: ...你们到底为什么来的？

OriginString:
...Well...I...
...It would also be great if you'd stop sexually harassing me when you're drunk...
String:
...那个...我...
...你喝醉的时候也别老对我动手动脚的...

OriginString: Ah! Right! I guess I did that!
String: 啊！对哦！我好像干过这事！

OriginString: As you can see, there are many, many, many, many reasons why we would like you to drink a little bit less.
String: 你看，有太多太多太多的理由让我们希望你少喝点。

OriginString: Have I done anything to you too?
String: 我对你也做过什么吗？

OriginString: I'm your biggest victim because I'm the one who has to deal with all this headache.
String: 我才是最大的受害者，因为所有这些烂摊子都得我来收拾。

OriginString: Wow... I didn't realize how much of a pain in the ass I was.
String: 哇...我都没意识到自己原来这么讨人嫌。

OriginString: It's just that the booze here is so good, and back at my village, it became harder and harder to find a drink.
String: 主要是这里的酒太棒了，在我们村里越来越难喝到好酒了。

OriginString: (Something tells me that they just started to hide all the alcohol away from Bai.)
String: （直觉告诉我，村民们只是开始把酒都藏起来不让白找到）

OriginString: But I hear ya. Starting tomorrow, I'll stop drinking as much as I do now.
String: 不过你说得对。从明天开始，我会少喝点的。

OriginString: Grea...<?whiteFlash>Wait! Tomorrow?
String: 太...<?whiteFlash>等等！明天？

OriginString: Can't just let it end like this. Today I want to get completely hammered one last time!
String: 不能就这么结束啊。今天我要最后一次喝个痛快！

OriginString: Why don't you all join me? Just one more day of fun, and I promise I'll start behaving.
String: 大家一起来吧？就放纵最后一天，我保证以后会收敛的。

OriginString: Well, if you promise to drink less...
String: 好吧，如果你保证以后少喝的话...

OriginString: This feels like a bad idea, Guild Master...
String: 会长，这主意听起来不太妙啊...

OriginString: I guess it's just fair to meet her halfway.
String: 我觉得各退一步也挺公平。

OriginString: I haven't touched a drop of alcohol in a long time, but if this is what it takes...
String: 我很久没沾酒了，但如果是这种场合...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Great! Then let's have fun for the rest of the day!
String: <?shakeScreen>太棒了！那今天咱们就玩个尽兴！

OriginString: Bwahahahaha...<?whiteFlash>huh?
String: 哈哈哈哈...<?whiteFlash>咦？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What happened to everyone? You're just lying on the floor like you're all dead. Bwahahaha!
String: <?shakeScreen>大家怎么了？怎么都躺在地上像死了一样。哈哈哈哈！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh, shit. Are you?
String: <?whiteFlash>卧槽。该不会...？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Oh! Nope! There's the vomit! Hahahahaha!
String: <?shakeScreen>噢！没事！看到呕吐物了！哈哈哈哈！

OriginString: Your eyes gleam brighter than any diamond in existence, captivating and enchanting. Your hair flows like silk, gently embracing your tender shoulders.
String: 你的眼睛比世上任何钻石都要闪亮，迷人而迷人。你的头发像丝绸一样飘逸，轻轻地拥抱着你柔软的肩膀。

OriginString: Hah....
String: 哈啊...

OriginString: There he goes again.
String: 他又来了。

OriginString: Does he do that often?
String: 他经常这样吗？

OriginString:
Every time one of the girls approaches him.
He just showers them with praises and compliments, and they just melt like butter.
String:
每次有姑娘接近他时，
他就对她们大献殷勤、甜言蜜语，
搞得她们个个神魂颠倒。

OriginString: As expected of a bard.
String: 不愧是吟游诗人啊。

OriginString: You probably should put a stop to his indiscriminate flirting. There is already some friction between some of the female adventurers. This could end ugly if left unchecked.
String: 你该管管他这种四处撩妹的行为了。已经有几位女冒险者之间起了摩擦，再这样下去怕是要闹出乱子。

OriginString:
*Sighs* I'd rather not have that happening.
I'll talk to him.
String:
*叹气* 我真不希望发生这种事。
我去和他谈谈。

OriginString: Hey, Vincent.
String: 喂，文森特。

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>Oh, Guild Master! How wonderful to see you!
How can I be of service?
String: <?whiteFlash>啊呀，公会会长！见到您真是太荣幸了！有什么能为您效劳的吗？

OriginString: I need to talk to you privately.
String: 我需要和你单独谈谈。

OriginString:
Is that so? Well, then excuse me, my lady, but it seems my presence is required elsewhere.
But I promise I'll return to you soon.
String:
"是这样吗？那么恕我失陪了，女士，看来别处需要我的出现。
不过我保证很快就会回到你身边。"

OriginString: Don't make me wait too long!
String: 别让我等太久哦！

OriginString: (It seems like she's completely fallen for him.)
String: (看来她已经彻底沦陷了。)

OriginString: Alright, Vincent, you need to....
String: 好了文森特，你得...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh, thank the gods, you came, Guild Master! I wasn't sure what to do in that moment!
String: <?whiteFlash>噢，谢天谢地你来了，公会会长！我刚才完全不知道该怎么办！

OriginString: Huh?
String: 嗯？

OriginString: I-I think she likes me.
String: 我、我觉得她喜欢我。

OriginString: Well, duh...
String: 这不是明摆着吗...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>B-but I don't think she's the one!
String: <?shakeScreen>但、但我觉得她不是那个对的人！

OriginString: The one?
String: 对的人？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>You know! The one woman I'll spend the rest of my life with!
The only woman I should ever date!
String:
<?shakeScreen>你懂的！
那个我要共度余生的女人！唯一值得我交往的女人！

OriginString: How can I turn her down gently? I don't have much experience with women, so I'm not sure what to say.
String: 我该怎么委婉拒绝她？我不太会和女性相处，不知道该说什么。

OriginString: ...You're kidding.
String: ...你在开玩笑吧。

OriginString: Of course not! I'm always serious in regards to women!
String: 当然不是！在女性问题上我一向认真！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Then why do you keep flirting with every woman you meet?
String: <?shakeScreen>那你为什么对遇到的每个女性都调情？

OriginString: F-Flirting?! I'm just being nice!
String: 调、调情？！我只是在表示友好！

OriginString: My mother always taught me to always compliment women and treat them special!
String: 我母亲总教导我要经常赞美女性，把她们当作特别的存在！

OriginString:
...So you were just being an idiot...
I really thought you were a womanizer.
String:
"...所以你只是犯蠢而已..."
我还真以为你是个花花公子呢。

OriginString: Why would you think that? That's awful!
String: 你怎么会这么想？这也太糟糕了！

OriginString: I mean, you're a bard after all.
String: 毕竟你是个吟游诗人啊。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What does that have to do with anything?
String: <?shakeScreen>这有什么关系？

OriginString: I mean, you know... the whole 'the bard seduces everything' shtick. The joke with the bard and the dragon...
String: 就是...你知道的，那种'吟游诗人见谁都撩'的梗。还有吟游诗人和龙的段子...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's such a stereotype, and I take offense to that! The joke with the bard and the dragon doesn't even make sense!
String: <?shakeScreen>这是刻板印象，我深感冒犯！吟游诗人和龙的段子根本说不通！

OriginString: Anyway, what am I supposed to do about my current predicament?
String: 总之，我现在这个困境该怎么办？

OriginString: First, you need to change the way you talk to women.
String: 首先，你得改变和女性说话的方式。

OriginString: If you want to have a friendly conversation, simply mention something like the weather being nice, rather than telling them that their tears could heal leprosy.
String: 如果想友好交谈，就聊些比如天气不错之类的话题，而不是说什么'你的眼泪能治愈麻风病'。

OriginString: Second, just be honest with the girl and tell her that you don't want to get into a relationship with her. She'll understand, and it's better than just beating around the bush and leading her on.
String: 其次，直接告诉那个女孩你不想发展关系。她会理解的，这总比拐弯抹角吊着人家强。

OriginString: I don't like the thought of making her sad, but I guess you're right.
String: 虽然不想让她伤心，但你说得对。

OriginString: Of course I am. Now go back and do the right thing.
String: 那当然。现在回去做正确的事吧。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I will, Guild Master!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>我会的，公会会长！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (Who would have thought? I guess appearances can be deceiving. I guess it just goes to show...)
String: (谁能想到呢？看来人不可貌相。这正好说明...)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>(...aaaand she kicked him between his legs.)
String: <?shakeScreen>(...然后她就踢了他胯下一脚。)

OriginString: It's kinda scary to hear those stories about bandits. I never knew they could be this brutal.
String: 听说那些强盗的故事真有点吓人，我从没想过他们能这么残暴。

OriginString: They usually aren't.
String: 通常不会的。

OriginString: ...Well, they can be pretty brutal but the stories we've been hearing lately go even beyond that.
String: ...好吧，他们确实可能很残暴，但最近听到的故事简直变本加厉。

OriginString: I guess I got lucky then when I got robbed that one time.
String: 那我上次被抢的时候还挺走运的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You...got robbed?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你...被抢劫过？！

OriginString: Just once...
String: 就一次...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Why are you saying that, like you just accidentally put on the wrong socks?
String: <?shakeScreen>你说得这么轻松，就像只是不小心穿错袜子一样？

OriginString: What happened? Did they do anything to you?
String: 发生了什么？他们对你做什么了吗？

OriginString: No, it wasn't that bad. They took a bit of my money and travelling supplies but left me enough to continue travelling.
String: 没那么糟啦。他们拿走了一些钱和旅行物资，但给我留了足够的继续赶路。

OriginString: When I told them that I was looking for the Flower of Eternity, they even wished me luck.
String: 当我告诉他们我在找永恒之花时，他们甚至还祝我好运呢。

OriginString: You got beyond lucky...
String: 你这运气简直逆天了...

OriginString: A bandit King?  That sounds kinda terrifying. I don't want to know what they're like.
String: 强盗王？听起来好可怕。我一点都不想知道他们是什么样的人。

OriginString: Yeah, with him around it  seems like there will be more bandits involved in the future Quests. Do you have anything that could help the adventurers?
String: 是啊，有他在的话，未来的任务里强盗估计会越来越多。你有什么能帮到冒险者的东西吗？

OriginString: I could make them some potions of speed to help them run faster.
String: 我可以做些加速药水帮他们跑快点。

OriginString: ...I was hoping something more combat-oriented.
String: ...我本来期待更偏战斗向的提议。

OriginString: Ah! Right, sorry!
String: 啊！对哦，抱歉！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen> Guild Masssshter!! Where you been?*hic* 
Everyone has been looking for you!
String: <?shakeScreen> 公会会——长！！您去哪儿了？*嗝* 大家都在找您呢！

OriginString: ...Are you drunk? At this hour?
String: ...你喝醉了？这个点？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Ahahaha, of course, I'm drunk! We're celebrating, after all! Didn't we tell ya?
String: <?shakeScreen>啊哈哈哈，当然醉了！我们不是在庆祝嘛！没跟您说吗？

OriginString: No, you did...I didn't think you meant literally right after.
String: 说了...但没想到你们立刻就喝上了

OriginString: Really, Falken? You're drunk? At this hour?
String: 认真的吗法尔肯？这个点你就醉了？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Fiola! We missed ya too! Why aren't you celebrating with us in the tavern?
String: <?shakeScreen>菲奥拉！我们也想死你啦！怎么不来酒馆一起庆祝？

OriginString: *Sighs* I'd rather get some work done.
String: *叹气* 我更想处理些工作

OriginString: I hate to agree with Fiola but same here, Falken. I'm not much of a party person anyway.
String: 虽然不想赞同菲奥拉...但我也一样，法尔肯。我本来就不爱凑热闹

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen> Whaaaaat?! You two can't be serious! *Hic!*
Our adventurers just completed a major achievement! They defeated the infamous Bandit King! Everyone ish talking about da Guild now!
String: <?shakeScreen> 啥——？！你俩开玩笑吧！*嗝！* 咱们的冒险者刚完成壮举！打败了臭名昭著的强盗王！现在全城都在讨论公会！

OriginString: Gotta be honest with ya, Guild Master. *Hic* I thought the Guild was done for. Didn't believe in ya, at all! Just didn't wanna say anything that might have discouraged ya, y'know?
String: "老实跟你说吧，公会会长。<*打嗝*> 我本来以为公会要完蛋了。压根儿不信你能行！就是不想说那些丧气话打击你，懂吗？"

OriginString: ...Well, I guess I can't fault you for thinking that. Although, I would have appreciated it if you had left out the emphasizing tone.
String: ...这么想也情有可原。不过你最后那句强调语气可以省掉

OriginString: <?shakeSceen>But I was wrong, man! *Hic*. You pulled through and made the Guild great again!
String: <?shakeSceen>但我错啦兄弟！*嗝* 您力挽狂澜让公会重现辉煌！

OriginString:
The Guild hash become famous! Bards are singing shongs 'bout our adventurers! Even nobles come to ush with requests now!
If thish isn't a reason to celebrate then nothing ish!
String:
"公会现在可出名啦！吟游诗人都在传唱咱们冒险者的歌谣！连贵族老爷们都上门来委托任务了！"
"这要还不值得庆祝，那还有啥值得的！"

OriginString: I'm shure...Fran would understand if ya take a break just for today. *hic* Ya both deserve a day off to celebrate with ush!
String: 我保...证弗兰会理解的，就今天休息一天。*嗝* 你俩都该放个假跟我们庆祝！

OriginString: Ish this were those two were hiding? *Hic*
String: 原来你俩躲在这儿？*嗝*

OriginString: L-Lord Gilbert! You're still here?
String: 吉、吉尔伯特大人！您还没回去？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Of course I am! Your adventurers know how to party! *Hic*.
String: <?shakeScreen>当然没回！你们冒险者太会玩儿了！*嗝*

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Brother! You're starting to make a fool out of yourself!
String: <?shakeScreen>哥哥！您又开始出洋相了！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>CECIL! MY LITTLE ANGEL! *Hic*
Give yer brother a little kiss!
String: <?shakeScreen>小茜！我的小天使！*嗝* 快给哥哥亲一个！

OriginString: Eeeek! You reek of alcohol brother!
String: 呀！满身酒气别过来！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Alright you two! Ya both coming with me and we'll celebrate till morning. *Hic* And I won't tak'a no for an answer!
String: <?shakeScreen>好啦两位！跟我回去喝到天亮。*嗝* 不许拒绝！

OriginString: ...*sighs* I'm going. Someone has to keep an eye on Lady Cecilia. It's apparent that her brother won't be able to.
String: ...*叹气* 我去。得有人看着茜茜小姐，她哥哥显然靠不住了

OriginString: What about you?
String: 你呢？

OriginString: ...I guess my hands are tied on this one.
String: ...看来只能从命了

OriginString: I was afraid you'd say that.
String: 就怕你这么说

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Great! Then let's go back and have some fun!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>太好啦！咱们回去嗨起来！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: YEAH! *Hic* Hahahaha!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 耶！*嗝* 哈哈哈！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Brother! Y-You're swaying so much!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>哥哥！站都站不稳啦！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>He was right, you know?
String: <?whiteFlash>他说得对，你知道么？

OriginString: Hmmm?
String: 嗯？

OriginString: About you pulling through. Without you there might have not been a Guild anymore.
String: 关于你力挽狂澜这事。没有你的话公会可能早就不存在了

OriginString: ...Franny was right in choosing you.
String: ...弗兰选对人了

OriginString:
...I
You...
...I'll just take the compliment.
String: ...这夸奖我收下了

OriginString: What's this? Don't tell me you're starting to get soft on me.
String: 怎么？别告诉我你开始心软了

OriginString:
I guess, I'm getting old.
Just like you.
String:
"看来我是老了。
跟你一样。"

OriginString: And there it is!
String: 又来这套！

OriginString: Milady, we've received news that the Bandit King has been eliminated.
String: 大人，我们收到消息说强盗王已经被消灭了。

OriginString: Has he? How disappointing.
String: 是吗？真令人失望。

OriginString: I guess that's the extent of what you can expect from low-lifes like those bandits. Despite all the powers we gave them.
String: 我想这就是对那种强盗渣滓能抱有的最高期待了。尽管我们给了他们那么多力量。

OriginString: But they did bring us a lot of sacrifices. And the bandits' souls also belong to the demon lords now. I bet they didn't expect that when they made the pacts.
String: 不过他们确实给我们带来了不少祭品。现在强盗们的灵魂也归恶魔领主所有了。我打赌他们签契约时绝对没想到这点。

OriginString: I guess it hasn't been entirely an unfruitful endeavor.
String: 看来这也不算完全白费力气。

OriginString: ...Just out of curiosity. Who were the ones who defeated the bandits?
String: ...纯粹出于好奇。是谁干掉了那些强盗？

OriginString: ...They say it was the Adventurer Guild.
String: ...据说是冒险者公会。

OriginString: ...The Adventurer Guild...Again?
String: ...又是冒险者公会...？

OriginString: ...I don't believe you.
String: ...我不相信你。

OriginString: It's all true, Guild Master! Everything happened exactly as I described it.
String: 千真万确，公会会长！事情经过完全就像我描述的那样。

OriginString: ...So, you're telling me that the dragon we were hunting turned out to be a half-god with intentions of world destruction.
String: ...所以你是说，我们追猎的那条龙其实是个意图毁灭世界的半神。

OriginString: He summoned a legion of greater demons to face the adventurers, and the gods, witnessing their heroism, intervened by sending an army of angels to aid them.
String: 他召唤了一支高等恶魔军团对抗冒险者，而众神目睹他们的英勇行为后，派天使军团前来支援。

OriginString: Together, they vanquished the dragon, who suddenly had a change of heart, forgetting about world destruction and instead rewarded the adventurers with an orb granting godly powers?
String: 然后他们合力击败了巨龙，而那条龙突然回心转意，放弃毁灭世界，反而给了冒险者们一颗能赋予神力的宝珠作为奖励？

OriginString: Well, maybe I embellished the story a little.
String: 呃，可能我稍微润色了一下故事。

OriginString: *Sighs*...I'll ask the adventurers later what really happened.
String: *叹气*...我待会儿去问问冒险者们真相。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>But the part about the orb is true! Look, I have it right here!
String: <?shakeScreen>但宝珠那段是真的！你看，就在我这儿！

OriginString: Why is it wrapped in cloth?
String: 为什么用布包着？

OriginString: Every time someone attempts to touch it, the orb forcibly tries to transfer its power and knowledge to the person.
String: 因为每次有人试图触碰，宝珠就会强行把力量和知识灌输给那个人。

OriginString: Which is incredibly painful.
String: 而且过程痛不欲生。

OriginString: That's why no one has taken the power yet.
String: 所以至今没人接受这份力量。

OriginString: Interesting. I guess only one person can hold the power?
String: 有意思。看来只能由一个人持有这份力量？

OriginString: From the little knowledge I gained when I held it,...
String: 根据我接触它时获得的零碎信息...

OriginString: And before I passed out...
String: ...在我昏过去之前...

OriginString: The power returns to the orb when the current wielder of it dies or gives it up. Therefore, as long as the Guild keeps it, they'll never lose access to this power.
String: 当现任持有者死亡或放弃时，力量会回归宝珠。因此只要公会保管好它，就永远不会失去这份力量。

OriginString: Good to know. I'll keep it for now. I'll later determine if any of the adventurers are suitable candidates to wield this power for the Guild.
String: 很好。我先保管它。之后会评估哪位冒险者适合为公会掌握这份力量。

OriginString: That sounds like a plan, Guild Master.
String: 很合理的安排，公会会长。

OriginString: Meanwhile, I'll be crafting a song about the adventurers' battle with Xenoth, the Dark Dragon God, the World Slayer!
String: 同时我要创作一首关于冒险者大战灭世黑暗龙神克赛诺斯的歌谣！

OriginString:
<?fadeOutNPC> In a realm where darkness did unfold,
Adventurers brave, their stories untold.
They clashed with Xenoth, the dragon god so grand,...
String: <?fadeOutNPC> 黑暗降临的大地之上，无畏冒险者的史诗传唱。他们对抗龙神克赛诺斯，那宏伟存在令人绝望...

OriginString: Hey, Guild Master!
String: 嘿，公会会长！

OriginString: Congratulations on your first successful Quest!
String: 恭喜你第一次任务就成功了！

OriginString: This was the least of all outcomes.
String: 这已经是最理想的结果了。

OriginString: It would have been too much for even yourself if the first Quest we accepted ended in a failure.
String: 要是我们接的第一个任务就失败，就算是你也会受不了吧。

OriginString: I hope I don't have to hold protocol with you after every Quest we do.
String: 希望以后不用每次完成任务都搞这些繁文缛节。

OriginString: Alright guys. Let's try to get along.
String: 好了伙计们，咱们好好相处吧。

OriginString: On another note, we came because we wanted to show you the last two places in the Guild.
String: 另外我们来是想带你们看看公会最后两个地方。

OriginString: As you already know, most of our resources are collected by our adventurers on their Quests.
String: 你们已经知道了，我们大部分资源都是冒险者们在任务中收集的。

OriginString: We use these resources to make our own equipment and potions.
String: 我们用这些资源来打造装备和炼制药水。

OriginString: Unfortunately, our former alchemist has left us, so for now we have lost the ability to make potions.
String: 可惜之前的炼金师离开了，现在我们暂时没法制作药水。

OriginString: But luckily our blacksmith is still with us.
String: 不过幸运的是铁匠还在。

OriginString: Let's give him a visit and see if we have enough resources to make use of.
String: 去拜访下他吧，看看我们有多少可用资源。

OriginString: Well...that could could have gone better...
String: ...这本该更顺利的...

OriginString: B-but don't worry!
String: 但-但是别担心！

OriginString: All beginnings are difficult! I'm sure next time we'll successfully complete a Quest!
String: 万事开头难！下次我们一定能顺利完成任务的！

OriginString: Or it will be the final nail in our coffin.
String: 或者这会成为压垮我们的最后一根稻草。

OriginString: Miss Fiola!
String: 菲奥拉小姐！

OriginString: Seriously! I hope you'll get your act together and try to do better next time!
String: 说真的！希望你下次能振作起来好好表现！

OriginString: ...(The worst part is I can't even argue back.)
String: ...(最糟的是我居然无法反驳。)

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>{PROTAGONIST}!<?shakeScreen><?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?whiteFlash>{PROTAGONIST}！<?shakeScreen><?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Woah, easy there!
String: "哇，悠着点儿！"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And Fiola!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>还有菲奥拉！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hey! Get off of me!
String: <?shakeScreen>喂！别扒着我！

OriginString:
I'm so glad that you're still fine! I was *sniff* so worried!
I didn't know what to do if we were too late.
String:
"太好了，你没事！我*抽泣*都快担心死了！
要是我们来晚了，我真不知道该怎么办。"

OriginString:
If anything had happened to you...then I...I...bwaaaaaaaahhh.
<?fadeOutNPC>
String:
"要是你有个三长两短...那我...我...哇啊啊啊啊啊..."
<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>C-Calm down! Don't cry into my blouse!
String: <?shakeScreen>冷-冷静点！别把鼻涕蹭我衬衫上！

OriginString: Hmph! I already told her that there was no need to worry. Of course, the Adventurer Guild wouldn't fall that easily.
String: 哼！我早说过不用担心。冒险者公会怎么可能这么容易垮掉。

OriginString: Hahaha. Weren't you just as worried? That's why you insisted on coming with us.
String: 哈哈哈。你不也担心得要命吗？所以才非要跟我们来。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Brother!
String: <?shakeScreen>哥哥！

OriginString: Thanks for coming to our aid. We wouldn't have been able to last much longer without you.
String: 多谢你们赶来支援。要是没有你们，我们恐怕撑不了多久了。

OriginString: It's the least we can do for the Adventurer Guild after what you've done for us. Although, it took some convincing on my parents for them to send me.
String: 比起你们为皇家做的事，这只是举手之劳。不过说服我父母放我来可费了不少功夫。

OriginString: You should have seen the Divine Messenger and my little sister tear into them when they tried to make excuses.
String: 你真该看看神使和我妹妹是怎么怼那些找借口的官员的。

OriginString:
You didn't stand idly by either, brother!
I've never seen you talk to father and mother like that.
String:
"你也没袖手旁观啊，老哥！
我还是头一次见你这么跟爸妈说话。"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Bwahahaha! It's not like they had any high opinions of me in the first place.
String: <?shakeScreen>哈哈哈！反正他们本来对我也没多高评价。

OriginString: ... I really don't know how to repay you for all you've done.
String: ...真不知道该怎么报答你们。

OriginString: How about with a celebration in your tavern? I'm sure your adventurers would also like to let loose after everything they've gone through.
String: 不如在你们酒馆开个庆功宴？我想冒险者们也急需放松一下。

OriginString: *sniff*That sounds like a great idea.*sniff*
String: *抽泣*这主意太棒了。*抽泣*

OriginString:
Anything if it gets this crybaby off of me.
<?shakeScreen>Would you please let go?!
String:
"只要能把这个爱哭鬼从我身上弄开，怎样都行。"
<?shakeScreen>你能不能放手啊？！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Neeever! Waahhhh!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>才不要！哇啊啊！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Guild Master?
String: 公会会长？

OriginString: Hmm? What's the matter, Eden?
String: 嗯？怎么了，伊登？

OriginString: The witch... she has woken up.
String: 那个女巫...她醒了。

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>!!!
...
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString:
Please, go without me.
I will join you later.
String:
"你们先去吧，不用等我。"
"我随后就到。"

OriginString: I have something to do first.
String: 我还有些事要处理。

OriginString: How are you?
String: 你还好吗？

OriginString: ...You need to tell us where the Emperor's body is.
String: ...你必须告诉我们皇帝的尸体在哪儿。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Didn't you see what he has done? He nearly killed you with a curse to keep himself safe!
He doesn't deserve your loyalty.
String: <?shakeScreen>难道你没看到他做了什么吗？他为了自保差点用诅咒害死你！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...That curse...I placed it on myself a long time ago.
String: <?whiteFlash>...那个诅咒...是很久以前我自己种下的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>！！！

OriginString: ... When I first joined him... many of his followers were against it. No one could trust a girl from a demonic tribe like mine.
String: ...当初我追随他时...很多追随者都反对。没人会信任一个像我这样来自恶魔部族的女孩。

OriginString:
So, to prove my loyalty, I placed a curse on myself, and gave the Emperor command over it.
He could end my life whenever he wished to.
String:
"所以，为了证明我的忠诚，我给自己下了诅咒，并把控制权交给了皇帝。"
"只要他想，随时都能结束我的生命。"

OriginString:
... I still remember his expression when I told him about it. The horror on his face when I said I wouldn't undo it.
...His promise that he would never use it...
String:
...我还记得他听我说完时的表情。当我说不会解除诅咒时，他脸上那种惊恐。
...他发誓永远不会使用那个力量...

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>I ruined him.
...I made him into the monster he is not.
String: <?whiteFlash>是我毁了他...把他变成了现在这个本不该成为的怪物。

OriginString: When he was on his deathbed, I should have let him go. Let him die as the greatest person ever known.
String: 在他弥留之际，我本该让他离开。让他作为史上最伟大的人物安息。

OriginString: ... But I couldn't.
String: ...但我做不到。

OriginString:
... I told him how to extend his life.
I used his love for his subjects against him...
I put him down a road he never wanted.
String:
...我告诉了他延续生命的方法。
我利用了他对子民的爱来操控他...
我让他走上了一条他从未想走的路。

OriginString:
...Since then, as time went on...he became more and more obsessed with the greater good.
...I know he has become mad...I know that this is not the person he wanted to become...
String:
...从那时起，随着时间流逝...他变得越来越执着于所谓的"大义"。
...我知道他已经疯了...我明白这绝非他想要成为的模样...

OriginString:
...But even then I wanted to believe...that the man I once knew was still there...
...That not letting him go was not a mistake...
String:
...但即便如此我还是想相信...我曾经认识的那个男人依然存在...
...相信不放手并不是个错误...

OriginString: ...But it was...And he paid for it.
String: ...但确实错了...而他为此付出了代价。

OriginString: ...Where is his body?
String: ...他的遗体在哪儿？

OriginString: ...(She waves her hand).
String: ...（她挥了挥手）。

OriginString: (A sudden image came into my mind. A location in the Ashenlands. I was sure that that was the location.)
String: （突然有个画面浮现在我脑海。灰烬之地的一个地点。我确信那就是位置所在。）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>W-what is happening to you?
String: <?whiteFlash>你这是怎么了？

OriginString: ...I've betrayed my Emperor. The only reason I continued to live for.
String: ...我背叛了我的君王。这是我唯一活着的理由。

OriginString: I'm tired...
String: 我累了...

OriginString: ...What was your name?
String: ...你叫什么名字？

OriginString: ...Amadia...<?fadeOutNPC>.
String: ...阿玛迪亚...<?fadeOutNPC>.

OriginString: (She became dust....)
String: (她化作了尘埃...)

OriginString: (...We finally have the location of the Emperor's body.)
String: (...我们终于找到君王遗体的位置了。)

OriginString: (It's time to put an end to this.)
String: (是时候结束这一切了。)

OriginString: ...Do you want to talk about what has happened?
String: ...想谈谈发生了什么吗？

OriginString: ...<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ......<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: It might be better if you just leave her alone for now.
String: 或许现在让她一个人静一静比较好。

OriginString: ...It has been a difficult day for her.
String: ...今天对她来说太难熬了。

OriginString: Guild Master.
String: 公会会长。

OriginString: ...Thank you for stopping her back then.
String: ...谢谢你当时拦住了她。

OriginString: I have misjudged you...
String: 我错怪你了...

OriginString: ...and for that I apologize.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...为此我向你道歉。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (Well, that was unexpected.)
String: （好吧，这可真是出乎意料。）

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}! You're back!
String: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}！你回来啦！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>How did it go? What happened?
String: <?shakeScreen>怎么样？发生什么事了？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>?!
String: <?whiteFlash>？！

OriginString: Who is that person the adventurers are carrying?
String: 冒险者们抬着的那个人是谁？

OriginString: ...It's the witch.
String: ...是那个女巫。

OriginString:
Things have gotten messy and there is a lot of questions we need answered. 
But for now we need to put her in the dungeon first.
String:
"事情变得一团糟，我们还有一大堆问题需要解答。
不过现在得先把她关进地牢再说。"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-we have a dungeon?
String: <?shakeScreen>我、我们还有地牢？

OriginString: Apparently, we do.
String: 显然，确实有。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>！！！

OriginString: (A little kid just bumped into me.)
String: （有个小孩撞到我了。）

OriginString: Hey kid. Are you lost?
String: 嘿小孩，迷路了吗？

OriginString: How about we go and find your parents?
String: 我们去找你父母好吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Don't touch me!
String: <?shakeScreen>别碰我！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And don't call me a kid!
String: <?shakeScreen>还有别叫我小孩！

OriginString: I'm actually old enough to have a fiance, I have you know.
String: 告诉你，我都到能订婚的年纪了。

OriginString: You mean you're playing house with some boy?
String: 你是说你在和某个男孩玩过家家？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what?! H-How dare you talk to me like that!
String: <?shakeScreen>什...什么？！你竟敢这么和我说话！

OriginString: Y-you....you...
<?shakeScreen>YOU STINK!!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>你臭死了！！！

OriginString: (And suddenly I'm reminded again why I don't like kids.)
String: （突然又提醒了我为什么不喜欢小孩。）

OriginString: Hmph! Whatever! I have no time to waste on the likes of you so I will let your rude behaviour towards me slide this time.
String: 哼！随便吧！我可没时间浪费在你这种人身上，这次就原谅你对我的无礼了。

OriginString: More importantly, I have to find the Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild.
String: 更重要的是，我得找到冒险者公会的会长。

OriginString: ..I'm the Guild Master.
String: ...我就是会长。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...What?
String: <?whiteFlash>...什么？

OriginString: I said I am the Guild Master.
String: 我说我就是会长。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>LIAR!
String: <?shakeScreen>骗子！

OriginString: As if the Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild could be someone as uncouth as you!
String: 冒险者公会的会长怎么可能像你这么粗俗！

OriginString: ...And how should the Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild be like in your opinion?
String: ...那在你看来冒险者公会的会长应该是什么样？

OriginString: Obviously the Guild Master would be a highly respectable person who radiates grace and awe wherever they go.
String: 当然是个德高望重的人，举手投足间都散发着优雅和威严。

OriginString: A prime example of a person for all of the great adventurers to strive for.
String: 是所有伟大冒险者都该效仿的典范。

OriginString: And what do you think adventurers are?
String: 那你觉得冒险者是什么？

OriginString: Noble and selfless warriors of course. Fighting for justice and against evil.
String: 当然是高贵无私的战士，为正义而战，对抗邪恶。

OriginString: And who told you all that?
String: 谁告诉你这些的？

OriginString:
My big brother. 
He knows everything.
String:
我的大哥。
他无所不知。

OriginString: Kid...I'm going to say something very upsetting.
String: 小鬼...我要说些很扫兴的话了。

OriginString: W-what exactly?
String: 到...到底是什么？

OriginString: Your brother lied. None of that is true.
String: 你哥哥撒谎了。那些都不是真的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what?! How dare you say that?!
String: <?shakeScreen>什...什么？！你竟敢这么说？！

OriginString: Noble and selfless? Did you know that people wouldn't let adventurers into their houses because they were afraid they would steal something?
String: 高贵无私？你知道人们以前都不让冒险者进屋，就是怕他们偷东西吗？

OriginString: B-but they fight monsters!
String: 可...可是他们会打怪物啊！

OriginString: For money.
String: 为了钱。

OriginString: T-they protect people!
String: 他...他们保护人们！

OriginString: For money.
String: 为了钱。

OriginString:
Do you want to know how many times I've seen adventurers skip town before they've done their job?
Even when they got the money?
String:
"你想知道我见过多少次冒险者接了活儿就溜号吗？
连订金都敢吞的那种？"

OriginString: N-no! That can't be. My big brother...
String: 不...不会的。我哥哥他...

OriginString: He lied. And do you know why he lied?
String: 他撒谎了。知道为什么吗？

OriginString: Because you're a kid.
String: 因为你就是个小孩。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WAHHHHHHH!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>哇啊啊啊啊啊！！！

OriginString: ...What are you doing?
String: ...你在做什么？

OriginString:
Fiola...
I've found some lost kid.
String:
菲奥拉...
我找到了一些迷路的孩子。

OriginString: Try not to eat her.
String: 别把她吃了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>*Sniff* E-Eat me?
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>*抽泣* 吃、吃掉我？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...
String: <?whiteFlash>...

OriginString: ...You idiot. Do you know who that child is?
String: ...你个白痴。知道这孩子是谁吗？

OriginString: ...No, but I get the distinct feeling I'm not going to like the answer.
String: ...不知道，但我有种强烈的预感不会喜欢这个答案。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>L-lady Cecilia!
String: <?shakeScreen>塞、塞西莉亚小姐！

OriginString: <size=10>From house Greyhorn. I might add...
String: <size=10>顺便说下...是灰角家族的。

OriginString: (Oh drat...A noble kid...)
String: (糟了...贵族家的小鬼...)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I'm terribly sorry if our Guild Master has been in any way disrespectful to you!
String: <?shakeScreen>如果会长大人有任何冒犯之处，我深感抱歉！

OriginString: I'm sure the Guild Master wasn't aware that they were in the presence of a lady like yourself.
String: 我相信会长大人绝对没有意识到您这样尊贵的小姐在场。

OriginString: Right, Guild Master?
String: 对吧，会长？

OriginString: Y-yeah.
String: 是、是啊。

OriginString: *Sniff*...
<?whiteFlash>F-finally someone who knows how to treat a lady!
String: <?whiteFlash>终、终于有个懂礼数的人了！

OriginString: You may be forgiven.
String: 原谅你们了。

OriginString: (That was a quick recovery.)
String: (情绪恢复得真快啊...)

OriginString: Lady Cecilia! We're delighted that you decided to grace us with your presence.
String: 塞西莉亚小姐！您能屈尊莅临是我们的荣幸。

OriginString: But if you don't mind me asking, what is the reason for this happy occasion?
String: 不过恕我冒昧，是什么风把您吹来了呢？

OriginString: ...I need adventurers for a Quest.
String: ...我需要冒险者来完成一个任务。

OriginString: We should talk somewhere else.
String: 我们该换个地方谈。

OriginString: Alright kid. Tell me what this is all about.
String: 好吧小子，告诉我这是怎么回事。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Stop calling me a kid!
String: <?shakeScreen>别叫我小子！

OriginString: Guild Master....
String: 公会会长...

OriginString: Alright, alright!
String: 好吧好吧！

OriginString: Lady Cecilia,...
String: 塞西莉亚女士...

OriginString: Much better.
String: 这还差不多。

OriginString: ...for what reason have you sought the Adventurer Guild?
String: ...你来找冒险者公会是为了什么？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...I want you to save my big brother.
String: <?whiteFlash>...我想请你们救我哥哥。

OriginString: ...What do you mean?
String: ...什么意思？

OriginString: As you know, the bandit problem in our lands has gotten out of hand as of late and it's believed to be the cause of a self-proclaimed Bandit King.
String: 如你所知，最近我们领地的强盗问题已经失控，据信是因为一个自称强盗王的家伙。

OriginString: As response, my family sent a subjugation force led by my big brother to deal with the Bandit King and his men.
String: 作为回应，我家派出了由我哥哥率领的讨伐队去对付强盗王和他的手下。

OriginString: (Ah, right. I think I remember hearing about the subjugation force.)
String: （啊对，我好像听说过这支讨伐队的事。）

OriginString: ...But they failed.
String: ...但他们失败了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what?
String: <?shakeScreen>什...什么？

OriginString: Yesterday, some soldiers managed to return and told us that the bandits under the Bandit King's command were much more numerous and stronger than we thought.
String: 昨天有几名士兵设法逃了回来，他们说强盗王手下的匪徒比我们预想的要多得多，也强得多。

OriginString: The subjugation force was completely routed.
String: 讨伐部队全军覆没。

OriginString: That's some rather unsettling news...
String: 这消息可真让人不安...

OriginString: (I would have never expected to hear that bandits could become this much of a threat.)
String: (我万万没想到强盗能构成这么大的威胁。)

OriginString: And your brother?
String: 那你哥哥呢？

OriginString: ...He's missing...
String: ...他失踪了...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>...B-But I'm sure he's alive!
String: <?shakeScreen>...但-但我相信他还活着！

OriginString: They said he was the one who called for the retreat!
String: 士兵们说是他下令撤退的！

OriginString: He is still alive for sure...
String: 他一定还活着...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Please Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>求您了公会会长！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>I know he is still out there! 
I need your adventurers to seach for him!
String: <?shakeScreen>我知道他还在那里！我需要你们的冒险者去找他！

OriginString: What about your family? Haven't they sent their own men to find your brother?
String: 你的家族呢？他们没有派人去找你哥哥吗？

OriginString: ...They won't look for him.
String: ...他们不会去找他。

OriginString: He is the fourth son of the family...
String: 他只是家族的第四子...

OriginString: So, not important enough to risk more men for a search party.
String: 所以不值得再冒险派人去搜救了。

OriginString: (Nobles. That's why I don't like dealing with them.)
String: (贵族啊...这就是为什么我不喜欢和他们打交道。)

OriginString: My family wouldn't even allow me to hire adventurers to search for him, saying that adventurers are just untrustworthy lowlifes.
String: 我的家族甚至不允许我雇佣冒险者去找他，说冒险者都是不可靠的下等人。

OriginString: But my brother always told me that adventurers always help people in need. I even heard how the Adventurer Guild saved a village from the Bandit King.
String: 但我哥哥总跟我说冒险者总会帮助需要帮助的人。我还听说冒险者公会从强盗王手中救下了一个村子。

OriginString: That's why I snuck out of my home with some trusted servants just to meet you.
String: 所以我带着几个心腹仆人偷偷溜出家门来见您。

OriginString: That explains those people panicking in the tavern just a moment ago.
String: 难怪刚才酒馆里那些人慌慌张张的。

OriginString: Please! I need your adventurers to look for my brother!
String: 求求您！我需要你们的冒险者去找我哥哥！

OriginString: (It has been days since the battle, hasn't it?)
String: (那场战斗已经过去好几天了吧？)

OriginString: (If he hasn't returned by now, I fear he might already be....)
String: (如果他现在还没回来，恐怕已经...)

OriginString: I-is it about the money? You said adventurers would help for money, right?
String: 是-是因为钱吗？您说过冒险者会为了钱帮忙对吧？

OriginString: I-I don't have any money, b-but...
String: 我-我没有钱，但-但是...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: I-I can give you this.
String: 我，我可以给你这个。

OriginString: It's a ring that my nanny once gave me. It's supposed to protect me.
String: 这是以前我的保姆给我的戒指，据说能保护我。

OriginString: B-but I don't need to be protected. I-I just want my brother back...
String: 但、但是我不需要保护...我、我只想要我哥哥回来...

OriginString: (An old ring made out of cheap metal. Something a noble would be embarassed to be seen with.)
String: (一枚用廉价金属制成的旧戒指，贵族戴着会觉得丢脸的那种。)

OriginString: (Yet contrary to that haughtiness she was displaying in the beginning, she was still wearing this cheap ring)
String: (但与她最初表现出的傲慢相反，她居然一直戴着这枚廉价戒指)

OriginString: (It has to mean a lot to her.)
String: (这一定对她意义非凡。)

OriginString:
Okay kid. 
The Adventurer Guild will accept your Quest.
String:
"好吧，小子。
冒险者公会接受你的委托。"

OriginString: Really? Oh, thank you! Thank you!
String: 真的吗？哦，谢谢！太感谢了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Eh,..I mean...
String: <?shakeScreen>嗯...我是说...

OriginString: Of course you will!
String: 你当然会的！

OriginString: And did you just call me a kid again?!!
String: 你刚才又叫我小鬼了是吗？！！

OriginString: (And for a moment I thought she was cute.)
String: (刚才有那么一瞬间觉得她挺可爱的)

OriginString: ...What?
String: ...怎么了？

OriginString: You know that that ring is probably not worth much and you still accepted the Quest.
String: 你明知道那枚戒指不值多少钱，还是接下了这个委托。

OriginString: I guess you do have a kinder side after all.
String: 看来你骨子里还是个温柔的人啊。

OriginString: Well, even if we take a loss on this Quest, we can just easily make up the difference from the Guild Master's pocket.
String: 就算这次委托亏本了，从公会会长口袋里补上差额也很容易嘛。

OriginString: ...You two are talking too much.
String: ...你们俩话太多了。

OriginString: Let's get back to work. We have a big brother to find.
String: 回去干活。我们还得找那位大哥呢。

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST}...
String: {PROTAGONIST}...

OriginString: Fiola...
String: 菲奥拉...

OriginString: Wow. The mood turned cold all of a sudden.
String: 哇哦。气氛突然就冷下来了。
