OriginString: I heard the Adventurers have found our "ghost".
String: 听说冒险者们找到我们的"幽灵"了。

OriginString: They did....She is over there.
String: 找到了...就在那边。

OriginString: ...Are you...?
<?shakeScreen>I'M SORRY! THIS IS ALL I HAVE I SWEAR!
String: <?shakeScreen>对不起！我发誓这是我全部家当了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>TAKE IT AND LET ME LEAVE PLEASE!
String: <?shakeScreen>拿走吧求求你放我走！

OriginString: She has been like this ever since we got her here.
String: 自从我们把她带回来就一直这样。

OriginString: I guess this is what happens when kids have to spend too much time with you. They instinctively realize that you're actually a child eating witch.
String: 看来小孩子跟你待久了就会这样。本能地意识到你是个吃小孩的巫婆。

OriginString: Hmph! I bet it was your ugly mug, that made her scared for her life.
String: 哼！肯定是你那张丑脸把她吓得半死。

OriginString: Don't bring my pretty face into this. You know as well as I do that I'm at least an 8 out of 10.
String: 别扯上我英俊的脸。你明明知道我的颜值至少八分起步。

OriginString: Pfft. Amongst pigs perhaps.
String: 噗。在猪圈里或许是吧。

OriginString: At least I'm not trying to hide my age behind makeups.
String: 至少我没靠化妆掩饰年龄。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WHAT!!?
String: <?shakeScreen>你说什么！！？

OriginString: Oh, don't act like that. I'm pretty sure everyone knows about it.
String: 别装了。我敢说大家都知道这事。

OriginString: You take that back!
String: 你给我收回这句话！

OriginString: Make me!
String: 来啊！

OriginString: Uhm...guys?
String: 呃...各位？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>PIG!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>猪头！！！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>HAG!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>老妖婆！！！

OriginString: GUYS!!!
String: 你们够了！！！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WHAT!!??
String: <?shakeScreen>什么！！？？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Yikes!
String: <?shakeScreen>哇啊！

OriginString: I-I just wanted to say that you're scaring the girl.
String: 我、我只是想说你们吓到那孩子了。

OriginString: (Is she hiding under a table?).
String: （她是不是躲到桌子底下了？）

OriginString: Come out, kid! There is nothing to fear.
String: 出来吧孩子！没什么好怕的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>A-are you going to sell me off now?
String: <?shakeScreen>你、你们现在要卖掉我吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What? Of course not!
String: <?shakeScreen>啥？当然不会！

OriginString: But you're adventurers, are you not?
String: 可你们是冒险者，对吧？

OriginString: Kid....what do you think adventurers are?
String: 孩子...你觉得冒险者是什么？

OriginString: A different word for bandits?
String: 强盗的另一种说法？

OriginString: (We really have an image problem...)
String: （我们的形象真是糟透了...）

OriginString: I don't know what you've heard about us but we won't do anything to you.
String: 不知道你听说了什么，但我们不会伤害你。

OriginString: Really?
String: 真的？

OriginString: Really.
String: 千真万确。

OriginString: So...adventurers aren't bad guys?
String: 所以...冒险者不是坏人？

OriginString: Well, if you disregard this person here amongst us.
String: 嗯，如果忽略我们当中某个人的话。

OriginString: You stay out of this!
String: 你少插嘴！

OriginString: Well it's true, that adventurers are a rough bunch of people but most rumors about them are greatly exaggerated. They aren't highway men so there is nothing to be afraid of.
String: 虽然冒险者确实都是些粗人，但大多数传言都太夸张了。他们不是拦路强盗，没什么好怕的。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>That's a relief. I really thought I was in hot water this time.
String: <?whiteFlash>总算松了口气。这次我真以为自己要倒大霉了。

OriginString: I'm really sorry about my behaviour but my mother used to warn me about adventurers.
String: 我为自己的行为道歉，但我母亲以前经常警告我要小心冒险者。

OriginString: She would always tell me how adventurers would always keep trespassing into her house and take things that aren't theirs. Or how they always respond with violence to everything.
String: 她总说冒险者会擅闯民宅拿走不属于他们的东西，还动不动就暴力相向。

OriginString: I guess those stories weren't true after all.
String: 看来那些故事都不是真的呢。

OriginString: (...Let's not burst the bubble.)
String: (...还是别打破她的美好想象吧。)

OriginString: Anyway, the reason the adventurers brought you here was that someone has been causing a disturbance very close to the Adventurer Guild. I guess that was you, right?
String: 言归正传，冒险者们带你来是因为有人在公会附近制造骚动。应该就是你吧？

OriginString: I'm sorry. I didn't want to cause a commotion.
String: 对不起...我不是有意引起骚乱的。

OriginString: But I was scared of bandits so whenever someone approached me I put them to sleep with one of my potions.
String: 但我害怕遇到强盗，所以只要有人靠近，我就用自制药水让他们睡着。

OriginString: Potions? Now that I look at you...are you by any chance an alchemist?
String: 药水？仔细看你...你该不会是个炼金术士吧？

OriginString: That's right! Emily is the name and potion making is my game! I'm from a family that has been producing respectable alchemists for centuries now!
String: 没错！我叫艾米丽，炼制药水是我的专长！我们家族世代都是受人尊敬的炼金术士！

OriginString: Or at least that's what my parents always said.
String: 至少我父母是这么说的。

OriginString: I see. Then I have only one question left.
String: 明白了。那我只剩下一个问题。

OriginString: What were you doing all alone in the nearby woods? From what I heard you've probably been roaming there for weeks now.
String: 你独自在附近森林里做什么？据我所知你至少在那里游荡好几周了。

OriginString: ...The truth is I'm searching for something...something that I believe is hidden somewhere here.
String: ...其实我在寻找某样东西...相信它就藏在这附近的某处。

OriginString: And what would that be?
String: 具体是什么？

OriginString: It's a rare plant. Something I've been looking for for a very long time now.
String: 是一种珍稀植物。我已经找它很久了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You've been wandering the woods for weeks just to find a plant? Don't you know how dangerous the forest here is? Especially, when you're going alone!
String: <?shakeScreen>你为了找株植物在森林里游荡数周？不知道这片森林有多危险吗？特别是独自一人！

OriginString: ...I know...but I still need to search for it.
String: ...我知道...但我必须找到它。

OriginString: ...Then how about you try to look for it from here?
String: ...那你要不要从这里开始找找看？

OriginString: It would be safer than just wandering around the forest on your own. And if you want to look for that plant, we can have at least some adventurers escort you to keep you safe.
String: 这总比你自己在森林里乱转安全些。如果你想找那种植物，我们至少可以派些冒险者护送你。

OriginString: B-But I really don't have that much money to pay for lodging and protection...
String: 可、可是我实在没有那么多钱支付住宿和保护费...

OriginString: Then why don't you work for us instead?
String: 那不如你来为我们工作如何？

OriginString: Didn't you say yourself that you're an alchemist?
String: 你自己不也说是个炼金术师吗？

OriginString: As it happens we do need an alchemist and we also have a building you could move into.
String: 正好我们需要炼金术师，而且也有空房间给你住。

OriginString: What's this? You can be nice to somebody?
String: 哦？你居然会对别人这么友善？

OriginString: As long as that somebody isn't you, I can be an angel.
String: 只要那个人不是你，我也可以很天使。

OriginString: So how about it? If you want, you can stay with us and we help you with your search. In exchange you work for us as an alchemist and make some potions for our adventurers.
String: 所以你怎么想？愿意的话可以留下来，我们帮你寻找。作为交换，你作为炼金术师为我们工作，给冒险者们制作药水。

OriginString: What do you say?
String: 你觉得呢？

OriginString: O-Of course I'll accept! Thank you very much!
String: 当、当然愿意！太感谢你们了！

OriginString:
Alright.
Welcome to the Adventurer Guild, Emily.
String:
"好的。
欢迎来到冒险者公会，艾米丽。"

OriginString: Thank you all! I really appreciate it.
String: 谢谢大家！我真的很感激。

OriginString: Oh! Hello Guild Master!
String: 啊！公会会长您好！

OriginString: Hello Emily. I was just wondering how you're fitting in.
String: 你好艾米丽。我来看看你适应得怎么样。

OriginString: Everything is great here!
String: 这里一切都超棒！

OriginString: This place is much bigger than the workstations I've usually worked with and there are a lot of ingredients here, I can't wait to try out!
String: 这地方比我以前的工作台宽敞多了，还有这么多原料，我都等不及要试试了！

OriginString: And best of all: I can finally sleep on a bed again.
String: 最棒的是：我终于又能睡床了。

OriginString: ...You don't exactly look like the adventurous type. Have you really been living the last few weeks on your own in the forest?
String: ...你看上去不像是冒险型的人。之前几周真的一直独自在森林里生活？

OriginString: It wasn't as bad as you might think. I'm fully capable of surviving on my own in the wilderness.
String: 没你想的那么糟啦。我在野外完全能照顾好自己。

OriginString: After all, I'm an alchemist and there is a potion for every situation.
String: 毕竟我是炼金术师嘛，每种情况都有对应的药水。

OriginString: If there was any danger I could easily use one of my potions to get away. If I got sick I could also use a potion to nurse myself back to health.
String: 遇到危险时用药水脱身，生病时用药水治疗，

OriginString: If I was hungry or thirsty I would just drink a potion. If I couldn't sleep because the ground was too hard I just drink a potion to put myself to sleep.
String: 饿了渴了喝药水，地面太硬睡不着也喝药水。

OriginString: I even have a laughing potion when I feel down.
String: 我连心情不好时都有欢笑药水呢。

OriginString: (I guess that explains the maniacal laughter, people have been reporting..)
String: （难怪最近总有人报告听到诡异的笑声...）

OriginString:
Thanks again, Guild Master. 
For offering me a place to stay and helping me in my search.
String:
"再次感谢您，公会会长。
不仅收留了我，还帮我一起寻找。"

OriginString: We both benefit from this arrangement. I'm curious how good your potion making skills really are.
String: 这是双赢的合作。我很好奇你的炼金术到底有多厉害。

OriginString: Then how about I show it to you? Let's make potions!
String: 那不如现在就展示给您看？我们来做药水吧！

OriginString: Apparently another group of travellers has encountered "her".
String: 显然另一群旅人遇到了“她”。

OriginString: So after two weeks it's still happening.
String: 所以过了两周还在闹这事啊。

OriginString: *Sighs*. I guess I have no choice but to tell {PROTAGONIST} about it.
String: *叹气*...看来只能告诉{PROTAGONIST}了。

OriginString: Tell me about what?
String: 要告诉我什么？

OriginString: Just when I mention you. It's like speaking of the devil.
String: 刚提到你你就来了，真是说曹操曹操到。

OriginString: But now that you're here you should know that there have been a few incidents close to the Guild.
String: 既然你来了，得让你知道公会附近发生了几起怪事。

OriginString: ...What kind of incidents?
String: ...什么怪事？

OriginString: Lately some of the travelers who visited the tavern have been talking about seeing a strange girl in the nearby forest.
String: 最近酒馆里有些旅人说起在附近森林见到个奇怪的女孩。

OriginString:
The story always goes like this:
They first hear a maniacal laughter in the forest and those who are brave enough will then start to look for the source.
String:
故事总是这样开始的：
人们会先在森林里听到一阵狂笑声，而那些胆子够大的人就会开始寻找声音的来源。

OriginString: When they find the source, it would always turn out to be a girl with blue hair.
String: 等找到声源处，总能看到一个蓝发女孩。

OriginString: But when they try to approach the girl they would always pass out for some mysterious reason.
String: 可每当他们试图靠近，就会莫名其妙地昏过去。

OriginString: Kinda sounds like a ghost story...
String: 听着像鬼故事...

OriginString: Oh gods...please don't let it be the ghost of a little girl.
String: 天啊...千万别是小女孩的鬼魂。

OriginString: That would be too depressing...
String: 那也太让人难受了...

OriginString: Well, whatever it is, until now all travelers have regained their consciousness on the road and were unharmed. So it might be harmless.
String: 总之到目前为止，所有昏倒的旅人都在路上恢复了意识且毫发无伤，应该没有危险。

OriginString: Still it might be a good idea to send some adventurers to investigate it as an Assignment.
String: 不过还是派些冒险者去调查下比较好，就当是个委托任务。

OriginString: If you don't have any adventurers available, hire more in the tavern.
String: 要是没人手，就去酒馆再雇几个。

OriginString: It does sound like a good idea...
String: 确实是个好主意...

OriginString: ...despite it coming from you.
String: ...虽然是从你嘴里说出来的。

OriginString: Was nice talking to you, Guild Master!
String: 和您聊天很愉快，公会会长！

OriginString: Anything else, Guild Master?
String: 还有什么我能帮忙的吗？工会会长

OriginString: Hello Guild Master! How can I help?
String: 公会会长好！有什么我能帮忙的？

OriginString: When we found you, you said you were looking for a certain plant.
String: 当我们找到你时，你说你在寻找某种植物。

OriginString: What is it and why is it so important to you that you kept living in the forest for so long?
String: 那到底是什么植物？为什么值得你在森林里生活这么久？

OriginString: Promise me you won't laugh.
String: 答应我你不会笑。

OriginString: ...I guess I can promise that.
String: ...我尽量不笑。

OriginString: I'm looking for the Flower of Eternity.
String: 我在寻找永恒之花。

OriginString: The Flower of Eternity?
String: 永恒之花？

OriginString: The Flower of Eternity is a legendary plant. It is a gorgeous flower that never withers and has existed since the dawn of creation.
String: 永恒之花是传说中的植物。这种绚丽的花朵永不凋零，自创世之初就存在。

OriginString: It's said that the Alchemists who were able to find one of the flowers were able to create potions with miraculous effects.
String: 据说能找到它的炼金术士，就能制作出具有神奇效果的药水。

OriginString: ....I see. And I guess the laughable part about that is...
String: ...我明白了。你觉得可笑的地方在于...

OriginString: ...The Flower of Eternity is considered a folktale amongst alchemists. Most alchemists don't believe that it exists. Those who believe are generally laughed at.
String: ...在炼金术士圈子里，永恒之花被认为是个民间传说。大多数炼金术士都不相信它存在。相信的人通常会遭到嘲笑。

OriginString: B-BUT I know it exists!
String: 但、但我确信它真的存在！

OriginString: Why do you think that?
String: 为什么这么肯定？

OriginString: Because of the diary of one of my ancestors. He was also looking for the flower of Eternity and it seems like he has actually found the location of the flower.
String: 因为我祖先留下的一本日记。他也在寻找永恒之花，而且看起来他真的找到了那朵花的下落。

OriginString: Unfortunately most of what was written in the diary has been lost to time so I was only able to narrow down the location, where he has found the flower, to the general area around here.
String: 可惜日记大部分内容都随时间损毁了，我只能把范围缩小到这片区域附近。

OriginString: If that's the case wouldn't he already have picked the flower?
String: 如果是这样，他难道不该已经把花采走了吗？

OriginString: I don't think so. If he had, then that should have been mentioned in the diary. It should have changed his life.
String: 我觉得没有。如果采到了，日记里应该会提到。这会改变他的人生。

OriginString: But nothing of that sort is mentioned in his diary. The latter part is mostly just mundane descriptions of his everyday life.
String: 但日记后面只是平淡的日常生活记录。

OriginString: I can only theorize that he never brought the flower with him back home for some reason.
String: 我猜测他可能出于某种原因没有把花带回来。

OriginString: So what do you intend to do with it when you find it?
String: 那你找到后打算用它做什么？

OriginString: Make a Potion of course!
String: 当然是配制药水啊！

OriginString: Who knows what kind of Potion you could make with the Flower of Eternity!
String: 用永恒之花能配出什么药水谁都不知道！

OriginString: They say it has miraculous properties so the potion you could make with it should be unlike anything ever seen before.
String: 传说它具有神奇特性，用它制作的药水会是前所未有的杰作。

OriginString: I see. If you do go out searching for it again then tell me so that I can assign some adventurers to escort you.
String: 明白了。如果你要再去寻找，记得告诉我，我会派冒险者护送。

OriginString: Thanks again for the help, Guild Master! I really appreciate it!
String: 再次感谢帮助，公会会长！我真的很感激！

OriginString: Show me your appreciation by continuing to make potions for our adventurers.
String: 真要感谢的话，就继续为我们的冒险者们配制药水吧。

OriginString: Will do Guild Master!
String: 遵命，会长大人！

OriginString: ...Yeah, that was a stupid question.
String: ...好吧，这是个蠢问题。

OriginString:
...My name is {PROTAGONIST}.
I'm the Guild Master here.
String:
...我叫{PROTAGONIST}。
是这里的公会会长。

OriginString: What is your name?
String: 你叫什么名字？

OriginString: ...Alissa...
Alissa...do you still have family?
String: 艾丽莎...你还有家人吗？

OriginString: No...*sniff*
They were everything I have.
String: 他们是我的一切

OriginString: My father...
String: 我父亲...

OriginString: My mother...
String: 我母亲...

OriginString:
And my older brother...
All gone...
String:
还有我哥哥...
全都离我而去了...

OriginString: ...I talked with a priest from the church of Ghanenta.
String: ...我和加南塔教堂的神父谈过了

OriginString: If you have nowhere else to go, then they would be able to take you in.
String: 如果你无处可去,他们可以收留你

OriginString:
You would leave your old life behind and start a new life.
And with time, the pain will become a faint memory.
String:
"你将告别过去的生活，开始崭新的人生。"
"随着时间的流逝，这份痛苦终将成为遥远的回忆。"

OriginString: ...Is that alright with you?
String: ...这样可以吗?

OriginString: ...I-I don't know...
(She is probably too numb from everything that has happened to make a decision.)
String: (她可能因为遭受的打击太大而无法做决定)

OriginString: ...I think you should go with them.
String: ...我觉得你应该跟他们走

OriginString: Your family would probably want you to be safe and sound.
String: 你的家人一定希望你能平安无事

OriginString: And this path might give you the best chance for happiness.
String: 这条路或许能给你最好的未来

OriginString: Even if now it seems like you'll never be again.
String: 即便现在你觉得永远无法走出伤痛

OriginString: ...Okay...
I wish you all the best for the future.
String: 祝你未来一切安好

OriginString: Then take your time.
String: 慢慢来.

OriginString: It's not like you have to make a decision now.
String: 不用现在就做决定。

OriginString: Just think about it.Maybe you'll find a better path on your own.
String: 好好想想吧。也许你会找到更适合自己的路。

OriginString: You can stay as long as you want until you've made a decision.
String: 在做决定之前，你想待多久都可以。

OriginString: ...Thank you...
...Hello Guild Master.
String: ...你好，公会会长。

OriginString: Oh, hello Alissa.
String: 哦，你好啊，阿丽莎。

OriginString:
I...wanted to talk to you.
...About what we talked about.
String:
我...想和你谈谈。
...关于我们之前说的事。

OriginString:
I see...
So you made your decision.
String:
我明白了...
看来你已经做出决定了。

OriginString: Yes...
String: 是的...

OriginString: I want to be an adventurer.
String: 我想成为一名冒险者。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...What?
String: <?whiteFlash>...什么？

OriginString: ...You're serious, aren't you?
String: ...你是认真的，对吗？

OriginString: Yes.
String: 是的。

OriginString: I'm not sure what to say...Have you really thought this through? Being an adventurer is not exactly an easy life and I'm sure your parents would have wanted more for you.
String: 我不知道该说什么...你真的考虑清楚了吗？冒险者的生活并不轻松，而且我相信你父母肯定希望你有更好的选择。

OriginString: ...I can't stop thinking about what happened that day.
String: ...我无法停止回想那天发生的事

OriginString: When the bandits appeared before us. The screams of people when they started killing. Their laughter while doing so...
String: 当强盗出现在我们面前时。人们被屠杀时的尖叫声。他们行凶时的狞笑...

OriginString: Every night I wake up terrified from my nightmares, reliving the events of that day.
String: 每晚我都会从噩梦中惊醒，重新经历那天的一切

OriginString: And in the times I'm awake, I'm afraid of every sound I hear and every stranger I see.
String: 清醒时，我害怕听到的每个声响，见到的每个陌生人

OriginString:
The world has become such a dark place and it frightens me...
It felt like...my life would never be alright again...
String:
"这个世界变得如此黑暗，让我感到害怕..."
"感觉就像...我的生活再也无法回到正轨了..."

OriginString: But...when your adventurers saved that village from the bandits, for the first time in a long time I felt...hopeful.
String: 但是...当你们的冒险者从强盗手中拯救那个村庄时，长久以来我第一次感受到...希望

OriginString: ...I...<?shakeScreen>I don't want to feel afraid anymore, Guild Master!  I want to be strong like an adventurer. Strong enough that I could have saved them.
String: ...我...<?shakeScreen>我不想再害怕了，公会会长！我想变得像冒险者一样强大。强大到当初能拯救他们

OriginString: Please Guild Master...Let me join you.
String: 求您了公会会长...让我加入吧

OriginString: ...I understand. If you think that's what is best for you I won't stop you.
String: ...我明白了。如果这对你最好，我不会阻拦

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master!
String: 谢谢您，公会会长！

OriginString: (Hopefully, I won't get haunted by her family for this decision).
String: (希望这个决定不会被她家人追着算账)

OriginString: ...I'm sorry Alissa but I can not let you join.
String: ...抱歉艾丽莎，但我不能让你加入。

OriginString: B-but...
I won't change my mind.
String: 我不会改变主意的。

OriginString: ...Just try to live your life in peace. I'm sure that's what your family would have wanted for you.
String: ...去过平静的生活吧。我相信这也是你家人对你的期望。

OriginString: I'm sorry! I have to go!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 对不起！我得走了！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (...This is for the best.)
String: (...这样对大家都好。)

OriginString: (I'll tell Eden that they should bring her away as soon as possible.)
String: (我得告诉伊登他们尽快带她离开。)

OriginString: ...Farewell Alissa.
String: ...再见了，艾丽莎。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master.
String: 您好，公会会长。

OriginString: Hello Alissa. What can I do for you?
String: 你好艾丽莎，有什么事吗？

OriginString: ...I heard there was a Quest against the Bandit King.
String: ...我听说有个讨伐强盗王的任务。

OriginString:
Word really spread fast here, don't they?
But it's true. We received a Quest to help fight the Bandit King.
String:
消息在这儿传得可真快啊，是吧？
不过确实如此。我们接到了讨伐强盗王的委托。

OriginString: If possible...I would like to take part in that Quest.
String: 如果可以的话...我想参加这个任务。

OriginString: ...I see.
String: ...我明白了。

OriginString: I'll think about it.
String: 我会考虑的。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢您，公会会长。

OriginString: So, we finally found all the pieces.
String: "所以，我们终于集齐所有碎片了。"

OriginString: What do we do now?
String: 现在该怎么办？

OriginString: According to Majika it would be enough to put the pieces back together and it would start showing the location of its counterpart.
String: 玛吉卡说过，只要把这些碎片重新拼合，它就会开始显示另一颗龙珠的位置。

OriginString: Let's do it then!
String: 那我们就开始吧！

OriginString: (It started to float.)
String: （它开始浮空了。）

OriginString: I guess the direction it's pointing at is the direction where the witch most likely resides.
String: 它所指的方向，应该就是女巫最可能藏身的地方。

OriginString: Then what are we waiting for? We should head there immediately!
String: "那我们还等什么？现在就立刻出发吧！" Key: DIALOGUESCENE111_DIVINE MESSENGER_DIALOGUE2 原文: *Gulp* I-I don't know... This sounds dangerous. Maybe we should prepare more? "*咽口水* 我...我不知道...这听起来很危险。也许我们该多做些准备？" Key: DIALOGUESCENE111_DIVINE MESSENGER_DIALOGUE3 原文: Hah! You're always so cautious. Fortune favors the bold! "哈！ 你总是这么谨慎。富贵险中求啊！" Key: DIALOGUESCENE111_DIVINE MESSENGER_DIALOGUE4 原文: *Sigh* Fine... But at least let me check my equipment first. "*叹气* 好吧...但至少先让我检查下装备。" Key: DIALOGUESCENE111_DIVINE MESSENGER_DIALOGUE5 原文: Enough talk! The Divine Messenger won't wait forever! " 废话少说！神使可不会一直等着我们！"

OriginString: Not so fast!
String: 别急！

OriginString: We should prepare first. We're about to go deep into the enemy's base after all.
String: 得先做好准备。毕竟我们要深入敌人老巢。

OriginString: I doubt they will let us in without a fight. Our adventurers need to be ready.
String: 他们肯定不会让我们轻松进去。冒险者们必须准备周全。

OriginString: ...Very well, Guild Master. I'll trust your judgement. Whenever you think you're ready, just tell me.
String: ...好吧，公会会长。我相信你的判断。等你们准备妥当，随时通知我。

OriginString: I...just want it to be resolved as quickly as possible.
String: 我...只希望这件事能尽快解决。

OriginString: "Nothing is going to..."
String: 没什么大不了的...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I don't want to hear it!
String: <?shakeScreen>我不想听！

OriginString: I hope at least the reason for this quest was worth risking the life of our Adventurers over.
String: 至少希望这个委托的理由，值得让我们的冒险者赌上性命。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Wait! Don't tell me you just wanted some flowers for yourself?
String: <?whiteFlash>等等！你该不会只是为了给自己采花吧？

OriginString: *sighs* They're not for me.
String: *叹气* 不是给我的。

OriginString: They're for Tavi. From her husband...
String: 是给塔薇的...来自她丈夫...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!
String: <?whiteFlash>！

OriginString: Just bring them to her.
String: 把花带给她就行。

OriginString: Oh! Hello Guild Master!
String: 啊！你好啊公会会长！

OriginString: What can I do for you?
String: 有什么我能帮你的吗？

OriginString: I got some flowers here that are meant for you.
String: 我有一些要送给你的花。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh...
String: <?whiteFlash>哦...

OriginString: These are...rainbow flowers...
String: 这些是...彩虹花...

OriginString: I...wasn't sure I'd get any this year...
String: 我...还以为今年收不到了...

OriginString: Fiola told me to get some but never told me it was for you.
String: 菲奥拉让我去采的，但没说是给你的。

OriginString: Hahaha, she probably thought if you knew what they were really for, you wouldn't deem it important enough to do it. She is sometimes thoughtful like that.
String: 哈哈哈，她大概是觉得如果告诉你真实用途，你会觉得不重要就不去做了。她有时候就是这样贴心。

OriginString: ...They're from your husband I heard...
String: ...听说这些是你丈夫...

OriginString: ...Yeah...
...He forgot our anniversary once and I was so angry at him I didn't talk to him for a whole week.
String: ...他有一次忘记我们的结婚纪念日，我气得整整一周没理他。

OriginString: As an apology, he paid the Guild to gather rainbow flowers for me every anniversary, so I'd have a gift even if he forgot.
String: 作为道歉，他付钱给公会每年纪念日都为我收集彩虹花，这样即使他忘了我也能收到礼物。

OriginString: ...I really miss my big old dork...
String: ...我真的好想那个大笨蛋...

OriginString: Nevertheless, thank you for the flowers, Guild Master! I hope it wasn't too much of a bother to collect them.
String: 不管怎样谢谢你的花，公会会长！希望收集它们没给你添太多麻烦。

OriginString: Oh gods. It was, wasn't it?
String: 天呐。确实很麻烦对吧？

OriginString: ...Well...
(After a short explanation...)
String: (简短解释之后...)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>A hostile tree?! Now I feel bad for the adventurers.
String: <?shakeScreen>一棵有敌意的树？！现在我真为冒险者们感到过意不去。

OriginString: Don't worry about it. They've gone through much worse.
String: 别担心。他们经历过更糟的情况。

OriginString: But even so...
String: 但即便如此...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I know! Wait here for a second, Guild Master!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?whiteFlash>我知道了！会长你在这等一下！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (I wonder what she's up to...)
String: (不知道她要做什么...)

OriginString: Hnnngh!....Why is this so heavy?
String: 呃啊！....这东西怎么这么重？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Phew! This thing weighs a ton!
String: <?shakeScreen>呼！这东西死沉死沉的！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>This is...an armor.
String: <?whiteFlash>这是...一套盔甲。

OriginString: This used to belong to my husband! Don't let my husband's death fool you. This is some fine armor, you'll rarely find anywhere.
String: 这是我丈夫的遗物！别被我丈夫的死讯误导了。这可是难得一见的上好盔甲。

OriginString: The Guild can have it. As thanks for the flowers.
String: 送给公会吧。作为这些花的谢礼。

OriginString: Are you sure about that? This armor is important to you, isn't it?
String: 你确定吗？这套盔甲对你很重要吧？

OriginString: ...I'd be lying if I said no, but the adventurers deserved it.
String: ...说不重要是假的，但冒险者们值得拥有它。

OriginString: And besides, armor should be used to protect people! Not to collect dust in some widow's room.
String: 再说盔甲就应该用来保护人！而不是在某个寡妇的房间里积灰。

OriginString: I'm sure he would be happy if his armor could save an adventurer's life. He was very fond of the Guild after all.
String: 我相信如果他的盔甲能救冒险者一命，他会很高兴的。毕竟他生前非常喜欢公会。

OriginString: And so am I.
String: 我也是。

OriginString: Thank you Tavi. I promise I will put it to good use.
String: 谢谢你塔薇。我保证会好好利用它。

OriginString: Hello, I guess you're Rogue's friend.
String: 你好，我猜你是罗格的朋友。

OriginString: If she is who I think she is, then yes. I'm her friend.
String: 如果她是我认识的那个罗格，那没错。我是她朋友。

OriginString:
And I assume that you're the one who has sent those adventurers to help me.
I'm grateful for that.
String:
"我猜那些来帮我的冒险者就是你派来的吧。
这份恩情我记下了。"

OriginString: It's alright.
String: 不用客气。

OriginString: (She seems to be a bit more open than Rogue. Maybe I can finally learn something from her.)
String: (她看起来比罗格开朗些。也许终于能从她这里打听到些什么。)

OriginString: So, what's your name and how did you get to know Rogue?
String: 那么，你叫什么名字？是怎么认识罗格的？

OriginString: Well, I'm...
String: 我叫...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Luana!
String: <?whiteFlash>露安娜！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Are you fine? Did they hurt you?
String: <?shakeScreen>你还好吗？他们有伤害你吗？

OriginString: I'm fine!
String: 我很好！

OriginString: Are you sure?
String: 你确定？

OriginString: Really! You don't have to worry.
String: 真的！你不用操心啦。

OriginString: (...Well, this is an unexpected reaction.)
String: (...这反应倒是出乎意料)

OriginString: (...She really was worried, wasn't she?)
String: (...她刚才真的很担心呢)

OriginString: I see you returned as well.
String: 看来你也回来了。

OriginString: Yeah, my place turned out to be a dud.
String: 是啊，我那破地方根本不能住人。

OriginString: The only ones waiting for me there, were some old acquaintances I had to take care of.
String: 唯一在那等我的，只有几个需要"叙叙旧"的老相识。

OriginString: That reminds me...
String: 说到这个...

OriginString: Did the adventurers take care of all the ones on their end?
String: 冒险者们那边都解决了吗？

OriginString: Don't worry. I took care of it.
String: 别担心，我都处理好了。

OriginString: "They" shouldn't know that the Adventurers Guild has helped me.
String: 他们""应该不会知道冒险者公会帮了我。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's Luana for you! I should have expected nothing less from you!
String: <?shakeScreen>不愧是露安娜！我就知道你能搞定！

OriginString: ...Why are you staring at me like that, Guild Master?
String: ...公会会长你干嘛这样盯着我看？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Am I?
String: <?whiteFlash>有吗？

OriginString: Sorry, I just thought that...
String: 抱歉，我只是觉得...

OriginString: ...you really care about her, don't you?
String: ...你其实很在乎她，对吧？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-wait. W-what are you implying? It's not what you're thinking!
String: <?shakeScreen>等、等等！你这是什么意思？才不是你想的那样！

OriginString: Are you saying you don't care about me...
String: 所以你不在乎我咯...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No! No! I didn't mean that! I-I...
String: <?shakeScreen>不是！不是那个意思！我、我...

OriginString: I'm just kidding of course!
String: 开玩笑的啦！

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>Ungghh...
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>呜呃...

OriginString: (I'm pretty sure if she wasn't hiding her face, we would be seeing a pretty red face right now.)
String: (要不是蒙着脸，现在肯定能看到她涨得通红的脸)

OriginString: Guild Master.
String: 公会会长。

OriginString: Again, I like to thank you for your help.
String: 再次感谢你们的帮助。

OriginString: And also thank you for keeping a dear friend of mine safe.
String: 也谢谢你保护了我的挚友。

OriginString: Well, the latter is more of a decision of my predecessor than mine.
String: 后者更多是我前任的决定。

OriginString: Nevertheless, thank you.
String: 但还是要谢谢你。

OriginString: If you allow it, I'd like to stay here with Rogue.
String: 如果你允许，我想和罗格一起留在这里。

OriginString: Just like her I can offer you to teach your adventurers the skills I learned during my life.
String: 和她一样，我也可以教授冒险者们我毕生所学。

OriginString: I heard about it from my adventurers. A warrior capable of casting spells. A very rare combination.
String: 我听冒险者们说了。能施法的战士，非常罕见的组合。

OriginString: I'd be a fool to object to that.
String: 拒绝的话就太愚蠢了。

OriginString: Thank you Guild Master.
String: 谢谢您，公会会长。

OriginString: Seems like we will be together for a while "Rogue".
String: 看来我们要相处一阵子了，""罗格""。

OriginString: I really missed you.
String: 我真的很想你。

OriginString:
...
<?whiteFlash><size=12>*mumble* I missed you too...</size>
String:
...
<?whiteFlash><size=12>*低声* 我也想你...</size>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Guild Master! We need to talk!
String: <?shakeScreen>公会长！我们需要谈谈！

OriginString: (That doesn't sound good.)
String: (听起来不太妙啊。)

OriginString: I need some of the adventurers to help me do something.
String: 我需要一些冒险者帮我办件事。

OriginString: Help you with what?
String: 帮你做什么？

OriginString: To kill somebody!
String: 去杀个人！

OriginString: ...Astrid, maybe you need to calm down a bit.
String: ...阿斯特丽德，也许你需要冷静一下。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I AM CALM!
String: <?shakeScreen>我很冷静！

OriginString: Geez! That was convincing.
String: 天！真是有说服力。

OriginString:
...I've been looking for that person for so long, and finally, I found him. 
I can at last let him pay for everything he has done.
String:
...我寻找那个人已经太久太久，终于让我找到了。
这下总算能让他为自己所做的一切付出代价了。

OriginString: Who is that unfortunate person, who has you on their bad side?
String: 那个不幸被你记恨的人是谁？

OriginString: ...His name is Andrey. He was...a former adventurer at the Guild.
String: ...他叫安德烈。曾经...是公会的一名冒险者。

OriginString: He was a member of my former party...
String: 他是我原小队的一员...

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Wait...What?
If so, why do you want to see him dead?
String: <?shakeScreen>等等...什么？既然如此，你为什么想要他死？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Because he betrayed us! He was part of the cultists who infiltrated the Guild!
He was never one of us!
String: <?shakeScreen>因为他背叛了我们！他是渗透进公会的邪教分子之一！他从来就不是我们的同伴！

OriginString:
So many people died in the Guild because of him!
He has to pay for it and I want to do it personally!
String:
"公会因为他死了那么多人！"
"他必须付出代价，我要亲手了结他！"

OriginString: Even right now, he is causing harm to people. I've heard that he and some other cultists are using hobgoblins to abduct people.
String: 直到现在他还在祸害他人。我听说他和其他邪教徒正利用巨魔绑架民众。

OriginString: We need to get there and put an end to it!
String: 我们必须去阻止这一切！

OriginString:
I guess we should...
Fine! I'll assemble a party and tell you when we're ready.
String:
"我想我们该...
好吧！我这就召集队伍，准备好了通知你。"

OriginString: Good!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 很好！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (That was intense.)
String: (真是剑拔弩张啊。)

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Hello, Falken. Didn't see you there.
String: <?whiteFlash>嗨，法尔肯。刚才没看到你。

OriginString:
Hello, Guildmaster. I... just heard your conversation with Astrid.
Could I ask you something, Guild Master?
String:
你好，公会会长。我...刚刚听到你和阿斯特丽德的谈话了。
能请教您一个问题吗，公会会长？

OriginString: What is it?
String: 什么事？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I'd prefer if you send those adventurers without telling Astrid.
String: <?whiteFlash>我希望你能派那些冒险者去，但别告诉阿斯特丽德。

OriginString: Are you worried about her? Sure, I haven't seen her in combat before, so I'm not sure she's still able to go on the field but...
String: 你担心她？确实，我没见过她战斗的样子，不确定她是否还能上战场...

OriginString:
No, no. That's not what I'm worried about. 
It's about Andrey.
String:
不，不是。我担心的不是这个。
是安德烈的事。

OriginString: The one Astrid seems to have a huge bone to pick with? Did you know him?
String: 就是阿斯特丽德恨之入骨的那个人？你认识他？

OriginString: ...I did. And Astrid wasn't entirely honest with you. Andrey wasn't simply a former party member of hers...
String: ...认识。而且阿斯特丽德没完全说实话。安德烈不只是她曾经的队友...

OriginString: He was her former lover.
String: 他曾是{GENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}旧爱。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WHAT?!
String: <?shakeScreen>什么？！

OriginString:
...And it wasn't just a fling or anything non-committal. She was really in love. 
Anyone could have seen it.
String:
"...而且这根本不是随便玩玩或是什么逢场作戏。她是真心实意地爱着。
任谁都看得出来。"

OriginString: (I certainly have a hard time imagining her go all lovey-dovey. Ugh..., this brings back some horrible memories with Franny and Fiola.)
String: （实在难以想象她陷入恋爱的样子。呃...这让我想起和弗兰妮、菲奥拉的那些糟糕回忆。）

OriginString: However, since Andrey's betrayal, she has never been the same again. She has completely shut herself off from anybody. Recently I had hoped that she might have gotten past it, but now that Andrey has reappeared...
String: 但自从安德烈背叛后，她就彻底变了。完全封闭了自己。最近我还以为她走出来了，可现在安德烈又出现了...

OriginString: I fear if she's the one who kills him... then she would never recover from it.
String: 我担心如果由她亲手了结...那她就真的再也无法回头了。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>So, please, Guild Master. I'm actually begging you here!
Please, don't let Astrid make that mistake!
String: <?shakeScreen>所以求你了，公会会长！我这是真心在求你！别让阿斯特丽德犯下这个错误！

OriginString:
...I'm not sure about it... but I trust your judgment. 
I'll send the adventurers and won't tell Astrid.
String:
...我虽然不太确定...但我相信你的判断。
我会派冒险者去，而且不会告诉阿斯特丽德。

OriginString:
Thank you, Guild Master. 
Trust me...It's for the best.
String:
谢谢您，公会会长。  
相信我...这是最好的选择。

OriginString: So the adventurers did it, huh.
String: 所以是冒险者们解决的啊。

OriginString: Yeah...
String: 是啊...

OriginString: ...How did Astrid react?
String: ...阿斯特丽德什么反应？

OriginString: Don't know. I left a message for her saying it was your idea.
String: 不知道。我给她留了条消息说是你的主意。

OriginString: You what now?
String: 你说啥？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>(Speaking of the devil.)
String: <?shakeScreen>（说曹操曹操到。）

OriginString: Everyone besides Falken...out!
String: 除了法尔肯...其他人都给我出去！

OriginString:
Hey, wait a second! You can't just throw everyone out!
Especially me!
String:
喂，等一下！你不能就这样把所有人都赶出去啊！
特别是不能赶我走！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Did I stutter?
String: <?shakeScreen>我说得不够清楚吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Ieeps!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>呜哇！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...Good luck, Falken.
String: ...祝你好运，法尔肯。

OriginString: Hey wait! You're not just going to leave me, are you?
String: 喂等等！你们不会就这样丢下我吧？

OriginString:
Well, Falken is a goner.
Maybe she'll leave him with a broken arm.
String:
唉，法尔肯这下完蛋了。
说不定她只会打断他一条胳膊。

OriginString: Don't be ridiculous. She wouldn't break his arms.
String: 别胡说。她不会打断他胳膊的。

OriginString: Are you sure about that?
String: 你确定吗？

OriginString: ...Let's watch through one of the windows and make sure nothing happens.
String: ...我们还是透过窗户看看，确保不会出什么意外。

OriginString: ...Explain yourself.
String: ...解释清楚。

OriginString: ...I did what I had to do.
String: ...我只是做了必须做的事。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Who are you to decide that?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你以为你是谁，能替我做决定？！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Andrey was my responsibility! Mine!
<?shakeScreen>You denied me my chance to make things right!
String: <?shakeScreen>安德烈是我的责任！我的！

OriginString: ...None of it was your fault!
String: ...这不是你的错！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>But it was!
...
String: <?shakeScreen>但就是我的错！

OriginString: ...I knew he was a cultist!
String: ...我早知道他是个邪教徒！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: ...Before the night of the Attack...he talked with me about the cultists. How they might not be what they seem.
String: ...袭击发生前那晚...他和我谈起邪教徒。说他们可能并非表面那样。

OriginString:
...It was obvious that he wanted to see if he could recruit me...It was obvious that he was one of them...
...But I willfully ignored it...because I wanted to believe in him.
String:
...很明显他是想看看能不能招募我...很明显他就是他们中的一员...
...但我故意视而不见...因为我想要相信他。

OriginString: I could have saved everyone. But my mistake was trusting someone close to me when I should have known better.
String: 我本可以救所有人。但我的错误是轻信了本该警惕的亲近之人。

OriginString:
...
Even knowing that, I would have still not let you kill him.
String: 即便知道这些，我也绝不会让你杀了他。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Why you...!
String: <?shakeScreen>你这家伙...！

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>Because you really loved him.
And I know he loved you too.
String: <?whiteFlash>因为你真心爱过他。

OriginString:
Remember when you told me that you lost your eye because you tried to stop Andrey that night? You both armed with your bows aiming at each other.
You said you both barely missed each other.
String:
还记得你说过那晚为了阻止安德烈而失去一只眼睛的事吗？当时你们俩都张弓搭箭瞄准对方。
你说你们俩都差点射中彼此。

OriginString: ...I never bought that story. You two have never missed your mark before.
String: ...我从没信过这说法。你们以前从未失手过。

OriginString: You just both couldn't do it.
String: 你们只是都下不了手。

OriginString: That's why I believe that if you had done it this time, then it would have haunted you for the rest of your life.
String: 所以我相信若这次你真杀了他，余生都会活在阴影里。

OriginString: And I couldn't let that happen.
String: 我不能让这事发生。

OriginString: ...Why do you care so much?
String: ...为什么这么在乎？

OriginString:
...You know why.
It's obvious, isn't it?
String:
...你心里清楚。
这不是明摆着的事吗？

OriginString: I'm sorry, Falken. I don't think I can ever trust someone like that again.
String: 抱歉，法尔肯。我想我再也无法那样信任谁了。

OriginString: You deserve better.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 你值得更好的人。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: What just happened?
String: 发生什么了？

OriginString: I think Falken just got dumped.
String: 我觉得法尔肯刚刚被甩了。

OriginString: ...a-and then we got attacked...they just started to kill everybody!
String: ...然...然后我们遭到袭击...他们见人就杀！

OriginString: We...tried to run away.*Sob*....I ran...I ran with all my might.
String: 我们...试图逃跑*抽泣*...我拼命跑...用尽全力逃跑。

OriginString: I heard my family screaming *sob*...but I was too afraid to look back.
String: 我听到家人在尖叫*抽泣*...但我害怕得不敢回头看。

OriginString: A-and when I finally stopped....I was the only one left.
String: 当...当我终于停下时...只剩我一个人了。

OriginString: Oh gods....*sob*. They're all dead!
String: 天啊...*抽泣*他们都死了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>*WAAAAHHHHH*
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>*哇啊啊啊*

OriginString: Could you bring her to one of the guest rooms? I think she needs some rest...and some time to grieve.
String: 能带她去客房休息吗？她需要休息...还有时间哀悼。

OriginString: O-of course...<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 好...好的...<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Did something happen?
String: 发生什么事了？

OriginString: Oh Guild Master...you saw that, didn't you?
String: 公会会长...您都看到了吧？

OriginString: Some adventurers found the poor girl completely battered and bruised outside the guild. Lying half dead on the ground.
String: 冒险者们发现这个可怜的女孩满身是伤地倒在公会外面，奄奄一息。

OriginString: She told us that she is the daughter of a merchant and that she and her family were part of a caravan that tragically got attacked by bandits.
String: 她说自己是商人的女儿，和家人随商队出行时不幸遭遇强盗袭击。

OriginString: She managed to flee but...the rest of her family wasn't so lucky.
String: 她侥幸逃了出来...但其他家人都没能幸免。

OriginString: That is quite...tragic.
String: 这真是...太悲惨了。

OriginString: ...Lately we get more and more stories about bandits attacking people. It's like there are no safe roads anymore.
String: ...最近关于强盗袭击的传闻越来越多，好像没有安全的道路了。

OriginString: Even more disturbing is the fact that they also started abducting people. The strange thing is that they never asked for a ransom and nobody knows what happened to them.
String: 更可怕的是他们开始绑架人。奇怪的是从不索要赎金，也没人知道那些人的下落。

OriginString: That's rather...worrisome. I wonder if this is going to have an impact on us.
String: 这确实...令人不安。不知道会不会影响到我们。

OriginString: ...I hate to ask...but what do we do about the girl from before? I don't think she has anywhere else to go now.
String: ...虽然难以启齿...刚才那女孩怎么办？她现在无处可去了。

OriginString: ...I'll talk with Eden later. Maybe the church of Ghanenta will take her in and take care of her.
String: ...我晚点找伊登谈谈。也许加南塔教会愿意收留照顾她。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master. I hope life will treat her kinder from now on.
String: 谢谢您，公会会长。希望她今后能过得好些。

OriginString: ...Let's hope so...
String: ...但愿如此...

OriginString: So, you're the ones from that Adventurer Guild that keeps getting in our ways.
String: "所以，你们就是那个总坏我们好事的冒险者公会的人。"

OriginString: But that will end today!
String: 但今天就是你们的末日！

OriginString: First I will kill you! Then I will kill that snot-nosed noble and his men.
String: 我要先宰了你们！然后再解决那个流鼻涕的贵族和他手下。

OriginString: And then I will come for your Guild!
String: 最后就轮到你们公会了！

OriginString: So, you're the ones from that Adventurer Guild that keeps getting in our ways.
String: 所以，你们就是那个一直妨碍我们的冒险者公会的人。

OriginString: But that will end today!
String: 但今天就是你们的末日！

OriginString: First I will kill you! Then I will kill that snot-nosed noble and his men.
String: 我要先宰了你们！然后再解决那个流鼻涕的贵族和他手下。

OriginString: And then I will come for your Guild!
String: 最后就轮到你们公会了！

OriginString: You will die before that happens and pay for everything you've taken from me!
String: 在那之前你就会死，为你从我这里夺走的一切付出代价！

OriginString: I don't even know who you are.
String: 我根本不认识你是谁。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Finally, I found you!
String: <?shakeScreen>终于找到你了！

OriginString: And the nightmare begins.
String: 噩梦开始了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Just quit your needless quips and come with me!
String: <?shakeScreen>少说废话，跟我走！

OriginString: We have an important guest!
String: 有位重要客人要见你！

OriginString: (An important guest?...)
String: （重要客人？...）

OriginString: Hmpf! Finally!
String: 哼！总算来了！

OriginString: You should be ashamed for making us wait so long.
String: 让我们等这么久，你真该感到羞愧。

OriginString: (Not her again...)
String: （怎么又是她...）

OriginString: (Behave this time!)
String: （这次给我注意点！）

OriginString: Now, now, Cecil! We were the ones who came unannounced.
String: 好了好了，塞西尔！是我们突然造访的。

OriginString: And for that I'm truly sorry.
String: 为此我深表歉意。

OriginString: (I guess this is her older brother.)
String: （这应该是她哥哥吧。）

OriginString: (Seems like a decent guy. I was already worried he'd be more like the kid.)
String: （看起来是个正经人。我刚才还担心他也像这小鬼一样难缠。）

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You just thought of something rude, didn't you?
String: <?shakeScreen>你刚才在想什么失礼的事对吧？

OriginString:
I think introductions are in order.
My name is Gilbert Greyhorn. I'm the man your adventurers have recently saved.
String:
"我想该做个自我介绍了。
我叫吉尔伯特·灰角。就是你们冒险者最近救下的那个人。"

OriginString: I know that my gratitude might come late at this point, but I still wanted to thank the Adventurer Guild for what they have done for me.
String: 虽然现在道谢可能有些迟了，但我仍想感谢冒险者公会为我所做的一切。

OriginString: Of course that's not worth mentioning! We are always happy to help a noble house like the Greyhorns.
String: 这根本不值一提！能帮助灰角家族这样的贵族是我们的荣幸。

OriginString: Well, I wouldn't say...
String: 呃，我倒不觉得...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>(HNNNNGGGH!!!)
String: <?whiteFlash>（嗷嗷嗷！！！）

OriginString: (SHE'S STEPPING ON MY FOOT!)
String: （她踩我脚！！）

OriginString: And we'd also be happy if we can do anything else for you in the future.
String: 如果今后还能为您效劳，我们将不胜荣幸。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...That is actually another reason why I'm here.
String: <?whiteFlash>...这其实是我来这里的另一个原因。

OriginString: I want to task the Adventurer Guild with a Quest.
String: 我想委托冒险者公会一项任务。

OriginString:
(From experience, working for nobles pays a lot.
<waitfor=0.5> Unfortunately it's usually also that much more dangerous.)
String:
(根据经验，为贵族办事报酬丰厚。
<waitfor=0.5> 可惜通常危险程度也会翻倍。)

OriginString: As you know our last attempt to bring down the bandit king has failed. Since then a lot more villages and towns have been raided and people have been abducted.
String: 如你所知，我们上次讨伐强盗王的行动失败了。自那以后更多村庄城镇遭到洗劫，人民被掳走。

OriginString: It's a situation which we can not allow to continue any longer.
String: 这种情况我们不能再放任下去了。

OriginString: The last few days my family has been consolidating our forces for a second attack on the bandit king.
String: 最近几天我的家族正在集结兵力，准备对强盗王发动第二次进攻。

OriginString: Aren't you afraid it will end like last time?
String: 你不怕重蹈覆辙吗？

OriginString: No, because it will be different from last time.
String: 不，因为这次会与上次不同。

OriginString: This time I want your adventurers to join us in battle.
String: 这次我希望你们的冒险者能与我们并肩作战。

OriginString: I've seen your adventurers fight. They're stronger than any of my men.
String: 我见过你们冒险者战斗的样子。他们比我任何手下都要强。

OriginString: I'm convinced that with your adventurers on our side, we can finally put an end to the bandit king!
String: 我相信有了冒险者的帮助，我们一定能彻底消灭强盗王！

OriginString: What do you say, Guild Master?
String: "您觉得呢，公会会长？"

OriginString: Will the Adventurer Guild lend us their strength?
String: 冒险者公会愿意助我们一臂之力吗？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>The Adventurer Guild accepts the Quest.
String: <?whiteFlash>冒险者公会接受这个任务。

OriginString:
Thank you, Guild Master! 
I swear that I will not forget this favor.
String:
"多谢了，公会会长！
这份恩情我吉尔伯特绝不会忘记。"

OriginString: You should feel honored to have a noble house like ours acknowledge the value of the Adventurer Guild.
String: 能被我们这样的贵族世家认可冒险者公会的价值，你们应该感到荣幸。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Why are you even here? This is a talk for grown-ups.
String: <?shakeScreen>你来干什么？这是大人的谈话。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>T-the audacity!
String: <?shakeScreen>无、无礼之徒！

OriginString: I'm sorry Guild Master but lately Cecil has refused to leave my side ever since I came back. It's like she's afraid I will disappear when she loses sight of me.
String: 抱歉公会会长...自从我回来后塞西莉亚就不肯离开我半步，她好像生怕一眨眼我就会消失似的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>BROTHER!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>哥哥！！！

OriginString: That's...surprisingly adorable.
String: 这...意外地可爱呢。

OriginString: Isn't it? My little sister is the most adorable being out there!
String: 对吧？我家妹妹是世界上最可爱的存在！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>BROTHER!
String: <?shakeScreen>哥哥！

OriginString: Did you know when I returned, she ran towards me crying? She tried to hug me but because she's so small she just hugged my leg.
String: "你知道吗？我回来的时候，她哭着朝我跑过来。想抱我来着，但因为个子太小，最后只抱住了我的腿。"

OriginString: It took a lot of effort to pry her away from my leg, so tightly did she cling to me.
String: 她抱得那么紧，费了好大劲才把她从我腿上扒下来。

OriginString: Stop it!<?shakeScreenWeak><waitfor=0.5> No more!<?shakeScreenWeak>
String: 别说了！<?shakeScreenWeak><waitfor=0.5>不许再说了！<?shakeScreenWeak>

OriginString: And she tried to tell me that she was worried but I could hardly understand anything from all the tears and snot on her face.
String: 她当时想告诉我她很担心，可那张哭得鼻涕眼泪糊满的小脸让我根本听不清她在说什么。

OriginString: Honestly, I felt like her cuteness that day would kill me after the bandits failed to.
String: 说真的，那天她的可爱程度简直比强盗还致命。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen><speed=3>I SAID THAT'S ENOUGH, STUPID BROTHER!
String: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen><speed=3>我说够了笨蛋哥哥！

OriginString: WAAAAAHHHH!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 哇啊啊啊！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...I might have overdone it on my teasing.
String: ...我可能玩笑开过头了。

OriginString: Let us talk about the details of the attack later. We'll be in the tavern if you need us.
String: 袭击的细节我们改天再谈。有事就来酒馆找我们。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Cecil! <?shakeScreen>Come back! Your big brother is sorryyyyyy.....!!!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>塞西莉亚！<?shakeScreen>回来啊！哥哥知道错啦.....!!!<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: I so want to hug her.
String: 好想抱抱她啊。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>W-what was that?
String: <?whiteFlash>刚、刚才那是？

OriginString: N-nothing! I said nothing!
String: 没、没什么！我什么都没说！

OriginString: N-North of here is a hall where the b-bandit king usually met with his inner circle.
String: "往、往北走有个大厅，强、强盗王经常在那里和他的亲信碰头。"

OriginString: I-if he's still here, t-then he might be there.
String: 如-如果他还在这儿，那-那他可能就在那儿。

OriginString: I-In the east is also a room where the p-prisoners are.
String: 东-东边还有间关押囚-囚犯的房间。

OriginString: A-and south of them is the t-treasury room.
String: 然-然后南边就是藏-藏宝室。

OriginString: Careful adventurers!
String: 小心点冒险者们！

OriginString: There are bandits patrolling on the path ahead.
String: 前面路上有强盗在巡逻。

OriginString: We should try to avoid fights. Otherwise we might get swarmed by enemies.
String: 我们最好避免战斗，不然可能会被敌人包围。

OriginString: Damn! There are even more bandits ahead and they're blocking the road.
String: 该死！前面还有更多强盗，他们把路给堵住了。

OriginString: Does that mean we have to fight our way through?
String: 这是不是意味着我们得杀出一条血路？

OriginString: ...<waitfor=0.8><?whiteFlash>Not necessarily.
String: ...<waitfor=0.8><?whiteFlash>未必。

OriginString: Not everything has to end in a fight. We might have other options, depending on the situation.
String: 并非所有事情都必须以战斗收场。根据情况，我们或许还有其他选择。

OriginString: Let's see what we can do.
String: 先看看我们能做些什么吧。

OriginString: ...and with that concludes the tale of "The Maiden's woes".
String: ...以上就是《少女的悲叹》的全部故事了。

OriginString: Tell us another story!
String: 再给我们讲个故事吧！

OriginString: Far be it from me to deny a beautiful woman's request.
String: 我怎忍心拒绝一位美丽女士的请求呢。

OriginString: But alas! Any more strain to my voice will only rob the world of its beautiful sound.
String: 但可惜啊！我的嗓子再这么用下去，这世界就要失去它美妙的声音了。

OriginString: Kyaaaahhh!!
String: 呀啊啊啊！！

OriginString: ...What am I looking at?
String: ...我在看什么？

OriginString: Oh, hello Guild Master!
String: 啊，公会会长您来啦！

OriginString: You just arrived in time to see the female adventurers fawning over the new arrival.
String: 您正好赶上女冒险者们围着新来的那位献殷勤呢。

OriginString: I have to admit that he got a beautiful voice and some funny stories.
String: 不得不说他的嗓音确实迷人，讲的故事也很有趣。

OriginString: Funny stories? Like what?
String: 有趣的故事？比如？

OriginString: Like the last one, you just missed.
String: 比如您刚错过的那个。

OriginString: A love triangle that ends in a bloody feud between two families.
String: 一个以两个家族血腥世仇告终的三角恋。

OriginString: (I don't think that was supposed to be funny.)
String: （这可不像是该笑的故事）

OriginString: Salutations!
String: 向您致敬！

OriginString: My deepest apologies if I'm disturbing you but I have to ask!
String: 若我打扰了您，请接受我最诚挚的歉意，但我必须问一句！

OriginString: Are you by chance the Guild Master of this place?
String: 您莫非就是此处的公会会长？

OriginString: ...Yeah?
Marvelous! I knew right from the beginning, when I laid my eyes on you that there was something different about you!
String: 太棒了！从我第一眼见到您时，就感觉到您与众不同！

OriginString: A majestic aura, fitting for the leader of the bands of heroes here!
String: 这种威严的气场，正适合统领此地的英雄们！

OriginString: (This is going to be very tiresome, isn't it?)
String: （看来会是个麻烦的家伙啊）

OriginString: Let me introduce myself:  My name is Vincent Accusto. An entertainer and seeker of stories. I come bearing the gifts of laughter and tears, of love and heartbreak, of triumph and tragedy.
String: 容我自我介绍：我是文森特·阿库斯托。一名吟游诗人和故事收集者。我带来欢笑与泪水、爱情与心碎、胜利与悲剧的馈赠。

OriginString: May I be so blessed to learn your beautiful name?
String: 不知是否有幸得知您的大名？

OriginString: ...I'm {PROTAGONIST}.
String: ...我叫{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: ...{PROTAGONIST}...was it?
String: ...{PROTAGONIST}...是吗？

OriginString: Yes, that's right.
String: 对，没错。

OriginString: ...You have some other name you go by?
String: ...您没有其他别名吗？

OriginString: No.
String: 没有。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Nonono! That's unacceptable!
String: <?shakeScreen>不行不行！这绝对不行！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That name lacks any sense of grandeur! You have to change it!
String: <?shakeScreen>这名字毫无气势！您必须改掉它！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You're the new leader of the Adventurer Guild, for crying out loud!
String: <?shakeScreen>您可是冒险者公会的新任领袖啊！

OriginString: How would any story about the Adventurer Guild sound when its' leader has such a lame name!
String: 要是冒险者公会的故事里出现这么土气的名字，观众会立刻退场的！

OriginString: The audience would leave as soon as they heard the name!
String: 听众听到这种名字就会走光的！

OriginString: And why would that matter to you?
String: 这关你什么事？

OriginString: Of course it matters! Because I want to be part of the Adventurer Guild!
String: 当然有关！因为我想加入冒险者公会！

OriginString: ...You want to be part of the Adventurer Guild?
String: ...你想加入冒险者公会？

OriginString: Yes, I do, dear Guild Master!
String: 正是如此，亲爱的会长大人！

OriginString: Not as an adventurer, mind you.
String: 当然不是作为冒险者。

OriginString: These hands are far too precious to risk them getting injured.
String: 我这双手可太金贵了，不能冒险受伤。

OriginString: But I'd like to stay here and follow the Guild's progress.
String: 但我想留在这里见证公会的发展。

OriginString: I'm certain that the Adventurer Guild will accomplish great feats in the future.
String: 我坚信冒险者公会未来必将成就伟业。

OriginString: Feats I want to immortalize in songs and stories.
String: 而我要将这些伟业谱写成歌、编写成篇。

OriginString: And what can you offer in return?
String: 那你能提供什么回报？

OriginString: Music and song for the weary adventurers and maybe even private lessons for those who wish to learn my craft.
String: 为疲惫的冒险者演奏音乐，甚至开设私教课传授技艺。

OriginString: Not sure if being able to play the lute would be any use to adventurers.
String: 我不觉得弹鲁特琴对冒险有什么帮助。

OriginString:
Do not underestimate the value of good entertainment my dear Guild Master.
For tedium is just as deadly as any blade on a long road.
String:
"可别小看优质娱乐的价值啊，我亲爱的公会会长。"
"在漫长的旅途中，无聊可是和刀剑一样致命的。"

OriginString: ...Fine. You can stay.
String: ...好吧。你可以留下。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master! I will make sure to spread the name and fame of the Adventurer Guild!
String: 感谢您，会长！我一定会让冒险者公会声名远扬！

OriginString: Now back to your name. I could make you a list of splendid names that would fit you far better.
String: 现在回到您的名字。我可以列个华丽的名字清单，绝对比现在这个合适。

OriginString: Okay, that's it! I'm out of here!
String: 够了！我先走了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-wait! Guild Master! We have to discuss this! It's important!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>等、等等！会长大人！这事很重要啊！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...wait a second...
...did that bard pay for his drinks?
String: ...那个吟游诗人付酒钱了吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hey! You! Come back here!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>喂！你给我回来！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Don't translate
String: Don't translate
