OriginString: Barret?
String: 巴雷特？

OriginString: ...Hello Guild Master.
String: ...你好，公会会长。

OriginString: I was kinda surprised to hear you wanted to talk to me.
String: 听说你想找我谈谈，我有点意外。

OriginString: Usually, you're not that proactive when it comes to conversations.
String: 通常你可不会这么主动找人聊天。

OriginString: ...I need to ask something of you, Guild Master.
String: ...我有事相求，公会会长。

OriginString: What is it?
String: 什么事？

OriginString: ...I want to request the help of the Adventurer Guild to find somebody.
String: ...我想请冒险者公会帮忙找个人。

OriginString: Is it someone who owes you money? Do you want us to break some fingers?
String: 是欠你钱的人吗？要我们打断几根手指？

OriginString: No...
String: 不是...

OriginString: I want you to kill him.
String: 我要你们杀了他。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: ...Are you joking? I can never tell if you're joking. I mean I was joking but...
String: ...你在开玩笑吗？我永远分不清你是不是认真的。虽然我刚刚是在开玩笑...

OriginString: ...I am not.
String: ...我是认真的。

OriginString: ...Who is the target?
String: ...目标是谁？

OriginString: He's a man now known as the Road Slasher...
String: 他现在被称为"道路斩人魔"...

OriginString: The Road Slasher? I think I sometimes hear the name drop amongst travelers. Not in a good way...
String: 道路斩人魔？我好像听旅行者们提起过这个名字。不是什么好名声...

OriginString: No...very likely not.
String: 对...肯定不是什么好名声。

OriginString: The last several years he has made the roads of the kingdom unsafe for lone travelers.
String: 过去几年里，他让王国的道路对独行旅客变得不再安全。

OriginString: For years he has indiscriminately killed people on the roads and has evaded all guards and adventurers, who were coming for him.
String: 多年来他无差别杀害路人，躲过了所有追捕他的卫兵和冒险者。

OriginString: I see. He certainly sounds like someone who we would be tasked to deal with eventually.
String: 明白了。听起来确实是我们迟早要处理的对象。

OriginString: But I'm still surprised that the quest would come from you. I never thought of you as someone who wants somebody dead.
String: 但我还是惊讶这任务会由你提出。我从没想过你会想让谁死。

OriginString: Did he do anything to you?
String: 他伤害过你吗？

OriginString: ...It's the weapon he wields...
String: ...是他使用的武器...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I crafted it...
String: <?whiteFlash>那是我打造的...

OriginString: I see...
String: 原来如此...

OriginString: Please Guild Master...I do not want any more people to fall victim to him.
String: 求你了会长...我不想再看到有人成为他的受害者。

OriginString: Do not worry, Barret.
String: 别担心，巴雷特。

OriginString: The Guild accepts your Quest.
String: 公会接受你的委托。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢你，会长。

OriginString: (It probably won't be easy to catch the Road Slasher. He'll probably avoid any large groups of adventurers.)
String: (要抓住道路斩人魔恐怕不容易。他肯定会避开大队冒险者。)

OriginString: (I'll probably only be able to send one adventurer if we want to catch him.)
String: (要想抓住他，恐怕只能派一名冒险者单独行动。)

OriginString: Bandits, huh?
String: "强盗是吧？"

OriginString: Usually crude weapons. Heavy armors should suffice.
String: 通常用粗制武器。重甲应该够用了。

OriginString: I see...anything else, you'd like to say?
String: 明白了...还有什么要说的吗？

OriginString: No.
String: 没了。

OriginString: (I just can't read this guy.)
String: （这人真让人捉摸不透）

OriginString: ...I see.
String: ...知道了。

OriginString: ...You wouldn't have a Bandit King Slayer around, would you?
String: ...你们这儿该不会有"强盗王杀手"之类的人物吧？

OriginString: ...I could craft a sword and call it "Bandit King Slayer", if you need me to.
String: ...如果你需要，我可以打把剑然后叫它"强盗王杀手"。

OriginString: (...Is he also joking? I can't tell if he's joking.)
String: （...他是在开玩笑吗？完全分不清他是不是认真的）

OriginString: ...I see. So, she is coming back.
String: ...我明白了。这么说，她要回来了。

OriginString: What do you think?
String: 你怎么看？

OriginString: ...I do not know.
String: ...我不知道。

OriginString: I hope that she does not bring more misfortune to the Guild.
String: 希望她不会给公会带来更多不幸。

OriginString: Were you there on the night when the "attack" happened?
String: 袭击"发生那晚你在场吗？

OriginString: ...I was.
I still remember the night.
String: 那晚的情景至今历历在目。

OriginString: A scream woke me up and I saw adventurers fighting each other with my weapons...
String: 一声尖叫惊醒了我，我看到冒险者们用我打造的武器自相残杀...

OriginString: Confused I ran outside trying to stop them. I grabbed them and tried to pull them away from each other.
String: 我慌乱地冲出去想阻止他们，抓住他们试图把厮打的人分开。

OriginString: But someone struck me from behind and I lost consciousness.
String: 但有人从背后袭击了我，我就失去了意识。

OriginString: When I woke up it was already all over.
String: 等我醒来时，一切都结束了。

OriginString: I was lucky to survive that day. Many others weren't.
String: 那天能活下来算是走运，很多人就没这么幸运了。

OriginString: ...What are you going to do with her?
String: ...你们打算怎么处置她？

OriginString: I don't know. For now she'll just stay in the dungeon until we know what to do with her.
String: 不知道。目前她会被关在地牢里，直到我们想好怎么处理。

OriginString: ...Be careful Guild Master.
String: ...小心点，公会会长。

OriginString: Do not do anything you might regret.
String: 别做出让自己后悔的事。

OriginString: ...I've heard the Road Slasher is no more...
String: ...我听说"道路杀手"已经不复存在了...

OriginString: Yes.
String: 是的。

OriginString: ...And his weapon?...
String: ...那他的武器呢？...

OriginString: They brought it back with them.
String: 他们把它带回来了。

OriginString:
Here.
I thought you'd might like it back.
String:
给。
我想你可能会想要拿回去。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢你，公会会长。

OriginString: ...Seeing this blade, I wonder how many lives it has taken.
String: ...看着这把刀，我在想它夺走过多少条生命。

OriginString: You know none of them were your fault, right?
String: 你知道那些都不是你的错，对吧？

OriginString: ...I wonder about that.
String: ...我不太确定。

OriginString: In my lifetime I have crafted so many weapons and sold them without any regard to their purpose.
String: 我这辈子锻造了那么多武器，却从不关心它们会被用来做什么。

OriginString: I find it hard to believe that I bear no responsibility for the harm they caused.
String: 要说我对它们造成的伤害毫无责任，这很难让人信服。

OriginString: If it bothers you that much...
String: 如果这件事让你这么困扰...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...how about we reforge the weapon and give it to one of the adventurers?
String: <?whiteFlash>...要不我们把武器重铸，交给某个冒险者怎么样？

OriginString: Who knows? Maybe it becomes a weapon that in the end will save more lives than the Road Slasher has ever taken.
String: 谁知道呢？说不定最后它会成为一把救人性命的武器，比"道路杀手"夺走的生命还要多。

OriginString: ...You two are really similar...
String: ...你们俩真的很像...

OriginString: What do you mean?
String: 什么意思？

OriginString: You and the former Guild Master.
String: 你和前任公会会长。

OriginString: ...I actually didn't want to join the Adventurer Guild.
String: ...其实我本来不想加入冒险者公会。

OriginString: I never wanted to craft weapons again. I already had put enough on my conscience.
String: 我再也不想锻造武器了。我的良心已经背负得够多了。

OriginString: That's when he told me...
String: 就在那时他对我说...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>"If your past work bothers you that much, then let me help you create weapons that will save more lives than they could have ever taken!"
String: <?whiteFlash>"如果你的过去让你如此困扰，那就让我帮你打造能拯救更多生命的武器，远超过它们可能夺走的数量！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I'll do it! I will make a new weapon out of this.
String: <?shakeScreen>我会做的！我要用这个打造一件新武器。

OriginString: I'll do it because I trust the Adventurer Guild!
String: 我会做，因为我信任冒险者公会！

OriginString: I'll do it because I trust you, Guild Master!
String: 我会做，因为我信任你，公会会长！

OriginString: Thank you, Barret.
String: 谢谢你，巴雷特。

OriginString: ...I should be saying that, Guild Master.
String: ...该说谢谢的是我，公会会长。

OriginString: So, for how long have you been with the Guild now, Barret?
String: 那么，巴雷特，你在公会多久了？

OriginString: Nearly ten years.
String: 快十年了。

OriginString: And how did you end up in the Guild?
String: 你是怎么加入公会的？

OriginString: Been a Blacksmith in the city. Fran saw my work.
String: 原本是城里的铁匠。弗兰看中了我的手艺。

OriginString: Asked me to become the blacksmith here.
String: 邀请我来这里当铁匠。

OriginString: I accepted.
String: 我答应了。

OriginString: (Short and sweet, huh?)
String: （真是简明扼要啊）

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master.
String: "你好啊，公会会长。"

OriginString: I will get back to work then.
String: 那我回去工作了。

OriginString: Barret? Are you here? We want to introduce you to somebody.
String: 巴雷特？你在吗？我们想给你介绍个人。

OriginString: I'm here.
String: 我在。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Yikes! Easy, big guy!
String: <?shakeScreen>哇！轻点，大个子！

OriginString: Didn't I tell you not to sneak up on people like that?
String: 我不是说过别这样突然出现在人背后吗？

OriginString: ...I wasn't. I stood here when you came in.
String: ...我没有。你们进来时我就站在这儿。

OriginString: Hello Barret.
String: 你好啊巴雷特。

OriginString: Hello Fiola.
String: 你好菲奥拉。

OriginString: Barret, this is the new Guild Master. How about you introduce yourself?
String: 巴雷特，这位是新任公会会长。要不你做个自我介绍？

OriginString: ...The name is Barret.
String: ...我叫巴雷特。

OriginString: I'm the blacksmith.
String: 是铁匠。

OriginString: Nice to meet you. I'm {PROTAGONIST}.
String: 很高兴认识你。我是{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: Barret isn't much of a talker, so you have to excuse him when he just goes silent.
String: 巴雷特不太爱说话，他突然沉默的时候请多包涵。

OriginString: But he is an excellent blacksmith, who has been providing our adventurers with equipment for years now.
String: 但他是位出色的铁匠，多年来一直为我们的冒险者打造装备。

OriginString: Whenever we have enough materials, consider letting Barret craft new equipment for our adventurers.
String: 等我们攒够材料时，不妨让巴雷特给冒险者们打造新装备。

OriginString: It's the most effective way of boosting an adventurer's combat capabilities.
String: 这是提升冒险者战斗力的最有效方法。

OriginString: Do you have anything to add, Barret?
String: 你还有什么要补充的吗，巴雷特？

OriginString: ...You're the salt of the earth, Barret.
String: ...你真是实诚得可爱，巴雷特。

OriginString: Do you mind if I ask you how the Road Slasher is wielding one of your weapons?
String: 介意告诉我为什么"道路杀手"会拿着你打造的武器吗？

OriginString: ...It was many years ago when I was still a city blacksmith.
String: ...那是多年前的事了，当时我还是个城里铁匠。

OriginString: I wasn't a weaponsmith nor did I ever intend to be one.
String: 我本不是武器匠，也从没想过要成为武器匠。

OriginString: When my father was still alive, he taught me to avoid the tools of war.
String: 父亲在世时常教导我要远离战争工具。

OriginString: However, things turned out differently when my wife...died during childbirth.
String: 但当我妻子...难产去世后，一切都变了。

OriginString: Just like that I was suddenly a single father with a newborn daughter to take care of.
String: 转眼间我就成了要独自抚养新生女儿的单身父亲。

OriginString: We weren't well off and I was worried if I could take care of my daughter on my own.
String: 我们并不富裕，我担心自己能否照顾好女儿。

OriginString: Suddenly, I felt like I was in need of money.
String: 突然间，我觉得自己急需用钱。

OriginString: It was then when a war with the neighbouring kingdom was declared.
String: 就在那时，王国向邻国宣战了。

OriginString: ...And I decided to take advantage of that.
String: ...而我决定利用这个机会。

OriginString: I started to also offer to forge weapons for soldiers.
String: 我开始为士兵们打造武器。

OriginString: In the beginning my weapons were crude but I was a fast learner. It didn't take long until my weapons were sought by many who wanted to join the war.
String: 起初我的武器很粗糙，但我学得很快。没过多久，许多参战者都来求购我的武器。

OriginString: However, it didn't bring me much joy to know that it meant that my weapons were effective in killing people.
String: 但想到我的武器能高效杀人，我实在高兴不起来。

OriginString: Nevertheless, it earned me more money than my usual work has ever done. I was able to afford a nanny for my daughter and could even send her to a school, when she got older.
String: 不过这比平常工作赚得多多了。我请得起保姆照顾女儿，等她长大些还能送她去上学。

OriginString: Then one day he appeared before me.
String: 然后有一天他出现在我面前。

OriginString: You mean the Road Slasher.
String: 你是说道路杀手。

OriginString: ...If you had seen that boy at that time, you would have never thought that he would one day become an infamous killer.
String: ...如果你当时见到那男孩，绝不会想到他日后会成为臭名昭著的杀手。

OriginString: I remember a noble boy, hardly old enough to be called a young man, who came to me shaking with fear.
String: 我记得那是个贵族少年，勉强算得上青年，浑身发抖地来找我。

OriginString: He wanted to join the war and asked me to forge him a weapon.
String: 他想参战，请我为他打造武器。

OriginString: However, to me he didn't look like someone who was eager to join a war, so I asked him for his reasons.
String: 但在我看来他并不像渴望参战的人，所以我询问了他的理由。

OriginString: He told me that his family considered him a weakling and coward and by joining the war he wanted to prove them wrong.
String: 他说家人认为他是懦夫，想通过参战证明自己。

OriginString: I knew it was a bad idea...and yet..
String: 我知道这不是好主意...但是...

OriginString: ...all my reservation were gone when he told me what he was willing to pay.
String: ...当他报出酬金时，我所有的顾虑都烟消云散了。

OriginString: ...It was enough that I would never have to forge another weapon again.
String: ...那笔钱足够让我从此再也不用打造武器。

OriginString: ...I accepted.
String: ...我接下了这单。

OriginString: ...He brought to me a rare ore that was in in his family's posession for generations and I forged him a weapon that was the peak of all my creations.
String: ...他带来家族世代相传的稀有矿石，我为他打造了毕生巅峰之作。

OriginString: A sharp blade gleaming with a pure shade of crimson.
String: 一柄泛着纯正猩红色寒光的利刃。

OriginString: And that's how the Road Slasher aquired his weapon.
String: 这就是道路杀手获得武器的始末。

OriginString: I stopped forging weapons after that. I didn't want to have any part of the war anymore.
String: 此后我便不再打造武器，不想再与战争有任何瓜葛。

OriginString: However, during the war I sometimes heard rumors of a soldier with a crimson red blade who has made himself a bloody name on the battlefield.
String: 但战争期间，我偶尔会听说有个手持猩红利刃的士兵在战场上恶名昭彰。

OriginString: After the war ended the boy never returned home. Instead rumors of a man killing innocent people on the road with a red blade started to spread.
String: 战争结束后那少年再没回家，反而开始流传有个持红刃男子在道路上杀害无辜的传闻。

OriginString: ...It could be anybody.
String: ...可能是任何人。

OriginString: No, I'm certain. It's the boy I've forged the weapon for.
String: 不，我确信。就是我为他打造武器的那个少年。

OriginString: ...You shouldn't blame yourself for that. If not you, another blacksmith would have forged a weapon for him.
String: ...你不该自责。就算不是你，也会有其他铁匠为他打造武器。

OriginString: ...Maybe...
...But maybe... if I had stopped him that day...maybe he would have given up on joining the war.
String: ...但如果那天我阻止了他...也许他就会放弃参战。

OriginString: But I didn't.
String: 但我没有。

OriginString: Don't you think you take the whole noble thing a bit far? I mean your brother doesn't seem to care.
String: 你不觉得贵族那套做得太过了吗？你哥哥似乎就不在乎这些。

OriginString: As much as I respect my brother, he sometimes forgets to behave in a manner befitting of his station. If we don't act dignified then it will only bring shame to the family.
String: 虽然我敬重兄长，但他有时会忘记保持符合身份的举止。若不端庄行事，只会让家族蒙羞。

OriginString: That's the duty of those who are born in a noble house.
String: 这就是贵族子弟的职责所在。

OriginString: ...Is that what you want or is that what your family wants?
String: ...这是你想要的，还是你家族想要的？

OriginString: Can you tell me something about your other siblings?
String: "能跟我聊聊你的其他兄弟姐妹吗？"

OriginString: I do have three more elder brothers, but I don't really know them that well.
String: 我确实还有三个哥哥，但我和他们不太熟。

OriginString: My brother Gilbert is the only one who ever visits me.
String: 只有吉尔伯特哥哥会来看我。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>B-but I'm sure that's because they're too occupied with other stuff!
String: <?shakeScreen>但、但肯定是因为他们都在忙别的事啦！

OriginString: (Probably stuff like who gets the biggest slice of the inheritance pie)
String: (八成是在忙着争遗产这块大蛋糕吧)

OriginString: Your loss.
String: 那是你的损失。

OriginString: Ah, I see you're here for my opinions.
String: 啊，你是来听我的看法的吧。

OriginString: So why are you here again?
String: 所以你又来干什么？

OriginString: Why wouldn't I? After all, I'm also part of the Greyhorn Household, am I not? So if there are matters to be talked about that relates to my family, it's only right for me to also be there.
String: 为什么不来？毕竟我也是灰角家族的一员，不是吗？如果有关于我家的事要讨论，我当然应该在场。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Are you sure you don't just want to stay close to your big brother?
String: <?whiteFlash>你确定不是只想粘着你哥哥？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>H-How insolent! Do you take me for a mere child?
String: <?shakeScreen>无-无礼！你当我是小孩子吗？

OriginString: (...You are a child.)
String: (...你就是个小孩子。)

OriginString: I was just under the impression that you really love your big brother.
String: 我只是觉得你真的很喜欢你哥哥。

OriginString: While I'm certainly fond of my big brother, I assure you that it doesn't dictate my behaviour at all.
String: 虽然我确实喜欢哥哥，但我保证这完全不会影响我的行为。

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>Your brother just collapsed!
String: ...<?whiteFlash>你哥哥晕倒了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-WHAT?!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>什-什么？！！！

OriginString: Is something wrong Cecil? You look a bit pale.
String: 怎么了塞西尔？你脸色有点苍白。

OriginString: Whoops! I was wrong.
String: 哎呀！我搞错了。

OriginString: <speed=2><?shakeScreen>YOU STINK! <?shakeScreen>YOU STINK !<?shakeScreen>YOU STINK!<?shakeScreen> YOU STINK!
String: <speed=2><?shakeScreen>你讨厌！<?shakeScreen>你讨厌！<?shakeScreen>你讨厌！<?shakeScreen>你讨厌！

OriginString: (Now that's what a kid sounds like.)
String: (这才像个小孩子嘛。)

OriginString: Anything else you need my input on?
String: "还有其他需要我帮忙的地方吗？"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Here, you can have this back.
String: <?whiteFlash>给，这个还给你吧。

OriginString: I-is that...?
Yes, it's the ring you gave to us.
String: 没错，就是你给我们的那枚戒指。

OriginString: I've decided that it's not really worth much and you might as well have it back.
String: 我觉得它不值几个钱，还是物归原主比较好。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No! I gave it to you as payment for your services. I can't just take it back.
String: <?shakeScreen>不行！这是支付给你们服务的报酬。我不能就这样收回来。

OriginString: It would be unbecoming for a noble to not pay their debts.
String: 贵族不偿还债务有失体统。

OriginString: But the ring is important to you, isn't it?
String: 但这枚戒指对你很重要，不是吗？

OriginString: *sighs* Why are you making this so hard for me?
String: *叹气* 你为什么要让我这么难办？

OriginString: Then how about this? Instead of an old ring, I will have gained your favor.
String: 那这样如何？我不要这枚旧戒指了，换成你的一个人情。

OriginString: M-My favor?
String: 我、我的人情？

OriginString: You will become someone important and influential in the future, right? I'm sure that having the goodwill of someone like that is worth more than gold or any old ring.
String: 你将来会成为举足轻重的大人物吧？像你这样的人的善意，肯定比金子或旧戒指更有价值。

OriginString: I guess that makes sense.
String: 这么说也有道理...

OriginString: Good. Then take the ring now before you change your mind again.
String: 很好。趁你还没改变主意，快把戒指拿回去吧。

OriginString:
...
Thank you, Guild Master.
String:
...
谢谢你，公会会长。

OriginString: (I've overheard what you said and I'm thankful for what you've done. The ring is the only memento she has from the person who was like a mother to her.)
String: (我听到你们的对话了。感谢你这么做。这枚戒指是她从那位如母亲般的人那里得到的唯一纪念品。)

OriginString: (I will make sure that you will get recompensated.)
String: (我会确保你得到应有的回报。)

OriginString: So...we have a temple in the Adventurer Guild.
String: 所以...我们冒险者公会里居然有座神殿啊。

OriginString: Are you sure you want to step foot in here? Aren't you afraid of turning into ashes?
String: 你确定要踏进这里？不怕被烧成灰烬吗？

OriginString: Of course not. Unlike you I'm not a faithless heathen. You should be more worried that the gods don't smite you because you defile this place with your presence.
String: 当然不怕。我可不像你是个没有信仰的异教徒。你才该担心诸神会不会因为你玷污圣地而降下天罚。

OriginString: I would pray for your soul...if you had one.
String: 我倒是想为你的灵魂祈祷...如果你有灵魂的话。

OriginString: ...You two should be more worried whether the gods would be offended by your bickerings in this place of all places.
String: ...你们俩才该担心诸神会不会因为在这种神圣场所吵架而动怒。

OriginString: Oh, hey Nora. Nice to see you!
String: 哦，诺拉你好啊！见到你真高兴！

OriginString: Nice to see you too, Mr. Falken. And of course you too Mrs Fiola.
String: 见到您也很高兴，法尔肯先生。当然还有您，菲奥拉女士。

OriginString: If you'll excuse me I have something to do.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 失陪了，我还有事要办。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (She left rather quickly...)
String: (她走得可真匆忙...)

OriginString: Hello Fiola! Hello Falken!
String: 你们好菲奥拉！你好法尔肯！

OriginString: Hello Eden. We were actually looking for you.
String: 你好伊登。我们正好在找你。

OriginString: Oh, is that so? Then I'm happy to be here. How can I help?
String: 哦，是吗？那我来得正好。有什么能帮上忙的？

OriginString: We wanted to introduce you to the new Guild Master.
String: 我们想把你介绍给新任公会会长认识。

OriginString: Guild Master, this is Eden! He is in charge of the temple here and is also a training instructor for the Guild. Eden, this is our new Guild Master, {PROTAGONIST}.
String: 会长，这位是伊登！他负责管理公会神殿，同时也是公会的训练教官。伊登，这位是我们的新会长{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>...Oh!<waitfor=1>
So you're {PROTAGONIST}...
String:
<?whiteFlash>...哦！<waitfor=1>
所以你就是{PROTAGONIST}...

OriginString: Is something wrong?
String: 有什么问题吗？

OriginString:
No..it's nothing.
...It's just I heard a lot about you.
String:
没什么...
...只是听说过不少关于你的事。

OriginString: *Sigh*. What did Fran tell you?
String: *叹气* 弗兰都跟你说了什么？

OriginString: ...It wasn't the former Guild Master...
String: ...不是前任公会会长说的...

OriginString: ...it was Fiola.
String: ...是菲奥拉。

OriginString: Why are you looking at me?
String: 你盯着我看干嘛？

OriginString: Isn't it obvious that you'd consult a priest if the devil haunts your nightmares?
String: 做噩梦被恶魔缠身的话，去找牧师咨询不是常识吗？

OriginString: Don't worry Guild Master. Of course I know Fiola was probably exaggerating. You seem to be a very touchy subject for her.
String: 别担心公会会长。我当然知道菲奥拉可能夸张了。你似乎是她特别敏感的话题呢。

OriginString: I don't even want to know.
String: 我一点都不想知道。

OriginString: You really don't...
String: 你确实不该知道...

OriginString: *Cough*, *cough*! Moving on...
String: *咳咳*！我们继续...

OriginString: As we told you before, sometimes adventurers will need to be sent out again before they're ready. In those cases Eden can help us.
String: 之前说过，有时候冒险者还没准备好就要再次出任务。这时候伊登能帮上忙。

OriginString: Usually, healing magic is only capable of giving temporary relief. When adventurers use healing magic or healing potions on the field, they will still need to recover naturally when they come back.
String: 通常来说，治疗魔法只能暂时缓解伤势。冒险者在野外使用治疗魔法或药水后，回来仍需自然恢复。

OriginString: But we priests from the Church Ghanenta are specialized in the art of healing and are capable of a ritual that can forcefully recover all injuries.
String: 但我们加南塔教会的祭司精通治愈之术，能通过仪式强制治愈所有伤势。

OriginString:
I'm familiar with that process.
It's not a great feeling.
String:
"这套流程我熟。
感觉可不怎么好受。"

OriginString:
Unfortunately, it isn't. Having the body mend itself, is a rather painful process.
Therefore, it shouldn't be used too often.
String:
"可惜并不是。让身体自行修复是个相当痛苦的过程。"
"所以最好不要频繁使用。"

OriginString: Otherwise, your adventurers will be less than thankful.
String: 否则你的冒险者们可不会感激你。

OriginString: Wait!
String: 等等！

OriginString: <?triggerEvent=TUTORIAL_RESSOURCE_SHOW>This place here is full of resources we can collect.
String: <?triggerEvent=TUTORIAL_RESSOURCE_SHOW>这里到处都是可收集的资源。

OriginString: Collecting resources is an important part of adventuring. We can use them to make our own potions and equipment.
String: 收集资源是冒险的重要环节。我们可以用它们制作药水和装备。

OriginString: So try to always collect all the resources if possible.
String: 所以尽量把资源都采集完。

OriginString: Sometimes, you might not have enough space in your inventories, so try to prioritize what to bring back with you.
String: 有时候背包空间可能不够，要优先带最重要的资源回来。

OriginString: N-North of here is the room where those strange people in robes gather.
String: "往、往北走就是那些穿长袍的怪人聚集的房间。"

OriginString: I-I never set foot in there but...w-whenever a prisoner is brought to them....they'll never retun.
String: 我、我从没进去过...但...每当有囚犯被带进去...就再也没出来过...

OriginString: Are you the Guild Master?
String: 你就是公会会长？

OriginString: That I am.
String: 正是。

OriginString: ...I think I want to join the Guild.
String: ...我在考虑加入公会。

OriginString: You think?
String: 考虑？

OriginString: I guess I'm still on the fence on that decision.
String: 还没完全下定决心。

OriginString: I'm used to working alone.
String: 我习惯单独行动。

OriginString: That's rather unusual.
String: 这倒是少见。

OriginString: It's more reliable.
String: 这样更可靠。

OriginString: Other adventurers are usually...hard to trust.
String: 其他冒险者通常...很难信任。

OriginString: (Can't really argue with that.)
String: (这点确实没法反驳)

OriginString: What changed your mind?
String: 是什么让你改变了主意？

OriginString: Your adventurers managed to save a village I wanted to abandon.
String: 你们公会的冒险者救下了我本想放弃的村庄。

OriginString: Since then I wondered if there are more adventurers like that in the Adventurers Guild.
String: 从那时起我就在想...冒险者公会里是不是还有更多这样的人。

OriginString: I wondered if it's okay to trust them.
String: 我在想...也许可以信任他们。

OriginString: But you're not sure.
String: 但你还是不确定。

OriginString: ...How about you make that decision for me?
String: ...不如你替我决定吧？

OriginString: I really don't feel like I should be making such a life-altering decision for you.
String: 我觉得不该由我来替你做这种人生抉择。

OriginString: It's fine. I don't think I can come to a decision on my own.
String: 没关系...我自己实在做不了决定。

OriginString: I don't think you should join us.
String: 我觉得你不该加入我们。

OriginString: If you can not commit yourself to working with others then it might only backfire if I force you into a party.
String: 如果你不能全身心投入团队合作，那我强行把你编入队伍可能只会适得其反。

OriginString: In that case it's probably better to continue with what you're already doing.
String: 这样的话，或许你继续现在的行动方式会更好。

OriginString: I see. Then I guess my business here is done.
String: 明白了。那我的事情就到此为止吧。

OriginString: Maybe one day you'll find comrades you can fully trust.
String: 也许有一天你会找到能完全信赖的伙伴。

OriginString: ...Maybe...
Farewell, Guild Master.
String: 再见了，公会会长。

OriginString: I think you should join us.
String: 我认为你应该加入我们。

OriginString: It's safer than to adventure on your own.
String: 这比独自冒险要安全得多。

OriginString: Then I will be in your care, Guild Master.
String: 那就请多指教了，公会会长。

OriginString: Welcome to the Guild Daryl.
String: 欢迎加入公会，达里尔。

OriginString: We have to talk.
String: 我们得谈谈。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> She doesn't have to do anything! So back off!
String: <?shakeScreen> 她不需要做任何事！退后！

OriginString: No...please, let me handle this.
String: 不...请让我来处理。

OriginString: B-But your Holiness!
String: 可-可是圣女大人！

OriginString: Please?
String: 可以吗？

OriginString: ...Yes, your Holiness.
String: ...遵命，圣女大人。

OriginString: ...I guess, I owe you an explanation...
String: ...我想，我欠你一个解释...

OriginString: Seems like it.
String: 看来是的。

OriginString: The goal of the last quest wasn't to save those captives, was it?
String: 上次任务的目标根本不是解救那些人质，对吧？

OriginString: The captives were only the bait for somebody more important for us to catch, right?
String: 那些人质只是诱饵，为的是引出某个对我们更重要的人物，是吗？

OriginString: Yes...I was hoping you wouldn't catch on.
String: 是的...我本希望你不会察觉。

OriginString: So you lied to me. Is this how the gods work?
String: 所以你欺骗了我。这就是神明行事的方式？

OriginString: ...Please not here, Guild Master. Let us talk somewhere no one can hear us.
String: ...请不要在这里说，公会会长。让我们找个无人能听见的地方谈。

OriginString: Are you sure, your Holiness?
String: 您确定吗，圣女大人？

OriginString: Yes. I need to talk to the Guild Master alone.
String: 是的。我需要单独和公会会长谈谈。

OriginString: ...I'l be waiting outside. Scream if they do anything.
String: ...我会在外面等着。要是他们有什么举动就尖叫。

OriginString: You worry too much.
String: 你太紧张了。

OriginString: ...<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (He's gone.)
String: (他走了。)

OriginString: Please don't judge him too harshly, Guild Master. He means well.
String: 请别太责怪他，公会会长。他是出于好意。

OriginString: ...Currently, he is the least of my problems.
String: ...眼下他算是我最不担心的问题了。

OriginString: I'm more concerned by the fact that again the Guild has been assigned a quest where the important details have been hidden from us.
String: 我更在意的是公会又一次接到了隐瞒关键细节的任务。

OriginString: We all know how well that ended for my friend.
String: 我们都知道这对我朋友造成了什么后果。

OriginString: ...I'm sorry, Guild Master.
String: ...我很抱歉，公会会长。

OriginString: Then tell me why you didn't tell me the whole story.
String: 那就告诉我为什么隐瞒真相。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>"Because faith is everything."
String: <?whiteFlash>"因为信仰就是一切。"

OriginString: "Humans are fickle and incapable of seeing the greater picture. They are easily led astray by knowledge that doesn't concern them."
String: 人类反复无常，无法看清大局。他们总是被无关紧要的知识引入歧途。

OriginString: You mean like using the lives of your believers as bait?
String: 你是说像用信徒的生命当诱饵这样的事吗？

OriginString: People died.
String: 有人死了。

OriginString: "...A...regrettable sacrifice but..."
String: ...一个...令人遗憾的牺牲，但...

OriginString: "...necessary. "
String: ...必要的。

OriginString: ...."The man we captured is part of the inner circle of the witch."
String: ...."我们抓住的那个人是女巫核心圈子的成员。

OriginString: "Although it's uncertain whether he possesses the complete extent of knowledge required to locate the witch, his information will still be pivotal in her capture."
String: 虽然不确定他是否掌握定位女巫所需的全部知识，但他的信息对抓捕她仍然至关重要。

OriginString: "Putting an end to the witch will save more souls from damnation than the ones that have recently been lost."
String: 铲除女巫拯救的灵魂，远比最近失去的要多得多。

OriginString: How much of that what you said is your opinion, oh Divine Messenger.
String: 这些话里有多少是你自己的意思呢，神圣使者大人？

OriginString: ...My opinion...is irrelevant.
String: ...我的意见...无关紧要。

OriginString: ...So, is this how we are going to do things, gods?
String: ...所以，这就是神明们的行事方式吗？

OriginString: You tell me where to go and I'm supposed to not even look at what I'm walking on?
String: 你们只告诉我去哪，却要求我连脚下的路都不许看？

OriginString: "...That's what we call faith."
String: ...这就是我们所说的信仰。

OriginString: "...Do not forget that this is a war to save your souls from damnation, Guild Master."
String: ...别忘了这是一场拯救你们灵魂免遭诅咒的战争，公会会长。

OriginString: "This fact should be the only thing that matters to you."
String: 这件事应该是你唯一需要关心的。

OriginString: "However, if the souls of your fellow humans mean so little to you then be reminded that we still can make your other dream come true."
String: 不过，如果你对人类同胞的灵魂如此漠视，那么请记住我们依然可以实现你另一个梦想。

OriginString: "The one you shared with your predecessor."
String: 那个你与前代会长共同怀揣的梦想。

OriginString: "The oh so glorious Adventurer Guild you've always dreamed of as children, can become a reality."
String: 你们儿时梦想中那个辉煌的冒险者公会，可以成为现实。

OriginString: Fine...for now I won't inquire any further.
String: 好吧...眼下我不会再追问了。

OriginString: However,...
String: 不过...

OriginString: ...if this is so important to you why don't you get involved directly?
String: ...既然对你们如此重要，为何不直接介入？

OriginString: "We can not."
String: 我们不能。

OriginString: "To avert the possibility of complete world annihilation, we have established an agreement with the demon lords that restricts each other's influence on the realm of men."
String: 为了避免世界彻底毁灭的可能性，我们与魔王们达成了协议，限制彼此对人类领域的影响。

OriginString: "Nonetheless, as a gesture of goodwill, we might be able to offer a little more help."
String: 尽管如此，作为善意的表示，我们或许可以提供更多帮助。

OriginString: "We offer you the opportunity for one of your adventurers to attain sainthood. Subsequently, a portion of the blessings and powers bestowed upon the Divine Messenger will be transferred to them."
String: 我们将给予你的一名冒险者获得圣徒身份的机会。随后，神圣使者的一部分祝福与力量将转移给他们。

OriginString: "We hope this arrangement will be enough to satisfy you, Guild Master."
String: 希望这个安排能让你满意，公会会长。

OriginString: It will have to do.
String: 只能这样了。

OriginString: "Then there is nothing more to be discussed."
String: 那么无需再多言了。

OriginString: ...I'm sorry, Guild Master.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...抱歉，公会会长。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Your Holiness?
String: <?whiteFlash>...圣座大人？

OriginString: ...Yes?
...I'm starting to see the burden you carry.
String: ...我开始理解你肩负的重担了。

OriginString: If I may, Guild Master...
String: 公会会长，恕我冒昧...

OriginString: Could you tell me your name?
String: 能否告知您的名字？

OriginString:
...Eh, sure.
It's {PROTAGONIST}.
String:
...呃，好吧。
是{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: ...{PROTAGONIST}...
String: ...{PROTAGONIST}...

OriginString: I like the sound of it.
String: 这名字...我很喜欢。

OriginString: So...what's your name?
String: 那么...你叫什么名字？

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>I don't have a name, Guild Master.
String: ...<?whiteFlash>我没有名字，公会会长。

OriginString: What?
String: 什么？

OriginString: I was chosen as the Divine Messenger from a very young age.
String: 我自幼就被选为神圣使者。

OriginString: Ever since then I was the Divine Messenger. And that's what the people call me.
String: 从那时起我就是神圣使者。人们都这么称呼我。

OriginString: But your parents have given you a name, haven't they?
String: 但你的父母应该给你起过名字吧？

OriginString: That is irrelevant.
String: 这不重要。

OriginString: Please just call me "Divine Messenger" or "Your Holiness".
String: 请称呼我"神圣使者"或"阁下"即可。

OriginString: I guess being the Divine Messenger for the gods isn't easy, is it?
String: 看来当神明的使者也不容易啊...

OriginString: ...I'd be lying if I said it was...
String: ...要说轻松...那是在说谎...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>But it's my duty!
String: <?whiteFlash>但这是我的职责！

OriginString: And when we finally get the witch...then the gods might not require me as much anymore.
String: 等我们抓到那个女巫后...神明或许就不需要我这么操劳了。

OriginString: It would be like a vacation!
String: 那就像放假一样！

OriginString: I'm fine now, thanks to you, Guild Master.
String: "多亏了你，公会会长，我现在已经没事了。"

OriginString: I'm sorry for all the troubles I caused.
String: 很抱歉给你添了这么多麻烦。

OriginString: Don't mention it. It didn't bother me at all.
String: "别客气。我一点都不介意。"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>In fact it was kinda cute to see you act like that.
String: <?whiteFlash>说实话，看到你那样还挺可爱的。

OriginString: Please strike that night from your memory, Guild Master.
String: 请把那天晚上的事忘掉吧，公会会长。

OriginString: I have to say Guild Master. It was quite brave of you to defy the gods like that.
String: 我必须说，公会会长，你反抗众神的举动真是勇敢。

OriginString: I honestly have never seen anybody dare to act like that in the presence of the divines. They'd be too afraid of their wrath.
String: 说实话我从没见过有人敢在神明面前那样做。他们通常都害怕神的愤怒。

OriginString: Well...it wasn't that big of a deal for them, right?
String: 呃...对他们来说不算什么大事吧？

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>Hm? Yes...okay....
Alright, I tell the Guild Master.
String: <?whiteFlash>嗯？是的...好吧...我这就告诉公会会长。

OriginString: The gods wanted me to tell you, you have seven new enemies.
String: 众神要我转告你，你多了七个新敌人。

OriginString: (Farewell, peaceful afterlife.)
String: (永别了，平静的来世。)

OriginString: I hope to see you soon!
String: "希望能很快见到你！"

OriginString: Hello Guild Master!
String: 你好啊，公会会长！

OriginString: Is there a way for somebody who is bound to a demon lord to become free again?
String: "有没有办法能让一个被恶魔领主束缚的人重获自由？"

OriginString: Why do you ask, Guild Master? You're not thinking of doing anything stupid, are you?
String: 为什么这么问，公会会长？你该不会想做什么傻事吧？

OriginString:
It's one of my adventurers. She...made a poor choice and now she has one of the marks of the demon lords.
Understandably, she wants to get rid of it.
String:
是我公会里的一名冒险者。她...做了个糟糕的选择，现在身上带着恶魔领主的印记。
可以理解，她很想摆脱这个标记。

OriginString: I think I saw the girl. The mark of Belephegor the Slothful if I recall correctly. I wanted to say something but I thought you had your reasons.
String: 我想我见过那女孩。如果没记错的话，是怠惰魔王贝列杰的印记。我本想提醒的，但以为你自有考量。

OriginString: So, is there a way?
String: 所以，有办法解除吗？

OriginString: ...Unfortunately, not even the divines can undo a pact made with one of the demon lords. The only one who could undo the pact would be Belephegor himself.
String: ...很遗憾，即便是众神也无法解除与魔王签订的契约。唯一能撤销契约的只有贝列杰本尊。

OriginString: ...So we would need to negotiate with the demon lord himself. Ugh...I don't feel like there is much hope there. How would we even be able to contact him?
String: ...也就是说我们需要和魔王本人谈判。呃...我觉得希望渺茫。我们甚至要如何联系上他？

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>!!!
R-really? You'd do that?
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: What are you talking about?
String: 你在说什么？

OriginString: Ghanenta has offered to help you with your endeavor. He said that he'll organize a meeting between your adventurer and Belephegor himself.
String: 加南塔表示愿意协助你们。他说会安排你的冒险者与贝列杰本人会面。

OriginString: (Ghanenta, you just moved up in my number one spot amongst the gods. Although, I don't know how to feel about the fact that gods and demon lords apparently can talk to each other like neighbors.)
String: （加南塔，你现在是我心中排名第一的神明了。不过神明和魔王居然能像邻居一样聊天这事...感觉有点微妙。）

OriginString:
...Yes, I'll tell the Guild Master.
 It's done, Guild Master. Ghanenta says that the adventurer will be able to communicate with Belephegor at a certain location.
String:
...好的，我会转告公会会长。
搞定了，公会会长。加南塔说冒险者可以在特定地点与别西卜进行交流。

OriginString: The rest will be up to them, however. To be honest, I don't see how they'll be able to convince Belephegor to take back the deal.
String: 但剩下的就得靠他们自己了。说实话，我不觉得他们能说服贝列杰撤销契约。

OriginString: Considering her soul is on the line, it will be at least worth a shot.
String: 考虑到她的灵魂危在旦夕，至少值得一试。

OriginString: ...Ghanenta wants me to give you a warning.
String: ...加南塔要我给你们个警告。

OriginString: Your adventurers need to be careful, Guild Master. Even though Belephegor will most likely not harm your adventurers directly, he is known to enjoy setting people against each other.
String: 你的冒险者们必须小心，公会会长。虽然贝列杰大概率不会直接伤害他们，但他最喜欢挑拨离间。

OriginString: The girl should only meet with Belephegor if she is accompanied by people who she can trust. At least one who'd never betray her.
String: 那女孩必须带着绝对信任的人同行才能去见贝列杰。至少要有一个永远不会背叛她的人陪同。

OriginString: I'll keep that in mind.
String: 我会记住这点。

OriginString: Do you have any other interesting topics?
String: 还有其他有趣的话题吗？

OriginString: So, you really can hear the voices of the gods?
String: "所以，你真的能听见神明的声音？"

OriginString: Do I hear scepticism?
String: 听这语气是不信我？

OriginString: Well, I don't have any proof that you can actually hear the voices of the gods. It could be all a big scam.
String: 呃，我确实没证据证明你能听见神谕。说不定是个大骗局呢。

OriginString: Proving it, is surprisingly easy. After all, they tell me that...
String: 证明起来意外简单。毕竟他们告诉我...

OriginString: *whisper*...yesterday you...*whisper*....while no one was looking...*whisper*
String: *低语*...昨天你...*低语*...趁没人注意时...*低语*...

OriginString: ...Great. So the phrase "The gods are watching." is not just a figure of speech.
String: ...好吧。"诸神在看着"这句话原来不是修辞手法啊。

OriginString:
Guild Master! You have to come!
We have a...situation...
String:
"公会会长！您快过来看看！
我们这儿...出状况了..."

OriginString: A situation? What do you mean?
String: 特殊情况？什么意思？

OriginString: You'll see when you get to the Tavern.
String: 去酒馆你就知道了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}! Did ya come to drink with me?
String: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}！你是来和我喝酒的吗？

OriginString:
*Gulp*
Bwahahaha!
String:
*咕咚*
哇哈哈哈！

OriginString: ...Tavi...
<?shakeScreen>D-don't look at me like that! She suddenly just appeared at the counter and asked me for the strongest drink I had.
String: <?shakeScreen>别、别那样看着我！她突然出现在吧台，问我要最烈的酒。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You should have seen her face. I just couldn't say no to it!
String: <?shakeScreen>你真该看看她的表情。我实在没法拒绝啊！

OriginString: I already gave her a weaker drink, but she still ended up that way.
String: 我已经给她换了度数低的酒，结果她还是变成这样了。

OriginString:
Why did no one tell me it feels so great to be so light-headed?
Whoooiii!
String:
"怎么没人告诉过我头晕目眩的感觉这么爽？
呜呼——！"

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC>(She spun around and fell down...)
String: <?fadeOutNPC>(她转着圈倒下了...)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Y-your holiness!
String: <?shakeScreen>圣、圣女大人！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Bwahahaha! That was fun! Again!
String: <?whiteFlash>哈哈哈！太好玩了！再来一次！

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC>(She spun around again but this time Tedric caught her before she fell down.)
String: <?fadeOutNPC>(她又开始转圈，不过这次泰德里克在她摔倒前接住了她。)

OriginString: You're going to hurt yourself. You need to stop!
String: 您会受伤的。请停下来！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No!
String: <?shakeScreen>不要！

OriginString: Please, your holiness! It's for your best! I'll take you back to your bed, and...
String: 求您了圣女大人！这是为您好啊！我带您回床上休息...

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>No! <?shakeScreen>No! <?shakeScreen>No! <?shakeScreen>No! 
I thought you'd understand me, Tedric!
String: <?shakeScreen>不要！<?shakeScreen>不要！<?shakeScreen>不要！<?shakeScreen>不要！我还以为泰德里克你能理解我呢！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I hate you!
String: <?shakeScreen>我讨厌你！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>H-hate me?
String: <?whiteFlash>讨、讨厌我？

OriginString: Bwahahaha!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 哇哈哈哈！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Where is she running off now?
String: <?shakeScreen>她现在又往哪儿跑去了？

OriginString: Hey Tedric!
String: 喂泰德里克！

OriginString: ...She hates me... She hates me...
String: ...她讨厌我...她讨厌我...

OriginString:
Great. He's useless for now.
<?shakeScreen>Gods damn it! I'll go after her.
String:
太好了。他现在就是个废物。
<?shakeScreen>该死的！我去追她。

OriginString: Where is she?
String: 她人呢？

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>!!!
Is she on the temple roof?
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！她怎么在神殿屋顶上？

OriginString: Hello Guild Master! Look how high I am!
String: 公会会长你好呀！看我在多高的地方！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>D-don't stand up! You'll fall!
Stay right there and don't move an inch!
String: <?shakeScreen>别、别站起来！会摔下来的！就待在那儿别动！

OriginString: Okey-dokey!
String: 好～的！

OriginString: Guild Master! The Divine Messenger...
String: 公会会长！神之使者...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Yeah, yeah! I'll take care of it.
String: <?shakeScreen>知道了知道了！我来处理。

OriginString: Alright, Divine Messenger! Be a good girl and come slowly towards me so that we can get inside.
String: 好了神圣信使！当个乖孩子慢慢走过来，我们好进去。

OriginString: But I want to be a bad girl tonight!
String: 可我今晚就想当个坏女孩！

OriginString: Then please, for the love of gods, do it somewhere where you can't fall down and break your neck!
String: 看在诸神份上，要闹也找个不会摔断脖子的地方行吗！

OriginString: You should come out here too, {PROTAGONIST}! It's such a beautiful night!
String: {PROTAGONIST}，你也该出来看看，今晚月色多美啊！

OriginString:
(Ugh... It's probably better to stick close to her and prevent her from doing anything stupid.) 
Okay fine. But stay still!
String:
（唉...还是跟紧她比较好，免得她又干出什么蠢事。）
好吧好吧。但给我老实待着！

OriginString: (I moved through the window onto the rooftop and slowly made my way towards the Divine Messenger.)
String: (我从窗户翻上屋顶，慢慢向神圣使者靠近。)

OriginString: (I then carefully sat down next to her.)
String: (随后我小心地在她身旁坐下。)

OriginString: Look Guild Master! Isn't it beautiful?
String: 看啊公会会长！是不是很美？

OriginString: Yeah... It's a beautiful night.
String: 是啊...真是个美丽的夜晚。

OriginString: Hey {PROTAGONIST}!
String: 嘿{PROTAGONIST}！

OriginString: Hmm?
String: 嗯？

OriginString:
Do you think I was too mean to Tedric earlier?
I didn't actually mean what I said...
String:
"你觉得我刚才对泰德里克是不是太过分了？
我说的那些话...其实不是真心的..."

OriginString:
You probably should tell him that later.
He seemed really hurt.
String:
"你最好晚点再告诉他吧。
他看起来真的很受伤。"

OriginString: Hey {PROTAGONIST}!
String: 嘿{PROTAGONIST}！

OriginString: Hmm?
String: 嗯？

OriginString: Could you call me by my name?
String: 能叫我的名字吗？

OriginString: Your name? I thought you didn't remember it.
String: 你的名字？我以为你不记得了。

OriginString: I fibbed. *Giggle*
String: 我撒谎啦。*咯咯笑*

OriginString:
Then sure.
What's your name?
String:
那当然。
你叫什么名字？

OriginString: Lily! Call me Lily!
String: 莉莉！叫我莉莉！

OriginString: Alright, Lily.
String: 好吧，莉莉。

OriginString: *Giggle* Say it again!
String: *咯咯笑* 再说一次！

OriginString: Lily.
String: 莉莉。

OriginString: Now say it three times fast!
String: 现在快速说三遍！

OriginString: Lilylilylily!
String: 莉莉莉莉莉莉！

OriginString: Now say it three times fast backwards!
String: 现在倒着快速说三遍！

OriginString:
Ylllil... Yll... OUCH!<?shakeScreen>
(I bit my tongue.)
String:
"咿咿咿...咿咿...哎哟！<?shakeScreen>
（咬到舌头了。）"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Bwahahaha!
String: <?shakeScreen>哇哈哈哈！

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>It was scary...you know...
String: ...<?whiteFlash>很可怕...你知道的...

OriginString: ...When the gods took over....
String: ...当神明接管的时候....

OriginString: ...I didn't even know they could do that...
String: ...我都不知道他们能做到这种事...

OriginString: ...I'm scared, {PROTAGONIST}*sniff*...
String: ...我害怕，{PROTAGONIST}*抽泣*...

OriginString: They've already taken my life...*sobs*..And now you're telling me they can also just take my body?*sobs*
String: 他们已经夺走了我的生命...*抽泣*...现在你告诉我他们还能随意占据我的身体？*抽泣*

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I never wanted to be the Divine Messenger!*sobs*
String: <?shakeScreen>我从来不想当什么神圣使者！*抽泣*

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Why did it have to be me!
String: <?shakeScreen>为什么偏偏选中我！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>It's so unfair! So unfair! So....waaaaah!
String: <?shakeScreen>太不公平了！不公平！呜呜...哇啊啊！

OriginString: (The Divine... No, Lily sobbed her heart out. She released every ounce of pain and frustration she harbored about her life until there was nothing left. Meanwhile, I remained there, silently absorbing it all.)
String: (这位神明...不，莉莉哭得撕心裂肺。她把生命中积攒的所有痛苦与委屈都发泄了出来，直到精疲力竭。而我只是站在原地，默默承受着这一切。)

OriginString: (In the end, all I could offer her was a promise, I didn't know I could keep.)
String: (最终，我只能给她一个连自己都不确定能否兑现的承诺。)

OriginString: *sniff*...
<?whiteFlash>Lily...I promise that we will do everything we can to prevent something like that happening again.
String: <?whiteFlash>莉莉...我保证我们会竭尽全力防止类似的事情再次发生。

OriginString: ...Thank you, {PROTAGONIST}.
String: ...谢谢你，{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString:
...
...{PROTAGONIST}... Could you tell me a story?
String: ……{PROTAGONIST}……能给我讲个故事吗？

OriginString: A story? About what?
String: 故事？关于什么的？

OriginString:
...I don't know...Maybe about an adventure you had...
Yeah...I'd like that.
String:
...我不知道...也许讲讲你经历的冒险...
好啊...我很乐意听。

OriginString: Alright. I'm no bard but I'll try my best to entertain you.
String: 好吧。虽然我不是吟游诗人，但会尽力让你开心的。

OriginString: (I started telling her one of the strangest adventures I had with Franny when we both were still adventurers. It was a story I hardly ever told anybody because of how unbelievable it sounded.)
String: (我开始给她讲述我和弗兰妮还是冒险者时最离奇的一次经历。这个故事我很少对人提起，因为它听起来太不可思议了。)

OriginString: (However, Lily listened intently, asked questions, laughed, and cried. Until she fell asleep, and with the help of others, I carried her back to her bed.)
String: (然而莉莉专注地听着，不时提问，又哭又笑。直到她睡着了，在其他人帮助下，我把她抱回了床上。)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Guild Master! Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>公会会长！公会会长！

OriginString: (I feel a headache coming on...) What is it, Vincent?
String: （我开始头疼了...）怎么了，文森特？

OriginString: I've just received some thrilling news!
String: 我刚收到个激动人心的消息！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Some travelers have reported spotting a dragon nearby!
String: <?shakeScreen>有旅人报告在附近看到龙了！

OriginString: Unnnnnngh....
String: 呃呃呃呃....

OriginString: Is everything alright, Guild Master?
String: 您还好吗，公会会长？

OriginString: I just heard about a dragon roaming around. What do you think?
String: 我听说有龙在附近出没。你怎么看？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And why on earth do you look so happy about this?
String: <?shakeScreen>而且你到底为什么看起来这么高兴？

OriginString: It's a dragon, Guild Master! The prized beast in any saga!
String: 那可是龙啊，会长大人！传奇故事里的顶级猎物！

OriginString: What manner of hero would not want to slay at least one in their lifetime?
String: 哪个英雄会不想在有生之年至少屠一条龙呢？

OriginString: The kind that survives.
String: 想活命的那种。

OriginString: Don't spoil this for me, Guild Master! The story about the Adventurer Guild really needs at least one dragon in it!
String: 别扫兴啊会长！冒险者公会的传奇故事里怎么能少了屠龙情节！

OriginString: Besides, the Guild has to take care of it!
String: 再说了，公会必须处理这件事！

OriginString: Just think of the possible loss of life and destruction if you just let it be.
String: 想想放任不管会造成多少人员伤亡和破坏。

OriginString: *Sighs* I hate to admit it, but you have a point.
String: *叹气* 虽然不想承认，但你说得有道理。

OriginString: There's even a chance it might target the Guild. It's better to take the fight to it than to let it wreak havoc here.
String: 它甚至可能袭击公会。与其坐等它来破坏，不如主动出击。

OriginString: It might be possible for our adventurers to handle a dragon.
String: 我们的冒险者说不定真能对付一条龙。

OriginString: Do you speak from experience, Guild Master?
String: 会长您这么说是有什么经验吗？

OriginString: Do I look like someone with a death wish? I was just trying to be optimistic.
String: 我看起来像活腻的人吗？只是试着乐观一点罢了。

OriginString: Let's just hope it's old or sick or something.
String: 但愿那是条老龙或者病龙什么的...

OriginString: H-Hello...Are you the Guild Master?
String: 您、您好...请问是公会会长吗？

OriginString: That I am. And you are?
String: 正是在下。你是？

OriginString: My name is Elan, Sir! Or Ma'am!
String: 我叫伊兰，先生！呃女士！

OriginString:
I'm...also an adventurer. 
N-Not for long.
String:
"我...也是个冒险者。
虽然...当不了多久了。"

OriginString: ...I'm actually the one who has been saved by your adventurers not too long ago.
String: ...其实不久前刚被你们公会的冒险者救过。

OriginString: (Ah, right! The missing son. I remember the report.)
String: （啊对！那个失踪的儿子。我记得报告）

OriginString: I feel like I can guess why you're here but why don't you tell me directly.
String: 大概能猜到你的来意，不过还是直接说吧。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I'd like to join the Guild!
String: <?shakeScreen>我想加入公会！

OriginString: After nearly dying last time, I realized that I underestimated the life of an adventurer and that I still have much to learn.
String: 上次差点死掉后，我意识到自己低估了冒险者的生活，还有很多要学的东西。

OriginString: By joining the Guild I hope to become a better adventurer.
String: 希望通过加入公会成为更好的冒险者。

OriginString: My hunch was correct...
String: 果然和我想的一样...

OriginString: So, I know I shouldn't be saying this but...why?
String: 虽然我不该这么说...为什么？

OriginString: Huh?
String: 啊？

OriginString: Most adventurers don't have much of a choice and end up as adventurers but I don't think that's the same with you.
String: 多数冒险者都是迫不得已才干这行，但你不一样吧。

OriginString: You have a family you can return to.
String: 你明明有家可回。

OriginString: ...I would be returning to a life as a farmer...
String: ...回去就只能当一辈子农夫...

OriginString: ...You could still die an ugly death like the one you just narrowly escaped.
String: ...你可能会像这次一样死得很难看。

OriginString: Go home, Elan. You have a family.
String: "回去吧，伊兰。你还有家人要照顾。"

OriginString: That's more than most of us have.
String: 这已经比我们大多数人拥有的都多了。

OriginString: ...Maybe you're right.
String: ...也许你说得对。

OriginString: I'll return home. Thank you for your advice.
String: 我会回家的。谢谢你的建议。

OriginString: I guess I won't be able to discourage you.
String: 看来我是劝不住你了。

OriginString: So, it might be better to let you join than let you wander off on your own.
String: 所以，与其让你独自乱闯，不如让你加入公会。

OriginString: ...Does that mean?
String: ...这是说？

OriginString: Yeah, yeah. You're in kid.
String: 对对，小子你通过了。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master!
String: 谢谢你，公会会长！

OriginString: You won't regret it!
String: 你绝对不会后悔的！

OriginString: Just try to stay alive, okay?
String: 至少给我活着回来，明白吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Is it true that the Divine Messenger is really coming here?
String: <?shakeScreen>神使真的会来我们这里吗？

OriginString: Yes...You seem awfully excited.
String: 是啊...你看起来特别兴奋呢。

OriginString: Of course I am! My mother used to tell me so many stories about her!
String: 当然兴奋啦！我妈妈以前经常给我讲关于她的故事！

OriginString: About how the Divine Messenger was chosen by the gods themselves to deliver us their wisdom. How her beauty transcends mortal imagination and how her presence alone could heal the sick.
String: 说神使是被众神选中来传递智慧的。她的美貌超越凡人想象，光是她的存在就能治愈疾病。

OriginString: I never knew if she even really existed, because there aren't many people that have actually seen her.
String: 我以前都不知道她是否真实存在，因为真正见过她的人并不多。

OriginString: It's exciting to think that I might be able to see her! It's like getting a glimpse of an unicorn!
String: 想到我可能见到她就好激动！就像要看到独角兽一样！

OriginString: Well, I guess I'm happy, you're happy. But just don't get your hopes up too high.
String: 好吧，你开心我也开心。不过别抱太高期望。

OriginString: Reality usually likes to disappoint people.
String: 现实往往喜欢让人失望。

OriginString: I imagined the witch to look much scarier.
String: 我以为女巫会长得更吓人些。

OriginString: Somebody with sharp teeths and claws and muuuuuuch older.
String: 应该是那种长着尖牙利爪，而且年纪大——得多的那种。

OriginString: But she looks kinda like...a normal girl.
String: 但她看起来就像...个普通女孩。

OriginString: Believe me, after seeing her fight, I can say that she is far from normal.
String: 相信我，看过她战斗的样子后，我敢说她一点也不普通。

OriginString: Anything else?
String: 还有别的事吗？

OriginString: Hello Guild Master! How can I help!
String: 公会会长好！有什么我能帮忙的吗！

OriginString: One more thing, Guild Master.
String: 还有件事，公会会长。

OriginString: We do not need to accept Quests every day.
String: 我们不需要每天都接任务。

OriginString: Adventurers have their own limits and need to rest from time to time. Both mentally and physically.
String: 冒险者都有自己的极限，需要时不时休息下。无论是精神上还是身体上。

OriginString: Push them beyond that and they might leave the Guild one way or another.
String: 如果逼得太紧，他们可能会以各种方式离开公会。

OriginString: (I guess one way is dying.)
String: （我猜其中一种方式是死掉。）

OriginString: Consider just letting this day end, so that our adventurers can recover a bit.
String: 考虑今天就到此为止吧，让冒险者们恢复一下。

OriginString: The adventurers will thank you, Guild Master!
String: 冒险者们会感谢你的，公会会长！

OriginString: So where has the swamp hag disappeared to?
String: 那个沼泽女巫跑哪儿去了？

OriginString: ...If you're referring to Fiola, then she already left.
String: ...如果你指的是菲奥拉，她已经走了。

OriginString: She was actually the one who told me to give you that advice in her stead.
String: 其实是她让我代她给你这个建议的。

OriginString: She ...*sigh* said that she hit her mental limit with you for today.
String: 她...*叹气* 说今天已经受够你了。

OriginString:
...
Would it bother you to deliver my remark so that she doesn't get the last word?
String:
...
能麻烦你转达我的话吗？这样她就不会抢到最后发言权了。

OriginString: It would bother me greatly, Guild Master. Very much so...
String: 我非常不愿意，公会会长。非常非常不愿意...

OriginString: What do you think about the incidents with the bandits lately?
String: 你怎么看最近强盗出没的事？

OriginString: I don't feel like that much has changed. Sure, they may seem to have increased in number and might be bolder than before but I bet that won't last long.
String: 我觉得没什么大变化。数量可能多了些，胆子也比以前大，但我打赌这持续不了多久。

OriginString: So you don't think the bandits' recent behaviour is unusual?
String: 所以你觉得强盗最近的行为很正常？

OriginString: Well, even if it's unusual, it's not like much has changed for us.
String: 就算不正常，对我们来说也没太大区别。

OriginString: After all, if our Adventurers cross paths with bandits they'll usually end up fighting anyway.
String: 反正冒险者遇到强盗，最后多半都会打起来。

OriginString: That's...quite the bold title. In the past some bandits were infamous enough to make names for themselves but crowning himself the king of them all is a first.
String: "这...还真是个狂妄的头衔。以前虽然也有臭名昭著的强盗给自己起名号，但自封为强盗之王倒是头一遭。"

OriginString: I nearly forgot that used to be a thing. There used to be so many of them like "Bloodhound", "The Red Scourge", "Black Widow" or "The Vicious Viper". What happened to all of them?
String: 我都快忘了这回事了。以前有好多这种名号，"血猎犬"、"红色灾星"、"黑寡妇"、"毒蝮蛇"什么的...这些人都哪去了？

OriginString: They're all dead, Guild Master. Either captured by authority, killed by some random group of adventurers or in case of "The Vicious Viper" an accident.
String: 都死了，会长。不是被官方逮捕，就是被哪个冒险者小队干掉。"毒蝮蛇"死得最离奇——纯属意外。

OriginString: Ah, right. I remember now.  Didn't "The Vicious Viper" die because he was bitten by a poisonous viper?
String: 啊，想起来了。"毒蝮蛇"是不是被一条毒蛇给咬死的？

OriginString: Yes...It was very ironic.
String: 没错...非常讽刺。

OriginString: Be careful, Guild Master.
String: 小心行事，会长。

OriginString: The Quests we received from the Divine Messenger were anything but safe.
String: 神使给我们的任务没一个是安全的。

OriginString: We've already lost one Guild Master.
String: 我们已经失去过一位会长了。

OriginString: I don't want it to happen to you too.
String: 我不想看到你也遭遇不测。

OriginString: A dark day for the Adventurer Guild.
String: 冒险者公会的黑暗之日。

OriginString: It's still hard to believe that so many enemies were amongst us and we didn't see it.
String: 还是很难相信我们中间潜伏了这么多敌人，而我们竟然毫无察觉。

OriginString: That night, I was actually walking around with one of the traitors.
String: 那天晚上，我其实正和一个叛徒一起巡逻。

OriginString: He was one the new recruits. A young man, I remembered as clumsy but earnest.
String: 他是新来的实习生。我记得是个笨拙但认真的年轻人。

OriginString: I remember how nervous he looked that night and just thought it was because he hasn't been doing well in training.
String: 我记得他那晚显得特别紧张，还以为是训练成绩不佳的缘故。

OriginString: But his intentions became clear when he suddenly swiped after my throat with a hidden blade.
String: 但当他突然用暗藏的刀刃划向我的喉咙时，意图就再明显不过了。

OriginString: I was lucky that it was a clumsy, hesitant attempt. Otherwise, we wouldn't have this conversation.
String: 幸好他的动作笨拙犹豫。否则现在就没法和你聊天了。

OriginString: I tried to reason with him but ,maybe because of the chaos that suddenly could be heard all around the Guild, any hesitation he had, quickly left him.
String: 我试图说服他，但公会突然爆发的混乱，让他彻底抛弃了所有犹豫。

OriginString: ...That day became another reminder of my disability. In my adventuring days I would had no problem to subdue him alive, but with my missing leg I was barely an adequate opponent.
String: ...那天再次提醒了我残疾的事实。换作冒险时的我，活捉他根本不是问题。但少了条腿的我，连自保都勉强。

OriginString: In the end I had to kill him...
String: 最终我不得不杀了他...

OriginString: You know, Guild Master...
String: 你知道吗，公会会长...

OriginString: The worst thing wasn't the fighting or the killing that night...
String: 那晚最可怕的不是战斗或杀戮...

OriginString: It was the constant doubt you had towards to the people around you. You had no idea who was your friend or your foe.
String: 而是你不得不时刻怀疑身边的每个人。根本分不清谁是朋友谁是敌人。

OriginString: It was chaos...It was no wonder that the majority of the adventurers left after that night.
String: 那简直就是人间地狱...难怪那晚之后大部分冒险者都离开了。

OriginString: I guess...we won then?
String: 我想...我们算是赢了吧？

OriginString: It would be great if it that were to be the case. But something tells me it's not over.
String: 要真是这样就好了。但我感觉事情还没结束。

OriginString: Well, whatever might come next, I have full confidence that you'll handle it.
String: 好吧，不管接下来发生什么，我完全相信你能应付得来。

OriginString: So...you like Astrid.
String: 所以...你喜欢阿斯特丽德。

OriginString: Oh, great! It feels like the entire Guild knows about it now and has been gossiping behind my back.
String: 噢，太好了！现在感觉整个公会都知道了，还在背后议论我。

OriginString: Well, you did kinda make a scene, so it would be stranger if everyone didn't know.
String: 嗯，你当时确实闹得挺大，要是没人知道才奇怪呢。

OriginString: *sighs* I guess that's true...
String: *叹气* 我想确实是这样...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>So...when did it start?
String: <?whiteFlash>那么...从什么时候开始的？

OriginString: Really, Guild Master? Really?
String: 认真的吗，公会会长？真的非要问这个？

OriginString: You can't blame me for being curious.
String: 你不能怪我好奇啊。

OriginString: *sighs*...Fine.
String: *叹气*...好吧。

OriginString: It started years ago when she first joined the Adventurer Guild. She didn't really make a great first impression among us.
String: 那是几年前她刚加入冒险者公会的时候。她给我们留下的第一印象并不太好。

OriginString: Hardly a day went by without her getting into a fight with somebody. People naturally assumed the worst of her.
String: 几乎每天她都会和别人起冲突。大家自然对她没什么好印象。

OriginString: But I've realized that she simply cared more than anybody. She never stood quietly by when something happened that she thought was wrong, and while the way she handled it was clumsy...
String: 但我后来意识到，她只是比任何人都更在乎。遇到她觉得不对的事，她绝不会冷眼旁观，虽然她处理的方式很笨拙...

OriginString: ...it was also kind of beautiful in its own way.
String: ...但这种方式也有它独特的美。

OriginString: I never really knew when I fell in love with her. The realization only hit me when I felt the ugly stings of jealousy upon her getting together with Andrey.
String: 我不知道具体是什么时候爱上她的。直到看见她和安德雷在一起时，那种丑陋的嫉妒感刺痛了我，我才意识到这份感情。

OriginString: After Andrey's betrayal, you never tried to get closer to her?
String: 安德雷背叛后，你没试着接近她吗？

OriginString: No, I knew there was no place for me in her heart. In fact, I never intended for her to find out about my feelings.
String: 没有，我知道她心里没有我的位置。事实上，我本来就没打算让她知道我的感情。

OriginString: But, in the end, I told her in the worst way possible.
String: 但最后，我还是用最糟糕的方式告诉了她。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>You're not giving up, are you?
String: <?whiteFlash>你不会放弃的，对吧？

OriginString: ...I didn't plan to try in the first place.
String: ...我本来就没打算尝试。

OriginString: ...Then, your feelings for her weren't that strong to begin with.
String: ...那么，你对她的感情从一开始就没那么深。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's not true!
String: <?shakeScreen>才不是这样！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Then you should try harder!
String: <?shakeScreen>那你就该更努力些！

OriginString: Believe me when I say this...if you don't try, you'll regret it.
String: 相信我...如果不尝试，你会后悔的。

OriginString: You know, for some reason I feel like I've heard the name Falken before.
String: 不知为何，我总觉得法尔肯这个名字有点耳熟。

OriginString: It doesn't surprise me. I used to be a somewhat famous Adventurer a long time ago.
String: 这不奇怪。很久以前我也算是个小有名气的冒险者。

OriginString: Really? Did you have some additional titles or an Alias? Because I have a hard time remembering anybody famous with the name "Falken".
String: 真的吗？你当时有什么称号或别名吗？因为我实在想不起哪个有名的冒险者叫"法尔肯"。

OriginString: W-well it wasn't anything special. In fact I can't remember it myself. Hahaha!
String: 呃-其实也没什么特别的。连我自己都记不清了。哈哈哈！

OriginString: I mean it has been years now since I "retired".
String: 毕竟我"退休"都这么多年了。

OriginString: You know...after I lost my leg I was sure my life was over. After all what use was a crippled Adventurer?
String: 知道吗...失去那条腿时，我以为人生完蛋了。毕竟一个残废的冒险者有什么用？

OriginString: But then one day Fran appeared to me and asked me to be an instructor for his Adventurer Guild.
String: 但后来有一天弗兰找到我，让我当他冒险者公会的教官。

OriginString: If it weren't for him I'd probably be begging on some street or more likely already dead by now.
String: 要不是他，我现在可能正在街头乞讨，或者早就死了。

OriginString: ...Do you think we can still save the Guild?
String: ...你觉得我们还能拯救公会吗？

OriginString: I don't know. But I'll try my best.
String: 不知道。但我会尽全力。

OriginString: I guess I really can't ask for more than that.
String: 我想...这确实就是我能期待的全部了。

OriginString: What's the matter, Guild Master?
String: "怎么了，公会会长？"

OriginString: I'll be here if you need me.
String: 有需要的话我随时在这儿。

OriginString: Anything else that needs to be discussed?
String: 还有其他需要讨论的事吗？

OriginString: Anything else you like to talk about?
String: "还想聊点别的吗？"

OriginString: So, did you manage to meet your former comrades?
String: 那么，你见到以前的伙伴们了吗？

OriginString: I did.
String: 见到了。

OriginString: And how did it go?
String: 情况如何？

OriginString: It...went better than I expected.
String: 比我想象中...要好。

OriginString: So they really wanted to talk to you like I said?
String: 所以就像我说的，他们其实是想和你谈谈？

OriginString: No, Guild Master. They did not.
String: 不，公会会长。他们不是这样想的。

OriginString: Thinking about it now, if they did they could have just approached me normally without the whole tournament thing.
String: 现在想想，如果他们真想谈，根本不需要搞什么比武大会，直接找我就行。

OriginString: No, Guild Master. They were still mad at me for everything I did and wanted me to know it.
String: 不，公会会长。他们还在为我做过的事生气，而且想让我知道这点。

OriginString: ...I'm sorry to hear that.
String: ...听到这个我很遗憾。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...I'm not.
String: <?whiteFlash>...但我不遗憾。

OriginString: You might have been wrong, but your words gave me the push I needed to finally face my past.
String: 您可能猜错了，但您的话给了我面对过去所需的勇气。

OriginString: We've talked, Guild Master.
String: 我们谈过了，公会会长。

OriginString: For the first time since I've known them, we've talked with each other openly and without any reservation.
String: 自从认识他们以来，这是我们第一次毫无保留地敞开心扉交流。

OriginString: I listened to every complaint they ever had about me. Many things I knew and some things I wasn't aware of. In the end I admitted to them that I was a bad leader and that I would do anything to make it up to them.
String: 我聆听了他们对我的所有不满。有些事我知道，有些事我从未察觉。最后我向他们承认我是个糟糕的队长，愿意做任何事来弥补。

OriginString: And do you know what they wanted from me?
String: 你知道他们要我做什么补偿吗？

OriginString: They wanted me to pay the next round of beer! Hahahaha!
String: 他们要我请下一轮酒！哈哈哈！

OriginString: ...You can't imagine the relief I felt when I heard that. I imagined that they would say that it would be impossible to make it up to them.
String: ...你无法想象听到这话时我有多释怀。我以为他们会说永远不可能原谅我。

OriginString: However, it seems after getting it out all of their system, they were ready to forgive me just like that.
String: 但当他们把怨气都发泄出来后，似乎就这么轻易地原谅了我。

OriginString: I'm glad it worked out for you.
String: 很高兴事情圆满解决了。

OriginString: It wouldn't have been possible without you, Guild Master.
String: 没有您的帮助，这不可能实现，公会会长。

OriginString: Guild Master! You've got a letter.
String: "公会会长！有您的信。"

OriginString: A letter? From whom?
String: 信？谁寄来的？

OriginString: It has the seal of House Greyhorn, so I think it might be from Lady Cecilia.
String: 盖着灰角家族的印章，我猜可能是塞西莉亚女士寄来的。

OriginString:
I see.
Well, let's see what she has to say.
String:
明白了。
那么，看看她要说些什么。

OriginString: My Esteemed Guild Master,
String: 尊敬的公会会长：

OriginString: I, Lady Cecilia from House Greyhorn, like to express my gratitude for the service you have done for me. My brother has returned to me safely and unharmed thanks to the interventions of your adventurers.
String: 我，灰角家族的塞西莉亚女士，谨对贵公会的协助表达谢意。多亏贵会冒险者的干预，我的弟弟已平安无恙地回到我身边。

OriginString: Despite your lack of manners, it seems that you are indeed able to live up to the title of Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild.
String: "虽然你缺乏教养，但看起来确实配得上冒险者公会会长这个头衔。"

OriginString:
Let it be known, that I, Lady Cecilia, bestow upon you a modicum of praise for your effort and may you strive to improve and aspire to meet the standards befitting to a person of your station.
Lady Cecilia
String:
特此声明，我塞西莉亚女士对您的努力给予些许褒奖，望您再接再厉，以符合您身份的标准要求自己。
塞西莉亚

OriginString: ...Now I'm a little bit irritated.
String: "...现在我有点恼火了。"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>C-come on, Guild Master! It's just her unique way of expressing gratitude. I'm sure she's honestly grateful for what the Guild has done for her!
String: <?shakeScreen>别、别这样啊公会会长！这就是她表达感谢的独特方式啦。我敢说她真心感激公会为她做的一切！

OriginString:
*Sighs* Maybe...
I was just hoping for more. We really didn't get paid enough for that Quest.
String:
*叹气* 也许吧...
我就是期望能多赚点。那个委托的报酬实在太少了。

OriginString: Don't say that, Guild Master! We've saved a noble! Our reputation has risen again and now even some influential people have started to take notice of us. That's worth more than gold.
String: 别这么说公会会长！我们可是救了个贵族！公会声誉又提升了，现在连一些权贵都开始关注我们。这可比金子值钱多了。

OriginString: I guess you're right, Falken. The Guild is growing thanks to that and that's all that matters. But we still got a long way to go.
String: 你说得对法尔肯。多亏这事公会在发展壮大，这才是最重要的。不过我们还有很长的路要走。

OriginString: Let us get back to work.
String: 继续干活吧。

OriginString: Yes, Guild Master!
String: 是，公会会长！

OriginString: It seems like the bandits have become bolder than usual.
String: 看来强盗们比往常更猖獗了。

OriginString: We're getting more and more quests related to bandit activities.
String: 最近接到的强盗相关委托越来越多了。

OriginString: I guess the whole thing has also its good side.
String: 我倒觉得这事儿也有好的一面。

OriginString: Not something Fran would have ever said.
String: 这可不像是弗兰会说的话。

OriginString: But it's what you were also thinking.
String: 但你不也是这么想的。

OriginString: ...I hate how alike we think...
String: ...真讨厌我们想法这么像...

OriginString: Apparently, a lot of the bandits have started to band together under a man calling himself the "Bandit King". They say that he essentially already has a small army under his command.
String: "听说很多强盗都开始聚集在一个自称'强盗王'的家伙麾下。据说他手下已经相当于有支小型军队了。"

OriginString: They also say that with every day passing, their numbers swell as if they're being lured by a siren call, beckoning the low lifes and scums to join.
String: 而且传言他们的人数每天都在增加，就像被塞壬的歌声引诱一样，吸引着各种地痞流氓加入。

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>Can you hear it?
String: ...<?whiteFlash>你听到了吗？

OriginString: Hahaha....Very funny, Fiola.
String: 哈哈哈...真有你的，菲奥拉。

OriginString: I had hoped we would have nothing more to do with her.
String: 我本来希望再也不用和她扯上关系的。

OriginString: But of course my second-most hated person decides to suck up to my most hated person.
String: 结果我第二讨厌的人偏偏要去巴结我最讨厌的人。

OriginString: Awww, I'm just your second-most hated?
String: 哎呀呀，我只是第二讨厌吗？

OriginString: Keep that up and you'll be back on the number one spot in no time.
String: 再这样下去，你马上就能重登榜首了。

OriginString: ...Why do you have to do this to me? I don't want to remember that day.
String: ...你为什么要这样对我？我不想回忆起那天的事。

OriginString: ...I need to know more. I need to know how exactly Fran died...
String: ...我需要知道更多。我必须弄清楚弗兰究竟是怎么死的...

OriginString: ...One night, it just happened. We were awoken by the sound of people fighting around the Guild ground.
String: ...就在那个晚上，事情突然发生了。我们被公会周围打斗的声音惊醒。

OriginString: At first we thought, it might have been adventurers doing a late night training but then there were screams mixed into the sounds.
String: 起初我们还以为是冒险者在深夜训练，但随后惨叫声混入了打斗声中。

OriginString: When we went outside, it was like a picture of hell was greeting us.
String: 当我们跑到外面时，眼前的景象如同地狱绘卷。

OriginString: Adventurers all over the place were fighting each other. People who just shared their meals the day before were suddenly engaged in battles to the death.
String: 到处都是互相厮杀的冒险者。前一天还同桌吃饭的人们，突然就开始以命相搏。

OriginString: At the time we had no idea what was happening.
String: 当时我们完全不知道发生了什么。

OriginString: Franny was the first to regain his composure and told me to hide.
String: 弗兰尼是第一个恢复冷静的，他让我躲起来。

OriginString: ...I begged him to hide with me...I told him that he wasn't an adventurer anymore...
String: ...我求他和我一起躲...我说他已经不是冒险者了...

OriginString: But he only smiled at me and apologized. Before I knew it he was already gone.
String: 但他只是对我笑了笑，说了声抱歉。等我反应过来时，他已经冲出去了。

OriginString: The fighting didn't stop until the next morning. At that point most of the people were either dead or have fled.
String: 战斗持续到第二天清晨才停止。那时大部分人不是死了就是逃走了。

OriginString:
They brought his body to me...
It was...i-it...
String:
他们把他的遗体带到我面前...
那...那真是...

OriginString: Stop...
String: 别说了...

OriginString: ...I don't want to hear it...
String: ...我不想听...

OriginString: ...Please I need some time now, {PROTAGONIST}.
String: ...让我一个人静一静吧，{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: Do you feel anything when you see the witch?
String: 看到那个女巫时你有什么感觉？

OriginString: ...You're wondering if I hate her.
String: ...你是想知道我恨不恨她。

OriginString: I do.
String: 我恨。

OriginString: ...If you asked me before she was sitting in the dungeon I never knew about then maybe.
String: ...如果在发现她被关在地牢前问我，或许答案是肯定的。

OriginString: But now...it feels pointless. I don't even really care if she dies or not.
String: 但现在...感觉毫无意义。我甚至不在乎她死活。

OriginString: It won't bring back Fran and even if it did, he wouldn't want it.
String: 这不会让弗兰回来，就算能，他也不会希望这样。

OriginString: ...Do you hate her?
String: ...那你恨她吗？

OriginString: You know you could just go home. There is no reason anymore for you to be here.
String: "你知道你可以直接回家的。你已经没有理由继续留在这里了。"

OriginString: This is my home. Where else should I be?
String: 这里就是我的家。我还能去哪儿？

OriginString: You know what I mean.
String: 你明白我的意思。

OriginString: Don't be ridiculous. Even if I wanted to return back to that place, it's not like I'm welcome there anymore.
String: 别犯傻了。就算我想回那个地方，现在也没人会欢迎我了。

OriginString: Your fault for getting involved with Adventurers.
String: 谁让你非要和冒险者搅和在一起。

OriginString: I don't regret it.
String: 我从不后悔。

OriginString: Well, I do regret getting myself involved with you...
String: 不过...我确实后悔和你扯上关系...

OriginString: ...but I do not regret falling in love.
String: ...但爱上他这件事，我绝不后悔。

OriginString: ...Tsk! Love!
You've been nothing but a pain in the neck for me ever since I met you.
String: 自从遇见你，你就没让我省心过。

OriginString: What a coincidence. I was just thinking the same.
String: 真巧，我也是这么想的。

OriginString:
You know.
I'm suprised that you even care that some people lost their son.
String:
你知道吗？
我很好奇你居然会在意有人失去了儿子。

OriginString: So what?
String: 所以呢？

OriginString: What do you care what I think about some Quests?
String: 你怎么会在意我对任务的想法？

OriginString: Well, I just never thought you were a creature capable of feeling compassion.
String: 我只是没想到你这种生物也会有同情心。

OriginString: *Sighs*. Is that all you came to see me for?
String: *叹气*。你来找我就为了说这个？

OriginString: To make a snidey remark?
String: 就为了阴阳怪气一句？

OriginString: Pretty much.
String: 差不多吧。

OriginString: I'll never understand how Fran was able to be friends with you.
String: 我永远想不通弗兰是怎么和你做朋友的。

OriginString: So, you didn't take the Quest.
String: "所以，你没接那个任务。"

OriginString: It didn't seem worth the payment.
String: 报酬不值得冒险。

OriginString: I don't want to risk an adventurer's life for barely something.
String: 我不想为这点报酬让冒险者去送命。

OriginString: I expect very little of you.
String: 我对你的期望已经够低了。

OriginString: And even then you managed to disappoint me.
String: 结果你还能让我更失望。

OriginString: So, the adventurers couldn't save him.
String: 看来冒险者们没能救下他。

OriginString: Not the outcome I hoped for.
String: 这不是我期待的结果。

OriginString: An adventurer's life is cheap. It happens.
String: 冒险者的命不值钱，常有的事。

OriginString: I think it was too much to hope for some uplifting words from you.
String: 指望你能说点安慰的话，看来是我奢望了。

OriginString: I'm glad we were able to save the young man but are you sure about letting him join the Guild?
String: "能救下那个年轻人是很好，但你确定要让他加入公会吗？"

OriginString: He's old enough to make his own decision.
String: 他已经到了能自己做决定的年纪了。

OriginString: And I do think, that that kid has potential.
String: 而且我觉得，那小子确实有潜力。

OriginString: I hope you'll understand that whatever happens to him now, will be your responsibility.
String: 希望你能明白，从现在起他的一切行为都将由你负责。

OriginString: I'm glad the adventurers were able to save the young man.
String: 真高兴冒险者们成功救出了那个年轻人。

OriginString: I hope he'll stop being an adventurer now and go back to his family.
String: 希望他能就此放弃冒险，回到家人身边。

OriginString: It's rare that we share an opinion.
String: 难得我们意见一致。

OriginString: I guess there really is a first time for everything.
String: 看来凡事都有第一次呢。
