OriginString: <?whiteFlash>{PROTAGONIST}. I have a Quest for you.
String: <?whiteFlash>{PROTAGONIST}。我有任务要交给你。

OriginString: Just put it in the pile with the others.
String: 把它和其他任务堆在一起就行。

OriginString: This one is important and should be done as soon as possible. It has been paid in advance for years.
String: 这个任务很重要，必须尽快完成。委托人已经预付了好几年的酬金。

OriginString: For years?
String: 好几年？

OriginString: At that point does it really matter if our adventurers do it a few weeks later?
String: 都拖这么久了，我们的冒险者晚几周去完成又有什么关系？

OriginString: *sighs* Just do the damn quest. It's just picking rainbow flowers.
String: *叹气* 赶紧把这该死的任务接了。就是去采点彩虹花而已。

OriginString: The adventurers will be done with the task within an afternoon and they don't even have to fight anything.
String: 冒险者一个下午就能搞定，连架都不用打。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>And there's the jinxing. Something horrible is bound to happen now. I wonder which adventurers I'm going to send to certain doom now.
<?shakeScreen>J-Just stop it! Nothing is going to happen!
String: <?shakeScreen>闭、闭嘴啦！才不会有事发生！

OriginString: Geez! Every fricking time I'm getting more annoyed...<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 真是的！每次都让人越来越火大...<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (I'm wondering if ordering a funeral in advance is cheaper.)
String: （我在想提前预定葬礼会不会便宜点）

OriginString: Make it quick.
String: 有话快说。

OriginString: Good.
String: 很好。

OriginString: Let's keep this short.
String: 我们长话短说。

OriginString: Oh no! Bandits!
String: "糟了！是强盗！"

OriginString:
No need to panic. Bandits really shouldn't scare you. 
They're like introductory enemies for adventurers.
String:
"别慌。强盗根本没什么好怕的。
他们就是冒险者入门级的敌人。"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Why don't you come here and say that to my axe!
String: <?shakeScreen>有种过来当着我的斧头再说一遍！

OriginString: Oh, they look pissed now.
String: 哦，他们现在看起来气疯了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><speed=2>G-Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen><speed=2>会、会长大人！

OriginString:
No worries. I still think you can take them on.
Let them come to you first and try to use the environment to your advantage.
String:
别担心。我觉得你完全能应付他们。
让他们先出手，试着利用周围环境创造优势。

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST}.
String: {PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: Fiola.
String: 菲奥拉。

OriginString: I have a specific Quest, I'd like you to see.
String: 有个特定委托...想请您过目。

OriginString: Is that so? You could have just put it on the pile with the other quests.
String: 是吗？你本可以把它和其他委托堆在一起的。

OriginString: I was worried you might overlook it, because the rewards for it, isn't much.
String: 我担心您可能会忽略它...因为报酬实在不多。

OriginString: It's from an old couple who can't afford much.
String: 是来自一对老夫妇...他们实在拿不出更多了。

OriginString: ...What's the Quest about?
String: ...什么委托？

OriginString: They're missing their son.
String: 他们的儿子失踪了。

OriginString: Their son has recently decided to become an adventurer. One that isn't affiliated with the Adventurer Guild.
String: 他们儿子最近决定成为冒险者...是个没在公会注册的独行侠。

OriginString: They said that they lost contact with him after he accepted his first quest.
String: 他们说儿子接了第一个委托后就失联了。

OriginString: ...That doesn't bode well...
String: ...这可不妙...

OriginString: Now they're asking us to find him.
String: 现在他们请求我们找回他。

OriginString: They're...clinging to the hope that he is still alive.
String: 他们...还抱着儿子活着的希望。

OriginString: ...I'll think about it.
String: ...我会考虑的。

OriginString: Th...Tha..
..xxkss...jooo....
...Is that some kind of curse?
String: ...这是某种诅咒吗？

OriginString: I know I'm always saying you're a witch but that was just to insult you.
String: 我知道我总说你是女巫，但那只是为了气你。

OriginString: Do I have to think of something else now?
String: 现在我得想个新词骂你了吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>S-shut up! I was trying to thank you!
String: <?shakeScreen>闭、闭嘴！我明明是想谢谢你！

OriginString: W-what?!!!
That's it! I'm out of here!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 够了！我走了！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (I wonder why she is invested enough in this that she'd try to do the unthinkable.)
String: (没想到她对这事这么上心，甚至愿意做这种出格的事)

OriginString: What's the matter, Emily?
String: 怎么了，艾米丽？

OriginString: I'm just sooooo frustrated that I still haven't found the Flower of Eternity.
String: 我快烦死了...到现在还没找到永恒之花。

OriginString: I'm pretty sure I have searched most of the area by now...
String: 这附近区域我基本都找遍了...

OriginString: And there is really no mention in the diary where it actually is?
String: 日记里真的没写具体位置吗？

OriginString: That's the confusing part.
String: 这就是最奇怪的地方。

OriginString: There are actually lots of places mentioned in the diary. Like the flower was in all of them.
String: 日记里提到很多地点，好像每个地方都有那朵花。

OriginString: Maybe I'm misunderstanding the diary. The language has changed a lot since the time of my ancestor.
String: 可能是我理解错了日记。现在的语言和我祖先那时差别太大了。

OriginString: Or maybe the Flower just doesn't exist after all.
String: 或许...永恒之花根本不存在。

OriginString: No...that can't be...
String: 不...不可能...

OriginString: It...has to...
String: 它...必须存在...

OriginString: ...Sorry, I might have spoken too soon.
String: ...抱歉，我可能说太早了。

OriginString: You said most areas. Doesn't that mean there are some more where you haven't looked?
String: 你说了"基本都找过"，说明还有遗漏的地方？

OriginString: Yes, but those areas are more dangerous than the usual places.
String: 是的，但那些地方比平常区域危险得多。

OriginString: The adventurers escorting me....might get hurt.
String: 护送我的冒险者们...可能会受伤。

OriginString: Then I just assign stronger adventurers for you.
String: 那我就派更强的冒险者保护你。

OriginString: I promised, didn't I? To help you with your search.
String: 我承诺过的，会帮你完成这个寻访。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master....
String: 谢谢你，公会会长...

OriginString: I really appreciate it.
String: 我真的很感激。

OriginString:
Hey Emily!
I wanted to see how you're doing since the last search was another bust.
I....
String:
"嘿，艾米丽！
我想来看看你情况如何，毕竟上次搜寻又是一场空。
我...."

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: What are you doing?
String: 你在干什么？

OriginString: I'm pretending to be a flower.
String: 我在假装是一朵花。

OriginString: I thought if I go into the mindset of a flower, I might understand where the Flower Of Eternity might be hiding!
String: 我想如果进入花的心境，说不定就能理解永恒之花会藏在哪里！

OriginString: ...Does it help?
String: ...有用吗？

OriginString: Not yet, but I might have to just commit more to the role.
String: 暂时还没有，不过可能是我入戏不够深。

OriginString: Could you hand me the fertilizer over there? It's made out of troll sh....
String: 能把那边的肥料递给我吗？是用巨魔的粪...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Alright! That's the cue for you to stop!
String: <?shakeScreen>好了！到此为止！

OriginString: Now, let's get you out of there!
String: "好了，这就把你弄出来！"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-Wait, Guildmaster! I'm not done yet! I haven't even tried to photosynthesise yet!
String: <?shakeScreen>等、等等，公会会长！我还没完事呢！我连光合作用都还没试过！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Just stop with the nonsense! This can't be healthy for you!
String: <?shakeScreen>别再说这些蠢话了！这对你身体不好！

OriginString:
No! Let go! 
<?shakeScreen>My Flowerbed!!!!!
String:
不！放开我！
<?shakeScreen>我的花圃啊！！！！

OriginString: Were you really going to go so far as to use feces on yourself?
String: 你当真打算在自己身上用粪便吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What else am I supposed to do? I'm sure at this point we have practically looked behind every blade of grass in the area.
String: <?shakeScreen>不然我还能怎么办？我敢说这地方每片草叶后面我们都翻遍了。

OriginString: ...I actually wanted to say this before but I wasn't sure how you'd react but...
String: ...其实我早就想说了，只是不确定你会有什么反应...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...maybe it's time to give up?
String: <?whiteFlash>...也许是时候放弃了？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What?! No!
String: <?shakeScreen>什么？！不行！

OriginString: I would sooner comb through every blade of grass in the continent if I have to.
String: 就算要翻遍大陆上每一片草叶我也在所不惜。

OriginString: Why is this so important to you?
String: 为什么这对你如此重要？

OriginString: I wasn't entirely truthful to you Guild Master.
String: 公会会长，我之前没有完全对你说实话。

OriginString: My full name is Emily Altem...
String: 我的全名是艾米丽·阿尔特姆...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Altem? Why does that name sound so familiar?
String: <?whiteFlash>阿尔特姆？这名字怎么这么耳熟？

OriginString: It may be because amongst alchemists, it has become a slur for charlatans.
String: 这可能是因为在炼金术士圈子里，这个词已经成了江湖骗子的代称。

OriginString: When I said that my ancestor was looking for the Flower of Eternity himself, he wasn't just doing it for fun.
String: 当我提到我的祖先亲自寻找永恒之花时，他可不是为了好玩才这么做的。

OriginString: He was actually sponsored by the king of that time to search for it after bragging that he knew exactly where to look and baiting the old king by claiming he could brew an elixir of immortality with it.
String: 他实际上是受到当时国王的资助——在他吹嘘自己知道确切位置，并声称能用它酿造长生不老药来引诱老国王之后。

OriginString: Most people who claimed such things would have probably been entirely dismissed, but our family was different.
String: 换作其他人说这种话，恐怕早就被嗤之以鼻了，但我们家族不一样。

OriginString: We were famed for being great alchemists. Respected and trusted by everyone in the alchemist community.
String: 我们家族曾以伟大的炼金术士闻名。整个炼金界都对我们尊敬有加、信任备至。

OriginString: Only because of that the king took him seriously and funded his search for the Flower of Eternity.
String: 正因为如此，国王才当真资助了他寻找永恒之花。

OriginString: My ancestor was gone for months and spent every single coin he was given. However, ultimately he returned empty-handed.
String: 我的祖先消失了数月，花光了每一分资助金。可最终却空手而归。

OriginString: Ever since then, my family has been mocked as liars and charlatans.
String: 自那以后，我们家族就被嘲弄为骗子和江湖术士。

OriginString: We eventually stopped using our surname in public...
String: 我们最终不再公开使用自己的姓氏...

OriginString: ...even more so after we lost all our assets over time to pay back the royal family.
String: ...尤其是当我们逐渐变卖所有家产来偿还王室债务之后。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>But the Flower of Eternity exists!
String: <?shakeScreen>但永恒之花真的存在！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>According to his diary, he found it!
String: <?shakeScreen>根据他的日记记载，他确实找到了！

OriginString: If I could just find it too then I might finally restore our name!
String: 要是我也能找到它，说不定就能洗刷我们家族的污名！

OriginString: In that case why didn't he return with the flower?
String: 既然如此，他当时为什么不带着花回来？

OriginString: I... I don't know.
String: 我...我不知道。

OriginString: All I know is that he actually lied and claimed that he couldn't find it.
String: 我只知道他撒了谎，声称自己没找到。

OriginString: I...I don't know why he would put our whole family through this.
String: 我...我不明白他为什么要让整个家族承受这些。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Sorry Emily, I spoke too soon.
String: <?whiteFlash>抱歉艾米丽，我话说得太早了。

OriginString: If it exists, then we will find it!
String: 如果它存在，我们就一定能找到！

OriginString: So, you'll still help me?
String: 所以...你们还会帮我吗？

OriginString: Of course! You promised me you'd create an awesome potion with the Flower of Eternity, didn't you?
String: "当然！你可是答应过要用永恒之花给我配出超厉害的药剂，对吧？"

OriginString: ...Thank you, Guild Master!
String: ...谢谢你，公会会长！

OriginString: Oh, hello, Guild Master.
String: 哦，你好啊公会会长。

OriginString: Hello, Emily. I wanted to see how you're doing.
String: 你好艾米丽，我来看看你最近怎么样。

OriginString: I'm fine. I finally know now why my ancestor lied about the Flower Of Eternity.
String: 我很好。现在终于明白为什么祖先要撒谎说永恒之花不存在了。

OriginString: And I'm glad he did. It's better if no one knows that she exists.
String: 而且我很庆幸他这么做了。最好没人知道她的存在。

OriginString: And you're fine with it? You've been looking for it for so long. What about your family name?
String: 你真的能接受吗？毕竟你寻找了这么久。那你的家族名声呢？

OriginString: I'm already used to it anyway. And who cares?
String: 反正我已经习惯了。谁在乎呢？

OriginString: The adventurers appreciate my work, so I shouldn't care what other alchemists might think of me.
String: 冒险者们认可我的工作，我才不在乎其他炼金术师怎么看我。

OriginString:
So, what are you going to do now?
With your search concluded, will you be returning home?
String:
"那么，你现在打算怎么办？"
"既然搜寻已经结束，你要回家了吗？"

OriginString: I actually would like to stay here. Making potions for adventurers has been fun, and I've really gotten used to the people here.
String: 其实我想留在这里。给冒险者们配制药剂很有趣，而且我已经很适应这里的人了。

OriginString: So, I'd still want to be your alchemist if it's alright with you.
String: 所以...如果你同意的话，我想继续当你们的炼金术师。

OriginString: Of course, it is.
String: 当然没问题。

OriginString: Great!
String: 太好了！

OriginString: Yeah, Hopi happy everyone happy!
String: 是啊，霍皮开心大家就开心！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What are you still doing here?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你们还杵在这儿干嘛？！

OriginString: Hopi actually asked me if it would be okay for him to stay here for a while.
String: 霍皮刚才问我能不能让他在这儿暂住一阵子。

OriginString: He wants to learn more about humans, and I thought I could use an assistant.
String: 他想多了解人类，而且我觉得我也需要个助手。

OriginString: Shouldn't you have asked me?
String: 这事不该先问问我吗？

OriginString: I thought you'd probably be fine with it.
String: 我以为你应该不会反对...

OriginString: Probably.
String: 大概吧。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Hopi very helpful. Human tribe teach Hopi about way of humans.
Hopi can teach Human way of Hopi's tribe.
String: <?shakeScreen>霍皮很有用。人族部落教霍皮人类之道，霍皮也能教人族霍皮部落的智慧。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>You hear that, Guild Master? He can probably teach the adventurers some neat new tricks!
And he can stay here with me!
String: <?shakeScreen>听到了吗会长？他肯定能教冒险者们新招数！而且他可以和我住一块儿！

OriginString: Please, Guild Master!
String: 求你了会长！

OriginString: Please, Guild Master!
String: 求你了会长！

OriginString: *Sighs*I never said I was against it. Just would have preferred if you had discussed this with me before.
String: *叹气*我又没说不答应。只是希望你们能事先跟我商量下。

OriginString: Hopi can stay.
String: 霍皮可以留下。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You're the best, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>会长你最好了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You the best, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>会长最棒！

OriginString: (...I'll never be able to say no to these two, am I?)
String: （...我永远都没法拒绝这两个家伙是吧？）

OriginString: So, with the part from the Flower of Eternity, what can you actually make with it?
String: 那么，用永恒之花的部分材料，你究竟能做出什么？

OriginString: It's actually quite scary. I made a few tests with small samples but I'm certain that there are a lot of effects I could achieve with it but there are two that are just...miraculous.
String: 说出来可能有点吓人。我用小样做了几次测试，虽然肯定还有很多效果待发掘，但有两种效果简直是...奇迹。

OriginString: One of the possible effects is getting a body at its peak condition and making it unable to age. They can still die though.
String: 第一种效果是让身体保持在巅峰状态且不再衰老。当然还是会死的。

OriginString: So, basically eternal youth? What's the other effect?
String: 这不就是永生不老？那第二种呢？

OriginString: The other effect...is even more unbelievable but...I think I can bring back the dead.
String: 第二种效果...更难以置信...但我觉得它能起死回生。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: I mean really bring them back. Not like a necromancer, but actually reviving a person to the state before they died.
String: 我是说真正的复活。不像死灵法师那种，而是让人恢复到死前的状态。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Really?! You mean we can really revive a person?
String: <?shakeScreen>真的？！你是说真能让人复活？

OriginString: O-only someone who died just recently!
String: 只-只能复活刚死不久的人！

OriginString: O-oh...
I'm sorry, Guild Master.
String: 对不起，会长。

OriginString: (Was my disappointment that obvious?)
String: （我的失望有这么明显吗？）

OriginString: So, which one do you want to make?
String: 那你打算做哪种？

OriginString: I wanted to let you decide. I think either of those two would prove helpful to the Guild.
String: 我想让你来决定。我觉得这两种药剂对公会都很有帮助。

OriginString: Are you sure? I still wouldn't mind if you decide to make it for yourself and sell it. You'd be set for the rest of your life.
String: 你确定？就算你选择自己留着卖钱我也不会反对。足够你下半生衣食无忧了。

OriginString: I'm sure. I don't want to risk other people knowing that the Flower Of Eternity exists and I wouldn't even have it if weren't for you.
String: 我确定。我不想冒险让别人知道永恒之花的存在，而且要不是因为你，我根本得不到它。

OriginString: So, I think it's just fair that the Guild gets the potion I make in the end.
String: 所以最后把药剂交给公会才是最公平的。

OriginString: Thanks, Emily. I will make good use of it.
String: 谢谢你，艾米丽。我会好好利用它的。

OriginString: It's rather surprising how much trouble these bandits seem to cause for you. I was sure that when you nobles were getting involved that it would have been a done deal.
String: 真没想到这些强盗能给你们带来这么多麻烦。我还以为有你们贵族插手，事情早就解决了。

OriginString: I have to shamefully admit that I was under the same impression but in the end it was us who got defeated.
String: 说来惭愧，我原本也是这么想的，但最后反而是我们吃了败仗。

OriginString: Because you underestimated them?
String: 因为你们轻敌了？

OriginString: ...I feel like it's more than that. I always thought that they were no ordinary bandits considering the reputation they have built up in such a short time.
String: ...我觉得事情没那么简单。他们能在这么短时间内建立起如此名声，我总觉得这些强盗绝非等闲之辈。

OriginString:
But even then they far exceeded my expectations. From their strength to their equipment. 
It feels as if this is more than just a bandit problem.
String:
"但即便如此，他们还是远远超出了我的预期。从实力到装备都是如此。
感觉这已经不仅仅是强盗作乱这么简单了。"

OriginString: What more could it be?
String: 那还能是什么？

OriginString: I don't know. Maybe I'm just overthinking.
String: 不清楚。也许是我多虑了。

OriginString: I wish your sister would behave a little more like you.
String: 真希望你妹妹能像你这样懂事些。

OriginString: I understand what you're saying and I hope you'll forgive her.
String: 我明白您的意思，还请您多包涵。

OriginString: She didn't use to be like this in the past.
String: 她以前并不是这样的。

OriginString: You mean she was well-behaved?
String: 你是说她曾经很守规矩？

OriginString: Hahaha! No, I mean she was less conscious about her position as a noble.
String: 哈哈哈！不，我是说她以前没那么在意自己的贵族身份。

OriginString: For the longest time I could remember, Cecil wasn't even aware of the distinction between nobles and commoners and had a hard time grasping the concept.
String: 在我的记忆里，塞西尔很长一段时间甚至分不清贵族和平民的区别，完全理解不了这个概念。

OriginString: In the past she would often play with the servants' children or try to help with their chores when she saw them working.
String: 过去她经常和仆人的孩子们玩耍，看到他们在干活时还会主动帮忙。

OriginString: (That's certainly hard to believe if you see her now.)
String: （看她现在的样子真难相信这些。）

OriginString: What changed?
String: 后来发生了什么？

OriginString: ...Our parents eventually put a stop to it.
String: ...后来我们的父母制止了这种行为。

OriginString: You mean they didn't before?
String: 他们之前没管过？

OriginString: No. You see, it's common for noble households to place their children in care of nannies, while the parents would preoccupy themselves with their social obligations. It was the same for my sister.
String: 没有。要知道，贵族家庭通常会把孩子交给保姆照顾，父母则忙于社交应酬。我妹妹也是这样。

OriginString:
Her nanny was a good woman. She always tried her best for my little sister, treating her like she was her own daughter.
However, she could be a bit too lenient at times.
String:
"她的保姆是个好人。为了我妹妹，她总是竭尽全力，把她当成亲生女儿一样对待。
不过有时候她可能有点太纵容了。"

OriginString: While some nannies would focus on instilling traditional manners and etiquette expected of a noble, she prioritized my sister's happiness above all else.
String: 别的保姆会着重培养贵族应有的传统礼仪，但她把我妹妹的快乐放在第一位。

OriginString: But as distanced as my parents were, they still eventually found out about my sister's inappropriate behavior.
String: 但尽管我父母平时疏于关心，最终还是发现了我妹妹不得体的行为。

OriginString: Unlike me, my sister was of some importance to them, as she was the only daughter of the Greyhorn Household and it wasn't long until her nanny had to bear the consequences.
String: 和我不一样，作为灰角家族唯一的女儿，妹妹对他们很重要。没过多久，她的保姆就不得不承担后果。

OriginString:
She was fired shortly after and had to leave.
Ever since then my sister's behavior has changed. I think, she blames herself for what has happened.
String:
"她不久后就被解雇了，不得不离开。
从那以后，我妹妹的行为就变了。我想，她把发生的一切都归咎于自己。"

OriginString: So, please forgive her if she seems to be disrespectful. She believes she has to act that way because that is what is expected of her.
String: 所以如果她显得无礼，请您见谅。她只是觉得必须那样表现才符合身份。

OriginString: I'll be here if you need me.
String: 需要我的时候，我就在这儿。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master! Anything you want to talk about?
String: 公会会长好！有什么想聊的吗？

OriginString: You're quite different from what I expected.
String: 你和我想象中的很不一样。

OriginString: How so?
String: 怎么说？

OriginString: I've met a lot of nobles in my past and it's hard to remember one who didn't look down on me. Even if they tried to hide it, it was easy to tell.
String: 我见过不少贵族，但很难找到一个不轻视我的人。即便他们试图掩饰，也很容易看出来。

OriginString: I don't get that feeling with you.
String: 但你身上没有这种感觉。

OriginString: I guess growing up as the unimportant fourth son has a way to humble you.
String: 大概是因为作为无关紧要的四子长大，总会让人学会谦卑吧。

OriginString: ...Did you know that they weren't looking for you?
String: ...你知道他们根本没在找你吗？

OriginString: ...It's at least something that didn't surprise me. Our family is not particularly close or affectionate.
String: ...至少这并不让我意外。我们家亲情淡薄得很。

OriginString: My parents are much more invested in playing their political games and my older brothers will probably tear each other apart for the inheritance.
String: 父母更热衷于政治博弈，兄长们迟早要为继承权斗得你死我活。

OriginString: But I'm not particularly sad about it. I can already consider myself lucky enough to be left alone.
String: 但我并不为此难过。能独善其身已是万幸。

OriginString: There are no expectations on me and I don't have rivalries with my elder brothers as long as I keep my head down.
String: 只要安分守己，既不会有人对我抱有期待，也不会卷入兄长的争斗。

OriginString: And I do have one special bond in the family in the form of my little adorable baby sister. Seeing her sometimes really heals my soul.
String: 不过家里还有个可爱的妹妹与我感情深厚。见到她总能治愈我的心灵。

OriginString: (Well, at least he has a good attitude about it.)
String: （至少他心态还不错。）

OriginString: Anything else you like to know?
String: 还想知道些什么？

OriginString: Ugh...I feel like vomiting.
String: "呃...我想吐。"

OriginString: That's a hangover you're feeling.
String: 你这是宿醉反应。

OriginString: This is the worst. Why do people even drink? I'll never touch a drop of alcohol again!
String: 太难受了。人们为什么要喝酒？我再也不碰一滴酒了！

OriginString:
How often have I heard that before? But as a divine spellcaster, you do have a remedy for it.
Just cast Cure on yourself, and you should feel fine.
String:
"这话我都听过多少遍了？不过作为神圣施法者，你确实有办法解决。"
"给自己施个治疗术，应该就没事了。"

OriginString: Really? Well, let me try that.
String: 真的吗？那我试试看。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Much better! Thank you, Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>好多了！谢谢你，公会会长！

OriginString: Don't mention it.
String: 举手之劳。

OriginString:
... And also thank you for keeping me company yesterday.
I was a bit of a mess, wasn't I?
String:
"...还有谢谢你昨天陪着我。
我当时有点失态了，对吧？"

OriginString: It seemed like you needed it.
String: 看起来你需要它。

OriginString:
... I just wanted to forget it all for one day. 
The war between the demon lords and the gods.
The fact that I'm the Divine Messenger.
String:
...我只是想有一天能忘记这一切。
恶魔领主与诸神之间的战争。
还有我身为神谕使者的事实。

OriginString: ...The fact that I'm not even the master of my own body.
String: ...以及我甚至不能主宰自己的身体。

OriginString:
But I can't run away from it any longer...I've been ignoring the gods for days now.
They made it clear that I can not put it off any longer. I have to contact them.
String:
"但我不能再逃避了...我已经好几天没理会众神的旨意了。"
"他们明确表示我不能再拖延了。我必须联系他们。"

OriginString: Now...
String: 现在...

OriginString: I-I'm afraid, Guild Master. I don't think I can face them on my own anymore.
String: 我...我害怕，公会会长。我觉得自己一个人面对不了他们了。

OriginString: ...Can you be at my side for this?
String: ...这次你能陪在我身边吗？

OriginString: (Meeting the gods? At this point, I'm not sure what to think about the gods, so I'm a bit hesitant but...)
String: (面见众神？事到如今我对神明持保留态度，所以有些犹豫...)

OriginString: Of course. What do I need to do?
String: 当然。我需要做什么？

OriginString: Just take my hand, and you'll be there with me.
String: 只要握住我的手，你就会和我一起到那里。

OriginString:
Alright. 
(I take her hand.)
String:
好的。
（我握住她的手。）

OriginString: You're not alone in this, Lily.
String: 莉莉，你不是孤军奋战。

OriginString: Thank you... {PROTAGONIST}.
String: 谢谢你...{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: <?greyFlash>(It felt like I was suddenly pulled into an endless dark space. Where the only other thing I could see at my side was Lily.)
(Suddenly, a celestial light appeared in the darkness, revealing a giant silhouette.)
String: (突然，黑暗中浮现出一道天光，显露出一个巨大的轮廓。)

OriginString: I see you brought the Guild Master with you, child.
String: 看来你带着公会会长一起来了，孩子。

OriginString: (Lily started to hold my hand tighter and seemed frightened.)
String: (莉莉更用力地握紧我的手，似乎很害怕。)

OriginString: There is no need to be afraid. We didn't call upon you for punishment.
String: 不用害怕。我们叫你来不是为了惩罚你。

OriginString:
It is rather fortuitous that you have brought them with you.
For there is a lot we have to tell both of you.
String:
"你们把他们带来真是太好了。
因为我们有很多事要告诉你们两位。"

OriginString: ...Are you a god?
String: ...您是神吗？

OriginString: I am Ghanenta, the one you mortals worship as the God of Love and Compassion.
String: 我是加南塔，你们凡人所崇拜的爱与慈悲之神。

OriginString: Where are the other gods?
String: 其他神祇在哪里？

OriginString: I've convinced them to let me address you on my own, as many of my brothers and sisters lack the...tactfulness when it comes to interacting with humans.
String: 我说服他们让我独自与你们交谈，因为我的许多兄弟姐妹...缺乏与人类打交道的技巧。

OriginString: I-if I'm not going to get punished, then why did you call for me?
String: 如-如果不是要惩罚我，那你们为什么叫我来？

OriginString: To mend the schism that has formed between us, child. We are aware that you can not trust us blindly any longer, and time is dwindling. Not much longer, and the cultists will have amassed enough souls.
String: 为了弥合我们之间的裂痕，孩子。我们知道你们已无法盲目信任我们，而时间所剩无几。很快邪教徒就将收集到足够多的灵魂。

OriginString: Enough souls for what?
String: 够多的灵魂是为了什么？

OriginString: It's time for you to know the truth. If possible, we would have avoided this scenario, but circumstances are forcing our hand.
String: 是时候让你们知道真相了。若非情势所迫，我们本不愿走到这一步。

OriginString: However, first you need to understand the relationship between the Gods and the Demon Lords.
String: 但是，首先你需要了解众神与恶魔领主之间的关系。

OriginString: In ages past, Gods and Demon Lords waged a relentless war for dominion over human souls. It was a brutal war.
String: 远古时期，诸神与魔王为争夺人类灵魂的支配权展开了一场永无止境的战争。那是场残酷的战争。

OriginString: Once, the universe was teeming with many worlds inhabitated by humans, but each encounter between Gods and Demon Lords on the battlefield, resulted in their annihilation.
String: 曾经，宇宙中存在着无数人类居住的世界。但每当诸神与魔王在战场上相遇，那些世界就会随之湮灭。

OriginString: This war endured for millenias until only seven Gods, seven Demon Lords and one world remained. With the same numbers on each side, we were evenly matched.
String: 这场战争持续了数千年，直到最后只剩下七位神明、七位魔王和唯一的世界。数量均衡的双方陷入了僵局。

OriginString: More battles would mean the annihilation of one side and neither side were certain that they would win.
String: 继续交战只会导致一方彻底毁灭，而双方都无法确保自己会是胜利者。

OriginString: So, we stopped fighting each other and instead made a pact.
String: 于是我们停止了争斗，转而订立了契约。

OriginString: There would be no longer direct confrontations. Instead representatives amongst the humans were employed to gather as many souls as possible for each side, with minimal intervention from the Gods and Demon Lords.
String: 双方不再直接对抗，转而通过人类代理人来收集灵魂。神明与魔王只进行最低限度的干预。

OriginString: Thus, the concept of the church with their Divine Messenger and the Cultists and their Witch was born.
String: 就这样，教会与神谕者、异教徒与魔女的格局由此形成。

OriginString: We have achieved a peaceful equilibrium and since that time then, our endeavors have been dedicated to preserving and sustaining this delicate balance.
String: 我们达成了微妙的平衡，自那以后的所有努力都是为了维持这个脆弱的和平。

OriginString: That sounds like you're fine with letting the cultists exists.
String: 听起来你们是默许异教徒存在的。

OriginString: The followers of the Demon Lords are not allowed to be ever wiped out. We aim to gain the upper hand, but never to win completely.
String: 魔王信徒永远不能被彻底消灭。我们追求优势，但从不谋求完全胜利。

OriginString:
If we do, the Demon Lords will be forced to march to war once again.
Neither we nor they desire that conflict.
String:
"若真如此，魔王们将被迫再次出征。"
"无论我们还是他们，都不愿重燃战火。"

OriginString: Then what about all those souls the Demon Lords do manage to gather? What happens to them?
String: 那魔王收集到的那些灵魂会怎样？

OriginString: It's better for you if you don't know. Just live with the knowledge, that it's a necessary price to keep the peace.
String: 对你来说，不知道会更好。你只需要知道，这是维持和平必须付出的代价。

OriginString: You might be under the impression that we don't care about your fate, but we do. However, we do not see humanity as individual souls.
String: 或许你以为我们不在乎人类的命运，但事实并非如此。只是在我们眼中，人类不是作为个体存在的灵魂。

OriginString: We cannot jeopardize the fate of all of humanity with our demise for the sake of a few unfortunate souls.
String: 我们不能为了少数不幸的灵魂，拿全人类的命运冒险。

OriginString: However, you need to know that this peace is in danger of getting broken. For we the seven Divines...
String: 但你必须知道，这份和平正面临被打破的危险。因为我们七神...

OriginString: ...are currently only six.
String: ...现在只剩六位。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！！

OriginString: We expect, you understand the consequences should the Demon Lords become privy to our disadvantage.
String: 你应该明白，若让魔王得知我们的劣势会引发什么后果。

OriginString: (With a truce built on a power balance? Of course, it would shatter the moment one side becomes weaker.)
String: （建立在力量平衡上的停战？当然会在弱势方出现时土崩瓦解。）

OriginString: B-But I'm sure you were always seven when I heard your voices.
String: 可...可我聆听神谕时明明一直有七位的声音啊？

OriginString: A ruse. It takes all our power to hide our number from the demon lords.
String: 这是个计谋。我们用尽全力才能对恶魔领主隐藏我们的数量。

OriginString: What happened to the seventh god?
String: 第七位神明发生了什么？

OriginString: The Empyrean Emperor. We're certain that you have heard of him at this point.
String: 苍穹帝王。想必你们现在已经听说过他的事迹了。

OriginString: Yeah... an ancient ruler that had some ties with the witch and the demon lords.
String: 嗯...那个与魔女和魔王都有牵连的古代帝王。

OriginString:
Indeed.
He's the one who managed to seal one of us.
String:
确实。
他就是那个成功封印了我们一员的人。

OriginString:
H-How is that even possible?
<?shakeScreen>You're gods!
String:
"这-这怎么可能？
<?shakeScreen>你们可是神明啊！"

OriginString: We, too, did not believe it to be possible, and therein lay our mistake.
String: 我们也曾认为这绝无可能——而这正是我们的失误所在。

OriginString: The Emperor had already drawn our attention—an immortal sovereign who forged an empire unparalleled by any human, where the adoration from his subjects surpassed even our own.
String: 这位帝王早已引起我们注意——不朽的君主建立的帝国超越所有人族王朝，子民的崇拜甚至胜过对我们的信仰。

OriginString: Intrigued, we granted him an audience through the Divine Messenger when he sought one.
String: 出于好奇，当他通过神谕者求见时，我们应允了这次会面。

OriginString: Despite knowing his ties with the demon lords?
String: 明知他与魔王有勾结还接见？

OriginString: A single soul selling themselves to the demon lords, means very little to us. We had a pact after all.
String: 区区一个向魔王出卖灵魂的人类，对我们无足轻重。毕竟我们有契约在先。

OriginString: However, the audience proved to be a trap. When our sister, Solara, sought to communicate directly by possessing the Divine Messenger, she found herself ensnared and sealed away.
String: 但这会面是个陷阱。当我们的姊妹索拉娜试图附身神谕者直接沟通时，遭到了封印。

OriginString: For what purpose?
String: 为了什么目的？

OriginString: We do not know. Despite his ties with the demon lords, we do not think it was done for their sake.
String: 不得而知。尽管他与魔王有关联，但我们认为此举并非为了魔王。

OriginString: The Demon Lords remain oblivious to their advantage over us, and it appears that he was deliberately concealing our sister's disappearance from them.
String: 魔王至今不知他们已占优势，而他似乎刻意向魔王隐瞒了我们姊妹的失踪。

OriginString: However, his goal was of no importance to us. Our focus was on the retrieval of our sister.
String: 然而，他的目标对我们来说并不重要。我们的重点是找回我们的姐妹。

OriginString:
But our Divine Messenger was killed immediately after the sealing was done, and due to our pact with the demon lords our options were limited without an avatar. 
We've debated for a long time what to do and in the end we took a risk.
String:
"但我们的神圣使者刚完成封印就被杀害了，由于与恶魔领主的契约限制，在没有化身的情况下我们束手无策。"
"我们争论了很久该如何行动，最终决定冒险一试。"

OriginString: We violated the pact and used our power to destroy the empyrean Empire.
String: 我们违背契约，动用神力摧毁了苍穹帝国。

OriginString: The mysterious fall of the Empyreans... it was you?
String: 苍穹帝国神秘覆灭...是你们所为？

OriginString:
It was.
With our power, we ceased them all to be—a tranquil demise. Yet, we have violated the contract and we had to answer to the demon lords.
String:
正是如此。
借我等之力，令其尽归寂灭——一场安详的终局。然而我们违背了契约，不得不向恶魔领主们作出交代。

OriginString: It took a considerable number of souls to uphold the peace and have them overlook the transgression.
String: 为维持和平，我们付出了大量灵魂作为代价。

OriginString: We also had to mask the true nature of the cleansing by claiming that the Empyreans were worshipping false idols and showing disrespect to our sanctuaries.
String: 还编造了苍穹子民亵渎圣所、崇拜伪神的说法来掩盖真相。

OriginString: Dear gods...all those people.
String: 神明啊...那么多无辜的人...

OriginString: Couldn't you just have killed the emperor himself? Why drag all those other people into it?
String: 你们就不能直接杀了皇帝吗？为什么要把其他人都牵扯进来？

OriginString: We could not afford to take any risks. Any person within that empire might have been part of his scheme and posed a potential source of information through which the Demon Lords could learn of our missing sister.
String: 我们不敢冒险。帝国任何人都可能是他计划的环节，都可能让魔王得知我们缺失姊妹的消息。

OriginString: No, there was no alternative.
String: 别无选择。

OriginString: That...that can't be true...
String: 这...这太残忍了...

OriginString: Our plan was to locate and liberate our sister using our next Divine Messenger. However, once more, we underestimated the Emperor.
String: 我们原计划通过下一任神谕者寻找并解救姊妹。但再次低估了那位帝王。

OriginString: He foresaw the destruction of the empire and took precautions by ensuring the survival of a woman who had been by the emperor's side the longest, someone he trusted implicitly – his most loyal follower.
String: 他预见了帝国毁灭，让追随自己最久、最信任的忠诚者活了下来。

OriginString: The Witch.
String: 魔女。

OriginString: Only that she wasn't the witch yet. She survived the cleansing by being outside the confinements of the realm and by the time we were aware of her existence, she already struck a bargain with the demon lords.
String: 那时她还不是魔女。因身处境外逃过清洗，等我们发现时她已与魔王达成交易。

OriginString: She pledged to serve as their witch, amassing millions of souls on their behalf. In return, they promised to resurrect the emperor, whose soul was in their possession.
String: 她承诺作为魔女为魔王收集百万灵魂，换取魔王手中帝王灵魂的复活。

OriginString: After this arrangement, she concealed the emperor's body and our sealed sister in a location that eluded even us.
String: 此后她将帝王躯体与被封印的姊妹藏在了连我们都找不到的地方。

OriginString: For centuries, we've been hunting her, masking it as a simple proxy war. However, on each occasion, she outwitted our chosen Divine Messenger, killing them one after another.
String: 数百年来，我们以代理战争为名追捕她。但每次她都反杀我们派出的神谕者。

OriginString: Until, at last, you succeeded where everyone before failed.
String: 直到你完成了所有前任未竟之事。

OriginString: Now you know everything.
String: 现在你知晓了一切。

OriginString:
...This was a bit much... I'm not sure I was able to follow everything, but...in essence you are trying to find the sealed goddess.
Then why did you ask for the Emperor's body?
String:
...这有点过了...我不确定自己完全听明白了，但...本质上你们是在寻找被封印的女神。
那为什么要打听皇帝遗体的下落？

OriginString: We must never openly disclose our quest for our sister, nor should you ever do so. We believe that there is a substantial probability that the body is concealed in the same location where our sister is hidden.
String: 我们必须永远隐瞒寻找妹妹的使命，你也不得向任何人透露。我们认为遗体很可能就藏在我们妹妹被封印的同一处地点。

OriginString: I trust you now comprehend the reasons behind our secrecy. Our destiny, as well as that of all others, hinges on your success in locating the whereabouts of our sister and safeguarding this secret from the Demon Lords.
String: 相信你现在已理解我们保密的原因。我们的命运，以及所有人的命运，都取决于你能否找到妹妹的下落，并向魔王们守住这个秘密。

OriginString: Is there nothing you can do?
String: 你们就无能为力吗？

OriginString: Nothing that would not require us to violate the pact once more, and this time the demon lords will not take another breach quietly. A pact dishonored twice holds no value. War would become an inevitability.
String: 除非我们再次违背契约，但这次魔王们绝不会容忍第二次违约。被两次践踏的契约将毫无价值，战争将不可避免。

OriginString: No, it must be you. Fulfill this mission on our behalf, and we shall grant you anything within our power. As for you, Divine Messenger, you will be at liberty to pursue your life as you desire, and we will not interfere in the remainder of your existence.
String: 不，必须是你。替我们完成这个任务，我们就会在我们能力范围内满足你的任何愿望。至于你，神使，你将可以自由地过你想要的生活，我们不会再干涉你余下的人生。

OriginString: However, you must be aware that time is swiftly dwindling. The cultists are on the verge of fullfilling the deal with the demon lords, and the Emperor's revival is imminent.
String: 但你必须明白时间所剩无几。邪教徒即将完成与魔王的交易，皇帝复活在即。

OriginString: Should he rise up once more, hope that his intentions with our sister do not lead to the demise of us all.
String: 若他再度苏醒，但愿他对我们妹妹的意图不会导致所有人的灭亡。

OriginString: <?grayFlash>(Suddenly, a light burst from the god, and just like that, our consciousnesses were back in the temple)
String: <?grayFlash>（突然，神明身上迸发出一道光芒，转眼间我们的意识就回到了神庙）

OriginString: ... That was something.
String: ...这可真是够呛。

OriginString: I suddenly want another drink.
String: 我突然想再来一杯。

OriginString: Please don't. I don't want to even think about what happens if you accidentally blurt out the 'secret'.
String: 请不要。我都不敢想象如果你不小心说漏嘴'秘密'会发生什么。

OriginString: (*Sighs*. What a mess. It seems we have no other choice but to do what the gods want from us.)
String: （*叹气* 真是一团糟。看来我们别无选择，只能按神明说的做了。）

OriginString: (We need to find out where the emperor's body is hidden.)
String: （必须查出皇帝遗体藏在哪里。）

OriginString: Where is the Divine Messenger?
String: "神使大人在哪？"

OriginString: ...She decided to stay inside her room for a while.
String: ...她决定暂时待在房间里。

OriginString: I see...
String: 我明白了...

OriginString: Being posessed by the gods really got to her, hasn't it?
String: 被神明附身这件事对她打击很大，是吧？

OriginString: ...She was always aware that her role as the Divine Messenger left her little freedom.
String: ...她一直很清楚，作为神使的身份让她几乎没有自由。

OriginString: However, to know that she might not even be the master of her own body....I fear the gods are asking too much of her.
String: 然而，知道她甚至可能不能掌控自己的身体....我担心众神对她的要求太过分了。

OriginString: Take care, Guild Master.
String: 请多保重，公会会长。

OriginString: Guild Master.
String: 公会会长。

OriginString: The question might be a litte late, but what's your name?
String: 虽然这个问题可能有点迟了，但你叫什么名字？

OriginString: It's Tedric, Guild Master.
String: 我叫泰德里克，公会会长。

OriginString: Have you been with the Divine Messenger for long?
String: "你和神使大人认识很久了吗？"

OriginString: I've been tasked to protect her ever since she has become the Divine Messenger as a child.
String: 从她小时候成为神圣使者起，我就奉命保护她。

OriginString: ...I always pitied her.
String: ...我一直很同情她。

OriginString: A child should be in company of other kids at their age. Not with a bodyguard.
String: 孩子本该和同龄人在一起。而不是整天跟着个保镖。

OriginString: Anything else?
String: 还有别的事吗？

OriginString: Unfortunately, I don't know the purpose of the capture of the witch either.
String: "可惜，我也不清楚他们抓那个女巫的目的。"

OriginString: There is little the Divine Messenger is allowed to relay to me and in this case I don't think even she knew that things would turn out this way.
String: 神圣使者能传达给我的信息很少，而且这次我估计她也没料到事情会变成这样。

OriginString: I was afraid of that but well, no harm in asking.
String: 我就知道会是这样...不过问一下总没坏处。

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST}.
String: {PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: Fiola.
String: 菲奥拉。

OriginString: As unbelievable as it might seem, the Guild seems to have improved their reputation a bit since you've taken over.
String: 虽然听起来难以置信，但自从你接手后，公会的声誉似乎有所改善。

OriginString: Now that we have the necessary funds, there will be a need to invest those funds into improving the Guild.
String: 既然我们已经有了必要的资金，就需要将这些资金投入到公会的改善中。

OriginString:
Sound reasonable and therefore slightly uncharacteristic of you.
Did you have anything specific in mind?
String:
听起来挺合理的，不过不太像你平时的作风啊。
具体有什么想法吗？

OriginString: I'll send you some drafts. I think some of the others also had their own ideas.
String: 我会发几份草案给你。其他人好像也有自己的想法。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You wanna go ****!
String: <?shakeScreen>你他妈想打架是吧！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Try me!
String: <?shakeScreen>来啊！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Whoa, there you two! We're here to greet the new Guild Master. Not to start a fight!
String: <?whiteFlash>喂喂，你们两个！我们是来欢迎新任公会会长的，可不是来打架的！

OriginString: ...And who are you?
String: ...你又是谁？

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master! I'm Falken. One of the instructors of the Adventuring Guild.
String: 你好啊会长！我是法尔肯，冒险者公会的教官之一。

OriginString: I was asked by Fiola here to accompany her in this meeting, saying that it would be troublesome if the two of you were alone.
String: 是菲奥拉让我陪她来的，说要是让你们俩单独见面准得出乱子。

OriginString: But I didn't quite...expect this.
String: 但我真没想到...会是这种场面。

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST} and I share a...history. {PROTAGONIST} was a friend of my late husband but the two of us never saw eye to eye.
String: {PROTAGONIST}和我有些...过节。{PROTAGONIST}是我亡夫的朋友，但我们俩从来都看对方不顺眼。

OriginString: I was too afraid that your gaze would turn me into stone.
String: 我是怕被你瞪一眼就会变成石头。

OriginString: And wouldn't that be wonderful? Besides of course from the ugly statue that would spoil the landscape.
String: 那不是挺好的吗？虽然会多出一尊破坏风景的丑雕像。

OriginString: Geez! No need to underline your relationship before me. Don't we actually have more important matters to discuss?
String: 天啊！不用在我面前强调你们的关系。我们不是有更重要的事情要讨论吗？

OriginString: For example, welcoming the new Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild! Congratulations!
String: 比如欢迎冒险者公会的新任会长！恭喜你！

OriginString: Although I have to admit that this won't be an easy position to be in.
String: 不过我得承认这个位置可不好坐。

OriginString: Fran's letter slightly hinted at it. How bad is it?
String: 弗兰的信里稍微提过。情况有多糟？

OriginString: I don't know how much you have heard but the Adventurer Guild has been going downhill for some time now.
String: "我不知道你听说了多少，但冒险者公会最近这段时间一直在走下坡路。"

OriginString: We lost most of our reputation and contacts. All of our seasoned adventurers have left us and there is not much gold left to keep the Guild going. Honestly, it's a mess.
String: 我们失去了大部分声望和人脉。所有资深冒险者都离开了，公会资金也所剩无几。老实说，简直一团糟。

OriginString: ...That does sound bad.
String: ...听起来确实很糟。

OriginString: That's why you're here! The former Guild Master was certain that you can bring the Adventurer Guild back on its feet.
String: 所以您才被请来！老会长坚信您能让冒险者公会重振旗鼓。

OriginString: Where do we start?
String: 我们从哪里开始？

OriginString: My suggestion would be to start recruiting new adventurers.
String: 我建议先从招募新冒险者开始。

OriginString: You can usually find them in the tavern. How about we pay it a visit right now?
String: 酒馆通常能找到他们。要不我们现在就去看看？

OriginString: (Oh great...It's her.)
String: (噢天啊...又是她。)

OriginString: (This is Fiola. My friend's wife.)
String: (这是菲奥拉。我朋友的妻子。)

OriginString: (She and I have an agreement.)
String: (我们之间有个约定。)

OriginString: (I can't stand her, she can't stand me.)
String: (我受不了她，她也受不了我。)

OriginString: So you really came back...{PROTAGONIST}.
String: "你真的回来了...{PROTAGONIST}。"

OriginString: Fiola...I see you're still here. I was sure by now that you'd be already back in your swamp hut and brewing some children in an iron cauldron.
String: 菲奥拉...你还在啊。我本以为你早该回到沼泽小屋里，用铁锅熬煮小孩汤了。

OriginString: Charming as ever I see. I guess the only thing that grew older is your exterior.
String: 还是这么会说话呢。看来只有你的外表变老了。

OriginString:
I still can't believe you will become the new Guild Master. What was my husband thinking?<waitfor=0.8>
It's like a nightmare.
String:
"我还是不敢相信你会成为新任公会会长。我丈夫到底在想什么？<waitfor=0.8>
简直像场噩梦。"

OriginString: You can help me get rid of mine by going back to the underworld you call home.
String: 你可以帮我摆脱噩梦——滚回你称之为家的阴间去。

OriginString: And just leave the Guild, which my husband has spent his life to raise, to somebody who I'm sure has done nothing worthwhile in the last 10 years?
String: "难道要我把我丈夫毕生心血建立的公会，交给一个我敢打赌过去十年一事无成的人？"

OriginString: I think not.
String: 休想。

OriginString: (Oh great...It's her.)
String: （糟透了...又是她。）

OriginString: (This is Fiola. My friend's wife.)
String: （这是菲奥拉。我朋友的妻子。）

OriginString: (She and I have an agreement.)
String: （她和我之间有个协议。）

OriginString: (I can't stand her, she can't stand me.)
String: （我受不了她，她也受不了我。）

OriginString: So you really came back...{PROTAGONIST}.
String: 你还真回来了...{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: Fiola.
String: 菲奥拉。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Wait!...Where are the adventurers I've sent for you?
String: <?whiteFlash>等等！...我派去找你的那些冒险者呢？

OriginString: You really don't want to know.
String: 你绝对不会想知道。

OriginString: Oh great! You haven't been the Guild Master for even a day and we already lost three adventurers.
String: 太棒了！你当上公会会长连一天都不到，我们就已经损失了三名冒险者。

OriginString: What was my husband thinking in making you his successor? It's like a nightmare I can't wake up from.
String: 我丈夫到底在想什么，居然让你当他的继任者？这简直是个醒不过来的噩梦。

OriginString: How about helping me get rid of mine, by going back to the underworld you call home?
String: 那不如帮我解决我的噩梦？滚回你称之为家的阴间去怎么样？

OriginString: And just leave the Guild, which my husband has spent his life to raise, to somebody who I'm sure has done nothing worthwhile in the last 10 years?
String: "难道要我把我丈夫倾注一生心血建立的公会，交给一个过去十年肯定毫无建树的人？"

OriginString: I think not.
String: 想都别想。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}!
String: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}！

OriginString: What's the matter? You look like you've seen a ghost.
String: 怎么了？你看起来像见了鬼似的。

OriginString: There's an army marching towards the Adventurer Guild!
String: 有支军队正朝冒险者公会进发！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WHAT?!
String: <?shakeScreen>什么？！

OriginString: Several travelers have seen an odd army consisting of humans, goblins, jotuns, lephoz, and vampires march through the lands.
String: 几个旅人目击到一支由人类、哥布林、冰霜巨人、莱弗族和吸血鬼组成的古怪军队正在穿越这片土地。

OriginString: Considering where they have been spotted in the last several days, it's obvious that they're heading towards us.
String: 根据他们这几天出现的地点判断，很明显是冲我们来的。

OriginString: ...It has to be the cult.
String: ...肯定是邪教组织。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>DAMN IT! That's what he meant!
How did I not see this coming!
String: <?shakeScreen>见鬼！这就是他的意思！我怎么会没料到这招！

OriginString: To think that the cultists would have that kind of number...
String: 没想到邪教徒能集结这么多人手...

OriginString: ...How long until they arrive here?
String: ...他们还有多久会到这儿？

OriginString: A few days at most...
String: 最多几天...

OriginString: ...How did an army get this close without anyone noticing?
String: ...这么大规模的军队逼近，怎么会没人发现？

OriginString: Considering that the cultists were always a diverse group, made up of individuals from different backgrounds and races, it's easy to assume that they hailed from various locations and just recently joined forces.
String: 考虑到邪教徒本就是由不同背景和种族组成的多元化群体，很可能他们原本分散各地，最近才集结成军。

OriginString: What about house Greyhorn? Shouldn't they be responding to an army right next to their doorsteps?
String: 灰角家族呢？他们不该对家门口的军队作出反应吗？

OriginString: Mobilizing an army could take weeks. And considering that it hasn't been that long since they fought the bandit king, they might even opt to simply wait until they're done with the Guild before they act.
String: 调动军队可能需要数周时间。考虑到他们与强盗王的战斗并没有过去多久，他们甚至可能选择等到解决完公会后再采取行动。

OriginString: T-they wouldn't, would they?
String: 不、不会吧？

OriginString: I'm sorry. I once again brought death to this place...
String: 抱歉...我又给这里带来了死亡...

OriginString:
Guild Master?
What should we do?
String:
"公会会长？
我们该怎么办？"

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>... Falken.
Please check with the adventurers and see how many of them are willing to stay.
String: <?whiteFlash>...法尔肯。去问问冒险者们有多少人愿意留下来。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You're not planning to fight, are you?
String: <?shakeScreen>您该不会打算应战吧？

OriginString: ...With everyone who is willing to stay behind.
String: ...和所有愿意留下的人一起。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's suicidal! We may have a fortress but not nearly the numbers to actually fend off an army!
String: <?shakeScreen>那是自杀！我们虽然有要塞，但根本没有足够的人数来抵挡一支军队！

OriginString: ...We need to abandon the Guild...
String: ...我们必须放弃公会...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Then we'll lose everything!
String: <?shakeScreen>那样我们就什么都没了！

OriginString: Guild Master...
String: 公会会长...

OriginString:
...I won't abandon this place.
Not without a fight.
String:
...我不会放弃这个地方。
除非战至最后一刻。

OriginString: I'll ask House Greyhorn for help. Maybe with those who stay behind we can hold out long enough for them to send reinforcement.
String: 我会向灰角家族求援。也许凭借留守人员的力量，我们能坚持到他们的援军赶来。

OriginString: Lily, could you travel to House Greyhorn and plead for us?
String: 莉莉，能请你前往灰角家族为我们求援吗？

OriginString:
You're sending me away?
<?shakeScreen>I can also fight!
String:
"你要赶我走？"
<?shakeScreen>我也可以战斗的！

OriginString: Please. You're our best hope in convincing them to help. As Divine Messenger, your words should have some weight.
String: 拜托了。你是说服他们帮忙的最佳人选。作为神谕使者，你的话应该有些分量。

OriginString:
And in the worst-case scenario, you have to continue without us.
You know as well as I do what is on the line.
String:
"最坏的情况下，你们也得在没有我们的情况下继续前进。"
"你我都清楚这关乎着什么。"

OriginString: ...I understand. I'll go immediately and try to come back as soon as possible!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...我明白了。我这就出发，尽快赶回来！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: W-wait, your holiness!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 等等，圣使大人！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Everyone. I won't ask any of you to stay.
String: 各位。我不会强求任何人留下。

OriginString: ...Truth to be told...I don't want any of you to stay.
String: ...说实话...我不想让你们任何人留下。

OriginString: I want you to know that... I'm glad to have known you all. And that's why I hope you'll stay safe.
String: 我想让你们知道...能认识大家是我的荣幸。正因如此，我希望你们都能平安。

OriginString: That's all. You can all go now.
String: 就说这么多。你们都可以走了。

OriginString:
Now there is still one place you also need to know of.
The temple.
String:
"现在还有个地方你也得知道。
神庙。"

OriginString: Sometimes people will get injured and need only time to heal.
String: 有时候人们受伤了，只需要时间来恢复。

OriginString: But time is a luxury we cannot always afford.
String: 但时间这种奢侈品我们并不总能负担得起。

OriginString: Yes...unfortunately.
String: 是啊...很不幸。

OriginString: But the temple can help us with that. How about we also give it a visit today?
String: 不过神殿能帮上忙。要不我们今天也去参观一下？

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master!
String: 你好啊，公会会长！

OriginString: Oh, hey Me'can. Is there something you need?
String: 哦，是你啊梅'坎。有事吗？

OriginString: No, no. I just wanted to introduce you to somebody.
String: 没什么没什么，就是想给你介绍个人。

OriginString: This here is my buddy, Hopi.
String: 这位是我的好兄弟霍皮。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>!!!

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's a Lephoz!
String: <?shakeScreen>那是莱弗族！

OriginString: Now, now, Guild Master. Don't be rude. His name is Hopi.
String: 哎哎，公会会长，别这么没礼貌。他叫霍皮。

OriginString: His tribe is actually not hostile to humans, and Hopi himself is quite fond of human culture. He's pretty amazing. He even taught himself the human language.
String: 他们部落其实对人类没有敌意，霍皮本人还挺喜欢人类文化的。他很厉害，人类语言都是自学的。

OriginString: Hopi, say hello to the Guild Master.
String: 霍皮，跟公会会长打个招呼。

OriginString: Hello Mis...
String: 你好小...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...?
String: <?whiteFlash>...？

OriginString: ...Hopi not want be racist but Hopi can not tell if that is miss or mister.
String: ...霍皮不想种族歧视，但霍皮实在分不清那位是小姐还是先生。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Hahaha!
It's not you, Hopi. Trust me.
String: <?shakeScreen>哈哈哈！不是你的问题啦霍皮，相信我。

OriginString: Could you explain to me why you brought him here?
String: 你能解释下为什么带他来这里吗？

OriginString: I was just doing a favor for Emily. I told her about this tribe that has been living in these lands for centuries, and that I quite often trade with them on my way here.
String: 我就是帮艾米丽个忙。我跟她说过这个部落在这片土地上生活了几百年，我每次来这儿都会和他们交易。

OriginString: She was so interested that she asked me to bring one of them over to talk with them.
String: 她特别感兴趣，非要我带个部落成员来聊聊。

OriginString:
...
<?shakeScreen>EMMILLLY!!!!!
String:
...
<?shakeScreen>艾米丽丽丽!!!!!

OriginString:
How great! 
This is the first time I'm actually meeting a Lephoz!
String:
太棒了！
这是我第一次见到莱弗族人！

OriginString: Hopi also excited to meet human. Hopi not get many chances.
String: 霍皮也很高兴见到人类。霍皮很少有机会。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I have so many questions!
String: <?shakeScreen>我有好多问题想问！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hopi too!
String: <?shakeScreen>霍皮也是！

OriginString: Alright! Then ask me your questions first!
String: 那好！你先问你的问题吧！

OriginString: Can Hopi touch your skin? Hopi want know how it feels without hair.
String: 霍皮能摸摸你的皮肤吗？霍皮想知道没有毛是什么感觉。

OriginString: Only if I can touch your ears!
String: 除非我也能摸摸你的耳朵！

OriginString: Hopi agrees!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 霍皮同意！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>So fluffy!!
String: <?shakeScreen>毛茸茸的！！

OriginString: So smooth!
String: 好光滑！

OriginString: (They were touching each other and giggled like little kids.)
String: (他们互相摸着对方，像小孩子一样咯咯笑。)

OriginString: Emily... would you explain to me why you asked Me'can to bring a Lephoz here?
String: 艾米丽...你能解释下为什么让梅肯带个莱弗族人过来吗？

OriginString: Oh, come on, Guild Master! Don't tell me you're not excited to see him here?
String: 哎呀，会长！别告诉我你看到他在这儿不高兴？

OriginString: I might be more excited if I don't remember every time I see him how I often nearly died of poison in the past.
String: 要不是每次见到他们都让我想起过去差点被毒死的经历，我可能会更高兴点。

OriginString: Hopi will not hurt human. Hopi's tribe not hostile to humans.
String: 霍皮不会伤害人类。霍皮的部落对人类没有敌意。

OriginString: Elder only does not want human near our land.
String: 长老只是不希望人类靠近我们的领地。

OriginString:
(Yeah. That totally does not sound hostile. 
<?whiteFlash>Wait... how is Me'can able to trade with them?
Ugh... just stop questioning it.)
String:
（是啊，这听起来完全不像有敌意。
<?whiteFlash>等等...梅肯是怎么能和他们做交易的？
唉...别想那么多了。）

OriginString: Emily. Care to answer my question, young lady?
String: 艾米丽。能回答我的问题了吗，小姑娘？

OriginString: Alright, alright.
String: 好啦好啦。

OriginString: Me'can told me how Hopi's tribe has been living in this area for centuries. So, I've thought that they might know something about the Flower of Eternity. That's why, I asked him if he could let me meet one of them.
String: 梅肯告诉我霍皮的部落在这一带生活了几百年。所以我想他们可能知道些永恒之花的事。这才请他安排我和他们的人见面。

OriginString:
*Sighs*What a reckless idea.
But fine.
String:
*叹气*真是个鲁莽的主意。
不过...好吧。

OriginString: Hopi, do you know anything about the Flower Of Eternity?
String: 霍皮，你知道永恒之花的事吗？

OriginString: Hopi does not know about Flower Of Eternity.
String: 霍皮不知道永恒之花。

OriginString: Oh...
I'm sorry, Emily.
String: 抱歉，艾米丽。

OriginString: But Elder knows.
String: 但长老知道。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>REALLY?!
String: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>真的吗？！

OriginString: Yes. Hopi remember when youngling, how elder once said tribe was saved by flower of eternity when plague spread.
String: "是的。霍皮记得小时候，长老说过部族当年闹瘟疫时，是被永恒之花救活的。"

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Guild Master! Did you hear that? Finally a solid lead to the Flower Of Eternity.
We just have to ask their Elder where to find it!
String:
<?shakeScreen>公会长！你听到了吗？终于有了永恒之花的确切线索。
我们只需要问问他们的长老在哪里能找到它！

OriginString: ...How much does your Elder dislike humans?
String: ...你们长老有多讨厌人类？

OriginString: ...Hopi feel like, human would not like answer.
String: ...霍皮觉得，人类不会喜欢这个答案。

OriginString: Of course.
String: 当然。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>But Hopi think Hopi can convince Elder to talk peacefully with human.
String: <?shakeScreen>但霍皮觉得可以说服长老和人类和平交谈。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Please Guild Master! Can we go? 
Please, please, please!
String: <?shakeScreen>求你了公会会长！我们能去吗？拜托拜托拜托！

OriginString: Alright, but not without some adventurers. I'll be coming too.
String: 好吧，但必须带上冒险者。我也会一起去。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>YES! Hahaha!
*singing* I'm so close. I'm so close.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>太好啦！哈哈哈！*哼唱* 我离目标好近。我离目标好近。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
So why are you helping?
What's in it for you?
String:
"那你为什么要帮忙？
这对你有什么好处？"

OriginString: Hopi like humans. Me'can often bring human wares to tribes. Hopi think that human who able to create wonderful items like those can not be bad.
String: 霍皮喜欢人类。商人经常带人类物品来部落。霍皮觉得能做出这些好东西的人类不会坏。

OriginString: Hopi hope by helping human, humans also see Hopi not bad. Then maybe Hopi's people and humans one day like each other.
String: 霍皮希望帮助人类后，人类也能觉得霍皮不坏。也许有一天霍皮的族人和人类能和睦相处。

OriginString:
...
Now I just feel horrible about myself.
String:
...
现在我只觉得自己糟透了。

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master.
String: 你好，公会长。

OriginString: Oh, hello Luana.
String: 哦，你好啊露安娜。

OriginString: ...I need your help.
String: ...我需要你的帮助。

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>My help?
What's the matter?
String: <?whiteFlash>我的帮助？出什么事了？

OriginString: ...It's about Rogue... She's acting weird...
String: ...是关于罗格的...她最近很不对劲...

OriginString: ...I have no idea how to respond to that.
String: ...这让我不知该如何接话。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>It's different than usual!
String: <?shakeScreen>这次和往常不一样！

OriginString: I can tell... she is planning to leave...
String: 我能感觉到...她打算离开...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Leave? But why?
String: <?shakeScreen>离开？为什么？

OriginString: I don't know. But she acted like this the last time she... just vanished.
String: 我不知道。但她上次也是这样...然后就突然消失了。

OriginString: Have you tried talking to her?
String: 你试过和她谈谈吗？

OriginString: It's no use. She pretends that there is nothing wrong.
String: 没用的。她假装什么事都没有。

OriginString: Guild Master, I want to keep an eye on her and hoped you could do so too.
String: 公会会长，我想盯紧她，希望您也能帮忙留意。

OriginString: I-I don't want her to disappear.
String: 我...我不想让她就这样消失。

OriginString: I'll keep an eye out and ask a few adventurers to do so too.
String: 我会留意的，再让几个冒险者也帮忙看着。

OriginString: I would also prefer if she doesn't just leave without an explanation.
String: 我也不希望她不辞而别。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master!
String: 谢谢您，公会会长！

OriginString: Oh...hello, Guild Master.
String: 哦...你好啊，公会会长。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Ouch!
Did you just hit me?
String: <?shakeScreen>哎哟！你刚才打我了吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Serves you right for leaving without saying anything!
String: <?shakeScreen>谁让你不辞而别的！活该！

OriginString:
...I'm sorry.
I-I just discovered that 'they' have learned I was hiding at the Adventurer Guild.
String:
...对不起。
我-我刚发现"他们"已经知道我躲在冒险者公会了。

OriginString: I didn't want to put any of you in danger.
String: 我不想连累你们任何人。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>(Luana hits her!)
String: <?shakeScreen>(露安娜打了她！)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Ouch! Why is everyone hitting me?!
String: <?shakeScreen>痛！为什么人人都要打我？！

OriginString:
I always told you that you didn't have to deal with your problems on your own!
<?shakeScreen>Didn't I always tell you that I'd protect you?
String: "我不是一直都跟你说不用一个人扛所有事吗！<?shakeScreen>我不是一直都说过会保护你的吗？"

OriginString: Luana...
String: 露安娜...

OriginString:
She's right, Rogue. We're also here.
You're part of the Adventurer Guild. If anyone messes with you, then they're messing with us.
String:
"她说得对，罗格。我们也在呢。"
"你现在是冒险者公会的一员。谁敢找你麻烦，就是跟我们整个公会过不去。"

OriginString:
...
<?whiteFlash>You know what, Guild Master? You're completely right!
String:
...
<?whiteFlash>你知道吗，公会会长？你说得完全正确！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>I don't need to be afraid of them anymore! They just lost their precious Executioner!
They'll think twice now before they try to make an enemy out of the Adventurer Guild!
String: <?shakeScreen>我再也不用怕他们了！他们刚失去了宝贵的处刑人！现在想和冒险者公会为敌可得掂量掂量！

OriginString: That's the spirit!
String: 这才像话！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>I'm so not afraid that I'm even going teach the adventurers 'their' most secret techniques! What are they going to do about it?
<?shakeScreen>Nothing!
String:
<?shakeScreen>我一点都不怕，我甚至要把'他们'最秘密的技巧教给冒险者！他们能拿我怎么样？
<?shakeScreen>什么都做不了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You hear me? You can do nothing to me! How do you like that?
String: <?shakeScreen>听见没？你们动不了我一根汗毛！气不气？

OriginString: ...Alright, calm down, Rogue. We don't have to kick the hornet's nest.
String: ...好了，冷静点，罗格。 我们没必要去捅马蜂窝。

OriginString: S-sorry, Guild Master. I got a little bit carried away there.
String: 对、对不起公会会长，我刚才有点得意忘形了。

OriginString: What I want to say is...thank you. For being there for me.
String: 我想说的是...谢谢你们。谢谢你们支持我。

OriginString: Especially you, Luana.
String: 特别是你，露安娜。

OriginString: I promised you that, didn't I?
String: 我答应过你的，不是吗？

OriginString: Whatever may come, and whatever hardship you might encounter, I always will be there for you.
String: 无论发生什么，无论你遇到什么困难，我都会一直在你身边。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: Is something wrong, Rogue?
String: 怎么了罗格？

OriginString: I-I need to go now.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 我、我得先走了。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
I think she's a bit embarrassed.
How cute.
String:
"我觉得她有点不好意思呢。
真可爱。"

OriginString: Despite not showing her face, she's kinda easy to read, isn't she?
String: 虽然看不到脸，但这孩子的心思还挺好懂的，对吧？

OriginString: Interesting...not quite my opinion but it does raise some questions...
String: 有意思...虽然我不完全赞同，但这确实引发了一些疑问...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...
String: <?whiteFlash>...

OriginString: Are you one of the instructors here?
String: 你是这里的导师之一吗？

OriginString: Indeed I am.
String: 正是。

OriginString: Majika. The mage instructor.
String: 玛吉卡。法师导师。

OriginString: Now that I answered your question...
String: 既然我已经回答了你的问题...

OriginString: Goodbye!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 再见！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Wait! Don't you want to know who I am?
String: <?shakeScreen>等等！你不想知道我是谁吗？

OriginString: Not particularly. No.
String: 不太想。不想。

OriginString: I'm the new Guild Master around here!
String: 我是这里的新任公会会长！

OriginString: We have a new Guild Master?
String: 我们换新会长了？

OriginString: W-wait! Don't you know that Fran has passed away?
String: 等-等等！你不知道弗兰已经去世了吗？

OriginString: Oh no, that I do know of. But I've heard that the Guild was not disbanding and that was all the interest I had in that matter.
String: 哦不，这事我知道。不过我听说公会没有解散，这就是我对这件事的全部兴趣所在了。

OriginString: But I do admit that a new Guild Master due to the current circumstances does make sense. I hope this doesn't affect my studies...
String: 但我承认，在当前情况下任命新会长确实合理。希望这不会影响我的研究...

OriginString: Well, was there anything else you like to say, Guild Master?
String: 那么，会长还有什么要说的吗？

OriginString: I...uh...guess not?
String: 我...呃...应该没了？

OriginString: Then I'll excuse myself. Good day, Guild Master!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 那我就先告辞了。祝您愉快，会长！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (...I don't even know anymore...)
String: (...我已经完全搞不懂了...)

OriginString: It seems by following the trails of the expedition we found ourselves in some secret hall filled with guardians.
String: 看来跟随探险队的踪迹，我们来到了某个充满守护者的秘密大厅。

OriginString: They do not seem hostile for now, so let's not attempt anything to agitate them.
String: 他们目前似乎没有敌意，所以我们最好别做出任何可能激怒他们的举动。

OriginString: I've encountered doors like these before. The ancient empyreans called them Gate Guardians.
String: "我以前见过这种门。上古天族称它们为'守门者'。"

OriginString: They're magically enhanced doors that only open when given the right password.
String: 这是经过魔法强化的门扉，只有输入正确口令才会开启。

OriginString: Considering that there are no other paths, I can only assume that my son's expedition passed through the door.
String: 既然没有其他路可走，我推测我儿子带领的探险队应该是通过了这扇门。

OriginString: Could it be that they have got themselves trapped? Possibly...there might be other hidden traps or safety measures we are unaware of.
String: 难道他们被困在里面了？很可能...这里或许还藏着我们不知道的机关或防护措施。

OriginString: Adventurers, let us try to pass through the door. For this we need to somehow infer the password required to enter.
String: 冒险者们，让我们试试通过这扇门。为此我们需要想办法推断出进入所需的密码。

OriginString: If that proves to be impossible, then there is also another way. I've studied these doors enough that I've developed a spell to break their enchantment.
String: 如果实在猜不出来，还有另一个办法。我对这类门的研究足以让我开发出破除其结界的法术。

OriginString: However, it's most likely that the guardians will retaliate if we open the door this way.
String: 不过，强行破门很可能会遭到守门者的反击。

OriginString: I leave the manner of approach to you.
String: 采用哪种方式由你们决定。

OriginString: Greetings, Guild Master. Thank you for coming.
String: 您好，公会会长。感谢您前来。

OriginString: Hello Majika.  You wanted to see me?
String: 玛吉卡，找我有事吗？

OriginString: Yes. I'm in need of assistance from the Adventurer Guild.
String: 是的。我需要冒险者公会的帮助。

OriginString: ...It's about a personal matter of mine.
String: ...是关于我的私事。

OriginString: What is it?
String: 请说。

OriginString: It's in regard to my son. He's...missing.
String: 是关于我儿子的事。他...失踪了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!
String: <?whiteFlash>！

OriginString: My husband has sent me a message that our son has not returned from an expedition he led into an ancient ruin.
String: 我丈夫来信说，儿子带队探索古代遗迹后至今未归。

OriginString: Ancient ruins are rife with dangers and I...
String: 古代遗迹危机四伏，我...

OriginString: ...I fear for him.
String: ...很担心他。

OriginString: I need to enter those ruins myself and search for my son.
String: 我必须亲自进入遗迹寻找儿子。

OriginString: However, I'm not an adventurer and I fear my own abilities will not suffice for such an expedition.
String: 但我毕竟不是冒险者，单凭自己的能力恐怕难以完成这次探险。

OriginString: That's where I require the assistance of the Adventurer Guild.
String: 这就是我需要冒险者公会帮助的地方。

OriginString: Don't worry Majika.
String: 别担心，玛吉卡。

OriginString: You can count on us. We'll help you find your son.
String: 我们一定会帮你找到儿子。

OriginString: You have my gratitude, Guild Master. I hope we're not too late.
String: 万分感激，公会会长。希望我们不会去得太迟。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master.
String: 你好，公会会长。

OriginString: Hi Majika, I wanted to check up on you.
String: 嗨，玛吉卡，我来看看你情况如何。

OriginString: I heard everything went well in the last quest.
String: 听说上次任务一切顺利。

OriginString: Indeed Guild Master. Thanks to the adventurers you've sent, we successfully found my son and saved him.
String: 确实如此，会长。多亏您派来的冒险者，我们成功找到并救出了我儿子。

OriginString: Words can not express the gratitude I have for you, Guild Master.
String: 言语无法表达我对您的感激之情，会长大人。

OriginString: I'm glad we could help you.
String: 能帮上忙我很高兴。

OriginString: Mother. I'll be leaving.
String: 母亲。我要走了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh! Is this...
String: <?whiteFlash>啊！这是...

OriginString: Guild Master, meet my son, Allen.
String: 会长，这是我儿子艾伦。

OriginString: Allen, this is the Guild Master.
String: 艾伦，这位是公会会长。

OriginString: Greetings, Guild Master. I assume I have you to thank for my timely rescue.
String: 你好，公会长。我想我要感谢你及时的救援。

OriginString: You have your mother to thank for that. After all she was the one who was worried enough to ask us for help.
String: 你该感谢你母亲。毕竟是她担心得来找我们求助。

OriginString: ...Is that so? I see.
String: ...是这样吗？我明白了。

OriginString: ...Don't you have anything to say about that?
String: ...对此你没有什么要说的吗？

OriginString: ...Of course. I'm also grateful to you, mother.
String: ...当然。我也很感谢您，母亲。

OriginString: That kinda sounded flat.
String: 听起来有点敷衍啊。

OriginString: It's fine Guild Master. Considering our relationship, that's enough.
String: 没关系的会长。考虑到我们的关系，这样足够了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hey! Mama's boy!
String: <?shakeScreen>嘿！妈宝男！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>SELENE!
String: <?shakeScreen>塞蕾娜！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Mr. Mama's boy! I've kept yours and everyone else's **** asses alive!
String: <?shakeScreen>妈宝男先生！我救了你们这群废物的命！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I want a **** bonus for that!
String: <?shakeScreen>我要为此拿到一笔****奖金！

OriginString: (...The mouth on this one...)
String: (...这姑娘嘴巴真厉害...)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Selene! This is not the best time to discuss this!
String: <?shakeScreen>塞蕾娜！现在不是说这个的时候！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>****!
String: <?shakeScreen>靠！

OriginString: ...Excuse me but for what reason did you refer to him as 'Mama's boy'?
String: ...请问你为什么叫他"妈宝男"？

OriginString: Hmmm? That's because he's one.
String: 嗯？因为他就是啊。

OriginString: Selene....!
String: 塞蕾娜...！

OriginString: He never shuts up about his mother. Always saying stuff like how **** brilliant she is, or that he needs to do better to make her proud.
String: 他从来不闭嘴谈论他的母亲。总是说她有多么****出色，或者他需要做得更好来让她骄傲。

OriginString: Even when we were trapped in that **** room, he kept yammering: "What would mother do?"
String: 就连被困在那个破房间里时，他还一直念叨："母亲会怎么做？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>SELENE!!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>塞蕾娜！！！！

OriginString: Oh, just give it a rest. You love your mother so just own up to it!
String: 哦，别装了。你爱你母亲就大方承认啊！

OriginString:
...Fine.
You can have your bonus.
String:
...好吧。
奖金归你了。

OriginString: **** yeah! That's what I'm talking about!
String: 太特么棒了！这才像话！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>AND YOU'RE FIRED!
String: <?shakeScreen>还有你被开除了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>*****! Not again!
String: <?shakeScreen>见鬼！又来！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Every ***** time! ****! <?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>每次都是这样！该死的！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...Son. Is what she said true?
String: ...儿子。她说的是真的吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> D-don't misunderstand mother! I respect you as a scholar and your work is obviously outstanding! Anyone with half a mind would tell you that!
String: <?shakeScreen> 别-别误会啊母亲！我作为学者非常尊敬您，您的工作显然出类拔萃！但凡有点脑子的人都会这么说！

OriginString: ...I see. Even then, it's still a relief to me that you don't hate me.
String: ...这样啊。即便如此，知道你不恨我，我还是松了口气。

OriginString: What? O-of course not! Why would you think that?
String: 什么？当-当然不恨！您怎么会这么想？

OriginString: ...I'm well aware of my own shortcomings as a mother. I can not deny that by pursuing my studies, I may have inadvertently harmed our relationship.
String: ...我很清楚自己作为母亲的不足。不能否认，追求学术研究可能无意中伤害了我们的关系。

OriginString: No...that's...
...Maybe I do sometimes wish we were a little bit closer...
String: ...或许我确实有时候希望我们能更亲近些...

OriginString: ...Why not try now?
String: ...为什么不现在试试呢？

OriginString: I mean now that all the feelings are out in the open, there is nothing that really prevents you from trying to do better now.
String: 我是说既然现在所有感受都摊开了，没什么能真正阻止你们从现在开始改善关系。

OriginString: You have a point, Guild Master.
String: 你说得有道理，公会会长。

OriginString: Son...would you like to exchange our research notes? I'm quite certain, that there is a myriad of knowledge we both could gain from each other.
String: 儿子...你想交换我们的研究笔记吗？我很确定，我们都能从对方那里学到很多知识。

OriginString: I...I'd like that.
String: 我...我很乐意。

OriginString: (All's well that ends well. Or wait! We can do better than that!)
String: (结局好就一切都好。等等！我们还能做得更好！)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>How about you stay with us here, Allen? We surely have some place where you can stay and you both could work on your studies together!
String: <?shakeScreen>艾伦，你要不要留在这里？我们肯定能找到地方让你住下，你们俩还可以一起研究！

OriginString: My apologies, Guild Master, but I can not do that. I need to return home to my wife and son as soon as possible. I'm sure they're worried sick by now.
String: 抱歉公会会长，这不行。我得尽快回家见妻子和儿子。他们现在肯定担心坏了。

OriginString: ...Your wife and...son?
String: ...你妻子和...儿子？

OriginString: I'm...a grand mother?!
String: 我...当奶奶了？！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And you never deemed it necessary, to inform me about it?!
String: <?shakeScreen>而你竟然觉得没必要通知我？！

OriginString: (Uh-oh...)
I-I thought father already told you....
String: 我-我以为父亲已经告诉您了...

OriginString: I will have a word with him at a later time, you can be assured of that, but do not presume that it implies exoneration on your end .
String: 我会抽空和他好好谈谈，这点你可以放心，但别以为这就意味着你能免于责难。

OriginString: My failure as a mother has now become apparent with the lack of discipline I seem to have instilled on you.
String: 我作为母亲的失职现在显而易见——看来我未能给你灌输足够的规矩。

OriginString: A mistake I intend to rectify.
String: 这个错误我必须纠正。

OriginString: Uh...I think I better leave so you two can have some nice mother-and-son bonding time.
String: 呃...我觉得我最好先走，让你们母子俩好好培养感情。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>N-No! <?shakeScreen>Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>别-别走！<?shakeScreen>公会会长！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>PLEASE WAAAAAIT!!!!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>等等我啊啊啊啊啊！！！！

OriginString: This is our supplier.
String: 这是我们的供应商。

OriginString: His name is Me'can. A name I'm pretty sure is made up.
String: 他叫梅坎。我敢肯定这名字是编的。

OriginString: It certainly is!
String: 没错！

OriginString: ...I see we're already off to a great start.
String: ...看来我们开了个好头啊。

OriginString: Care to explain?
String: 能解释下吗？

OriginString: ...After the Guild has started to lose its reputation fewer and fewer merchants were willing to do business with us.
String: ...自从公会声誉下滑后，愿意和我们做生意的商人越来越少了。

OriginString: Then suddenly a very suspicious stranger appeared...
String: 然后突然出现个非常可疑的陌生人...

OriginString: That would be me!
String: 那就是我！

OriginString: ...and he offered to become our supplier now that all the other merchants have cut their contact with us.
String: ...在其他商人都断绝往来后，他主动提出要当我们的供应商。

OriginString: He never showed us his face, never told us where he came from or why he even wants to support the Adventurer Guild...
String: 他从不露脸，也不说来自哪里，甚至不愿解释为何要支持冒险者公会...

OriginString: So all the red flags.
String: 所以全是危险信号。

OriginString: Buuut beggars can't be choosers. And you my dear customers, are very much beggars right now and I'm the philanthropist who is holding you up.
String: 但~乞丐没资格挑三拣四。而亲爱的顾客们，你们现在就是乞丐，而我是支撑你们的慈善家。

OriginString: So you're doing this out of generosity?
String: 所以你这么做是出于慷慨？

OriginString: Oh, nonononono! The actual reason is completely different from that.
String: 噢，不不不不！真正原因完全不是那样。

OriginString: And you're not going to tell us.
String: 而你也不打算告诉我们。

OriginString: Exactly! You're just as insightful as you look!
String: 没错！您和看上去一样敏锐！

OriginString: I mean even if I told you a reason, how could you possibly know I'm telling the truth?
String: 就算我编个理由，你们怎么知道是真是假？

OriginString: For all you know, I could be a big bad evil guy and this is all part of an unnecessarily elaborate plan to destroy everything you love and care about.
String: 在你们看来，我可能是个大恶人，这一切都是摧毁你们所爱之物的复杂计划。

OriginString: Lighten up, Guild Master! I'm joking of course!
String: 放松点，会长！我开玩笑的啦！

OriginString: *Sighs*. I miss the old Guild Master. He actually laughed when I told him that.
String: *叹气*。我怀念老会长。我讲这个笑话时他真会笑。

OriginString: ...Despite all of...that, there was never any problem with the wares Me'can brought to us. Quite the opposite in fact.
String: ...尽管有这么多问题，但梅坎提供的货物从没出过差错。事实上正好相反。

OriginString: I guess we have no choice but to keep on relying on you then...
String: 看来我们别无选择，只能继续依赖你了...

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master! You will not regret this.
String: 谢谢会长！您不会后悔的。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Or will you?
String: <?whiteFlash>...真的吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Just kidding! Hahahaha!
String: <?shakeScreen>开玩笑的！哈哈哈！

OriginString: Did you have any troubles with bandits lately?
String: 最近有遇到强盗麻烦吗？

OriginString: I'm moved that you're worried about me, Guild Master,  but there is no need to.
String: 您这么关心让我很感动，会长，但没必要。

OriginString: Bandits have never posed a problem for me.
String: 强盗从不是我的问题。

OriginString: ...How?
String: ...怎么做到的？

OriginString: I've never seen you travel with any guards and your cart isn't small enough to travel...covertly.
String: 从没见你带护卫，货车也不像能隐秘行动的大小...

OriginString: I have my ways. So you don't have to worry about any shipments coming too late.
String: 我有我的方法。所以不用担心货物延误。

OriginString: Are you going to tell me how you do it?
String: 能告诉我怎么做到的吗？

OriginString: No.
String: 不能。

OriginString: Good talking to you Guild Master!
String: 和您聊天很愉快，会长！

OriginString: My, my. The bandit king surely sounds like a dangerous fellow. With the way things are, many merchants would probably be too afraid to travel to do trade.
String: 哎呀呀，那个强盗王听起来可真是个危险人物。照这么下去，恐怕很多商人都不敢出门做生意了。

OriginString: But not me! Aren't you glad to have me as a trading partner?
String: 但我可不怕！有我这样的贸易伙伴是不是很棒？

OriginString: I probably still preferred to have a merchant I can look in the eyes.
String: 我可能还是更希望能和能直视眼睛的商人打交道。

OriginString: You'd have a hard time with your two eyes and my six.
String: 你用两只眼睛盯着我六只眼睛看会很吃力的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hahahaha! You should have seen your face!
String: <?shakeScreen>哈哈哈！你真该看看自己刚才的表情！

OriginString: To think the Divine Messenger herself will be visiting you.
String: 没想到圣使大人会亲自来拜访你们。

OriginString: I just take my eyes away from you for just a second and suddenly the Guild is all grown up.
String: 我才一转眼没注意，公会就成长到这个地步了。

OriginString: I wonder if this is what a mother bird feels when she sees her baby bird fly for the first time.
String: 不知道这是不是母鸟第一次看见雏鸟飞翔时的心情。

OriginString: What do you think about the Divine Messenger herself?
String: 你对圣使本人有什么看法？

OriginString: I think she probably has the worst job in the world.
String: 我觉得她可能是世界上最糟糕的差事了。

OriginString: How so?
String: 怎么说？

OriginString: They say that the gods are like the parents of mankind.
String: 传说诸神就像是人类的父母。

OriginString: Now imagine your parents watching your every move and telling their opinion on everything you do.
String: 想象一下你父母整天盯着你的一举一动，还要对你做的每件事发表意见。

OriginString: ...That does sound hellish...
String: ...听起来确实像地狱...

OriginString: If those priests are actually right with their sermons, then the gods will probably have a lot to nag about.
String: 如果那些祭司的布道是真的，那诸神估计有很多事情要唠叨了。

OriginString: Yes...I remember that day.
String: "是啊...我还记得那天。"

OriginString: I wasn't here exactly when it happened. I arrived in the morning the next day, when it was already over.
String: 事情发生时我并不在现场。我是第二天早上才到的，那时一切都结束了。

OriginString: ...It wasn't a pretty sight.
String: ...那场面并不好看。

OriginString: You know, now that I know that has happened, your suspiciousness has become just more threatening to me.
String: 你知道吗，现在我知道了这件事，你的可疑行为对我来说更具威胁性了。

OriginString: If you think I'm in cahoots with the people who attacked the Guild then you're mistaken.
String: 如果你认为我和袭击公会的人是一伙的，那你就错了。

OriginString: But I know that just saying that probably won't ease your worries.
String: 但我知道光这么说可能无法消除你的疑虑。

OriginString: In that case, if you ever have the slightest doubt about me...
String: 既然如此，如果你对我有丝毫怀疑...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Then you can cut me down right where I stand.
String: <?whiteFlash>那你可以现在就砍了我。

OriginString: ...I have my doubts now.
String: ...我现在确实有疑虑。

OriginString: Then will you kill me now?
String: 那你要现在就杀了我吗？

OriginString: No...
Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢，公会会长。

OriginString: You're quite the mystery to me Me'can. Why would you go so far?
String: 你真是个谜啊梅坎。为什么要做到这种地步？

OriginString: You might not believe me Guild Master, but I have great respect for the Adventurer Guild and I would do anything to help you.
String: 你可能不信，公会会长，但我非常敬重冒险者公会，我愿意做任何事来帮助你们。

OriginString: You mean even giving us a discount on the wares?
String: 你是说甚至给我们商品打折？

OriginString: I think I might have phrased that wrong.
String: 我想我可能表达有误。

OriginString:
I always knew you had in ya to beat the witch and her cult.
But surely it isn't over yet.
String:
"我早就知道你有本事打败那个女巫和她那帮邪教徒。"
"不过这事儿肯定还没完呢。"

OriginString: Why would you think that?
String: 为什么这么说？

OriginString: Well, it would be quite disappointing if it were, wouldn't it? And life isn't as boring as that.
String: 因为如果就这样结束的话，那也太无趣了吧？生活可没这么无聊。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master! How I can be of service?
String: "你好啊公会会长！有什么我能效劳的吗？"

OriginString: So how old are you?
String: 那你多大了？

OriginString: After 2 millennia I stopped counting.
String: 活了两千年后我就懒得数了。

OriginString: What is your real name?
String: 你的真名是什么？

OriginString: It's a word that can not be pronounced in any known language.
String: 这是个任何已知语言都无法发音的词。

OriginString: Are you human?
String: 你是人类吗？

OriginString: If I were, would I be wearing all these clothes that cover up my skin?
String: 如果我是的话，还会穿这种把皮肤裹得严严实实的衣服吗？

OriginString: Was any of that remotely true?
String: 刚才那些话有半句是真的吗？

OriginString: No.
String: 没有。

OriginString: Good Talking to you Guild Master!
String: 和你聊天真愉快，公会会长！

OriginString: As always, it has been a pleasure!
String: "和往常一样，真是愉快啊！"

OriginString: Anything else you'd like to say, Guild Master?
String: 公会会长，还有什么想说的吗？

OriginString: Guild Master! Anything I can Interest in you in?
String: 公会会长！有什么我能为您效劳的吗？

String: Don't translate

OriginString: Anything else I can interest you in?
String: 还有什么我能帮您的吗？
