OriginString:
Hello Guild Master.
I wanted to ask you a favor.
String:
公会会长你好。
我想请你帮个忙。

OriginString: What's the favor?
String: 什么忙？

OriginString: I'm planning on a trip to a grave and because there have been some rumors of bandits, I was hoping that some adventurers could escort me there.
String: 我打算去扫墓，但听说最近有强盗出没，希望能有冒险者护送我过去。

OriginString: A trip to a grave? You mean...
String: 扫墓？你是说...

OriginString:
Yes, Guild Master.
My daughter's grave.
String:
是的，公会会长。
我女儿的墓地。

OriginString:
I understand.
I'll arrange for some adventurers to accompany you.
String:
我明白了。
我会安排冒险者护送你的。

OriginString:
And if it's acceptable, I'd also like to join.
Even though I never had the chance to know her, I'd like to pay my respects.
String:
如果你不介意的话，我也想一起去。
虽然从未有幸认识她，但我想去祭拜一下。

OriginString:
Of course Guild Master.
And thank you!
String:
当然可以，公会会长。
谢谢你！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I-I want to come with you too!
String: <?whiteFlash>我、我也想跟你们一起去！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>N-Nora?!
String: <?shakeScreen>诺...诺拉？！

OriginString: I know you might not want me there, but I would like to visit Mily one last time.
String: 我知道你可能不想让我去，但我想最后去看米莉一次。

OriginString: ...before I leave forever.
String: ...在我永远离开之前。

OriginString: Eden?
String: 伊登？

OriginString:
...Of course. There is nothing wrong with that.
...You can come with us, Nora.
String:
...当然可以。这没什么不妥。
...跟我们一起吧，诺拉。

OriginString: Thank you.
String: 谢谢。

OriginString: It's good to see you, Guild Master.
String: 见到您真好，公会会长。

OriginString:
Hi Eden.
I wanted to see how things are between you and Nora after what happened last time.
String:
"嗨，伊登。"
"我想知道上次那件事之后，你和诺拉之间相处得怎么样了。"

OriginString:
You do not need to worry about it. I meant what I said when I promised to do better. 
I will not try to push her away anymore.
String:
"你不必为此担心。我承诺过会做得更好，这话是认真的。"
"我不会再试图推开她了。"

OriginString: Does that mean...
String: 这是不是说...

OriginString: I've told my acquaintance that Nora will be staying here after all.
String: 我已经告诉那位熟人，诺拉最终会留在这里。

OriginString: I'm glad that things worked out between you two.
String: 很高兴你们之间的问题解决了。

OriginString:
I'm glad too. Although, there is still that awkwardness between us.
I guess years of growing apart aren't filled that easily.
String:
"我也很高兴。不过，我们之间还是有点尴尬。"
"毕竟多年的疏远不是那么容易弥补的。"

OriginString: Today for example, I caught her several times tailing me, as if she wants to say something but is hesitant to do so.
String: 比如今天，我好几次发现她跟着我，好像有话要说却又犹豫不决。

OriginString: Isn't that right, Nora?
String: 对吧，诺拉？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Iieeps! S-sorry Mr. Eden.
String: <?whiteFlash>咿呀！对、对不起伊登先生...

OriginString: I just didn't want to bother you.
String: 我只是不想打扰您。

OriginString:
It's alright. You don't have to worry.
Bother me as much as you like.
String:
"没关系。你不用担心的。"
"想怎么麻烦我都行。"

OriginString: There is something you want to say, isn't there?
String: 你有话想说，对吧？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Y-yes, Mr. Eden!
I-I...wanted to ask you...
String: <?shakeScreen>是、是的，伊登先生！我...我想问您...

OriginString: Come on. Just say it.
String: 说吧。直接说出来。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><speed=1.5>I-I wanted to ask if I could call you Papa!
String: <?shakeScreen><speed=1.5>我、我想问能不能叫您爸爸！

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC>(He fell over.)
String: <?fadeOutNPC>(他晕倒了。)

OriginString:
<speed=1.5><?shakeScreen>I knew it! You hate it! 
<?shakeScreen>It was a stupid idea! I'm sorry!
String:
<speed=1.5><?shakeScreen>我就知道！你讨厌这个！
<?shakeScreen>这主意蠢透了！对不起！

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>No, no, wait! 
I didn't hate it, I...it's just...
String: <?whiteFlash>不不，等等！我不讨厌，只是...我...

OriginString: My heart just skipped a beat because of how precious that was.
String: 因为刚才那一刻太珍贵了，我的心跳都漏了一拍。

OriginString: (No one needs to know mine did too.)
String: (没人需要知道我也心跳加速了。)

OriginString: Does that mean...
String: 那是不是说...

OriginString:
Yes, Nora.
You can call me Papa, if you like.
String:
"好的，诺拉。
如果你愿意，可以叫我爸爸。"

OriginString: Thank you...Papa!
String: 谢谢你...爸爸！

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC>(He fell over again.)
String: <?fadeOutNPC>(他又晕倒了。)

OriginString: Maybe you should ease into it until he's used to it.
String: 也许你该慢慢来，等他适应这个称呼。

OriginString: Y-you're the Guild Master, right?
String: 你...你是公会会长对吧？

OriginString: ...And you are?
M-my name is Misasa and I-I...
String: 我...我叫米莎莎，我...我...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-I'd like to join the Adventurer Guild!
String: <?shakeScreen>我...我想加入冒险者公会！

OriginString: Misasa...Where did I hear that name?
String: 米莎莎...这名字我好像在哪听过？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Wait! Are you that bandit girl the adventurers met at the bandit king's fortress?
String: <?whiteFlash>等等！你是不是强盗王要塞里那些冒险者遇到过的强盗女孩？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Y-Yikes! Y-yes, that's me.
String: <?shakeScreen> 呜...是...是的，就是我。

OriginString: And now you want to be an adventurer? Why?
String: 现在你想当冒险者？为什么？

OriginString: I-I don't have anywhere else to go...
String: 我...我无处可去了...

OriginString:
I'm useless on my own. I-I know nothing. 
I-I'm too afraid to live out there on my own.
String:
"我一个人什么都做不了。我...我什么都不懂。"
"我...我太害怕了，不敢独自在外面生活。"

OriginString: Y-your adventurers were nice enough to let me go...I thought m-maybe this was a good place to join.
String: 你...你们的冒险者们好心放了我...我觉得这里...也许是个可以加入的好地方。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>P-please Guild Master! I know I might not deserve a second chance b-but can you overlook my past and let me join you?
String: <?shakeScreen>求...求你了会长！我知道自己不配得到第二次机会...但能不能不计前嫌让我加入？

OriginString: ...Fine you can join.
String: ...好吧，你可以加入了。

OriginString: It might be better than letting you go and risk having you join another bandit group.
String: 总比放你走然后冒险让你加入其他强盗团伙强。

OriginString: T-thank you, Guild Master! You will not regret it!
String: 谢、谢谢您，公会会长！您一定不会后悔的！

OriginString: You better hope so.
String: 你最好说到做到。

OriginString: I can not let you join. Adventurers need to be able to trust each other.
String: 我不能让你加入。冒险者之间必须互相信任。

OriginString: I can not trust you. Consider yourself lucky enough that we let you go.
String: 我信不过你。能放你走已经算你走运了。

OriginString: Not every bandit is as lucky as you.
String: 不是每个强盗都像你这么幸运。

OriginString: I-I...I understand...
String: 我...我明白了...

OriginString: F-for what it's worth...I'm sorry.
String: 至、至少...我很抱歉。

OriginString: I'm not the one you need to apologize to.
String: 你该道歉的对象不是我。

OriginString: ...<?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>G-Guild Master! 
I-I need to ask you a favor!
String: <?shakeScreen>公...公会会长！我有事想拜托您！

OriginString: Did you get swindled out of your money again?
String: 你又被人骗钱了？

OriginString:
N-No! It's not that!
I-I just heard the Divine Messenger is here in the Guild.
String:
不、不是那样的！
我、我只是听说神使大人来公会了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>C-Could you ask her how to get rid of my Mark?!
String: <?shakeScreen>能...能不能帮我问问她怎么消除我的烙印？！

OriginString: Oh, right...your mark. The one you got, when you were with the Bandit King.
String: 啊对...你的烙印。就是当初跟着强盗王时留下的那个。

OriginString:
I-I'm scared, Guild Master.
Knowing that my soul belongs to demons when I die...
String:
"公、公会会长...我好害怕..."
"想到死后我的灵魂会归恶魔所有..."

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>C-Can you please ask her of a way to get rid of it!? 
<?shakeScreen>I'd do anything! 
Anything!
String: <?shakeScreen>求您帮我问问消除方法吧！<?shakeScreen>我什么都愿意做！真的！

OriginString:
Calm down, Misasa!
I will ask her...for your sake.
String:
冷静点，米萨萨！
为了你...我会去问她的。

OriginString: T-thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢...谢谢您，会长。

OriginString: You wanted to see me?
String: 你找我？

OriginString: That's right, Guild Master. Thank you for coming.
String: 是的会长，感谢您过来。

OriginString: I was hoping I could ask you a...personal favor.
String: 我想向您提个...私人请求。

OriginString: Depends on the favor.
String: 那要看是什么请求了。

OriginString: Then let me start from the beginning.
String: 那就让我从头说起吧。

OriginString: A few days ago, some travellers have been talking about an old wandering Paladin, travelling the roads fighting monsters and bandits alike.
String: 前几天有旅人提起，说看到一位年迈的游侠圣骑士在路上与怪物和强盗战斗。

OriginString: From their description, I think I know that man and I would like you to find him for me.
String: 从描述来看，我可能认识那个人...希望您能帮我找到他。

OriginString: ...Does he owe you money?
String: ...他欠你钱？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>...What? No!
String: <?shakeScreen>...什么？不是！

OriginString: He's an old aquaintance of mine. A good man.
String: 他是我的旧识，是个好人。

OriginString: Maybe too good.
String: 可能好过头了。

OriginString: As long as I've known him, he travelled the lands with the sole purpose of helping people in need.
String: 从我认识他起，他就以帮助困境中的人为唯一目标游走四方。

OriginString: That sounds like a good thing.
String: 听起来是好事啊。

OriginString: It might have been 20 years ago.
String: 要是放在二十年前的话。

OriginString: Now I'm only worried that he might get himself killed one day if he continues like that.
String: 现在我只怕他再这样下去迟早会送命。

OriginString: Honestly he was already at an advanced age when I first met him.
String: 说实话我们初遇时他就已经不年轻了。

OriginString: In the past I've asked him many times if he wouldn't consider to just retire and try to live a peaceful life.
String: 过去我多次劝他退休安享晚年...

OriginString: But that man can be stubborn as a mule.
String: 但那老头犟得像头驴。

OriginString: So, you want me to send some adventurers to find him and persuade him to retire?
String: 所以你想让我派冒险者找到他，劝他退休？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I was actually hoping if we could offer him a place in the Guild as an instructor.
String: <?whiteFlash>其实我希望能在公会给他安排个教官职位。

OriginString: If we can convince him that the Guild is a place that helps people, then he might be persuaded to share his wisdom with adventurers.
String: 如果让他相信公会也是助人之所，或许他会愿意将圣骑士的智慧传授给冒险者们。

OriginString: This would keep the man out of harm's way and the Guild would gain access to the years of experiences of a paladin.
String: 这样既能让他远离危险，公会也能获得圣骑士的毕生经验。

OriginString: I like the sound of that. I'll see what I can do.
String: 这主意不错，我会想办法的。

OriginString: That's all I'm asking. Thank you, Guild Master!
String: 这就是我的请求。谢谢您，会长！

OriginString: *pant*, *pant*
String: *喘气* *喘气*

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>TAKE THIS!
String: <?shakeScreen>接招！

OriginString: *Spit*. <?whiteFlash>You call that a punch, you wuss?
String: *吐口水* <?whiteFlash>这就叫拳头？软脚虾！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>THIS IS A PUNCH!
String: <?shakeScreen>这才叫拳头！

OriginString: Ugh.......*thud*<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 呃啊.......*扑通*<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: She beat another one!
String: 她又干翻一个！

OriginString: That's five consecutive wins! Who is she?
String: 五连胜了！她到底是谁？

OriginString: That's not important! She won again! That means...
String: 这不重要！她又赢了！也就是说...

OriginString: You know the drill, you drunken bastards!
String: 老规矩懂吧，你们这群醉鬼！

OriginString: Another round of beer for everyone and five for me on this loser's tab!
String: 每人再来一轮啤酒，我五轮——记在这个输家账上！

OriginString: Cheers!!!
String: 干杯！！！

OriginString: What is happening here?
String: 这里发生什么事了？

OriginString: We've gotten ourselves a very 'lively' visitor, Guild Master.
String: 公会会长，我们来了位"活力四射"的访客。

OriginString: She appeared this morning and the first thing she asked for was a drink.
String: 她今早出现，第一件事就是要酒喝。

OriginString: But apparently she is travelling without money and couldn't afford to buy a drink.
String: 但显然她身无分文，连杯酒都买不起。

OriginString: So she started challenging people to fist fights and they always make the same bet. If she manages to beat them, they have to pay a round of beer for everyone and...
String: 所以开始找人比拳，赌注都一样：如果她赢了，对方就得请全场喝酒，还有...

OriginString: ...five for her. I heard it. And what's in for them? What do they get when they win?
String: ...她喝五轮。我听说了。那他们赢了能得到什么？

OriginString: Oh, they get nothing. They just want to beat her.
String: 哦，啥也没有。他们就是想揍她。

OriginString: ...What?
Believe me. That girl has a really nasty mouth.
String: 相信我，那姑娘的嘴特别欠。

OriginString: Tavi! Where is the booze? I'm starting to sober up here!
String: 塔薇！酒呢？我都开始清醒了！

OriginString:
Yeah, yeah. 
I'll be right back.
String:
"知道啦知道啦。
我马上回来。"

OriginString: I love you, Tavi!
String: 我爱你塔薇！

OriginString: ...Hmmm...
<?whiteFlash>*touch*
String: <?whiteFlash>*摸*

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-What the hell! Why would you touch me there!
String: <?shakeScreen>见、见鬼！你干嘛摸我那里！

OriginString: I was just curious if you're a guy or a gal.
String: 我就是想确认下你是男是女嘛。

OriginString: Who are you, mysterious being?
String: 你谁啊，神秘人？

OriginString: ...The name is {PROTAGONIST}. I'm the Guild master of the Adventurer Guild.
String: ...我叫{PROTAGONIST}。是冒险者公会的会长。

OriginString: A master? Does that mean you're strong?
String: 会长？那是不是说明你很能打？

OriginString: Not necessarily...
String: 倒也不一定...

OriginString: Booohhh! Boring! I call you master of nothing then!
String: 嘁——！没劲！那我管你叫"啥都不会长"好了！

OriginString: (Now I'm starting to get why people get into fights with her.)
String: (现在我开始明白为什么大家都想揍她了。)

OriginString: ...So, what's your name?
String: ...所以，你叫什么名字？

OriginString: The name's Bai. Master and rightful heir to the martial arts style "Broken Fist".
String: 我叫白。"破拳流"的正统传人兼掌门。

OriginString: Wait, that doesn't sound right. Was it maybe "Breaking Fist"? Nah, still sounds stupid.
String: 等等，这名字不太对。是不是叫"碎拳流"来着？呃，听起来还是蠢爆了。

OriginString: Aren't usually animals in those names? "Tiger Fist", maybe? Ugh, sounds ridiculous. Tigers don't even have fists.
String: 这类流派不是都该用动物命名吗？"虎拳流"怎么样？啧，太蠢了。老虎哪来的拳头。

OriginString: "Fists of the East Star"? "Water Fist"? "Rock Fist"?.....
String: 北斗神拳"？"水形拳"？"岩石拳"？.....

OriginString: Argh...whatever! A martial art named by some stupid ancestor of mine. One, I use to beat the crap out of people.
String: 啊...管他呢！反正就是我某个蠢祖宗起的流派名，专门用来揍人的。

OriginString: From now on, I just call it the "My Fist in your face"-Style!
String: 从今天起，我就叫它"老娘的拳头糊你脸流"！

OriginString: ...At least that name is self-explanatory.
String: ...至少这名字够直白。

OriginString: And what exactly brings you around here?
String: "什么风把你吹到这儿来了？"

OriginString: Just travelling around, trying to find some students.
String: 就是四处游历，想找些徒弟。

OriginString: Students?
String: 徒弟？

OriginString: Yeah, students. My old man kept whining at home how I should go out and spread our martial arts to the world.
String: 对啊，徒弟。我家老爷子整天在家唠叨，说让我出门把咱们的武术发扬光大。

OriginString: Pretty sure it was just a pretense and he just wanted his daughter who was stronger than him out of the house.
String: 我敢打赌他就是找个借口，想把比他强的女儿赶出家门罢了。

OriginString:
That man just can't stand not being on top of the food chain.
How pathetic! Hahahaha!
String:
"那家伙就是受不了自己不是食物链顶端。"
"真可悲！哈哈哈哈！"

OriginString:
Martial arts...huh....
Would you consider teaching it to our adventurers?
String:
"武术啊...嗯...
你愿意教教我们的冒险者们吗？"

OriginString: ...Maybe...if they're strong. I don't like teaching weaklings.
String: ...可能吧...如果他们够强的话。我可不喜欢教弱鸡。

OriginString: Send one of them against me in a fight and I'll judge if they're good enough.
String: 派个人来和我打一场，我来判断他们够不够格。

OriginString: They can use their equipments and magic or whatever and I give myself a handicap.
String: 他们可以用装备和魔法什么的，我会给自己加点限制。

OriginString: If they manage to beat me like that, then I won't mind teaching them.
String: 要是这样还能打赢我，那我教他们也未尝不可。

OriginString: If they don't, then they're free to try as many times as they like. I won't be going anywere for a while.
String: 要是输了，随时欢迎再来挑战。反正我会在这儿待上一阵子。

OriginString: I like the booze here and there are enough chumps to beat the money out of.
String: 我喜欢这儿的酒，而且这儿有的是可以揍出钱来的冤大头。

OriginString: (I better hurry then. Some of those chumps might end up being one of my adventurers.)
String: （我得抓紧了。那些冤大头里说不定就有我的冒险者。）

OriginString: (I'll set up a quest.)
String: （我去发布个任务。）

OriginString: I'm back! Here are all five rounds at once. I thought this might be faster, seeing as how fast you can empty a mug.
String: 我回来啦！一次性带了五轮酒来，看你喝得这么快，觉得这样可能更省时间。

OriginString: You're the best, Tavi!
String: 塔薇你最好了！

OriginString: ...Wait...Five rounds of beer and this is the fifth time...
String: ...等等...五轮啤酒，这已经是第五次了...

OriginString: That liver of hers is the most terrifying thing about her...
String: 她那副肝脏才是她身上最可怕的东西...

OriginString: So, what do you think?
String: 那么，你觉得如何？

OriginString: It was a damn good fight! Your adventurers are tougher than most bastards I beat up. I might wanna get serious next time.
String: 这场架打得真他娘爽！你们公会的冒险者比大多数被我揍的杂碎强多了。下次我可得动真格了。

OriginString: So, does that mean you agree to teach them?
String: 所以你是同意教他们了？

OriginString: You can bet your flat ass, I'm going to teach them.
String: 你这扁屁股尽管放心，我肯定教。

OriginString: I and  "My Fist in Your Face"-Style are at your disposal.
String: 我和我的"铁拳糊脸流"随时听候差遣。

OriginString: I hope you will be paying my drinks from now on.
String: 希望你从今天开始包我的酒钱。

OriginString: ...I'm going to go broke, aren't I?
String: ...我要破产了对吧？

OriginString: Bwahahahaha!
String: 哇哈哈哈！

OriginString: So, what do you think about this piece of ore the adventurers brought back home?
String: 冒险者们带回来的这块矿石，你怎么看？

OriginString: It's... fascinating. I've never seen this type of ore before.
String: 这...太神奇了。我从没见过这种矿石。

OriginString: It looks similar to mithril... but from what I can tell, it might even surpass it in terms of material quality.
String: 看起来像秘银...但就材质而言，可能比秘银更优质。

OriginString: Do you think you can make anything out of it?
String: 你觉得能用它打造什么吗？

OriginString: I might... but I'll need more of it.
String: 或许可以...但需要更多材料。

OriginString: That will most likely be difficult. I don't think these things grow on trees. But I'll tell the adventurers to keep an eye out for more of these.
String: 恐怕不太容易。这玩意儿应该不是遍地都有的。不过我会让冒险者们留意收集更多。

OriginString: I'm kinda excited to see what you might be able to make out of it.
String: 我挺期待你能用它做出什么来。

OriginString: ...I admit that I'm looking forward to the challenge myself.
String: ...老实说我自己也很期待这个挑战。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Nora?
String: <?whiteFlash>...诺拉？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Guild Master!?
String: <?shakeScreen>公会会长！？

OriginString: Is everything alright?
String: 一切还好吗？

OriginString: You seem down...
String: 你看起来情绪低落...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I-I'm fine, Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>我-我没事，公会会长！

OriginString: I-I was just resting here but I probably should get back to doing my duties.
String: 我-我只是在这里休息，不过我现在该回去继续工作了。

OriginString: Have a nice day, Guild Master!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 祝您愉快，公会会长！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (I should talk with Eden.)
String: （我该和伊登谈谈。）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Hello.
String: <?whiteFlash>你好。

OriginString: Oh! Hello Guild Master!
String: 哦！公会会长好！

OriginString: Your name was Nora if I remember correctly.
String: 如果我没记错的话，你叫诺拉对吧。

OriginString:
Yes, Guild Master. That's right. 
I'm Priest Eden's acolyte. I support him with all his tasks.
String:
"是的，公会会长。您说得没错。"
"我是伊登祭司的助手，负责协助他完成所有工作。"

OriginString:
So, what are you doing out here?
It seems like you're waiting for something.
String:
"所以，你在这儿干什么呢？
看起来像是在等什么东西。"

OriginString: A message is supposed to arrive today for Priest Eden from the church. I'm waiting here for the courier to receive it.
String: 今天教堂有封给伊登祭司的信件要送达，我在这里等信使来接收。

OriginString: Really? That's what you're doing? I feel like Eden could do that himself.
String: 真的？就为这个？我觉得伊登可以自己来取吧。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>O-of course not! He's a very busy man! These kind of tasks are perfect for acolytes like me.
String: <?shakeScreen>当-当然不行！他是个大忙人！这种工作正适合我这样的助手来做！

OriginString: But isn't this kind of task rather...dull?
String: 但这种工作不是有点...无聊吗？

OriginString: It doesn't matter! I'm happy to help priest Eden wherever I can.
String: 没关系！只要能帮上伊登祭司的忙，我就很开心。

OriginString: (Well, isn't this adorable.)
String: （呵，真是可爱。）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I got a message here for the Priest.
String: <?whiteFlash>我这里有封给祭司的信

OriginString: Ah! Thank you! I will take it.
String: 啊！谢谢你！我来转交吧

OriginString: Alright! Then with this my task is over. Goodbye!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 太好了！那我的任务就完成了。再见！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
Oh, hello Guild Master! It's good to see you.
Did you need something from me?
String:
"啊，公会会长您好！见到您真高兴。
您找我有事吗？"

OriginString: Hello Eden. No, I was just walking by. But Nora here has something for you.
String: 你好伊登。我只是路过。不过诺拉有东西要给你

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Nora?...
String: <?whiteFlash>...诺拉？...

OriginString: P-Priest Eden! I-I received a message for you! Here!
String: 伊、伊登祭司！我收到给你的信了！给！

OriginString: ...I wasn't expecting a message for today...
String: ...没想到今天会有信来...

OriginString: Nora...did you purposely not tell me about it, so I couldn't receive it myself?
String: 诺拉...你是故意不告诉我，好让我没法亲自收信吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what? N-No. I-I...
String: <?shakeScreen>什、什么？不、不是...

OriginString:
...Yes...I'm sorry.
I-I thought I could do it for you.
String:
...是的...对不起。
我...我以为我能替你做到的。

OriginString:
...It's fine...I'll take it.
Was there anything else Nora?
String:
...没关系...我来处理。
诺拉，还有其他事吗？

OriginString:
N-no...
I'll excuse myself.
String:
不...不用了...
我先告辞了。

OriginString: ...Nora...
<?shakeScreen>Y-yes?
String: <?shakeScreen>在、在呢？

OriginString: You don't have to do this. I don't need your help.
String: 不用这样。我不需要你的帮助

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC>.
String: <?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (She looked like, she was about to cry.)
String: （她看起来快要哭了）

OriginString: ...Eden?
<?whiteFlash> Oh! I apologize Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>啊！抱歉公会会长！

OriginString: It seems like I'm a little bit tired. I hope you don't mind if I excuse myself for today?
String: 我好像有点累了。今天能先告辞吗？

OriginString: Of course not...
String: 当然可以...

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master. <?fadeOutNPC>
String: 谢谢会长。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Hello Guild Master! I wanted to tell you that Zoldak has arrived.
String: "你好啊公会会长！我想告诉你佐尔达克已经到了。"

OriginString: Zoldak?
String: 佐尔达克？

OriginString: The Paladin I've talked to you about. My aquaintance?
String: 就是我跟您提过的那位圣骑士。我的老相识？

OriginString: Oh, the one our adventurers has recently helped out.
String: 噢，就是最近我们冒险者帮忙的那位。

OriginString: That's right Guild Master! And I'm happy to say that he wants to meet you!
String: 没错会长！而且我很高兴地告诉您，他想见您！

OriginString: It seems like he wants to join the Guild. Just like we hoped for.
String: 看起来他想加入公会。就像我们期待的那样。

OriginString: I guess that's good to hear. So, where is he?
String: 这倒是好消息。那么，他人呢？

OriginString: He's there. He's actually coming towards us, right now.
String: 就在那边。实际上他正在朝我们跑来，就现在。

OriginString: Look at the enthusiasm. He is actually sprinting towards us!
String: 看这热情劲儿。他简直是在冲刺啊！

OriginString: He's gaining so much speed that he has to take out his sword.
String: 冲得太快都不得不拔剑了。

OriginString: Wait...that doesn't make any sense...
String: 等等...这不太对劲...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Die, Demon!
String: <?whiteFlash>受死吧，恶魔！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what the hell?
String: <?shakeScreen>搞...搞什么鬼？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I will cast you back into the depths of hell!
String: <?shakeScreen>我要把你打回地狱深渊！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Be careful where you swing that sword!
String: <?shakeScreen>注意你挥剑的方向！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Zoldak! What are you doing?
String: <?shakeScreen>佐尔达克！你在干什么？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What does it look like I'm doing? I'm banishing a demon!
String: <?shakeScreen>这还用问？我在驱魔！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>The Guild Master isn't a demon!
String: <?shakeScreen>公会会长不是恶魔！

OriginString: Don't be deceived, boy! Look at that creature!
String: 别被蒙蔽了，小子！看看那个生物！

OriginString: It's apparent that this is some kind of androgynous succubus!
String: 很明显这是某种雌雄同体的魅魔！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Look at it! You can't tell what is what!
String: <?shakeScreen>好好看看！根本分不清公母！

OriginString: Now take this! HOLY SMITE!
String: 接招吧！神圣惩戒！

OriginString: W-WAIT!!!
<?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>ZOLDAK!!!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>佐尔达克！！！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (After a while.)
String: （过了一会儿。）

OriginString: I'm truly ashamed of myself, Guild Master.
String: 公会会长，我真是羞愧难当。

OriginString: (That took so much effort to explain.)
String: （解释这些可费了我好大功夫。）

OriginString: I'm very sorry about this, Guild Master. Sometimes Zoldak can be quite overzealous.
String: 非常抱歉会长，佐尔达克有时候就是太过热情了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I will accept any punishment you might deem necessary!
String: <?shakeScreen>我甘愿接受您认为必要的任何惩罚！

OriginString: It's fine!
String: 没事的！

OriginString: You're far too kind, Guild Master. Very well! I will forego food and drinks for the next two days.
String: 您实在太仁慈了会长。那好！接下来两天我会禁食禁水。

OriginString: ...Please don't...
How about you tell the Guild Master, why you're here Zoldak.
String: 不如说说你此行的目的吧，佐尔达克。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Ah that's right!
String: <?shakeScreen>啊对！

OriginString: I wish to join the Adventurers Guild as an instructor!
String: 我想以教官的身份加入冒险者公会！

OriginString: I was moved by the actions of your adventurers, who risked their lives to eradicate the evil, that was plaguing a village.
String: 贵公会的冒险者们舍命铲除危害村庄的邪恶势力，这让我深受感动。

OriginString: I'm convinced that by joining the Adventurers Guild I can raise a new generation of Paladins, that will join in our unending war against evil!
String: 我相信通过加入冒险者公会，可以培养出新一代圣骑士，共同参与对抗邪恶的永恒之战！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We will raise an army of Paladins! An unending tide that will block the sun! Enough to invade even hell itself!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们要组建圣骑士大军！遮天蔽日的铁骑！连地狱都要踏平！

OriginString: ...I'll just pretend you just said something completely reasonable in the end and welcome you to the Guild, Zoldak.
String: ...我就当你最后说了些合情合理的话吧。欢迎加入公会，佐尔达克。

OriginString: Thank you very much, Guild Master!
String: 万分感谢，公会会长！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>!!!

OriginString: (What the...?)
<?whiteFlash>Ouch! Careful Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>哎哟！公会会长你看着点啊！

OriginString: You should really watch where you're going, Guild Master!
String: 公会会长你真该注意看路！

OriginString: Eden? What were you doing crawling on the ground?
String: 伊登？你趴在地上干什么？

OriginString: I was looking for my pendant.
String: 我在找我的吊坠。

OriginString: I think I lost it here somewhere but I have a hard time looking for it.
String: 应该就掉在这附近，但我实在找不着。

OriginString: My eyes aren't what they used to be.
String: 我这双眼睛不比当年了。

OriginString: Is that why you're squinting half the time?
String: 所以你才总眯着眼睛？

OriginString: I am?
String: 我有吗？

OriginString: I thought you knew.
String: 我以为你知道。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No, of course not!
String: <?shakeScreen>当然不知道啊！

OriginString: Why didn't anyone tell me?
String: 怎么没人告诉我？

OriginString: I guess we all just thought that it was just part of your character.
String: 大家可能觉得这就是你的特色吧。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>How is that part of my character?
String: <?shakeScreen>这算什么特色啊？

OriginString: ...I have no answer for that.
String: ...我无言以对。

OriginString: *Sighs* Anyway,...can you help me look for my pendant? I'm confident that it's around here somewhere.
String: *叹气* 总之...能帮我找找吊坠吗？肯定就在这附近。

OriginString: Sure.
String: 好啊。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
I think I found it, Eden!
String: 我想我找到了，伊甸！

OriginString: Great! Thanks, Guild Master! Can you bring it to me?
String: 太好了！谢谢你，公会会长！能把它拿给我吗？

OriginString: Sure.
String: 当然。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>(A picture of a girl...)
String: <?whiteFlash>（一张女孩的照片...）

OriginString: (She looks awfully similiar to Nora.)
String: （她看起来和诺拉出奇地相似。）

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢你，公会会长。

OriginString: No problem, Eden.
String: 不用谢，伊登。

OriginString: ...About the girl in the picture...
String: ...关于照片里的那个女孩...

OriginString: ...You saw it, huh?
String: ...你看到了啊？

OriginString: I didn't mean to pry.
String: 我不是有意打探的。

OriginString: No, it's alright. I don't mind telling you.
String: 不，没关系。告诉你也无妨。

OriginString: The girl in the picture is my daughter.
String: 照片里的女孩是我女儿。

OriginString: She...passed away a long time ago.
String: 她...很久以前就去世了。

OriginString: ...I'm sorry about that.
String: ...对此我很遗憾。

OriginString:
...
It's alright.
String: 没关系。

OriginString: I like to believe she is in a better place now.
String: 我宁愿相信她现在在更好的地方。

OriginString: I...I only wished I had more time with her.
String: 我...只是希望能多陪陪她。

OriginString: Have you heard of the rise in banditry?
String: 你听说强盗活动增加的事了吗？

OriginString: I did. More often than not, some travellers who arrived at the Guild injured by bandit attacks have been brought to us.
String: 听说了。最近经常有被强盗袭击受伤的旅人被送来公会。

OriginString: It's rather worrisome how seemingly common being attacked by bandits has become.
String: 强盗袭击变得如此频繁，实在令人担忧。

OriginString: I hope we are just experiencing an unusual situation and things will eventually go back to normal.
String: 希望这只是暂时现象，情况最终会恢复正常。

OriginString: Although in normal times, there were still a lot of banditry.
String: 虽然平常时候强盗也不少。

OriginString: A rather sad thought, isn't it?
String: 这种想法挺可悲的，不是吗？

OriginString: I dread the time that will come now with the existence of a bandit king. Bandits have always been a source of suffering for the people but I'm afraid with a bandit king it could become much worse.
String: "想到强盗王的出现，我就感到恐惧。强盗向来是百姓苦难的根源，但有了强盗王，恐怕情况会变得更加糟糕。"

OriginString: It might be not for long. I heard they're raising an army to deal with him.
String: 这局面或许不会持续太久。听说他们正在组建讨伐部队。

OriginString: Then I pray that they'll be successful.
String: 那我祈祷他们能成功。

OriginString: The Divine Messenger is maybe the most important figure in the Church of the Divines.
String: 神圣使者可能是圣灵教会中最重要的人物。

OriginString: It was the right decision for you to oblige her.
String: 你选择服从她是正确的决定。

OriginString: Although, after hearing what has happened, I'm not necessarily happy about it.
String: 不过在了解事情经过后，我并不为此感到欣慰。

OriginString: I understand, Guild Master. The way the Divine Messenger has handled the situation, has left much to be desired.
String: 我理解您的感受，公会会长。神圣使者处理此事的方式确实欠妥。

OriginString: Do you think the gods just used us?
String: 你觉得神明只是在利用我们吗？

OriginString: Our branch of the church follows the teaching of Ghanenta. He has taught us to show compassion to those around us.
String: 我们教派遵循加南塔的教义。他教导我们要对周遭心怀慈悲。

OriginString: I believe if anyone had objections to the way the Guild was treated, it would have been him.
String: 我相信如果有人反对公会所受的对待，那一定会是他。

OriginString: I wish I had your faith.
String: 真希望我能有你这样的信仰。

OriginString: It was the worst night of the Adventurer Guild.
String: "那是冒险者公会最黑暗的一夜。"

OriginString: Who would have thought that the people closest to us would betray us like that.
String: 谁能想到最亲近的人会这样背叛我们。

OriginString: I was praying in the temple when it started. Suddenly, the air was filled with the sound of battle, mixed with screams of wounded people.
String: 事发时我正在神殿祈祷。突然间，空气中充斥着打斗声和伤者的惨叫。

OriginString: When I went outside, people were already fighting with each other.
String: 等我出去时，人们已经互相厮杀起来了。

OriginString: Many times  I've seen adventurers argue and fight with each over trivial matters but I knew this was different.
String: 我见过很多次冒险者为琐事争吵打斗，但这次明显不同。

OriginString: We started to fortify the temple against attackers and carried wounded people inside to heal them. We didn't care which side they belonged to.
String: 我们开始加固神殿防御，把伤员抬进来治疗。不管他们属于哪一方。

OriginString: The only thing that mattered that night was to save as many lives as possible.
String: 那晚唯一重要的就是尽可能多救人。

OriginString: But...there were so many we couldn't save.
String: 但是...有太多人我们救不了。

OriginString: The attackers used some sort of curse on their weapons. Making it impossible to use healing magic to stabilize the wounded.
String: 袭击者在武器上施加了某种诅咒，使治愈魔法无法稳定伤势。

OriginString: So many lives slipped through my fingers that night.
String: 那晚有太多生命从我指缝中溜走。

OriginString: When the night was finally over we had lost more adventurers in one night than all the years of the Guild combined.
String: 当黎明终于到来时，我们一夜损失的人手比公会历年累计的还要多。

OriginString: I wonder for what reasons the gods had us imprison the witch. Usually, they're not that...involved.
String: 我在想神明为何要我们囚禁那个女巫。通常他们不会这么...亲自插手。

OriginString: Do you have any inkling why?
String: 你想到什么原因了吗？

OriginString: I'm not the Divine Messenger, so I would be even less qualified to make a guess on their intentions but...I can only imagine something big is happening.
String: 我并非神谕使者，更没资格揣测神意...但恐怕有大事要发生。

OriginString: I don't like the sound of that...
String: 这种预感可不妙...

OriginString: How long have you been part of the Adventurers Guild now?
String: "你在冒险者公会待了多久了？"

OriginString: I'd say about 8 years now.
String: 大概有八年了吧。

OriginString: Why did you join?
String: 当初为什么加入？

OriginString: Because I believe in the good the Adventurer Guild can do.
String: 因为我坚信冒险者公会能行善事。

OriginString: What a strange thing to say about adventurers.
String: 这种说法对冒险者来说可有点奇怪。

OriginString: I used to feel the same. But I still remember the day the former Guild Master came to us and asked for our help.
String: 我以前也这么想。但我永远记得那天，前任会长来请求我们协助的情形。

OriginString: Adventurers never had a good reputation in the church. They were only known as people who'd do anything for money and sometimes were as big of a problem as bandits and monsters.
String: 在教会里，冒险者向来名声不佳。他们被认为是唯利是图的人，有时造成的麻烦甚至不亚于强盗和魔物。

OriginString: But the former Guild Master seemed different. He told us about his Adventurer Guild. How he wanted it to be something that could help people.
String: 但前任会长与众不同。他向我们讲述了他理想中的冒险者公会——一个能真正帮助人们的组织。

OriginString: He believed that the Guild could provide help to the common people in a time where more and more people resort to banditry and monsters roam unhindered into human territory.
String: 他相信在这个盗匪横行、魔物肆虐的年代，公会能为平民百姓提供庇护。

OriginString: He also believed that the Guild could also provide a chance for adventurers to be more than what they were currently known for.
String: 他更相信公会能让冒险者们超越世人眼中的形象。

OriginString: Honestly to us it sounded more like he wanted to create a Guild for heroes.
String: 说实话，当时我们觉得他更像是在筹建一个英雄公会。

OriginString: It sounded so unbelievable and many at that time had their doubts.
String: 这听起来太不真实，当时很多人都心存疑虑。

OriginString: But not me.
String: 但我不这么想。

OriginString: I don't know what it was but what he said resonated with me that day and I volunteered to join the Adventurer Guild as representative.
String: 说不清为什么，那天他的话深深打动了我。于是我自愿作为代表加入了冒险者公会。

OriginString: Unfortunately, not many of my brothers and sisters followed me. They doubt that a Guild of adventurers could ever do any good.
String: 遗憾的是，我的同袍们大多没有跟随。他们不相信一群冒险者能做出什么善举。

OriginString: Seeing the State of the current Guild maybe the doubters were right.
String: 看看公会现在的状况，也许怀疑者们是对的。

OriginString: I disagree Guild Master.
String: 我不同意，会长大人。

OriginString: Maybe the Guild has declined but remember that before that it has done what it has promised to do.
String: 公会或许衰落了，但别忘了它曾经兑现过的承诺。

OriginString: In these eight years I have seen adventurers do more good and protect more lives than anyone would have expected from them.
String: 这八年来，我亲眼见证冒险者们创造的善举、拯救的生命，远超世人预期。

OriginString: Eden. There is something I need to talk with you about.
String: 伊登，有件事要和你谈谈。

OriginString: I'm here to listen Guild Master.
String: 我洗耳恭听，会长。

OriginString: (After a short explanation.)
String: （简短解释后。）

OriginString: What happened to the girl is a tragedy.
String: 那个女孩的遭遇真是场悲剧。

OriginString: Losing one's family...
String: 失去家人...

OriginString: That's why I wanted to know if there is anything you can do for her.
String: 所以我想知道你们能为她做些什么。

OriginString: Or specifically what the church of Ghanenta can do for her.
String: 或者说加南塔教会能为她提供什么帮助。

OriginString: I heard that they more often than not, help people who lost their livelihoods or families.
String: 我听说你们经常帮助那些失去生计或家人的人。

OriginString: That's certainly true. Ghanenta has taught us that we have to offer a helping hand to those in need. If she wishes so, we can take her in and help her start a new life somewhere peaceful.
String: 确实如此。加南塔教导我们要向需要帮助的人伸出援手。如果她愿意，我们可以收留她，帮助她在安宁的地方开始新生活。

OriginString: I see. That's good to know.
String: 明白了。这是个好消息。

OriginString: (I should talk to the merchant's daughter about this. She should still be in the tavern.)
String: （我该和那个商人的女儿谈谈这事。她应该还在酒馆里。）

OriginString: How can I help, Guild Master?
String: "有什么我能帮忙的吗，公会会长？"

OriginString: I just saw Nora outside.
String: 我刚才在外面看到诺拉了。

OriginString: She seemed...down. Do you know why?
String: 她看起来...情绪很低落。你知道原因吗？

OriginString: ...I asked her to become an acolyte for an aquaintance of mine. A priestess in Ravenreach.
String: ...我邀请她成为我一位熟人的见习祭司。是渡鸦港的一位女祭司。

OriginString: She will have a spot open in a few months and I thought that Nora would fit well with her.
String: 她几个月后会空出一个职位，我觉得诺拉很适合那个位置。

OriginString: Ravenreach? That's pretty far away from here.
String: 渡鸦港？离这儿可够远的。

OriginString:
...
That's the intention.
String: 这就是我的本意。

OriginString: That sounds like you want to send her away.
String: 听起来你是在刻意把她送走。

OriginString: The priestess in Ravenreach is a kind person. She'll take good care of Nora.
String: 渡鸦港那位女祭司人很好。她会照顾好诺拉的。

OriginString: ...In my presence she will just continue to suffer.
String: ...如果继续留在我身边，她只会不断痛苦下去。

OriginString: ...Alright, that's it!  I've tried to stay out of your personal affairs, but I have to ask now.
String: ...够了！我本来不想干涉你们的私事，但现在我必须要问清楚。

OriginString: What happened between you two? Why are you treating her so coldly?
String: 你们之间到底发生了什么？为什么你要对她这么冷淡？

OriginString: How about we continue this conversation somewhere else?
String: 我们换个地方继续谈如何？

OriginString: Why are we sitting in the confession booth?
String: "我们干嘛要坐在忏悔室里？"

OriginString: It just felt appropriate.
String: 感觉这样比较合适。

OriginString: ...It started about 8 years ago, just shortly after I joined the Adventurer Guild.
String: ...事情要从8年前说起，就在我刚加入冒险者公会不久。

OriginString: Some adventurers returned with a little girl, they found on their Quest.
String: 一些冒险者在任务中带回了一个小女孩。

OriginString: That was the first time I met Nora.
String: 那是我第一次遇见诺拉。

OriginString: She was in shock, barely responsive, having lost her parents in a monster attack. She would have perished too if not for the adventurers.
String: 她因目睹父母被怪物袭击而精神恍惚，要不是被冒险者发现，她也活不下来。

OriginString: Fran, the former Guild Master, thought it was best to send her to an orphanage but decided to let her stay with the Guild for a while until she felt better.
String: 前任会长弗兰本想送她去孤儿院，但决定先让她在公会住段时间恢复情绪。

OriginString: ...I volunteered to take care of her since I was already raising a daughter of my own within the Guild, and I thought it would provide the best environment for her.
String: ...我主动提出照顾她，因为那时我正好也在公会里抚养自己的女儿，觉得这样对她最好。

OriginString: Your daughter was also at the Guild?
String: 你女儿也在公会？

OriginString: Yes.
String: 对。

OriginString: And her mother?
String: 那她母亲呢？

OriginString: Long gone...
String: 早就不在了...

OriginString: Nora started to live with us. She was initially quiet, hardly responding to anything.
String: 诺拉开始和我们同住。起初她很沉默，几乎不回应任何人。

OriginString: If it had been just me, I don't know if she would have ever smiled again.
String: 如果只有我一个人的话，她可能永远都不会再笑了。

OriginString: But my daughter, Mily, she spoke to Nora every day.
String: 但我女儿米莉每天都陪诺拉说话。

OriginString: Maybe it was because they were about the same age, but slowly, Nora started opening up to her.
String: 也许因为年龄相仿，诺拉渐渐对她敞开心扉。

OriginString: It didn't take long for her to act and laugh like a child should.
String: 没过多久，她就开始像普通孩子那样说笑玩闹了。

OriginString: ...A wonderful few years passed, where we spent our time together like a family. Very often their laughter would fill the temple and it was like I had two daughters.
String: ...那几年很美好，我们就像一家人。两个孩子的笑声常常充满神殿，让我觉得自己有了两个女儿。

OriginString: No one even thought about sending her to an orphanage anymore.
String: 再没人提送她去孤儿院的事了。

OriginString: ...What happened then?
String: ...后来发生了什么？

OriginString: ...One day both of them sneaked out of the Adventurer Guild.  When we realized they disappeared we frantically tried to search for them.
String: ...有一天她们偷溜出了冒险者公会。等我们发现时，发疯似地四处寻找。

OriginString: I eventually found Nora, standing close to a cliff, staring blankly into the chasm.
String: 最后我在悬崖边找到了诺拉，她呆望着深渊。

OriginString: I pulled her away and asked her where Mily was.
String: 我把她拽回来，问她米莉在哪。

OriginString: ...She broke in tears, saying that it was all her fault.
String: ...她突然崩溃大哭，说都是她的错。

OriginString: Saying that it was her idea to sneak out of the Guild.
String: 说是她提议偷溜出公会的。

OriginString: Saying that she only wanted to collect flowers as a present for me.
String: 说只是想采些花给我当礼物。

OriginString: ...I asked her again where my daughter was, knowing full well the answer that was awaiting me.
String: ...我再次追问女儿的下落，其实心里早已知道答案。

OriginString: In tears she pointed at the chasm in front of us...
String: 她哭着指向我们面前的深渊...

OriginString: ...It took days until we finally found her body.
String: ...我们花了几天时间才找到遗体。

OriginString: ...Did you know that Nora is dying her hair? Green isn't her natural hair color.
String: ......你知道吗，诺拉其实在染发？绿色可不是她天生的发色。

OriginString: She became my acolyte, a position that my daughter aspired to be, and tried to support me in any way she could.
String: 她成为我的助手，这个位置本是我女儿梦寐以求的，她竭尽所能地支持着我。

OriginString: ...I believe she is trying to become the daughter I lost as penance.
String: ...我想她是想成为我失去的那个女儿，以此来赎罪。

OriginString: I tried telling her that I don't blame her but I think I hurt her just more with my words.
String: 我试着告诉她我并不怪她，但我的话似乎只是让她更受伤了。

OriginString: ...They weren't true, after all.
String: ...毕竟那些话并非真心。

OriginString: ...So, I stopped saying it.
String: ...所以，我不再提起。

OriginString: Guild Master...Can I confess my sin to you?
String: 公会会长...我能向你忏悔我的罪过吗？

OriginString: ...What is it, Eden?
String: ...说吧，伊登。

OriginString: ...My sin is that I'm unable to forgive an innocent girl who never meant any harm.
String: ...我的罪过是，我无法原谅一个从未想过伤害任何人的无辜女孩。

OriginString: That I let her quietly suffer for three years without saying anything.
String: 我让她默默承受了三年的痛苦，却始终一言不发。

OriginString: That the best I can do is to send her away so I stop tormenting her.
String: 而我能做的最好的事，就是把她送走，停止对她的折磨。

OriginString: ...Do you think my sin can be forgiven?
String: ...你觉得我的罪过能被宽恕吗？

OriginString: ...Neither do I.
String: ...我也不认为。

OriginString: Then you're much kinder than I could ever be.
String: 那你可比我要善良多了。

OriginString: So about your acolyte Nora.
String: 关于你的助手诺拉...

OriginString: ...What about her?
String: ...她怎么了？

OriginString: I was just wondering what kind of relationship you two have.
String: 我只是好奇你们之间的关系。

OriginString: It seemed like she really holds you in high regard.
String: 她似乎对你非常敬重。

OriginString: She is my acolyte in name only. Nothing more, nothing less.
String: 她只是名义上的助手。仅此而已。

OriginString: A position I didn't want her to have in the first place.
String: 这个位置我一开始就不想给她。

OriginString: Then why let her become your acolyte?
String: 那为什么还让她当你的助手？

OriginString: ...I didn't have the heart to refuse her...
String: ...我狠不下心拒绝她...

OriginString: What do you me...
String: 你是说...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Guild Master.
String: <?whiteFlash>公会会长。

OriginString:
Please, could you let it rest?
I...I do not want to talk about it.
String:
"求你了，能不能别提这事了？
我...我不想谈这个。"

OriginString: ...I understand. I won't pry any further.
String: ...我明白了。不再多问。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢你，公会会长。

OriginString: So, how are things, 'Papa'?
String: "那么，情况如何啊，'老爹'？"

OriginString: Please, don't make fun of me, Guild Master. I can't help how I react to it.
String: 请别取笑我了，公会会长。我就是控制不住自己的反应。

OriginString: You have no idea how it is to hear those words again after so many years.
String: 你根本不知道时隔多年再次听到这个称呼是什么感受。

OriginString: But you're happy to hear them, aren't you?
String: 但你还是挺开心的，不是吗？

OriginString:
I can't deny that.
I don't really deserve it after how I treated her all these years.
String:
我无法否认这一点。
这些年我那样对她，确实不配得到这些。

OriginString: But I will try my best to earn it.
String: 但我会努力让自己配得上。

OriginString: Maybe I should buy her a small doll as a present.
String: 或许我该给她买个娃娃当礼物。

OriginString: ...I think she might be too old for that.
String: ...我觉得她可能已经过了玩娃娃的年纪了。

OriginString: Really? But she is still so little.
String: 真的吗？可她明明还那么小。

OriginString: She is old enough that some of the younger adventurers are already showing interest in her.
String: 她已经到了会让年轻冒险者们心动的年纪了。

OriginString:
Oh...do they? Could you tell me their names?
I'd be happy to learn more about them...
String:
哦...是吗？能告诉我他们的名字吗？
我很乐意多了解他们一些...

OriginString: (Oh crap. He went full daddy-mode.)
String: (糟了。他完全进入老爸模式了。)

OriginString: May Ghanenta bless you, Guild Master.
String: 愿加南塔保佑你，公会会长。

OriginString: How else can I help?
String: 我还能帮上什么忙吗？

OriginString: Don't translate.
String: Don't translate.

OriginString: Don't translate.
String: Don't translate.

OriginString: Don't translate.
String: Don't translate.

OriginString: Don't translate.
String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

OriginString: Don't translate.
String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

String: Don't translate.

OriginString: Anything else I can help you with?
String: 还有什么我能帮你的吗？

OriginString: How can I be of service, Guild Master?
String: 有什么我能效劳的吗，公会会长？

OriginString: Don't translate.
String: Don't translate.
