OriginString: Y-you used to be an adventurer before, right Guild Master?
String: "公、公会会长...您以前也是个冒险者对吧？"

OriginString: That's right.
String: 没错。

OriginString: H-Have you ever fought bandits before?
String: 那、那你和强盗战斗过吗？

OriginString: More often than not.
String: 家常便饭。

OriginString: People usually assume that fighting monsters is harder than bandits but that's not always the case.
String: 人们总觉得打怪物比打强盗难，但事实并非总是如此。

OriginString: Sometimes humans can be a lot scarier than monsters.
String: 有时候人类比怪物可怕多了。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>A-a bandit King?
Shouldn't we do something?
String: <?shakeScreen>强、强盗王？我们是不是该做点什么？

OriginString: We're already doing something. We take care of the Quests, where bandits might cause trouble.
String: 已经在做了。我们会处理那些可能有强盗出没的委托。

OriginString: I-I mean s-shouldn't we send some adventurers to defeat the bandit king?
String: 我、我是说...要不要派些冒险者去讨伐强盗王？

OriginString: I think there are better people out there that can do that instead of us. For example, house Greyhorn is already preparing to take care of it.
String: 我觉得有别的人更适合处理这事。比如灰角家族已经在着手解决了。

OriginString: I see...Hopefully, they'll be successful.
String: 这样啊...希望他们能成功。

OriginString:
It'll be fine.
...Surely.
String:
会没事的。
...肯定会的。

OriginString: T-The Divine Messenger is returning?
String: "神、神使大人要回来了？"

OriginString: I-I see...
String: 我、我知道了...

OriginString: You don't seem very happy about that.
String: 你看起来不怎么高兴啊。

OriginString: ...I'm scared of what might happen....
String: ...我只是害怕会发生什么不好的事...

OriginString: Last time things didn't go well....
String: 上次的事情就没能好好收场...

OriginString: That night I was still awake. I watched Mr. Eden pray and was worried that he might stay up all night.
String: 那天晚上我还没睡着。我看着伊登先生祈祷，担心他会整晚不睡。

OriginString: And out of nowhere suddenly people could be heard fighting. Mr. Eden went outside to see what happened and returned with a grim expression on his face.
String: 突然不知从哪里传来打斗声。伊登先生出去查看情况，回来时脸色很难看。

OriginString: He woke everybody in the temple and together we barricaded most of the entrances to the temple. Mr. Eden told everyone to stay inside until the situtation outside has resolved.
String: 他叫醒神殿里的所有人，我们一起封住了大部分入口。伊登先生让大家待在室内，直到外面事态平息。

OriginString: But...despite what he told everyone else, he himself went outside and carried back any wounded he could find.
String: 但是...尽管他这么告诫别人，自己却一次次出去把能找到的伤员都背回来。

OriginString: H-he tried to save as many as he could. He looked so desperate at that time...
String: 他、他拼命想救更多人。那时候他的表情那么绝望...

OriginString: ...and I felt so useless.
String: ...而我觉得自己真没用。

OriginString: I could do nothing for anyone.
String: 我谁都帮不上。

OriginString: We buried so many people the next day...
String: 第二天我们埋葬了好多人...

OriginString: I don't understand why anyone would become the servant of the demon lords.
String: "我真不明白怎么会有人愿意给恶魔领主当走狗。"

OriginString: Why did she kill all those people?
String: 她为什么要杀害那么多人？

OriginString: That's what I intend to find out.
String: 这正是我要查清楚的事。

OriginString: So, what exactly is your relationship with Eden?
String: 那么，你和伊登究竟是什么关系？

OriginString:
You seem...very fond of him.
(Do I need to worry here?)
String:
"你看起来...很喜欢他啊。"
(我该不会要担心什么吧？)

OriginString: ...After I lost my parents and was brought to the Guild, it was actually Mr. Eden who started to take care of me.
String: ...在我失去双亲被带到公会时，其实是伊登先生开始照顾我的。

OriginString: He's like a father to me. He was always so kind to me. He never even yelled at me when I misbehaved.
String: 他就像父亲一样。总是对我那么温柔。就算我调皮捣蛋也从不对我发脾气。

OriginString: All I remember is his smile,  him patting my head and telling me that everything is going to be alright...
String: 我只记得他的笑容，他轻拍我的头告诉我一切都会好起来的...

OriginString: ...And then I guess something happened between you two.
String: ...看来后来你们之间发生了什么事。

OriginString: (Looking at her, it seems like she doesn't want to continue. I should leave it at that.)
String: (看她的样子似乎不想继续这个话题。我该适可而止了。)

OriginString: So, how did you come to join the Adventurer Guild?
String: "那么，你是怎么加入冒险者公会的？"

OriginString: Did the church send you to become Eden's acolyte?
String: 是教会派你来当伊登的助祭吗？

OriginString: N-no. I...I actually only became part of the church when I decided to become Mr. Eden's acolyte.
String: 不、不是的。我...我其实是在决定成为伊登先生的助祭后才加入教会的。

OriginString: Before that...I was just an orphan.
String: 在那之前...我只是个孤儿。

OriginString: I lost my parents when I was still a little child. I...I don't remember much, but we were attacked by monsters when we were travelling.
String: 我很小的时候父母就不在了。我...我记不太清了，只记得我们旅行时遭遇了怪物袭击。

OriginString: ...How did you survive?
String: ...那你是怎么活下来的？

OriginString: ...Some adventurers appeared and killed the monsters. They saved me...but my parents weren't as lucky.
String: ...当时出现了一些冒险者，他们消灭了怪物。我被救了...但我的父母没那么幸运。

OriginString: ...I'm sorry to hear that.
String: ...听到这个我很难过。

OriginString: I-it's fine, Guild Master. It happened a long time ago. I'm sure my parents are in a better place now.
String: 没、没事的公会会长，都是很久以前的事了。我相信父母现在一定在更好的地方。

OriginString: After what happened the adventurers took me with them. It turned out they were adventurers from the Adventurer Guild.
String: 事发后那些冒险者收留了我。后来才知道他们就是冒险者公会的成员。

OriginString: It was since then that I started living here.
String: 从那时起我就一直住在这里了。

OriginString: It was also the time when Mr. Eden joined the Adventurer Guild...
String: 也正是在那个时候，伊登先生加入了冒险者公会...

OriginString: So, how are things between you and Eden?
String: 你和伊登现在相处得怎么样？

OriginString: It's great! We're nearly as close as we used to be!
String: 特别好！我们几乎恢复到从前那么亲密了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We even eat at the same table again!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们甚至又开始同桌吃饭了！

OriginString: That really means a lot to you, doesn't it?
String: 这对你来说真的很重要，对吧？

OriginString: I was always worried that I might have completely destroyed my relationship with Papa.
String: 我一直担心自己可能彻底毁掉了和爸爸的关系。

OriginString: When we sat together as a family—Mily, Papa, and me—it was one of my happiest memories.
String: 当我们一家三口——米莉、爸爸和我——坐在一起吃饭时，那是我最幸福的回忆之一。

OriginString: I-I just wanted to have a slice of that back.
String: 我...我只是想重新找回一点那样的时光。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I-Is everything alright, Guild Master?
String: <?whiteFlash>会、会长您没事吧？

OriginString: I...just had something in my eyes.
String: 我...只是眼睛进了点东西。

OriginString: G-Ghanenta bless you, Guild Master!
String: "加-加南塔保佑您，公会会长！"

OriginString: H-Hello Guild Master! You wanted to talk to me?
String: 您、您好公会会长！您找我有事吗？

OriginString: A-anything else I can do for you?
String: 还、还有什么我能为您效劳的吗？

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST}.
String: {PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString:
Fiola.
You look more uptight than usual. How come?
String:
"菲奥拉。"
"你看起来比平时更紧张。怎么回事？"

OriginString:
Spare me your humor!
We have more important matters!
String:
"省省你的幽默感吧！
我们有更重要的事要处理！"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>We received an urgent Quest from a nearby village!
String: <?whiteFlash>我们收到了附近村庄的紧急委托！

OriginString: ...How urgent?
String: ...有多紧急？

OriginString: They're in danger of getting raided by bandits.
String: 他们随时可能遭到强盗袭击。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>！！！

OriginString: They say that bandits showed up and declared that the Bandit King is demanding a tribute from them.
String: 据说强盗出现并宣布强盗王要向他们征收贡品。

OriginString: (A Bandit King? I guess we got our reason why the bandits have been acting up lately.)
String: (强盗王？看来这就是最近强盗们猖獗的原因了。)

OriginString: They were ready to pay the bandits whatever they wanted......but instead of money they wanted half their people.
String: 村民们本打算满足强盗的任何要求...但他们要的不是钱，而是要村里一半的人口。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>They wanted actual people?
String: <?whiteFlash>他们要活人？

OriginString: Yes.
String: 是的。

OriginString: ...For what purpose?
String: ...目的是什么？

OriginString: I don't know but the bandits threatened to destroy the village if they don't have the people ready the next time they return.
String: 不清楚，但强盗威胁说如果下次来的时候没准备好这些人，就摧毁村庄。

OriginString: Of course the villagers do not want to meet their demands and are desperate. They asked us to protect them.
String: 村民们当然不愿答应这种要求，现在走投无路了。他们请求我们保护。

OriginString: What about  the local lord? Shouldn't he be protecting them?
String: 当地的领主呢？他不是应该保护村民吗？

OriginString: I heard house Greyhorn is preparing a subjugation force against the bandits.
String: 听说灰角家族正在组建讨伐强盗的部队。

OriginString: But they won't spare any men for the protection of the village.
String: 但他们不会分派人手保护村庄。

OriginString: ...The bandits will probably come in great number, I...I'm not sure if our adventurers are at the level where they could handle that.
String: ...这次强盗可能会大规模来袭，我...我不确定我们的冒险者是否有能力应对。

OriginString: You're the Guild Master. What shall we do?
String: 你是公会会长。我们该怎么办？

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>We accept the Quest.
String: ...<?whiteFlash>我们接受这个任务。

OriginString: This is actually an opportunity for us. Lately our name hasn't been spreading as much with the usual Quests we're getting.
String: "这其实是个好机会。最近接的那些普通任务都没怎么打响我们公会的名号。"

OriginString: But saving a village could really help us spread our fame.
String: 但拯救村庄能让我们声名远扬。

OriginString: If we fail, then it might be really the end of us.
String: 如果失败，我们就真的完蛋了。

OriginString: I never said it wasn't a gamble. But without any risks, we won't achieve anything.
String: 我说过这不是赌博吗？但不冒险就永远不会有收获。

OriginString:
And besides...
I don't think Fran would be very happy if we just turn our back on the villagers.
String:
而且...
我觉得如果我们对村民们见死不救，弗兰肯定会很不高兴的。

OriginString: I put up the Quest. Send the adventurers whenever you think they're ready.
String: 我已经发布任务了。你觉得冒险者们准备好就派他们出发吧。

OriginString: Good. You found a group that is willing to work with you. Congratulations!
String: 很好。你找到愿意合作的团队了。恭喜！

OriginString: It's much easier than having to deal with you. So what's next?
String: 比应付你轻松多了。接下来呢？

OriginString: Now that we have the adventurers, we should be able to do Quests again.
String: 现在有了冒险者，我们又能执行任务了。

OriginString: But before we send the adventurers on their first Quest for the Adventurer Guild, we should make some preparations.
String: 不过在派冒险者执行公会的首个任务前，我们得做些准备。

OriginString: Usually, the Guild provides the adventurers with items for their adventures. A few potions, bandages, antidotes and etc.
String: 通常公会会为冒险者提供冒险物资。比如药水、绷带、解毒剂等等。

OriginString: Unfortunately, the Guild currently has nothing in their inventory.
String: 可惜现在公会仓库里什么库存都没有。

OriginString: And where do we get more?
String: 那我们去哪里搞物资？

OriginString: We still have a merchant here, who is selling us his supplies. But he is a bit...
String: 这儿还有个商人愿意卖给我们补给品。不过他有点...

OriginString: ...well it doesn't matter. You'll see for yourself.
String: ...算了不重要。你马上就能见识到了。

OriginString: (...I don't like how that sounds.)
String: (...这语气让我有不祥的预感。)

OriginString: Well, I guess it's time for you to meet Me'can.
String: 好吧，是时候去见见梅肯了。

OriginString: Now we should have everything ready for the adventurers to start their first official quest for the Adventurer Guild.
String: "现在我们应该已经准备好一切，让冒险者们可以开始为冒险者公会执行他们的第一个正式任务了。"

OriginString: For now the Quests we get, aren't much.
String: 目前我们能接到的任务还不多。

OriginString: But hopefully, when our reputation starts to get better there will be more and better paying quests available.
String: 但等公会声望提升后，希望能有更多报酬丰厚的任务。

OriginString: From here on out, the future of the Adventurer Guild is in your hands.
String: 从此刻起，冒险者公会的未来就交到你们手上了。

OriginString: Don't screw this up!
String: 别搞砸了！

OriginString: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen>Guild Master!
String: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen>公会会长！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Ah shit!
String: <?shakeScreen>见鬼！

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>Don't just appear out of nowhere! I nearly had an heart attack!
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>别突然冒出来！我心脏病都快吓出来了！

OriginString: I'm sorry Guild Master, but I need to talk with you.
String: 抱歉会长，但我必须和您谈谈。

OriginString: It's important...
String: 很重要的事...

OriginString: ...Alright. I have time. What do you need to talk about?
String: ...行吧。我有空。你要说什么？

OriginString: Not here. It isn't safe. Let's change location!
String: 这里不安全。我们换个地方！

OriginString: Here! Wear this blindfold.
String: 给！把这个眼罩戴上。

OriginString: ...Is this really necessary?
String: ...真有这个必要？

OriginString: If you do not want to wake up with your throat slit open one day, then yes. It's necessary.
String: 如果您不想某天醒来发现自己喉咙被割开的话，是的，非常必要。

OriginString: *sigh*. Fine...
...Are we there yet?
String: ...我们到了没？

OriginString: A little while longer.
String: 再坚持一会儿。

OriginString: Do we really need to crawl here or are you just trying to throw me off?
String: 我们非得这么爬着走吗？还是说你在故意绕晕我？

OriginString: Maybe.
String: 也许吧。

OriginString: We're here.
String: 到了。

OriginString: This place is completely dark...
String: 这地方黑得伸手不见五指...

OriginString: That's on purpose.
String: 故意的。

OriginString: So, I'm not even allowed to know what the place, where we're talking, looks like?
String: 所以我连谈话地点长什么样都没资格知道？

OriginString: A place, I like to add, I have no idea how to get to.
String: 补充一句，这地方我压根不知道怎么再来。

OriginString: Believe me. It's safer this way, Guild Master!
String: 相信我，这样更安全，公会会长！

OriginString: Fine, I'll take your word for that.
String: 好吧，我就信你一回。

OriginString: So, what is it that you wanted to talk with me about?
String: 那么，你找我到底要谈什么？

OriginString: ...This is hard for me to ask of you...
String: ...这事我实在难以启齿...

OriginString: ...But I need your help.
String: ...但我需要你的帮助。

OriginString: ...For what?
String: ...什么事？

OriginString: ...A friend of mine...is being pursued by "them".
String: ...我有个朋友...正在被"他们"追杀。

OriginString: ...I don't know how this has happened. I tried to leave no connections to her but somehow "they" still found out.
String: ...我不知道怎么会这样。明明切断了所有联系，可"他们"还是发现了。

OriginString: Knowing you it's hard to imagine that you let something slip by.
String: 以你的作风居然会出纰漏，真难以想象。

OriginString: ...In the end it doesn't matter how. All I know is that my friend needs my help and I have to go.
String: ...现在追究这个没意义。重要的是我朋友需要帮助，我必须去。

OriginString: My friend has gone into hiding and "they" were able to locate two possible hideouts where she might be.
String: 她躲起来了，"他们"锁定了两个可能的藏身处。

OriginString: This is where I need your help. I need some adventurers to check one of the locations while I check the other.
String: 所以需要你帮忙。派些冒险者查一个地点，我去另一个。

OriginString: We need to get there before "they" and bring my friend to safety.
String: 必须赶在"他们"之前找到我朋友。

OriginString: I know it's a lot to ask for and I'd rather not get you involved against a powerful enemy but...
String: 我知道这要求很过分，本不该把你们卷进来对抗强敌...

OriginString: Powerful enemy?
String: 强敌？

OriginString: As if I could get scared of something you refuse to talk about.
String: 你连说都不敢说的事情，怎么可能吓到我？

OriginString:
All I heard is that your friend needs help against some people who want to harm them. 
Sounds like a normal Quest to me.
String:
"我只听说你的朋友需要帮助对抗一些想伤害他们的人。  
听起来就是个普通的任务嘛。"

OriginString: Guild Master...
String: 公会会长...

OriginString: I'll put up a Quest on the board and we'll get to it as soon as possible.
String: 我会在公告板上发布任务，尽快处理。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master!
String: 谢谢您，公会会长！

OriginString: Now...
String: 那么...

OriginString: How do I get back?
String: 我怎么回去？

OriginString: Oh right, the blindfold.
String: 哦对，眼罩。

OriginString: Damn it! Now, we're getting attacked by wild monsters!
String: 该死！现在连野外怪物都来袭击我们了！

OriginString: Beware of that dire wolf. It's a quick fellow and I reckon that at your level you will have a hard time hitting it.
String: 小心那只恐狼。它动作很快，以你们现在的等级很难打中。

OriginString: Do you have any tips?
String: 有什么建议吗？

OriginString:
I do! 
<?whiteFlash>Believe in yourself!
String:
"我当然信！"
<?whiteFlash>要相信自己啊！

OriginString: ...Any other tips?
String: ...还有其他建议吗？

OriginString: I'm being serious. I've seen you fight! You're all stronger than you think you are!
String: 我是认真的。我见过你们战斗！你们都比自己想象的要强！

OriginString: R-really?
String: 真...真的吗？

OriginString:
Yes! I've hardly seen anyone as talented as you lot!
Now go out there! I'm sure you'll be able to defeat those monsters!
String:
"没错！我很少见到像你们这么有天赋的家伙！"
"现在出发吧！我相信你们一定能干掉那些怪物！"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Y-yes, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>是...是的，公会会长！

OriginString: We will not disappoint you!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 我们不会让您失望的！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (...They really bought that? This whole Guild Master thing is going to be much easier than I thought.)
String: (...他们真信了？这个公会会长当起来比我想象的容易多了。)

OriginString:
Hey! 
You!
String:
"喂！ 
说你呢！"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>?
String: <?whiteFlash>?

OriginString: Aren't you the girl from that expedition?
String: 你不是上次探险队里那个女孩吗？

OriginString: Yeah, yeah, whatev'!
String: 对对对，少废话！

OriginString: You're the boss around here, aren't ya?
String: 你就是这儿的头儿对吧？

OriginString: ...Yeah.
String: ...没错

OriginString: So, how much does being an adventurer here pay?
String: 那在这儿当冒险者能赚多少？

OriginString: ...Fairly.
String: ...还行

OriginString: (I said fairly, didn't I?)
String: (我不是说了"还行"吗？)

OriginString: Well, that has to do for now...
String: 哼，暂时凑合吧...

OriginString: I'm currently looking for a new job since...
String: 我正在找新工作因为...

OriginString: ...my last jerk of a boss, couldn't take some ***** teasing.
String: ...我上个混蛋老板连开玩笑都受不了

OriginString: How about it? Want to have a kick-ass priestess in your team?
String: 怎么样？想不想队里多个超赞的祭司？

OriginString: I'm the best at keeping people alive and also pretty good at ***** people up when they're down.
String: 我最擅长保住人命，顺便也很会在别人倒下时*****他们

OriginString: Especially, when they're down...fu,fu,fu.
String: 特别是当他们倒下的时候...呵，呵呵

OriginString: Sure. Why not? We could always use a healer in our midst.
String: 好啊。为何不呢？我们正缺治疗者

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>**** yeah!
String: <?shakeScreen>****爽爆！

OriginString: <size=10>Now how do I get the most money out of the boss....
String: <size=10>现在该想想怎么从老板这儿榨最多钱了...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...What was that?
String: <?whiteFlash>...你说什么？

OriginString: Uhh...I just said how happy I am to be here.
String: 呃...我说很高兴加入这里

OriginString: We're currently not looking for more adventurers. Sorry.
String: 我们目前不需要更多的冒险者。抱歉。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> ****!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen> 靠！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <speed=4><?shakeScreen>What kind of **** up world do we live in that you can't get employed if you want to. It's all the king's fault! ****! If I could I would **** him up and **** until he...*rambling*...*rambling*....like a little girl! And then....
String: <speed=4><?shakeScreen>这他妈什么狗屁世界？想找工作都不行！都是国王的错！操！要是我能的话，我要把他揍得...*碎碎念*...*碎碎念*...像个娘们儿似的！然后...

OriginString: <speed=4><?shakeScreen>And all those wimpy bosses! I can talk how the **** I want! Stop being wusses! I'm doing my job, aren't I? But nooooo! Apparently that's not enough! You'd be all ****** dead without me! *Keeps on ranting*
String: <speed=4><?shakeScreen>还有那些怂包老板！老娘爱怎么说就怎么说！别他妈那么玻璃心！我活儿干得不差吧？但偏～偏～不行！这还不够！没我你们早他妈完蛋了！*继续咆哮*

OriginString: (I can still hear her from all the way here...)
String: （隔着这么远还能听到她的声音...）

OriginString: Good. I have better things to do anyway.
String: 很好。反正我有更重要的事要做。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master.
String: 你好，工会会长。

OriginString: What else?
String: 还有什么事吗？

OriginString: Hmmm...<?whiteFlash>!?
String: 嗯...<?whiteFlash>！？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I will go and there is nothing that you can say to stop me!
String: <?shakeScreen>我非去不可！你说什么也拦不住我！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Be reasonable, Zoldak! You're just walking towards your death!
String: <?shakeScreen>清醒点，佐尔达克！你这是去送死！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And I told you, boy, that I don't care!
String: <?shakeScreen>我再说一遍，小子，老子不在乎！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>The people around you care!
String: <?shakeScreen>可关心你的人在乎！

OriginString: What's going on here?
String: 出什么事了？

OriginString: Oh, Guild Master! Good thing you've come!
String: 啊，公会会长！您来得正好！

OriginString: Please help me stop this maniac from killing himself!
String: 快帮我阻止这个疯子去送死！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>An Opening!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?whiteFlash>破绽！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Stop him, Guild Master! You can't let him get away!
String: <?shakeScreen>拦住他，公会会长！不能让他跑了！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>W-what? What's happening? I-I..uh...
String: <?whiteFlash>什...什么情况？我...呃...

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC><?whiteFlash>*Grabs*<?shakeScreen>...
String: <?fadeOutNPC><?whiteFlash>*抓住*<?shakeScreen>...

OriginString: (...I tried to grab Zoldak...but accidentally pushed him instead.)
String: （...我本想抓住佐尔达克...却不小心推了他一把）

OriginString:
Zoldak? 
Is everything, alright?
String:
佐尔达克？
你还好吗？

OriginString: ...Y-you're not dead, are you?
String: ...你-你没死吧？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>WHAT HAVE I DONE?
<?shakeScreen>I PUSHED AN ELDERLY PERSON TO HIS DEATH!
String: <?shakeScreen>我都干了什么？

OriginString: <?WhiteFlash>Wait, Guild Master! Look!
String: <?WhiteFlash>等等，公会会长！快看！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>He is trying to crawl away! Get him!
String: <?shakeScreen>他想爬走！抓住他！

OriginString: I...will not be stopped...by mere broken bones...
String: 我...绝不会被...区区骨折...拦住...

OriginString: (After I helped Eden carry Zoldak to a bed.)
String: （在帮助伊登把佐尔达克搬到床上之后）

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master. Luckily, he hasn't hurt himself too much. At least nothing I can't take care of.
String: 谢谢你，公会会长。幸好他伤得不重，至少还在我能处理的范围内。

OriginString: Gods, that man was even more agitated than usual. He nearly bit me!
String: 天啊，那家伙比平时还要激动，差点咬到我！

OriginString: What happened for him to...act even crazier than usual?
String: 到底发生什么了让他...比平时更疯癫？

OriginString: ...It has something to do with the message I received from the church just recently.
String: ...最近从教会收到的一条消息。

OriginString: What kind of message?
String: 什么消息？

OriginString: They asked me to relay the message that they want to initiate a quest with the Adventurer Guild.
String: 他们让我转告想和冒险者公会发起一项委托。

OriginString: Are you familiar with the necromancer named Edmund Galthagin?
String: 你听说过一个叫埃德蒙·加尔萨金的死灵法师吗？

OriginString: I hope that I recall wrong, but isn't that the necromancer who has actually achieved lichdom?
String: 希望我记错了...但那个不是已经转化为巫妖的死灵法师吗？

OriginString:
The very one. 
For decades the church has been trying to hunt him down and exterminate him, but unfortunately, every attempt was in vain.
String:
"正是此人。
几十年来教会一直在试图追捕并消灭他，但遗憾的是，每次尝试都以失败告终。"

OriginString: We could only watch helplessly as he continued causing death and destruction, devouring souls to sustain his form.
String: 我们只能眼睁睁看着他继续制造死亡与破坏，靠吞噬灵魂维持形态。

OriginString: Just recently, the church has discovered his latest hideout in an old fortress. This time they want to enlist the Adventurer Guild, hoping for a better chance of success.
String: 最近教会在古堡发现了他的新据点，这次想联合冒险者公会提高胜算。

OriginString: Zoldak, the fool, immediately decided that he had to confront the lich all on his own.
String: 佐尔达克那个蠢货立刻决定要独自去讨伐巫妖。

OriginString: I see. I guess this does sound like something that would upset Zoldak, but usually he would leave it to us.
String: 明白了。这确实像会激怒佐尔达克的事，但他通常都会交给我们处理。

OriginString: ... I think this might be more personal. I already told you that the church tried to exterminate the lich several times, didn't I?
String: ...我觉得这次可能涉及私人恩怨。我提过教会曾多次讨伐巫妖吧？

OriginString:
...Zoldak was sent on one of those times. 
He and several other paladins were sent to go after Edmund, but in the end only Zoldak returned.
String:
...佐尔达克就是其中一次被派去的人。
他和其他几位圣骑士一起奉命追捕埃德蒙，但最后只有佐尔达克活着回来了。

OriginString: Survivor's guilt?
String: 幸存者内疚？

OriginString: I fear so.
String: 恐怕是的。

OriginString: ... I do not wish to pressure you or the adventurers, Guild Master. The Lich is a fearsome monster, which not even the church was able to defeat.
String: ...我不想给公会或冒险者们压力。巫妖是连教会都无法战胜的可怕怪物。

OriginString: However, I fear that as long as the Lich is out there, Zoldak will continue to try to confront the Lich himself.
String: 但我担心只要巫妖还存在，佐尔达克就会不断尝试亲自去面对他。

OriginString: We'll take care of it. I promise.
String: 我们会处理的。我保证。

OriginString:
Thank you, Guild Master. 
Meanwhile, I'll be taking care of Zoldak.
String:
"多谢了，公会会长。"
"至于佐尔达克那边，就交给我来处理吧。"

OriginString: M-Mr. Eden! Zoldak has freed himself of the restraints!
String: 伊、伊登先生！佐尔达克挣脱了束缚！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No mere restraints will be able to contain my righteous fury!
String: <?shakeScreen>区区枷锁岂能禁锢我的正义之怒！

OriginString: *Sighs*...
Hi, Barret.
String: 嗨，巴雷特。

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master.
String: 你好，公会长。

OriginString: You wanted to talk to me?
String: 你找我有事？

OriginString:
No.
But someone else.
String:
不。
但另有其人。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Guild Master! You have to see this!
String: <?shakeScreen>公会会长！你快看这个！

OriginString: ...oh. It's you.
String: ...哦，是你啊。

OriginString: Watch my blade, Guild Master! Do you notice something different about it?
String: 看我的剑刃，公会会长！发现什么不同了吗？

OriginString: It looks...sharper?
String: 看起来...更锋利了？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's right! Master Smith has improved me! I'm a much deadlier weapon now! And furthermore, I can do this now!
String: <?shakeScreen>没错！铁匠大师强化了我！现在的我可是更致命的武器！而且我还能做到这个！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Uhhhhhhnnnnn...!
String: <?shakeScreen>呃啊啊啊...！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash> Did you just wiggle?
String: <?whiteFlash>你刚才是不是扭了一下？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Perfect observation, Guild Master! I have gained the ability to move my body ever so slightly!
String: <?shakeScreen>完美的观察力，公会会长！我现在能稍微移动身体了！

OriginString: ...How did you do that?
String: ...你怎么做到的？

OriginString: It wasn't me.
String: 不是我干的。

OriginString: I'm good. Not that good.
String: 还行吧。 但也没那么厉害。

OriginString: Maybe it's because when my blade gets improved, I'll also grow with it?
String: 可能是因为剑刃被强化时，我也会跟着成长？

OriginString: Hmmm...you mean you could gain even more abilities when we upgrade you more?
String: 嗯...你是说继续强化你就能获得更多能力？

OriginString: That seems to be the case! And there is also something else!
String: 看来是这样！而且还有别的发现！

OriginString: There is even more to this?
String: 还有更劲爆的？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Yes! I started to remember my past!
String: <?shakeScreen>对！我开始恢复记忆了！

OriginString: Really? What did you remember?
String: 真的？想起什么了？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I remember that I've been stuck on that rock for more than 20 years!
String: <?shakeScreen>我记得在那块石头上卡了二十多年！

OriginString: ...That's horrible...Why do you sound excited?
String: ...真惨...你怎么还这么兴奋？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Don't you see, Guild Master? That means there is a possibility to find out about my past as long as we keep upgrading me!
String: <?shakeScreen>还没明白吗会长？只要继续强化我，就有机会找回过去的记忆！

OriginString: I didn't know you were that eager to know your past.
String: 没想到你这么渴望知道过去。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Who wouldn't want to know about their past? Maybe I used to be some knight and some evil wizard turned me into a sword. Maybe I have a family? Maybe they're even still alive?
String: <?shakeScreen>谁不想知道自己的过去？说不定我曾是个骑士，被邪恶巫师变成了剑。也许我有家人？他们可能还活着？

OriginString: Are you sure you want to know that? It could make your current predicament seem worse.
String: 你确定想知道？真相可能让现状更糟。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Hah! You're asking the man who wouldn't break even knowing that he has been stuck on a boring rock for twenty years!
...Or maybe I'm a woman? I never considered that possibility.
String: <?shakeScreen>哈！你是在问一个知道自己被卡在无聊石头上二十年都没崩溃的人！

OriginString:
Why wouldn't I? Is that an indication that I'm a man? Or maybe I'm a woman who identifies himself as a man?
There are so many possibilities!
String:
"为什么不呢？这是在暗示我是个男人吗？或者也许我是个自认为是男人的女人？
可能性多着呢！"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Guild Master! You have to help me regain my memories! I'm too excited to know!
String: <?shakeScreen>公会会长！你必须帮我恢复记忆！我等不及要知道真相了！

OriginString: I guess we can do that, when we got the materials.
String: 等材料齐了可以试试。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Marvelous!
String: <?shakeScreen>太棒了！

OriginString: (I really hope you won't regret it.)
String: (希望你以后别后悔。)

OriginString: ...Hello Guild Master.
String: ...会长好。

OriginString: ...Ferdinand wants to talk with you.
String: ...费迪南德找你。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>GUILD MASTER! I've remembered more of my past!
String: <?shakeScreen>会长！我又想起更多过去了！

OriginString: Oh...great! What did you remember?
String: 哦...太好了！想起什么了？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I think I remembered how I got stuck in the rock.
String: <?whiteFlash>好像记起是怎么卡在石头里的了。

OriginString: I...I think someone put me there.
String: 我...我觉得是被人放进去的。

OriginString: Do you know who?
String: 知道是谁吗？

OriginString: No...Maybe if I get improved more, I'll remember...
String: 不...继续强化的话可能会想起来...

OriginString: <?shakeScreenWeak>Guild Master! I...I want to meet that person.
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>会长！我...我想见那个人。

OriginString: I may not remember now but...I feel like they're important somehow.
String: 现在虽然想不起来...但感觉他们很重要。

OriginString:
I see.
Well, there is no point in searching for a person we don't know, so let's talk again when you remember who it was.
String:
我明白了。
既然连要找的人是谁都不知道，那搜寻也没意义。等你想起来是谁后，我们再来谈吧。

OriginString: Y-yes! Of course, Guild Master! You're right....
String: 好-好的！会长说得对....

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Do you have any new abilities, you want to show off?
String: <?whiteFlash>...有什么新能力要展示吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Marvel at this, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>看好了会长！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I can change the shape of my blade now! Hahahaha!
String: <?shakeScreen>我现在能改变剑刃形状了！哈哈哈！

OriginString: You called, Barret?
String: 你叫我吗，巴雷特？

OriginString: Yes, Guild Master. It's about Ferdinand.
String: 是的，公会会长。是关于费迪南德的事。

OriginString: He's been acting strange ever since I upgraded him.
String: 自从我升级他之后，他的行为就很奇怪。

OriginString: Strange how?
String: 怎么个奇怪法？

OriginString: He hasn't spoken a word since.
String: 从那以后他就再没说过一句话。

OriginString: That is worrying for a blabbermouth like him. I'll talk to him.
String: 对一个话痨来说这确实令人担忧。我去和他谈谈。

OriginString: Hey, Ferdinand! Is there something new you want to show me?
String: 嘿，费迪南德！有什么新东西要给我看吗？

OriginString: Is something wrong? Speak to me, Ferdinand.
String: 出什么问题了吗？跟我说说话，费迪南德。

OriginString: <?shakeScreeen>(Wait...don't tell me he turned into an ordinary sword and I'm talking to thin air right now.)
String: <?shakeScreeen>（等等...该不会他变回普通剑了，我正在对空气说话吧。）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Oh! Guild Master! I-I didn't realize you were here!
String: <?whiteFlash>...啊！公会会长！我、我没注意到您在这里！

OriginString: Phew! You had me worried there. I thought something might have happened to you.
String: 呼！你可吓到我了。我还以为你出了什么事。

OriginString:
Oh, no! There is no need to fret about me, Guild Master.
...I was just contemplating something...
String:
"噢，不！您不必为我担心，公会会长。
...我只是在思考一些事情..."

OriginString: What were you thinking about?
String: 你在想什么？

OriginString: ...Guild Master...I remember now. I remember who put me out there... His name was Zephyrion!
String: ...公会会长...我想起来了。我记得是谁把我放在那里的...他的名字是泽菲里昂！

OriginString: Zephyrion, huh... What else do you remember about him?
String: 泽菲里昂，嗯...你还记得关于他的其他事情吗？

OriginString:
...It's still foggy. I remember the name, but everything else about the man eludes me.
I can't even remember his face...
String:
...记忆还是很模糊。我记得那个名字，但关于那个人的其他一切我都想不起来了。
甚至连他的脸都记不清...

OriginString: And you still want to meet him?
String: 而你还是想见他？

OriginString:
...I...
<?whiteFlash>Yes, Guild Master. I still want to meet him.
String:
...我...
<?whiteFlash>是的，公会会长。我依然想见他。

OriginString:
It won't be easy to find a man with only a name. At least the name is unusual enough that there can't be too many people with it.
Maybe I could ask some adventurers to try and find him.
String:
"光靠一个名字想找到人可不容易。不过至少这名字够特别，应该不会有太多重名的。"
"或许我可以让几个冒险者试着去找找他。"

OriginString: ...Thank you, Guild Master
String: ...谢谢您，公会会长

OriginString: Don't mention it. I'm also a bit curious about the man who is connected to you.
String: 不用谢。我也对那个与你有关联的人有点好奇。

OriginString: Still, you have my gratitude.
String: 尽管如此，我还是很感激您。

OriginString: ...Don't you have anything else to tell me?
String: ...你没有其他事情要告诉我了吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Oh right! My new ability!
String: <?shakeScreen>哦对了！我的新能力！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And Guild Master, have you found Zephyrion?
String: <?shakeScreen>公会长，你找到泽菲里昂了吗？

OriginString:
...
It might be better if you lower your expectations, Ferdinand.
String: "费迪南德，你最好别抱太大期望。"

OriginString: W-what do you mean?
String: 你...你这话是什么意思？

OriginString: ...The adventurers have been searching far and wide for someone named Zephyrion, and they've only uncovered one lead to a man with that name.
String: ...冒险者们四处搜寻一个叫泽菲里昂的人，但只找到一条关于这个名字的线索。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-It has to be him! Where is he?
String: <?shakeScreen>肯-肯定是他！他在哪？

OriginString:
You need to calmly listen to what I'm saying...
...He might already be dead.
String:
"你得冷静听我说..."
"...他可能已经死了。"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-What?!
String: <?shakeScreen>什...什么？！

OriginString: It seems like your Zephyrion is an adventurer and has made the mistake of joining a coalition of adventurers who attempted to take on Vorathax The Terror together.
String: 你的泽菲里安似乎是个冒险者，错误地加入了一支试图共同讨伐「恐怖者」沃拉萨斯的冒险者联盟。

OriginString: Vorathax the...Terror?
String: 「恐怖者」...沃拉萨斯？

OriginString: You don't know him? There are few who haven't heard the name. Vorathax is a giant red dragon, perhaps one of the most dangerous dragons known.
String: 你没听说过他？世上少有人不知这个名字。沃拉萨斯是头巨型红龙，可能是已知最危险的巨龙之一。

OriginString: There have been numerous attempts to slay him – knights, adventurers, even armies of soldiers – but Vorathax has annihilated them all. Only fools or those with a death wish would try to challenge him now.
String: 曾有无数讨伐他的尝试——骑士、冒险者、甚至整支军队——但沃拉萨斯全数歼灭了他们。如今只有疯子或求死之人才会挑战他。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-we need to save him, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>我-我们必须救他，公会会长！

OriginString: I don't think there's much hope left. It would be a miracle if he was still alive.
String: 我认为希望渺茫。他若还活着就是奇迹了。

OriginString: B-but, but...
It's better if you forget about him.
String: 你最好忘了他。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>But I can't!
He's the one who created me!
String: <?shakeScreen>但我做不到！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString:
I-I'm sorry for not telling you this before, but I think he's the one who created me.
No...I'm sure of it.
String:
"对-对不起之前没告诉你...但我觉得他就是创造我的人。"
"不...我敢肯定就是他。"

OriginString:
I know that I used to be an ordinary sword and someone named Zephyrion gave me life. 
I might not remember any details...but I know that's the truth.
String:
"我知道自己曾经只是把普通的剑，是一个叫泽菲里昂的人赋予了我生命。
虽然记不清具体细节...但这就是真相。"

OriginString:
Guild Master...I know this is shameless, but I beg of you! 
Please save him!
String:
"公会会长...我知道这很无耻，但我求求您了！"
"请救救他吧！"

OriginString:
I have nothing to offer you, nor do I have any power to influence you in any way
...but even so...please...save him!
String:
"我没有什么能给你的，也没有任何能力左右你的决定"
"...但即便如此...求求你...救救他！"

OriginString:
*sighs*...What are you talking about? You've given us plenty already.
You're a powerful weapon on our side and you should be more confident about it.
String:
*叹气*...你到底在说什么？你已经给了我们很多了。
你对我们来说是一个强大的武器，你应该更自信一点。

OriginString:
...
...I can't promise you that we'll find him alive.
String:
...
...我不能保证我们能找到活着的他。

OriginString:
...Thank you, Guild Master! 
If there's even the smallest chance, then that's good enough for me.
String:
...谢谢您，公会会长！
哪怕只有一丝希望，对我来说也足够了。

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master.
String: 你好，公会长。

OriginString: Let me start by thanking you and your adventurers for saving my life. I don't know how much longer I could have survived like that.
String: 首先请允许我感谢你和你的冒险者们救了我的命。我不知道自己那样还能撑多久。

OriginString: It was only a matter of time before either my body would have succumbed or Vorathax got bored of watching me die.
String: 我的身体迟早会垮掉，要么就是沃拉萨斯看腻了我慢慢死去的样子。

OriginString: Hm...you're younger than I imagined.
String: 嗯...你比我想象中年轻。

OriginString: Uh...Excuse me?
String: 呃...你说什么？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Sorry! Just thinking out loud.
String: <?whiteFlash>抱歉！我自言自语而已。

OriginString: Okay... Anyway, I heard from your adventurers that you wanted to meet me.
String: 好吧...总之，我听你的冒险者说你想见我。

OriginString: Not me. But this guy here.
String: 不是我。是这位。
由于您提供的原文部分缺失（"..."），我无法完成具体翻译。如果您能提供完整的对话原文，我将严格按照您的要求进行专业游戏本地化翻译。

OriginString:
A...sword? 
Is this a joke I'm not getting?
String:
"一...把剑？
这是什么我不懂的玩笑吗？"

OriginString: ...Guild Master. It's not him.
String: ...公会会长。不是他。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Ahhh! It's talking!
String: <?shakeScreen>啊啊啊！它会说话！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>You can't be serious, Ferdinand... 
We did all that and it turned out to be the wrong guy?
String: <?shakeScreen>你不是认真的吧，费迪南德...

OriginString:
...Wait...Ferdinand? I think I'm recalling something.
<?shakeScreen>Wait! Are you by chance that magic sword that once belonged to my great-grandfather?
String:
...等等...费迪南德？我好像想起什么了。
<?shakeScreen>等等！你该不会是我曾祖父当年用过的那把魔剑吧？

OriginString: Y-Your great-grandfather?
String: 你...你的曾祖父？

OriginString:
Yes! I was named after him and I recall people saying that he had a unique sword he called Ferdinand!
 I did think that name was weird but now it makes a bit more sense.
String:
"没错！我就是以他命名的，我记得人们说他有一把独特的剑，叫它费迪南德！"
"我之前还觉得这名字挺怪的，但现在好像说得通了。"

OriginString: And your great-grandfather...is he...
String: 那你的曾祖父...他...

OriginString: I've never met him so I don't know what happened to him but realistically with how much time has passed, he has most likely died of old age by now.
String: 我从没见过他，所以不知道他后来怎样了。但按时间推算，他应该已经寿终正寝了。

OriginString: ...Oh...I see.

...So, the one who created you is already gone.
Sorry that you couldn't meet him.
String:
"...所以，创造你的人已经不在了。
很遗憾你没能见到他。"

OriginString: It's alright...I...
String: 没关系...我...

OriginString: ...No, it's true that I'm disappointed...
String: ...不，我确实很失望...

OriginString: I wanted to remember more of my past...but the one person tied to me is no longer there.
String: 我本想找回更多过去的记忆...但与我羁绊的那个人已经不在了。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Guild Master! I need to be improved even more!
I can feel it! One more upgrade and I'll remember everything!
String: <?shakeScreen>公会会长！我还需要继续强化！我能感觉到！只要再升级一次，我就能想起所有事情！

OriginString: Is it still possible, Barret?
String: 还有可能吗，巴雷特？

OriginString:
...Usually, I'd say no.
Ferdinand has already been enhanced with obsidian, and there is hardly any material in the world that could be considered better.
String:
"...通常来说我会拒绝。
费迪南德已经用黑曜石强化过了，世上几乎找不到比这更好的材料了。"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>However, with the scale of Vorathax, it might just be possible.
String: <?whiteFlash>不过，如果用沃拉塔克斯的龙鳞，或许还有一线希望。

OriginString: Please, Guild Master! Let us finally put an end to this story!
String: 求你了，公会会长！让我们给这个故事画上句号吧！

OriginString: ... And how do you feel, Ferdinand?
String: ...费迪南德，你现在感觉如何？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Are you crying?
(How is that even possible?)
String: <?shakeScreen>你在哭吗？

OriginString:
... I was so afraid, Guild Master...
The more I learned about myself, the more I was afraid to learn the truth...
String:
"...我好害怕，公会会长..."
"越是了解自己，我就越害怕知道真相..."

OriginString: Why was I left on that rock? When I vaguely remembered that it was my creator...no, my father, who left me there... I was scared that I was hated.
String: 为什么要把我留在那块岩石上？当我模糊记起是我的创造者...不，是我的父亲把我留在那里时...我好怕自己是被憎恨的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>But that wasn't the case...that wasn't the case at all!
String: <?shakeScreen>但事实并非如此...完全不是这样！

OriginString: I remember my father and the time we had together. I remember the childlike wonder on his face when I first awoke.
String: 我记得我的父亲，记得我们共度的时光。记得我第一次苏醒时，他脸上孩童般的惊喜表情。

OriginString: I remember the adventures we had together, traveling the world, seeing things you wouldn't believe.
String: 记得我们一起冒险，周游世界，见证那些难以置信的景象。

OriginString: I remember the time I still spent by his side, despite him settling down with his sweetheart and having no need for a weapon. I remember when he introduced me to his newborn daughter as her older brother.
String: 记得即使在他与爱人安定下来，不再需要武器后，我依然陪伴在他身边。记得他把我介绍给他刚出生的女儿，说我是她的哥哥。

OriginString: I remember the time I consoled him when his wife passed away. I remember the time when I was the only one still by his side when he reached his golden years.
String: 记得在他妻子去世时我安慰他的日子。记得当他步入暮年时，我是唯一仍陪伴在他身边的人。

OriginString: ... I remember him putting the last bit of strength he had left into putting me into that rock after being deadly wounded by a bear.
String: ...我记得他被熊重伤后，用尽最后力气把我放进那块岩石里。

OriginString: I remember when he smiled one last time to me and said that one day people will find me and take care of me just like he did.
String: 我记得他最后一次对我微笑，说总有一天会有人发现我，像他一样照顾我。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>I was beloved, Guild Master! I was truly loved.
I'm so happy, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>我是被爱着的，公会会长！我是真真切切被爱着的。我好开心，公会会长！

OriginString: I'm so grateful that you helped me regain my memories. Thank you for helping me remember.
String: 非常感谢你帮我找回这些记忆。谢谢你让我想起这一切。

OriginString: I swear on my father's name that I will forever serve the Adventurer Guild as long as my blade hasn't rusted away.
String: 我以父亲之名起誓，只要我的剑刃还未锈蚀殆尽，我将永远效忠于冒险者公会。

OriginString:
I'm glad to have you on our side, Ferdinand.
And I promise to your father, that as long as you're with us, we will also take care of you.
String:
"费迪南德，很高兴你能加入我们。
我向你父亲保证过，只要你和我们在一起，我们就会照顾好你。"

OriginString: ...Hmmm
<?whiteFlash>Oh my!
String: <?whiteFlash>天啊！

OriginString: (It looks like Barret was sharpening the talking sword.)
String: （看起来巴雷特正在打磨那把会说话的剑。）

OriginString: ...Did that hurt?
String: ...会痛吗？

OriginString: Interesting. Does that mean the sword has a sense of touch?
String: 有意思。这说明剑有触觉吗？

OriginString: My apologies, Master Smith it was an involuntary reaction. I got a little squeamish because this is my first time. At least I think it is.
String: 很抱歉，铁匠大师，这是本能反应。因为是第一次所以有点紧张。至少我觉得是第一次。

OriginString: But you do not need to worry, Master Smith! It was just a response to a visual cue. I can in fact not feel anything by touch. You could rub my blade and I would feel nothing.
String: 但您无需担心，铁匠大师！这只是视觉刺激的反应。实际上我没有任何触觉。就算您摩擦我的剑身，我也感觉不到任何东西。

OriginString: How about it? Give it a try, and I assure you that you won't get a reaction out of me.
String: 要不试试看？我保证您不会得到任何反应。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Why the reservation? I assure you that I will feel nothing, Master Smith. You do not need to be afraid of hurting me!
String: <?shakeScreen>为什么要拒绝？我向您保证我什么都感觉不到，铁匠大师！您不必担心伤害我！

OriginString: (I'm pretty sure that he has other reasons why he wouldn't want to do that.)
String: （我敢肯定他不这么做有其他原因。）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...
String: <?whiteFlash>...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>M-My lady!
String: <?shakeScreen>小...小姐！

OriginString: My apologies, but I was under the impression that your challenge to test your statement would also extend to anyone else in this room.
String: 抱歉，但我以为您提出的测试挑战也适用于在场其他人。

OriginString:
N-No, of course.
I was just surprised that a lady would touch my blade.
String:
"不、不是的。
我只是没想到会有女士愿意碰我的剑。"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>The talking sword, which seems to identify itself as a male, shows signs of carnal desires in spite of being an object. Also very likely ticklish, despite claiming otherwise.
String: <?whiteFlash>这把自认为男性的会说话之剑，尽管是物品却表现出肉欲迹象。同时很可能怕痒，尽管它声称并非如此。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen> A-Are those notes about me?
I beg you not to write that down! I'm not a degenerate!
String: <?shakeScreen>这、这些笔记是在写我吗？求您别记下来！我不是变态！

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>!
Hello Guild Master.
String: <?whiteFlash>！公会会长好。

OriginString: Hello, Barret. I see you have your hands full.
String: 你好巴雷特。看来你很忙啊。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Oh! Greetings! You must be the Guild Master, I have heard so much about!
I'm Ferdinand and it might be hard to believe but I'm a...
String: <?shakeScreen>哦！您好！您一定是公会会长，久仰大名！我是费迪南德，虽然难以置信但我是一把...

OriginString: ...A talking sword. Yeah, yeah. I read the reports.
String: ...会说话的剑。知道知道，我看过报告了。

OriginString: I see you seem to be interested in the sword. Does that mean it's in some way related to the ancient empire?
String: 我看你对这把剑很感兴趣。它和古帝国有关联吗？

OriginString: That was my initial hope. After all, many wondrous items we have found today have been produced by the craftsmen of the ancient empire.
String: 这原本是我的期待。毕竟现今发现的许多奇物都是古帝国工匠的作品。

OriginString: Unfortunately, to my disappointment, the sword seems to be too relatively new for it to be the case.
String: 遗憾的是，这把剑相对较新，恐怕并非如此。

OriginString: Nevertheless, it still might prove to be an interesting subject to study in my spare time.
String: 不过闲暇时仍可作为有趣的研究对象。

OriginString: ...That statement doesn't exactly boost my self-confidence, my lady.
String: ...小姐，这话实在打击我的自信心啊。

OriginString: So, why is it here?
String: 那它为什么来这里？

OriginString: One of the adventurers wanted to know if it was possible to improve it.
String: 有冒险者想知道能否强化它。

OriginString: Despite it being a talking sword, they said it seems...unimpressive.
String: 虽然是会说话的剑，但据说...不太出色。

OriginString: And with that my self-confidence just took another hit, Master Smith.
String: 铁匠大师，我的自信心又受到暴击了。

OriginString: And is it possible to improve it?
String: 那能强化吗？

OriginString:
It is.
With the right materials.
String:
正是如此。
只要有合适的材料。

OriginString: I'll see if I can provide you with the materials if possible.
String: 我会尽量帮你弄到材料。

OriginString: Given that you are already working on the item, Barret, it may be worthwhile to consider fully smelting it down and utilize the materials to craft a new weapon.
String: 巴雷特，既然你已经在处理这件物品，或许值得考虑将它彻底熔铸，用材料打造新武器。

OriginString: I'm interested to see if it retains its personality after such a transformation.
String: 我很想看看经过这种转变后它是否还能保留个性。

OriginString: ...My lady, I officially declare that I am afraid of you and beg the others to get me as far away as possible from you.
String: ...小姐，我正式宣布害怕您，并恳请大家带我离您越远越好。

OriginString: Did you use to be an adventurer?
String: 你以前是冒险者吗？

OriginString: No...why would you think that?
String: 不...为什么这么问？

OriginString: It just seemed very likely in a place like this.
String: 在这种地方很容易让人产生这种联想。

OriginString: If you really want to know...I joined the Adventurer Guild because of my husband.
String: 如果你真想知道...我加入冒险者公会是因为我丈夫。

OriginString: He was an adventurer and he was also one of the first adventurers to join the Adventurer Guild.
String: 他曾是冒险者，也是最早加入冒险者公会的一批人。

OriginString: When he joined the Guild I opened a Tavern here with the help of the former Guild Master.
String: 他加入公会时，在前任会长的帮助下我在这里开了这家酒馆。

OriginString: It was my way of staying close to him. Because my family used to run a tavern in Cragmond I had no trouble with running one in the Guild.
String: 这样我就能离他近些。我家在克拉格蒙德经营过酒馆，所以打理公会酒馆对我来说不是难事。

OriginString: Sure, adventurers can be a rougher bunch than most but my husband always had a knack for reminding people not to cause any trouble in my tavern.
String: 当然，冒险者大多比较粗野，但我丈夫总有办法提醒他们别在我的酒馆闹事。

OriginString: ...You say he "was" an adventurer...
String: ...你刚才说"曾"是冒险者...

OriginString: He never got to retire.
String: 他没能等到退役那天。

OriginString: But I guess that was never unexpected. That's the life of an adventurer for you.
String: 不过这也不算意外。冒险者的生活就是如此。

OriginString: One day you were making plans for the future together and on the next day there is none to be had.
String: 前一天你们还在为未来做计划，第二天就只剩你一个人。

OriginString: I see...
String: 我明白了...

OriginString: There is no need to feel sorry for me, Guild Master. It happened a long time ago.
String: 不用为我难过，会长。那都是很久以前的事了。

OriginString: Right now I'm more concerned about people paying their tabs.
String: 现在我更关心的是那些欠酒钱的家伙。

OriginString: *Hics* Can I have another one?
String: *嗝* 能再来一杯吗？

OriginString: You already had enough you lightweight.
String: 你这酒量早该打住了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-who *hics* are you calling a lightweight?! I ain't dunk yet! *Hics*
String: <?shakeScreen>你...*嗝*说谁酒量差？！我还能喝！*嗝*

OriginString: Suuure.
String: 是～是～

OriginString: Oh, hi Fiola and hi Falken! Is this...
String: 哦，菲奥拉和法尔肯！这位是...

OriginString: Hello Tavi. That's right this is unfortunately the new Guild Master...
String: 你好塔薇。没错，这位就是不幸的新任会长...

OriginString: "Unfortunately?"...
Don't mind them. Just introduce yourself.
String: 别理他们。先自我介绍吧。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master. I am Tavi and this Tavern belongs to me. This is where all the adventurers go when they need to relax.
String: 你好会长。我是塔薇，这家酒馆是我开的。冒险者们放松时都会来这里。

OriginString: If you think someone had a hard day, just send them to me and I'll make them drink until they're too intoxicated to even remember why they were sad in the first place.
String: 要是觉得谁心情不好，就把他们送来。我会灌到他们连为什么难过都不记得。

OriginString: I would have phrased it differently but yes. Sometimes the former Guild Master would buy drinks for adventurers to raise morale.
String: 我会换个说法...不过确实。前任会长常请冒险者喝酒提升士气。

OriginString: It is actually quite efficient. My advice is to keep that tradition and occasionally buy a drink or two for the adventurers.
String: 这招很管用。建议你保留这个传统，偶尔请冒险者们喝几杯。

OriginString: Anything else I should keep in mind here?
String: 这里还有什么需要注意的？

OriginString: As I already said before, usually new adventurers who would like to join the Guild will also arrive here.
String: 之前说过，想加入公会的新冒险者通常也会来这里。

OriginString: In the past we would get adventurers from all over the world, wanting to join us. Many, who have already made a name for themselves.
String: 过去世界各地有名气的冒险者都会慕名而来。

OriginString: Nowadays however, the only people who come here are people who are too inexperienced and too weak to make it on their own.
String: 但现在来的都是些没经验又弱小的独行侠。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Hey! I heard that!
String: <?shakeScreen>喂！我听见了！

OriginString: So what? If you have a problem with that then prove him wrong!
String: 那又怎样？不服气就用实力证明啊！

OriginString: That's what I thought.
String: 我就知道。

OriginString: <speed=0.5>...Annyyywayy...<speed=1>we should start looking for adventurers here. At least enough to field a full party of four on a quest.
String: <speed=0.5>...总...之...<speed=1>我们得在这里招募冒险者。至少要凑齐四人小队。

OriginString: Okay. Got it.
String: 好。明白了。

OriginString: Heeeeey! How about meeee.......
String: 喂～～考虑下我嘛......

OriginString: *Bleurgh!*<?fadeOutNPC>
String: *呕！*<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
As I said:<waitfor=1>
Lightweight.
String:
如我所言：<waitfor=1>
弱鸡。

OriginString: How have been things lately?
String: 最近怎么样？

OriginString: Well, the amount of injured travellers arriving here has increased and they all tell the same story:  Bandits attacking people and not letting them leave in peace.
String: 唉，最近来这里的受伤旅人越来越多了，他们都在说同一件事：强盗袭击路人，不让人平安离开。

OriginString: I don't know if this how the survivors try to cope with the shock but the stories they're telling isn't really great for the morale of the adventurers.
String: 不知道是不是幸存者为了缓解惊吓才这么说的，但这些传言严重影响了冒险者们的士气。

OriginString: It has been quite depressing in the Tavern...
String: 酒馆里的气氛一直很低迷...

OriginString: Sussshh!! Don't mention that name in here!
String: 嘘！！别在这儿提那个名字！

OriginString: Every traveller that comes through here has already heard of him and every time someone mentions B.K. the mood here takes a deep dive.
String: 每个经过这里的旅人都听说过他，只要有人提到"强盗王"，这里的气氛就会瞬间跌到谷底。

OriginString: So, he already made a name for himself.
String: 看来他已经声名远扬了。

OriginString: You tell me! There are a lot of stories floating around him and it's hard to tell which ones are real and which are pure exaggeration.
String: 可不是嘛！关于他的传言满天飞，根本分不清哪些是真的，哪些是夸大其词。

OriginString: But one thing is certain. This bandit king is a terrifying man.
String: 但有一点可以确定，这个强盗王是个可怕的角色。

OriginString: The Divine Messenger, huh?
String: 神圣使者啊？

OriginString: Maybe this time I'll be able to catch a glimpse of her.
String: 也许这次我能瞥见她一眼。

OriginString: You never saw her?
String: 你从没见过她？

OriginString: I never did. In the past she usually just visited the Guild Master and left shortly after.
String: 从没见过。以前她通常只来见公会会长，很快就离开。

OriginString: Didn't even come in for a drink before they left. I guess religious people aren't just that fond of taverns.
String: 连杯酒都不喝就走了。看来信教的人都不太喜欢酒馆。

OriginString: For example I've been trying for ages to get Eden to have a drink in here but haven't had any success yet.
String: 比如我一直想请伊登来喝一杯，但至今都没成功过。

OriginString: Why?
String: 为什么？

OriginString: Come on, Guild Master. Don't tell me you are not interested in seeing Eden drunk?
String: 得了吧会长，别告诉我你不想看伊登喝醉的样子？

OriginString: ...I retract the question.
String: ...我收回这个问题。

OriginString: I feel like no amount of alcohol could make me forget that day.
String: 我觉得喝多少酒都忘不了那天的事。

OriginString: It was a late night for me and while I was preparing to go to bed, I suddenly heard fighting.
String: 那天我熬夜到很晚，正准备睡觉时突然听到打斗声。

OriginString: At first I thought some drunken adventurers were getting into a fight and I was already prepared to give them a stern warning.
String: 起初还以为是醉酒的冒险者在打架，我都准备好要严厉警告他们了。

OriginString: However, when I stepped outside, I immediately realized that wasn't what was happening.
String: 但当我走出去，立刻意识到情况不对。

OriginString: ...They were seriously trying to kill each other, Guild Master...
String: ...他们是真的想置对方于死地，会长...

OriginString: I ran back into the tavern and hid in the wine cellar until it was over.
String: 我跑回酒馆躲进酒窖，直到一切结束。

OriginString: I didn't come out until Falken and some others found me and told me it was over.
String: 直到法尔肯他们找到我，告诉我事情平息了才敢出来。

OriginString: Adventurers can be rough around the edges...but I always thought of them all as good people.
String: 冒险者们可能举止粗鲁...但我一直以为他们都是好人。

OriginString: Even after we identified the people, who betrayed the Guild...I still couldn't believe it.
String: 即便查明了背叛公会的人...我还是无法相信。

OriginString: They were people I knew. People with whom we shared drinks and laughter...
String: 那些人我都认识。是和我们一起把酒言欢的伙伴啊...

OriginString: Looks can be deceiving, can't they?
String: 长相可以很有欺骗性，不是吗

OriginString: I would have never guessed that a young looking girl like her would be the witch that caused all those deaths.
String: 真没想到那个看起来年轻的小姑娘，就是害死那么多人的女巫。

OriginString: Well, now that she's behind bars, hopefully people don't have to fear for their souls anymore.
String: 现在既然把她关起来了，大家应该不用再担心灵魂被夺走了。

OriginString: Here for a drink, Guild Master?
String: 来喝一杯吗，公会会长？

OriginString: There is always a seat free for you here.
String: 这里永远有你的位置。

OriginString: Still don't want that drink?
String: 还是不想来杯喝的？

OriginString: Anything else you want to talk about?
String: 你想聊点别的吗？

OriginString: Here for a drink?
String: 来喝一杯吗？

OriginString: ...Fiola. So, you're also here...
String: ...菲奥拉。你也在啊...

OriginString: ...{PROTAGONIST}. I guess Eden called you too, didn't he?
String: ...{PROTAGONIST}。伊登也把你叫来了吧？

OriginString: It's got to be pretty important if he thought, that it was necessary for the two us to be in the same room.
String: 能让那家伙觉得必须把我们俩叫到同一个屋檐下，事情肯定很严重。

OriginString: We're in a hall you dimwit.
String: 这是大厅，白痴。

OriginString: And still not enough space for the both of us.
String: 还是容不下我们俩。

OriginString: My apologies. I hope you two didn't have to wait long.
String: 抱歉。希望二位没等太久。

OriginString: It's fine. We've just arrived.
String: 没事，我们也刚到。

OriginString: So what is it that you needed both of us here?.
String: 所以非得同时找我们俩是什么事？

OriginString: ...I've received a letter...from the Divine Messenger.
String: ...我收到了...神谕使者的来信。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: The Divine Messenger? You mean the person supposedly chosen by the gods to be their speaker?
String: 神谕使者？就是传说中被众神选中作为代言人的那位？

OriginString: They are real?
String: 真的存在？

OriginString: ...Yes, Guild Master.
String: ...是的，公会会长。

OriginString: And she wants to meet you, Guild Master.
String: 而她想要见您，公会会长。

OriginString: ...I think she requires the Guild's services.
String: ...我想她需要公会协助。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>NO!
String: <?shakeScreen>休想！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Tell her that she can go to hell for all I care!
String: <?shakeScreen>告诉她我巴不得她下地狱！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}! Don't even think about letting her in here again!
String: <?shakeScreen>{PROTAGONIST}！你敢让她再踏进这里试试！

OriginString: (Again?)
Fiola. I understand how you feel, but this is a request from the Divine Messenger herself. I don't think refusing her will go well for us.
String: 菲奥拉。我理解你的感受，但这是神谕使者本人的请求。拒绝她对我们没好处。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> I don't care! It's because of her that Fran...
String: <?shakeScreen>我才不管！要不是因为她，弗兰...

OriginString: ...that Fran...
(...I think I have been avoiding that topic for too long...)
String: ...我好像逃避这个话题太久了...

OriginString: Fiola...Tell me...
String: 菲奥拉...告诉我...

OriginString: What happened to Fran?
String: 弗兰到底怎么了？

OriginString: Four years ago, the reputation of the Adventurer Guild was at its peak. We had helped numerous people, and they had placed their trust in us. Quests would pour in from every corner of the country.
String: 四年前，冒险者公会的声望正处于巅峰。我们帮助过无数人，他们也给予了我们信任。全国各地的委托源源不断地涌来。

OriginString: Then, one day, the Divine Messenger herself visited us and requested our services.
String: 然后有一天，神使亲自登门委托任务。

OriginString: We were elated, believing this to be the culmination of all our achievements. We thought that by undertaking her quests, the Guild would become famous across the continent.
String: 我们欣喜若狂，认为这是对我们所有成就的肯定。我们以为完成她的委托后，公会将名扬大陆。

OriginString: However, things took a different turn.
String: 然而事情却朝着相反的方向发展。

OriginString: The quests we were assigned were perilous. Frequently, we would lose adventurers during these missions because we were kept in the dark about the true nature of the threats we faced.
String: 那些委托都极其危险。由于对真实威胁一无所知，我们在任务中经常失去冒险者。

OriginString: Initially, it appeared that we were simply sent to deal with cultists, demon worshippers, and other heretics.
String: 起初，看起来我们只是被派去对付异教徒、恶魔崇拜者之类的邪教分子。

OriginString: Little did we know that they were all part of the same powerful cult, one that would eventually wage war against the Adventurer Guild in retaliation.
String: 我们不知道他们全都隶属于同一个强大的教派——这个教派最终会对冒险者公会展开报复性战争。

OriginString: Over time, our adventurers would get ambushed by unknown assailants during their quests. Some were discovered dead in alleys, their backs pierced by daggers.
String: 渐渐地，我们的冒险者在任务中会遭遇不明袭击。有些人被发现死在暗巷里，背上插着匕首。

OriginString: We struggled a lot in those years. Adventurers left us out of fear. We were unable to complete more and more Quests.
String: 那几年我们过得很艰难。冒险者们因恐惧而离开，越来越多的委托无法完成。

OriginString:
People started to lose their trust in us and our reputation detoriated. 
In just three years, we were reduced to a mere shadow of our former selves.
String:
"人们开始对我们失去信任，我们的声誉一落千丈。"
"短短三年间，我们就沦为了昔日辉煌的残影。"

OriginString:
But that wasn't enough for them.
One day we were attacked from within.
String:
"但这还不够满足他们。
有一天，我们遭到了内部的袭击。"

OriginString: As it turned out many of our adventurers who joined us were cultists themselves and under the cover of the night they launched an assault on their comrades.
String: 原来许多新加入的冒险者本身就是教徒，他们在夜色掩护下对同伴发动了攻击。

OriginString: People fought, not knowing who was friend or foe. We were betrayed by people we considered friend and family.
String: 人们互相厮杀，分不清敌友。我们被视如亲友的人背叛了。

OriginString: Many lives were lost that night...
String: 那晚牺牲了很多人...

OriginString: Including Fran...
String: 包括弗兰...

OriginString: Afterwards, you know what happened. Fran seems to have feared his own death and prepared a last will, where he made you the new Guild Master.
String: 后来的事你也知道了。弗兰似乎预感到自己会遭遇不测，提前立下遗嘱让你接任会长。

OriginString: We lost everything. And what did we receive in return for our services?
String: 我们失去了一切。而作为报酬，我们得到了什么？

OriginString: Nothing!
String: 什么都没有！

OriginString: When we were of no use to them anymore the Divine Messenger just left with the shattered remains of everything Fran worked so hard for!
String: 当我们失去利用价值后，那个神使就带着弗兰毕生心血的残骸扬长而去！

OriginString: There is nothing good that will come out of dealing with that woman!
String: 和那个女人打交道绝对不会有好结果！

OriginString: ...I agree with you. If we could then I'd also prefer for us to stay away from whatever she needs the Guild to do.
String: ...我理解你的想法。如果可能的话，我也希望公会能远离她的差遣。

OriginString: However, the Divine Messenger is a human chosen by the gods themselves. Not even kings or queens can ignore her.
String: 但神使是神明钦选之人。即便是国王女王也无法违抗她。

OriginString: I fear what might happen if we do.
String: 我不敢想象拒绝的后果。

OriginString:
...Guild Master.
As the one leading the Guild it's your decision.
String:
...公会会长。
作为公会的领导者，这该由你来决定。

OriginString: How should we respond?
String: 我们该如何回应？

OriginString:
...
Tell her that we will receive her.
String:
...
告诉她我们会接待她。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Why you...!
String: <?whiteFlash>你竟然...！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Didn't you listen to a word I said?
String: <?shakeScreen>你刚才一句话都没听进去吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Don't you care about the Guild at all?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你根本不在乎公会死活？！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Of course I care!
String: <?shakeScreen>我当然在乎！

OriginString: That's why I have to meet the person responsible for what had happened.
String: 正因如此，我才必须见见那个始作俑者。

OriginString: Eden, answer her as soon as you can.
String: 伊登，尽快给她答复。

OriginString: Yes, Guild Master!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 遵命，会长！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: You're making a mistake!
String: 你这是在犯错误！

OriginString: It's my decision.
String: 这是我的决定。

OriginString: I remember now why I can't stand you! HMPF! <?fadeOutNPC>
String: 我现在想起为什么讨厌你了！哼！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: *Sighs*. Where is that poor excuse of a Guild Master?
String: *叹气*。那个不靠谱的公会会长跑哪儿去了？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...?
String: <?whiteFlash>...？

OriginString: ...and that's all I could find out.
String: ...这就是我能打听到的全部情报了。

OriginString: Thank you, Rogue.
String: 多谢了，罗格。

OriginString: No problem, Guild Master. I'm glad I could help you in this situation.
String: 不客气，公会会长。很高兴能在这事上帮到你。

OriginString: Until later then, Guild Master. <?fadeOutNPC>
String: 那回头见，公会会长。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: So, this is where you are.
String: 原来你在这儿。

OriginString: Fiola.
String: 菲奥拉。

OriginString: I'd like to ask what you were doing but I'm sure I'll just be disappointed by the answer.
String: 我本想问你在干什么，但答案多半只会让我失望。

OriginString: Instead just let's go.
String: 所以直接走吧。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Greetings, Guild Master.
String: <?whiteFlash>向您问好，公会会长。

OriginString: ...So you're the...
String: ...所以你就是...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Stay back! Do not come one step closer!
String: <?shakeScreen>退后！不许再靠近半步！

OriginString: Whoa! Easy there, tiger!
String: 哇！冷静点，大块头！

OriginString: My apologies Guild Master. My bodyguard takes his job very seriously.
String: 万分抱歉，公会会长。我的保镖对待工作非常认真。

OriginString: I would have never guessed.
String: 这可真是一点都看不出来呢。

OriginString: Also greetings to you, Mrs. Fiola. It's a pleasure to meet you again.
String: 也向您问好，菲奥拉女士。很高兴再次见到您。

OriginString: That makes only one of us.
String: 这只是你单方面的想法。

OriginString: ...I can see that you're still angry about what has happened in the past.
String: ...看来您仍为过去的事耿耿于怀。

OriginString: Believe me when I say that I'm truly sorry about your losses.
String: 请相信，我对您遭受的损失深感歉意。

OriginString: Tell that to my dead husband.
String: 这话去跟我死去的丈夫说吧。

OriginString: ...How about we change the subject and talk about business instead?
String: ...不如我们换个话题谈谈正事？

OriginString: That's fine with me, eh...
String: 我没问题，呃...

OriginString: Just call me your Holiness, Guild Master.
String: 叫我"圣座"就好，公会会长。

OriginString: (How humble...)
String: （还真是谦逊呢...）

OriginString: Alright, your "Holiness". What does the Divine Messenger herself want from the Adventurer Guild?
String: 好吧，"圣座"大人。圣使亲临冒险者公会有何贵干？

OriginString: The gods have been watching the Adventurer Guild and are quite pleased to see that it has regained its strength.
String: 诸神一直在关注冒险者公会，很高兴看到它重振雄风。

OriginString: They believe that the Adventurer Guild can once again become an instrument of good. You should be flattered, Guild Master.
String: 他们相信冒险者公会能再次成为正义之器。您应该感到荣幸，会长大人。

OriginString: They only ask that the Guild will take on any Quests they give to you and that you prioritize them over all else.
String: 唯一的要求是公会必须优先处理我们委派的任务。

OriginString: And what do we get in return?
String: 那我们的回报是？

OriginString: The Church of the Divines has enough gold to pay for all the Quest Fees. Of course we will pay well above the rate you usually charge.
String: 神圣教会财力雄厚，报酬会远超你们平常的收费标准。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>That's not enough.
String: <?whiteFlash>这还不够。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What?! You insolent...!
String: <?shakeScreen>什么？！你这无礼之徒...！

OriginString: ...I'm sure we have more than enough to pay any fee you could think of, Guild Master.
String: ...我相信我们完全付得起任何费用，会长。

OriginString: I'm not after more gold.
String: 我要的不是钱。

OriginString: Then what do you want?
String: 那你想要什么？

OriginString: I want for the Guild to have the same status as the Church of the Divines.
String: 我要让公会获得与神圣教会同等的地位。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！

OriginString: ...What do you mean?
String: ...什么意思？

OriginString: Just like the church of the Divines I want the Adventurer Guild to have full autonomy. I want it to be a separate entity not directly subject to any king or other ruling authority.
String: 就像神圣教会一样，我要冒险者公会完全自治，不受任何国王或统治势力直接管辖。

OriginString: I'm not sure that's what we're able to give you.
String: 这恐怕不是我们能决定的。

OriginString: Are you sure about that? I'm certain that when the seven divines themselves decree it, then the nine kingdoms will surely pass royal decrees to guarantee our independence.
String: 真的吗？只要七圣神亲自降下神谕，九大王国自然会颁布法令保障我们的独立。

OriginString: The church alone should have enough political leverage and moral authority to at least be able to negotiate those terms for us.
String: 以教会的政治影响力和道德威望，至少能帮我们争取这些条件。

OriginString: And what if we refuse?
String: 如果我们拒绝呢？

OriginString:
Then the Guild won't help you.
And I'm certain that would put you in quite the inconvenient spot.
String:
"那公会可不会帮你了。"
"我敢肯定这会让你陷入相当尴尬的境地。"

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: You see, I have been digging a bit and it seems like in the last few months alone you have been hiring dozens of adventurer parties, most of which ended up either dead or missing.
String: 我调查发现，仅过去几个月你们就雇佣了几十支冒险者队伍，大多非死即失踪。

OriginString: Additionally, many of your paladins have died under mysterious circumstances and considering your bodyguard, I'm certain that you yourself have been the target of assassination attempts.
String: 此外许多圣骑士离奇死亡，看你的护卫配置，想必你也遭遇过暗杀。

OriginString: (...Was that what Rogue was supposed to find out for {PROTAGONIST}?)
String: (...这就是罗格要帮{PROTAGONIST}查的事？)

OriginString: It's obvious you're in a war...and it's also obvious that you're losing it.
String: 很明显你们正在打仗...而且节节败退。

OriginString: That's why you want to hire people like us as your mercenaries.
String: 所以才想雇佣我们当打手。

OriginString: ...The gods do not appreciate to be extorted like that.
String: ...诸神不会容忍这般要挟。

OriginString: Are you sure you're willing to offend them with your answer?
String: 你确定要用这个答案触怒神明？

OriginString: ...I don't care.
String: ...我不在乎。

OriginString: I'm here to make sure that you pay the price that my best friend should have deserved in the first place.
String: 我来这里就是要让你们付出代价，这本该是我挚友应得的公道。

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST}...
String: {PROTAGONIST}...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>I've had enough of this!
String: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>我受够了！

OriginString: *Pulls weapon*<?shakeScreen> What stops us from just killing you and then negotiate with your successor?
String: *拔出武器*<?shakeScreen> 我们何不直接杀了你，然后和你的继任者谈判？

OriginString: ...Good luck having the adventurers follow you after you kill their Guild Master during a negotiation.
String: ...祝你在谈判期间杀死公会会长后，还能让冒险者们听你的指挥。

OriginString: It's important for clients to be able to trust their adventurers...
String: 委托人能够信任冒险者很重要...

OriginString: ...but people seem to miss that it's equally important for adventurers to be able to trust their clients.
String: ...但人们似乎忽略了，冒险者能够信任委托人同样重要。

OriginString: Y-You....!
<?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>BWHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
String: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>噗哈哈哈哈哈哈！

OriginString: (...This wasn't the reaction I expected...)
String: (...这反应出乎我的意料...)

OriginString: Y-Your Holiness!
String: 圣、圣座大人！

OriginString: *sniff* In all my years I have never seen anyone make a hard bargain with the seven divines like that.
String: *抽气* 我活这么久，还是第一次见到有人敢和七圣神这样讨价还价。

OriginString:
Very well, Guild Master!
You win!
String:
"很好，公会会长！
你赢了！"

OriginString: If you help us win this war, as you put it nicely, then the Church will be the first to acknowledge the authority of the Adventurer Guild and help you gain the recognition of all nine kingdoms.
String: 若你助我们赢得这场战争——如你精妙的措辞所言——教会将第一个承认冒险者公会的权威，并助你获得九大王国的认可。

OriginString: (That was easier than I expected it to be...)
String: (比预想的要顺利...)

OriginString: Then we have a deal.
String: 那就这么定了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>No touching!
String: <?shakeScreen>不许碰！

OriginString: ...It's a deal even without the handshake.
String: ...不握手也算达成协议。

OriginString: So, what is supposed to be our first task?
String: 那么，我们的第一个任务是什么？

OriginString: The gods will reveal to me their plans when the time is right...
String: 当时机成熟时，诸神自会向我揭示他们的计划...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...so meanwhile I will be staying here until that happens.
String: <?whiteFlash>...所以在那之前我会留在这里。

OriginString: What?
String: 什么？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WHAT!?
String: <?shakeScreen>什么！？

OriginString: Why not? I think this arrangement would be far more convenient than traveling back and forth.
String: 有何不可？我觉得这样安排比来回奔波方便多了。

OriginString: And I do like to see more of the Guild. I didn't have the chance the last time I was here.
String: 而且我也想多看看公会。上次来都没机会好好参观。

OriginString: I think I saw a tavern on my way here. I always wondered what it would look like inside.<?fadeoutNPC>
String: 记得来的路上有家酒馆。一直好奇里面是什么样子呢。<?fadeoutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> B-But your Holiness!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>可、可是圣座大人！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
...*sighs*...That was nerve-racking.
(Pretty sure I'm going to hell now.)
String:
...*叹气*...真是让人神经紧绷啊。
(我八成是要下地狱了。)

OriginString: Was that your goal all along?
String: 这就是你一直计划的目标吗？

OriginString:
...Yeah.
I got the idea when Eden was worried about what happens if we don't submit ourselves to the authority of the church.
String:
...是啊。
这个想法是伊登担心如果我们不服从教会权威会有什么后果时产生的。

OriginString: I realized that we will probably face that problem more often in the future, the more we grow. At some point we might end up as a political tool.
String: 我意识到随着我们发展壮大，未来可能会更频繁地面临这个问题。总有一天我们可能会沦为政治工具。

OriginString: I don't think Fran wants that for the Guild.
String: 我觉得弗兰不会希望公会变成那样。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Who would have thought? There is a brain inside that head of yours after all.
String: <?whiteFlash>谁能想到呢？你那脑袋里居然真的有脑子。

OriginString: Hah! That's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.
String: 哈！这是你对我说过最动听的话了。

OriginString: Hey you!
String: 喂，你！

OriginString:
Her Holiness wants to see you.
Do not let her wait.
String:
"圣女大人要见你。"
"别让她久等。"

OriginString: I hope being rude wasn't part of your job description.
String: 希望粗鲁不是你们的工作要求。

OriginString: Tsk!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 啧！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>H-Hello, Guild Master. It's nice to see you!
(I guess the two of you being alone together is a rather awkward atmosphere for you, isn't it?)
String: （你们两个单独相处，气氛果然很尴尬吧？）

OriginString: ...So, what is that you wanted to talk to me about?
String: ...那么，你想找我谈什么？

OriginString: ...We finally have a task for you.
String: ...我们终于有任务要交给你了。

OriginString: I see. So what's the job?
String: 明白了。具体是什么工作？

OriginString: Before I do that, it might be time to tell you who our enemy is. The gods have given me permission to do so.
String: 在那之前，也许是时候告诉你我们的敌人是谁了。众神已准许我透露此事。

OriginString: (Probably just as much as I'm allowed to know.)
String: （大概也就是我能知道的限度了吧。）

OriginString: Please be aware that the gods do not wish the knowledge to be spread lest, it may incite unrest amongst the people. Anything we discuss here, must stay between us.
String: 请注意众神不希望这些情报外泄，以免在民众中引发动荡。我们在此讨论的一切都必须保密。

OriginString: Fine...so who are we dealing with?
String: 行...所以我们的对手是谁？

OriginString: You might have already encountered them. After all they were the reason why the bandits in this area have become such a problem.
String: 你可能已经遇到过他们了。毕竟他们就是这片区域强盗猖獗的根源。

OriginString: ...I already suspected something was off when the adventurers reported that they encountered a demon in their final confrontation with the bandit king.
String: ...当冒险者们报告说在最后与强盗王的战斗中遇到了恶魔时，我就觉得事情不太对劲。

OriginString: How could bandits be connected with demons?...Even the weapon he wielded, doesn't seem like something you could just normally aquire.
String: 强盗怎么会和恶魔扯上关系？...就连他使用的武器，也不像是普通途径能获得的东西。

OriginString: They've been supported by the same people who attacked us, haven't they?
String: 是那些袭击我们的人在背后支持他们，对吧？

OriginString: Yes, that's right.
String: 没错，正是如此。

OriginString: They are the servants of the seven demon lords.
String: 他们是七位恶魔领主的仆从。

OriginString: So they're a cult?
String: 所以他们是个邪教组织？

OriginString: They're far more dangerous than any ordinary cult, Guild Master.
String: 他们比任何普通邪教都要危险得多，公会会长。

OriginString: These people have existed for hundreds of years and have ever since been causing suffering and deaths on a grand scale.
String: 这群人已存在数百年，一直在制造大规模的苦难与死亡。

OriginString: And furthermore, they're led by an avatar not unlike me. A woman chosen by the demon lords.
String: 而且他们的首领是和我相似的化身，一个被恶魔领主选中的女人。

OriginString: We call her the Demon Witch.
String: 我们称她为恶魔女巫。

OriginString: What is their goal?
String: 他们的目的是什么？

OriginString: The same as it has always been. To collect souls for their masters.
String: 和以往一样。为他们的主人收集灵魂。

OriginString: They search for people who crave power and in exchange for granting them those powers, they sacrifice people in the name of the demon lords.
String: 他们寻找渴求力量之人，以赐予力量为交换，让他们以恶魔领主之名献祭他人。

OriginString: We, the church, have been at war with them for centuries to protect the souls of our fellow humans.
String: 我们教会与他们交战数百年，只为保护人类的灵魂。

OriginString: Unfortunately, the war isn't going as well as we would like to. That's why we had to rely on people like your adventurers to fight our battle for us.
String: 遗憾的是战况不如预期，所以我们才需要依靠你们这些冒险者来代我们作战。

OriginString: Even for this task, we can only rely on you, Guild Master.
String: 即便这次任务，我们也只能仰仗您了，公会会长。

OriginString: ...Demons, witches, Demon Lords...
String: ...恶魔、女巫、恶魔领主...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You should have told us that from the beginning!
String: <?shakeScreen>你们早该一开始就告诉我们！

OriginString:
I'm sorry.
But the gods deemed it unnecessary to let you know more than you should.
String:
"抱歉。"
"但诸神认为没必要让你知道得更多。"

OriginString: Knowing that there is a war for their souls could frighten the people.
String: 若民众知晓这场灵魂争夺战，恐会引起恐慌。

OriginString: (...that still sounds like it's not the complete truth.)
String: (...听起来还是有所隐瞒。)

OriginString: (However, I don't think they'd be willing to reveal more if I try to press them.)
String: (不过就算追问，他们恐怕也不会透露更多了。)

OriginString: Alright, fine! We know now what we're dealing with.
String: 好吧！现在我们总算知道对手是什么来头了。

OriginString: So, what is it that you need us now for?
String: 那么，你现在需要我们做什么？

OriginString: The witch has started to make a pact with another group. A group of jotuns, calling themselves the Icefang Tribe.
String: 那个女巫开始与另一个群体结盟——自称冰牙部落的霜巨人。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Jotuns? You mean the warriors of the north?
String: <?shakeScreen>霜巨人？你是说北方那些战士？

OriginString: They're already fearsome warriors on their own. I do not want to know how much worse it gets when they have the support of demons.
String: 他们本身就是可怕的战士。不敢想象得到恶魔支持后会多恐怖。

OriginString: ...Unfortunately, it gets worse. A monastery of ours has been raided by them and they have taken numerous people captive.
String: ...更糟的是，他们袭击了我们一座修道院，掳走了许多人质。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We have to save them!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们必须救出他们！

OriginString: How old is that information? Can we even get to them in time?
String: 这情报时效多久？还来得及吗？

OriginString: Mere minutes. The Gods have been keeping an eye out and immediately notified me.
String: 就几分钟前。诸神一直监视并立即通知了我。

OriginString:
(Well, that's kinda convenient.)
Alright, I'll send some adventurers.
String:
（这倒是挺方便的。）
好吧，我会派几个冒险者过去。

OriginString: Wonderful, Guild Master! Tell them to meet me when they're ready to go.
String: 太好了，公会会长！让他们准备好后来找我。

OriginString: Meet you? Don't tell me, you're going to go too.
String: 找你？别告诉我你也要去。

OriginString: Of course! It will be far easier for the adventurers to follow the jotuns with the guidance of the divines.
String: 当然！有神明指引，冒险者更容易追踪霜巨人。

OriginString: ...Then I'll come too.
String: ...那我也一起去。

OriginString: I want to see where this is going.
String: 我想亲眼看看事态发展。

OriginString: Very well. Then we will go and save the captives together!
String: 很好。那我们就一起去解救俘虏吧！

OriginString: Hmph!
String: 哼！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Be careful, {PROTAGONIST}.
String: <?whiteFlash>小心点，{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: I'd rather not have to look for another Guild Master.
String: 我可不想再找个新会长。

OriginString: Geez, don't scare me like that.
String: 喂，别吓唬人啊。

OriginString: It's eerie how quiet it is.
String: "安静得有点瘆人。"

OriginString: Are you sure that this is the place where the Emperor's body is hidden?
String: 你确定这里就是藏匿皇帝遗体的地方吗？

OriginString: I'm certain. It looks just like the way I saw it in the vision.
String: 我确定。和我预视中看到的一模一样。

OriginString: It's strange that we didn't encounter any resistance so far. I'm getting scared that something might be wrong.
String: 奇怪的是我们至今没遇到任何抵抗。我开始担心是不是出什么岔子了。

OriginString: Are we maybe already too late?
String: 会不会...我们已经来晚了？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>T-That can't be! The gods are certain that there is still a substantial number of souls needed to revive the emperor.
String: <?shakeScreen>不-不可能！众神确信复活皇帝还需要大量灵魂。

OriginString: They couldn't have possibly collected them all in such a short time!
String: 他们绝不可能在这么短时间内就收集齐全！

OriginString: T-They're sure of it.
String: 神-神明们很确定这点。

OriginString: Well, no other way to find out than to move forward.
String: 好吧，想知道答案就只能继续前进了。

OriginString: (Alright...{PROTAGONIST}. No need to feel nervous.)
String: (好了...{PROTAGONIST}。没必要紧张。)

OriginString: (Just breathe in....and breathe out..)
String: (吸气...然后呼气...)

OriginString: (Breathe in....)
(Breathe out....)
...What are you doing?
String: ...你在干什么？

OriginString:
What does it look like?
<?shakeScreen>I'm trying to calm myself down!
String:
"这还用问吗？
<?shakeScreen>我正在努力让自己冷静下来！"

OriginString: Some words of encouragement would be helpful!
String: 说点鼓励的话会很有帮助！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Listen to me here, {PROTAGONIST}!
We're about to meet every King and Queen on this continent!
String: <?shakeScreen>给我听好了，{PROTAGONIST}！

OriginString: Your demeanor will affect whether they'll recognize the Adventurer Guild as an independant organization or not!
String: 你的表现将决定他们是否承认冒险者公会是个独立组织！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>So, don't screw this up!
String: <?shakeScreen>所以，千万别搞砸了！

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>That does not help at all! I'm going to lose my mind!
Breathe in...Breathe out...
String: <?shakeScreen>这根本没用！我快要疯了！

OriginString: Hnngh....
<?whiteFlash>There is no need for you to get nervous.
String: <?whiteFlash>你根本没必要紧张。

OriginString: I...know you can do this. You stood before greater obstacles and managed to overcome them all.
String: 我...知道你能行的。你面对过更大的难关，最后都挺过来了。

OriginString: This is nothing compared to that...
String: 和那些比起来这根本不算什么...

OriginString: I-I...b-believe in you, because...
String: 我-我...相-相信你，因为...

OriginString: Because?
String: 因为什么？

OriginString: ...because you're a great Guild Master!
String: ...因为你是个了不起的公会会长！

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>Alright, I think that's the best I can get out of you.
String: ...<?whiteFlash>好吧，看来从你这儿只能问出这么多了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Did you just pretend to be nervous?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你刚才是在假装紧张吗？！

OriginString: Oh come on, Fiola. I've met a real god! This is nothing compared to that. I was just trying to see how far you'd go to cheer me up.
String: 别这样嘛，菲奥拉。我可是见过真神的人！这根本不算什么。我只是想看看你会为了让我振作做到什么程度。

OriginString: ...Why you!!!
String: ...你给我等着！！！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Alright, guys! You can come in! Everyone is already excited to see you two!
String: <?whiteFlash>好了各位！可以进来了！大家都迫不及待想见你们俩了！

OriginString: Alright. We'll be right behind you, Lily.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 知道了。我们马上跟上，莉莉。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Hey!
String: <?whiteFlash>喂！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>You can do this!
String: <?whiteFlash>你能行的！

OriginString: ...Aren't you cold running around like that?
String: ...你这样跑来跑去不冷吗？
