OriginString: It's fine, Guild Master. The gods' blessing also protects me from the cold.
String: 没关系的，公会会长。神的祝福也能保护我免受寒冷。

OriginString: Ain't that convenient. Probably means that me freezing here is a sign of their disfavor.
String: 那可真是方便。看来我在这儿挨冻就是神不待见我的证明咯。

OriginString: Are you sure that we're on the right track?
String: 你确定我们没跟错路？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Are you questioning her holiness?!
String: <?shakeScreen>你竟敢质疑圣女大人？！

OriginString: Can you please just stay out of this?
String: 你能不能别插嘴？

OriginString: The gods have guided me to this place, so I'm certain that the group we're following is nearby.
String: 神明指引我来到此地，所以我确信我们追踪的那群人就在附近。

OriginString: Damn. I hoped we would find them first before we got this far. The tundra is an unforgiving place.
String: 该死。我本希望能在深入冻原前找到他们的，这地方可不好对付。

OriginString: But I guess we have no choice now.
String: 但现在看来别无选择了。

OriginString: We should hurry. If we take too long who knows what might happen to the captives.
String: 我们得加快速度。拖太久的话那些人质就凶多吉少了。

OriginString: I agree, Guild Master.
String: 我同意，公会会长。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>Yo, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>哟，公会会长！

OriginString: Oh, hello Bai.
String: 哦，你好啊白。

OriginString: I wanted to talk to you.
String: 我想和你聊聊。

OriginString: I was hoping you could do me a solid.
String: 想请你帮个忙。

OriginString: ...I'm afraid to ask but what do you want?
String: ...虽然不太想问，但你要什么？

OriginString: Have you heard of the wandering swordsman?
String: 听说过那个流浪剑客吗？

OriginString: Doesn't really ring a bell.
String: 没什么印象。

OriginString: Really? He's all everyone is talking about here.
String: 真的吗？现在酒馆里人人都在讨论他。

OriginString: You really need to come to the tavern more often.
String: 你真该多来酒馆转转。

OriginString: (You need to go less.)
String: （你才该少去。）

OriginString: Anyway, it's some guy who has been popping up recently and challenging anybody who is somehow famed for their sword skill.
String: 总之是个最近突然冒出来的家伙，专门挑战那些有名气的剑术高手。

OriginString: And he won every single time! He supposedly beat some really big names out there.
String: 而且从无败绩！据说打败过好些大人物。

OriginString: Like who?
String: 比如谁？

OriginString: I dunno. They lost so why remember their names?
String: 不知道啊。输家谁记得名字？

OriginString: Anyway, they say that he might be the greatest swordsman alive and there are rumors that he's currently somewhere nearby.
String: 反正都说他可能是当世第一剑客，而且传闻他现在就在附近。

OriginString: And you want to....?
String: 所以你想...？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Challenge him of course!
String: <?shakeScreen>当然是挑战他啊！

OriginString: ...But you're not a swordsfighter.
String: ...但你又不用剑。

OriginString: Who cares? It's actually exactly how I want it to be.
String: 谁在乎？这样正合我意。

OriginString: If I can beat up the greatest swordsman then I can finally prove that fists are better than swords!
String: 要是我能打败第一剑客，不就能证明拳头比剑厉害了吗！

OriginString: Alright...and what's it that you wanted from me?
String: 好吧...那你找我干嘛？

OriginString: I wanted to ask if I could bring some of the adventurers with me. They might learn one or two things from my fight with the guy.
String: 想问问能不能带几个冒险者一起去。他们说不定能从我的战斗中学到一两招。

OriginString: ...So to recap: You want to take some adventurers with you, so they can see you beat up some stranger?
String: ...总结一下：你想带几个冒险者去围观你揍陌生人？

OriginString: I guess that's the gist of it.
String: 差不多就这意思。

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>Sure, why not? Knock yourself out. Have fun.
String: ...<?whiteFlash>行啊，随便你。玩得开心。

OriginString: Thanks, Guild Master!
String: 谢啦会长！

OriginString: Oh, Bai. You're back.
String: "啊，白。你回来了。"

OriginString: I am, and I brought a new mouth to feed.
String: 是啊，还带回来一张要喂饭的嘴。

OriginString: You what?
String: 你说什么？

OriginString: ...So this is the Adventurer Guild.
String: ...这就是冒险者公会啊。

OriginString: I've heard about it before, but it's less impressive than I thought.
String: 听说过，但比想象中寒酸。

OriginString: And this is?
String: 这位是？

OriginString: This is the Guild Master.
String: 这位是公会会长。

OriginString: Guild Master, this is Shen.
String: 会长，这是申。

OriginString: ...*Touch*
<?shakeScreen>W-What the heck!! Why are you touching me there?!
String: <?shakeScreen>搞...搞什么鬼！！你摸哪儿呢？！

OriginString: I wasn't sure whether you were a man or a woman.
String: 我只是不确定你是男是女。

OriginString: What's with you and your village that keeps touching people to ascertain their gender?
String: 你们村的人怎么回事？非要动手摸才能确定性别吗？

OriginString: Well, it doesn't really matter.
String: 嘛，其实无所谓啦。

OriginString: Rejoice, Guild Master! The greatest swordmaster in the world has decided to join your humble guild.
String: 欢呼吧会长！世上最伟大的剑术大师决定屈尊加入你们这个小公会了。

OriginString: ...You're asking to join us?
String: ...你是要加入我们？

OriginString: Oh no! I'm not asking. I'm just telling you what's happening.
String: 不不！我不是在请求。我只是在通知你这件事。

OriginString: As long as Bai wants to stay here, I will too.
String: 只要白想待在这儿，我就会留下。

OriginString: She said she was instructing people. Then I will do the same.
String: 她说要指导别人。那我也一样。

OriginString: What she can do, I can do better!
String: 她能做的，我能做得更好！

OriginString: However, unlike the crude techniques of the Rising Sun Fist  Style, the techniques of the Azure Blade style is much harder to master!
String: 不过和旭日拳那种粗浅功夫不同，青锋剑法的奥义可难掌握多了！

OriginString: So, that's what my style was called again!
String: 哦对，我那流派是叫这个名儿来着！

OriginString: ...Still sounds dumb.
String: ...还是那么蠢的名字。

OriginString: I will only be able to teach a single person at a time. However, that person will learn the Azure Blade style and be as effective as ten of Bai's disciples.
String: 我一次只能指导一个人。但这个人将学会青锋剑法，一个顶白教出来的十个徒弟。

OriginString: As you can see there is no reason to refuse even if you could.
String: "如你所见，就算你想拒绝也毫无理由。"

OriginString:
...
Will you still be wearing the mask while you're here?
String:
...
你在这儿的时候也要一直戴着面具吗？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Why? Is the mask a problem?
String: <?whiteFlash>...为什么？这个面具有问题吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>A big one!
String: <?shakeScreen>问题大了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I'm sick and tired of all these people who wear masks around me.
String: <?shakeScreen>我受够了身边这些成天戴面具的家伙。

OriginString: Is Shen even your real name?
String: 申""真的是你的本名吗？

OriginString: Well, technically it...isn't.
String: 严格来说...不是。

OriginString: ...Take it off.
String: ...摘下来。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>W-what?
String: <?whiteFlash>什...什么？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I said take it off!
String: <?shakeScreen>我说摘下来！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-wait! <?shakeScreeen>What are you doing?<?fadeOutNPC><?shakeScreen> Stop it!
String: <?shakeScreen>等...等等！<?shakeScreeen>你要干什么？<?fadeOutNPC><?shakeScreen>住手！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！！

OriginString: (Oh no! He's hot!)
String: (天啊！他好帅！)

OriginString: C-can I have my mask back? P-please?
String: 能...能把面具还给我吗？求...求你了？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>You suddenly seem different now.
String: <?whiteFlash>你突然看起来不一样了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-I am sorry!!! I was r-rude, wasn't I?
String: <?shakeScreen>对...对不起！！！我太...太失礼了，对吧？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I didn't mean to boast like that.
String: <?shakeScreen>我不是故意那样炫耀的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>A-and it was also terrible of m-me to touch you there!
String: <?shakeScreen>还...还有碰到你那里也...也太过分了！

OriginString: ...What is happening here?
String: ...现在是什么情况？

OriginString: Guild Master, let me introduce you to Yu. My childhood friend.
String: 公会会长，让我为你介绍玉。我的发小。

OriginString: The person behind the mask.
String: 面具后面的人。

OriginString: ...I still don't understand.
String: ...我还是没搞明白。

OriginString:
Let me demonstrate, Guild Master.
Can I have the mask?
String:
"让我来示范一下，公会会长。"
"能把面具给我吗？"

OriginString: If I put the mask on him...
String: 如果我把面具戴在他脸上...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>That was mighty brave of you, Guild Master, to take the mask of the man who could just kill you a hundred times over in a split of a second.
String: <?whiteFlash>你可真大胆啊公会会长，敢摘下一个能在瞬间杀死你上百次的人的面具。

OriginString: And if I take the mask off him...
String: 而如果我把面具摘下来...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>B-but I w-would never do that. I-I could never hurt anybody!
String: <?whiteFlash>但...但是我绝...绝对不会那么做。我...我从来不会伤害任何人！

OriginString: Is the mask haunted?
String: 这面具是被诅咒了吗？

OriginString: No, it's worse than that.
String: 不，比那更糟。

OriginString: Little Yu here is the heir to the Azure Blade style, but despite his talents, he never did well during his training.
String: 小玉是青刃流的传人，但尽管天赋异禀，他在训练中始终表现不佳。

OriginString: He was too timid and lacked any kind of self-confidence, usually getting beaten by people who were weaker than him.
String: 他太胆小，缺乏自信，经常被比他弱的人打败。

OriginString: Eventually, his parents got the idea to brainwash him. Now, every time he puts this stupid mask on, he believes himself to be Shen, an arrogant swordmaster with self-confidence enough for ten people.
String: 最后他父母想出了洗脑的主意。现在每次戴上这个蠢面具，他就会以为自己是个叫申的狂妄剑豪，自信程度够十个人用。

OriginString: ...So I guess, just teaching their kid some self-confidence was too easy, was it? Had to skip right over to brainwashing.
String: ...所以我猜，教孩子建立自信太麻烦了是吧？直接跳到了洗脑这一步。

OriginString: C-can I have the mask back? I-I think Shen would contribute better to the conversation.
String: 可-可以把面具还给我吗，我觉得沈会更好地参与对话。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Damn it, Yu! Just leave the mask off for a bit. How long has it been since you've been just you?
String: <?shakeScreen>该死的，玉！就暂时别戴面具了。你有多久没做真正的自己了？

OriginString: It's been a while since we last saw each other, hasn't it?
String: 我们好久没见了，对吧？

OriginString: How about we go drink together tonight?
String: 今晚一起去喝一杯怎么样？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I WANT MY MASK BACK!
String: <?shakeScreen>把面具还给我！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>G-GIVE IT BACK, BAI!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>还、还给我，白！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what? WHY?
String: <?shakeScreen>什、什么？为什么啊？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>J-JUST GIVE IT BACK!
String: <?shakeScreen>少、少废话快还给我！

OriginString: ...Great. Another oddball joined us.
String: ...太好了。又来个怪人。

OriginString: *Sighs*I guess at this point one more makes no difference.
String: *叹气*反正都这么多了，也不差这一个。

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master!
String: 你好，公会会长！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh, hello...eh...
String: <?whiteFlash>哦，你好...呃...

OriginString: ...You forgot my name, didn't you?
String: ...你忘了我的名字，对吧？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Just forget it!
String: <?shakeScreen>算了！

OriginString: There is something else I wanted to tell you.
String: 其实我有别的事要告诉你。

OriginString: Some courier came by and just left this letter to me. I thought it might be for you.
String: 有个信差过来，就把这封信塞给我了。我猜可能是给你的。

OriginString: Let me see...
String: 让我看看...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...This is addressed to Falken.
String: <?whiteFlash>...这是写给法尔肯的。

OriginString: Really? Can't read, so really couldn't tell.
String: 真的？我不识字，所以完全不知道。

OriginString: You can't read?
String: 你不识字？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>And you can't remember names! So, we're not all perfect, okay?
String: <?shakeScreen>你还记不住人名呢！谁还没点缺点啊！

OriginString: (Perhaps I should offer some reading classes in the Guild.)
String: (也许我该在公会开个识字班。)

OriginString: Should I take this over to Falken then?
String: 那要我帮忙转交给法尔肯吗？

OriginString: No need. I'll take care of it.
String: 不用，我来处理。

OriginString: Alright, then.
String: 那好吧。

OriginString: ...Is there something else?
String: ...还有什么事吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>You still didn't ask me my name!
String: <?shakeScreen>你还没问我叫什么名字呢！

OriginString: Hey, Falken!
String: 嘿，法尔肯！

OriginString: Oh! Hello, Guild Master! What is it?
String: 啊！会长好！有什么事吗？

OriginString: I wanted to deliver some great news, but where is Astrid? She needs to hear this too.
String: 有个好消息要宣布，但阿斯特丽德在哪？她也该听听。

OriginString: I'm here. I had a feeling that the adventurers had done it!
String: 我在这儿。我就知道冒险者们能成功！

OriginString: Done what?
String: 什么成功？

OriginString: I've sent some adventurers to participate in the grand tournament in Cragmond.
String: 我派了些冒险者参加克雷格蒙德的大比武。

OriginString: And they've won it!
String: 他们赢了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Heck yeah! That's what I'm talking about! I hope they really put those people from Talon's Fury down!
String: <?shakeScreen>太棒了！这才像话！希望他们好好教训了利爪之怒那帮人！

OriginString: Talon's Fury? You mean my old comrades? Is this what this is all about?
String: 利爪之怒？你是说我以前的队友？就为了这个？

OriginString: Well... yeah. We thought it would be nice to get them back for harassing you.
String: 这个...是啊。我们觉得该替你出口恶气。

OriginString: ...You really didn't have to do that.
String: ...你真的不必这样做的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What do you mean? They deserved it for constantly mocking you with their tournament invitations.
String: <?shakeScreen>什么意思？他们活该，谁让他们总是用比赛邀请来嘲讽你。

OriginString: They knew exactly how much it meant to you!
String: 他们明明知道这对你意味着什么！
由于您提供的原文部分缺失（"Key: DIALOGUESCENE490_FALKEN_DIALOGUE4 原文: ..."），我无法完成具体翻译。请您提供完整的待翻译英文游戏对话文本，我将严格按照您提出的9条要求进行专业的中文本地化翻译。

OriginString: Truth is, I deserve it.
String: 说实话，这是我应得的。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>What?
String: <?whiteFlash>什么？

OriginString: Guild Master. I tried to hide it, but we once met each other when I was still the Black Falcon. Do you remember?
String: 公会会长。我试图隐瞒，但我们曾经见过——那时我还是"黑隼"。你还记得吗？

OriginString: I remember meeting the 'Black Falcon' but you've really changed to the point I didn't recognize you. I mean all that black leather you were wearing.
String: 我记得见过"黑隼"，但你变化大到我都认不出来了。我是说你当时那身黑色皮衣...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-well, that's another thing completely.
String: <?shakeScreen>那、那是另一回事。

OriginString: But besides that. Tell me, what was your impression of me?
String: 但除此之外。告诉我，你当时对我的印象如何？

OriginString: ... Let me think. It was so long ago... But if I recall...
String: ...让我想想。那是很久以前了...如果没记错的话...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh...
String: <?whiteFlash>噢...

OriginString: Yeah, I was a bastard.
String: 没错，我就是个混蛋。

OriginString: The kind you'd love to beat up, Astrid.
String: 就是你最想揍的那种，阿斯特丽德。

OriginString: I was strong and famous at a young age, and more than once I let it all go to my head.
String: 我年少成名实力超群，不止一次被这些冲昏头脑。

OriginString: If you thought I was insufferable, how bad do you think it was for my comrades? There is a reason why none of them ever got famous despite us accomplishing so much.
String: 如果你都觉得我难以忍受，那我的队友们呢？我们完成了那么多伟业，却没有一个队友成名——这不是没有原因的。

OriginString: I downplayed every one of their achievements and belittled them in front of people wherever I could. I was a bully to the people who I should have cared for the most.
String: 我贬低他们的每一项成就，抓住一切机会当众羞辱他们。我霸凌了本该最珍惜的人。

OriginString: The day I lost my leg was because I took a dangerous quest they all protested against. But I forced them to risk their lives for my fame.
String: "我失去腿的那天，是因为我执意接下了他们都反对的危险任务。" "但我逼着他们为我的名声赌上性命。"

OriginString: Any of them could have become a cripple like me.
String: 他们任何一个人都可能变成我这样的残废。

OriginString: Or even worse.
String: 或者更糟。

OriginString: ... They still didn't have to harass you after such a long time.
String: ...即便如此，他们也不该时隔这么久还来骚扰你。

OriginString: ...You don't deserve it.
String: ...你不该承受这些。

OriginString: ...What's worse than a person doing bad things is a person who makes good people do bad things.
String: ...比作恶之人更可恨的，是让善人作恶之人。

OriginString: I deserve it.
String: 这是我应得的。

OriginString: And if it's just a letter every year, then I got off far too easily.
String: 如果只是每年一封信，那我的惩罚已经太轻了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Maybe you should talk with them?
String: <?whiteFlash>或许你该和他们谈谈？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>T-Talk with them?
String: <?shakeScreen>谈...谈谈？

OriginString: I... I don't know if I can. I'm too ashamed to face them after all this time.
String: 我...我不知道能不能做到。过了这么久，我实在没脸见他们。

OriginString: And I'm sure they don't even want to see me.
String: 而且我敢肯定他们根本不想见到我。

OriginString: Maybe they do.
String: 也许他们想呢。

OriginString: Huh?
String: 啊？

OriginString: There is another possible interpretation for the invitation. It could mean 'We're here. Come if you want to see us.'
String: 这份邀请还有另一种解读。它可能是在说'我们在这里。想见我们就来吧。'

OriginString: They might still be in Cragmond. It still might be possible to meet them.
String: 他们可能还在克雷格蒙德。现在去见他们或许还来得及。

OriginString: ...I-I don't know.
String: ...我...我不知道。

OriginString: It's laughable, isn't it? I used to face monsters on a daily basis but this somehow scares me more.
String: 真可笑对吧？我以前每天都要面对怪物，但这件事情却让我更害怕。

OriginString: I'll come with you.
String: 我陪你去。

OriginString: If any of them tries to make a scene, I'll crack their heads open.
String: 要是谁敢闹事，我就敲碎他们的脑袋。

OriginString: Astrid...
String: 阿斯特丽德...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Alright! You've convinced me. I'll go to Cragmond immediately!
String: <?shakeScreen>好吧！你说服我了。我这就动身去克雷格蒙德！

OriginString: I'll ask them for their forgiveness and try to make amends.
String: 我会请求他们的原谅，尽力弥补我的过错。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Let's go, Astrid!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们走，阿斯特丽德！

OriginString: I'm right behind you.
String: 我跟着你。

OriginString: And Guild Master..
String: 还有公会会长...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>No... {PROTAGONIST}...
String: <?whiteFlash>不...{PROTAGONIST}...

OriginString: Thank you!
String: 谢谢你！

OriginString: ...I wish you luck, Falken.
String: ...祝你好运，法尔肯。

OriginString: Now remember the form I taught you all and start swinging.
String: 都记住我教你们的姿势了吗？现在开始挥剑练习。

OriginString: (It seems like Falken is busy training some adventurers.)
String: （看起来法尔肯正在忙着训练一些冒险者）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh! Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>啊！公会会长！

OriginString: What are you doing here?
String: 您怎么来了？

OriginString: I needed to talk with you. Is this a bad moment?
String: 我有事找你。现在不方便吗？

OriginString: No, it's alright.
String: 不，没关系。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Everyone!
String: <?shakeScreen>所有人听着！

OriginString: Just because the Guild Master is here, doesn't mean you can slack off!
String: 别因为公会会长来了就偷懒！

OriginString: I want you to keep swinging your practice swords until your arms fall off!
String: 我要你们继续挥剑练习，直到手臂断掉为止！

OriginString: Ugh....
I don't even use swords!
String: 我根本不用剑的！

OriginString: Now that should keep them busy for a while. How can I help you, Guild Master?
String: 这样他们能忙上一阵子了。会长找我什么事？

OriginString: Actually, I have something for you.
String: 其实我有东西要给你。

OriginString: A letter arrived that is addressed to you.
String: 有封寄给你的信。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Is it that time of the year already?
String: <?whiteFlash>...又到这个时候了吗？

OriginString: *Sighs* You can throw it away if you wish.
String: *叹气* 你想扔就扔了吧。

OriginString: What? Are you sure?
String: 什么？你确定？

OriginString: Don't you want to at least read it?
String: 至少看看内容吧？

OriginString: No. It's the same letter every year.
String: 不用。每年都是一样的内容。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>The same letter every year?
String: <?whiteFlash>每年都一样？

OriginString: Don't worry about it, Guild Master. It's nothing, really.
String: 别在意，会长。真的没什么。

OriginString: Just throw it away for me, will you?
String: 帮我扔掉它，好吗？

OriginString: Well, if you say so.
String: 好吧，既然你这么说。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master. Now I better get back to my adventurers.
String: 谢谢会长。我得回去照看那些冒险者了。

OriginString: They probably already miss me.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 他们八成已经开始想我了。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (Opens the letter).
String: （打开信件）

OriginString: A tournament invitation?
String: 比武大会邀请函？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Is it another letter from those bastards again?
String: <?whiteFlash>又是那群混蛋寄来的信？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>！！！

OriginString: Astrid! Where did you come from?
String: 阿斯特丽德！你从哪冒出来的？

OriginString: I just saw you talking with Falken and that letter you were carrying.
String: 我刚看见你和法尔肯说话，还拿着那封信。

OriginString: Considering the time of the year, I knew immediately from whom it is.
String: 算算时间就知道是谁寄来的。

OriginString: If I ever get my hands on them...
String: 要让我逮到他们...

OriginString: From whom is this letter?
String: 这信是谁寄的？

OriginString: ...Falken's former Adventurer Party.
String: ...法尔肯以前的冒险者小队。

OriginString: ...From when he was still an adventurer.
String: ...这还是他当冒险者时候的事。

OriginString: Really? Why would they send him a tournament invitation?
String: 真的？他们为什么给他寄比武大会邀请函？

OriginString: It is a taunt!
String: 这是在挑衅！

OriginString: Every year these bastards send Falken an invitation to the yearly grand tournament in Cragmond, knowing full well he can't participate.
String: 每年这些混蛋都会给法尔肯寄克雷格蒙德年度比武大会的邀请函，明知道他不能参加。

OriginString: He used to win that tournament every year with his former party, but of course, after his injury, he had to retire.
String: 他以前每年都和队友一起赢得冠军，但受伤退役后就...

OriginString: Every year? That's quite the achievement.
String: 每年都赢？这可不简单。

OriginString: Didn't you know? Falken used to be quite the bigshot back in the days.
String: 你不知道吗？法尔肯当年可是个大人物。

OriginString: He used to be called the "Black Falcon."
String: 他有个外号叫"黑隼"。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>He is the "Black Falcon"?! He?!
String: <?shakeScreen>他就是"黑隼"？！他？！

OriginString: One of the few adventurers who were actually famous and respected?
String: 那个少数真正有名望的冒险者之一？

OriginString: ...I would have never guessed.
String: ...真没想到。

OriginString: I met the guy once, and he seemed like a very different person!
String: 我见过那人一次，完全判若两人！

OriginString: I didn't believe it myself at first, too, but believe me. He's the real deal.
String: 我一开始也不信，但千真万确就是他。

OriginString: ...So why would his former teammates send him a letter every year just to taunt him?
String: ...那他的前队友为什么每年都要写信嘲讽他？

OriginString: Do you remember any names besides the "Black Falcon" from his party?
String: 你记得"黑隼"之外他队友的名字吗？

OriginString: ...Not really.
String: ...不太记得。

OriginString: That's how much he overshadowed everyone else in the party. It's no wonder they were jealous of him
String: 可见他在队里多么耀眼，难怪队友会嫉妒他

OriginString: Now that he can't fight back, they just enjoy kicking him while he's on the ground.
String: 现在他没法还手，他们就喜欢落井下石。

OriginString: Spineless bastards...
String: 没种的混蛋...

OriginString: That's low.
String: 太过分了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>You know what, Guild Master? We should do something!
String: 你知道吗，工会会长？我们应该做点什么！

OriginString: What did you have in mind?
String: 你有什么想法？

OriginString: Even after Falken left the party, they manage to win it every year. How about we send our adventurers to that tournament and win it ourselves?
String: 法尔肯离队后他们居然每年都能赢。不如派我们的冒险者去参赛，亲自拿下冠军？

OriginString: Let our adventurers put them in their place and show them that even Falken's trainees are better than them.
String: 让咱们的人好好教训他们，证明连法尔肯带出来的学徒都比他们强。

OriginString: I do not dislike that idea. It would be also a great way to spread the Guild's name.
String: 这主意不坏。还能顺便打响公会名号。

OriginString: Great!
String: 太好了！

OriginString: I would have preferred a more violent solution but this will have to suffice.
String: 我本来想用更暴力的方式解决...不过这样也行吧。

OriginString: I have to say that I rarely met bandits myself most of my life.
String: 说实话我这辈子很少遇到强盗。

OriginString: There was one time where the order was sent out to destroy a group of bandits that has made the mistake of robbing merchants affiliated with the king.
String: 有次奉命剿灭一伙强盗——他们胆大包天竟敢抢劫皇家商队。

OriginString: What happened that day couldn't even be considered a fight.
String: 那天根本称不上是战斗。

OriginString: But most of the time, bandits were rarely an occurence for me.
String: 不过大多数时候，强盗确实很少出现在我面前。

OriginString: I guess bandits know better than to mess with the powerful people.
String: 毕竟强盗也懂不能招惹强者吧。

OriginString: Not much consolation for everyone else.
String: 对其他人来说可不算什么安慰。

OriginString: I've heard adventurers who seemingly mocked the title and thought nothing of it.
String: 我听说一些自以为是的冒险者嘲笑这个头衔，毫不在意。

OriginString: However, I would be wary of anyone with a title like that, Guild Master.
String: 但是会长，我会警惕任何拥有这种头衔的人。

OriginString: I've seen how people react to it. It would be unwise to underestimate someone with a title with this much weight behind it.
String: 我见识过人们对这个头衔的反应。低估这种分量十足的称号持有者可不明智。

OriginString: I've heard of the Divine Messenger, although I've never seen her.
String: 我听说过神谕使者，虽然从未亲眼见过。

OriginString: In fact most people have never seen her. Not for a lack of trying.
String: 实际上大多数人都没见过她。不是人们没尝试过。

OriginString: In my time as part of the Crown Order, I remember the king trying several times to seek an audience with her.
String: 我在王室骑士团服役时，记得国王多次试图求见她。

OriginString: Every time he was refused.
String: 每次都遭到拒绝。

OriginString: Considering that, it's rather strange that she would decide to meet the leader of an organization so far below her.
String: 这么看来，她主动要见您这样地位远低于她的组织领袖，实在很蹊跷。

OriginString: ...Ah, right! No offense, Guild Master.
String: ...啊对了！无意冒犯，会长。

OriginString: Some taken.
String: 有点被冒犯到了。

OriginString: The way the gods handle the issue with the witch reminds me of my time with the Crown Order.
String: 神明处理女巫问题的方式让我想起了我与皇冠骑士团共事的日子。

OriginString: In what way?
String: 怎么说？

OriginString: There were also often times where we were sent on missions with no knowledge of their purpose.
String: 那时我们也经常被派去执行任务却对其目的一无所知。

OriginString: Usually when that happens, it means that there is some dirty secret somebody does not want anyone to know of.
String: 通常这种情况意味着有人想掩盖某些见不得光的秘密。

OriginString: If that's the case, I can only advise you to be careful, Guild Master. Some secrets are better left unknown if you want to live long.
String: 如果是这样，我只能建议您小心行事，公会会长。要想活得久，有些秘密最好永远别去探究。

OriginString: ...I'll try to keep that in mind, Luana.
String: ...我会记住的，露安娜。

OriginString: Have a good day, Guild Master.
String: 祝您今天愉快，公会会长。

OriginString: Greetings, Guild Master.
String: 你好，工会会长。

OriginString: So is Luana your real name?
String: 所以露安娜是你的真名吗？

OriginString: It's my parent's given name if that's what you're asking.
String: 如果你问的是父母给的名字，那确实如此。

OriginString: Oh good. Nothing to worry about in that regard then.
String: 那就好。这方面没什么可担心的了。

OriginString: I was just considering the possibility that Rogue might have told you to give me a fake name.
String: 我只是在想，罗格可能让你给我报个假名。

OriginString: I can see her doing that.
String: 这确实像她会干的事。

OriginString: I have to say that from your look and behaviour you seem to be very different from Rogue.
String: 我得说从你的外表和行为来看，你和罗格很不一样。

OriginString: Are you affiliated to "them" like her?
String: 你也和她一样是"他们"的人吗？

OriginString: No, I'm not, Guild Master.
String: 不，我不是，公会会长。

OriginString: To tell the truth, I myself do not know much of "they" other that "they" call themselves "The Hand".
String: 说实话，除了他们自称"手"之外，我对"他们"知之甚少。

OriginString: (Well, at least now I don't have to call them "they" anymore.)
String: (好吧，至少现在不用再叫他们"他们"了。)

OriginString: Rogue herself won't tell me anything. She says that any knowledge I gain would only put me in danger.
String: 罗格自己什么都不肯告诉我。她说我了解得越多就越危险。

OriginString: It's kinda cute how much she worries.
String: 她这么担心我的样子还挺可爱的。

OriginString: (She has been acting "cuter" since you got here.)
String: (自从你来之后，她确实变得"可爱"多了。)

OriginString: So what's your affiliation then?
String: 那你属于哪个组织？

OriginString: I am, or better I was, part of The Crown Order.
String: 我曾是圣冠骑士团的一员。

OriginString: The Crown Order? Isn't that the chivalric order founded by the King to gather the best knights in the country?
String: 圣冠骑士团？那不是国王为集结全国最优秀的骑士而建立的骑士团吗？

OriginString: Yes, it is.
String: 是的。

OriginString: Then that also means you're a...
String: 那也意味着你是...

OriginString: A noble, yes.
String: 贵族，没错。

OriginString: My full name is Luana Moonguard.
String: 我的全名是露安娜·月卫。

OriginString: ...So, not even lower nobility. Even I have heard of the Moonguard family.
String: ...看来连低级贵族都算不上。连我都听说过月卫家族。

OriginString: (You really have a high-class friend here, Rogue).
String: (罗格，你这次可交了个上流社会的朋友啊。)

OriginString: You don't have to feel uncomfortable around me, Guildmaster.
String: 会长不必对我感到拘束。

OriginString: None of that matters anymore, since I lost my position in the Order. I have no titles anymore.
String: 自从被骑士团除名后，那些头衔就都不作数了。

OriginString: What about your family?
String: 你的家族呢？

OriginString: I was dishonorably discharged.
String: 我是被不光彩地逐出的。

OriginString: To them, I'm already dead.
String: 对他们来说，我已经死了。

OriginString: I see...
String: 我明白了...

OriginString: (I think I noticed a pattern.)
String: (我好像发现了一个规律。)

OriginString: So, about Rogue...
String: 关于罗格...

OriginString: Yeah?
String: 嗯？

OriginString: Nevermind.
String: 算了。

OriginString: Oh.
String: 哦。

OriginString: But that reminds me what Rogue once said...
String: 不过这让我想起罗格说过...

OriginString: What did she say?
String: 她说什么了？

OriginString: ...I can't remember.
String: ...想不起来了。

OriginString: I see.
String: 好吧。

OriginString: (I should try this with Rogue too.)
String: (下次也该这样逗逗罗格。)

OriginString: Is there more you'd like to discuss?
String: 你还想讨论些什么吗？

OriginString: Lately, Rogue has been avoiding me.
String: 最近罗格总躲着我。

OriginString: I think she still just feels a bit embarassed after what you said last time.
String: 我想她还在为你上次说的话感到尴尬。

OriginString: What do you mean?
String: 什么意思？

OriginString:
You know, the whole "Whatever may come, I'll be with you."
It kinda sounded like you intend to stay by her side for the rest of your life.
String:
"你知道吗，那句'无论发生什么，我都会陪着你'，
听起来像是你打算这辈子都守在她身边似的。"

OriginString: I do.
String: 我是这么想的。

OriginString: Oh, I see.
String: 噢，我懂了。

OriginString: Then you better grab onto her and never let go.
String: 那你最好抓紧她永远别放手。

OriginString: ...I think I'll do that. <?fadeOutNPC>
String: ...我会这么做的。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...<?shakeScreen>W-wait! Luana! I meant figuratively!
String: ...<?shakeScreen>等、等等！露安娜！我是打个比方啊！

OriginString: It looks to me like you and Rogue live in two different worlds.
String: 看起来你和罗格生活在两个不同的世界

OriginString: How did you two meet each other and what's your relationship?
String: 你们俩是怎么认识的？你们是什么关系？

OriginString: ...I'm sorry Guild Master.
String: ...对不起公会会长

OriginString: ...I'm not sure if Rogue would be fine with me sharing that story.
String: ...我不确定罗格是否愿意让我分享那段往事

OriginString: If you really want to know, try asking her.
String: 如果你真想知道，不妨直接去问她

OriginString: (That probably won't be easy.)
String: (这恐怕不太容易)

OriginString: I can only say that the first time I met her,...
String: 我只能说第一次见到她的时候...

OriginString: ...it was the best day in my life.
String: ...那是我生命中最美好的一天

OriginString: Bandits, nothing more than unskilled trash that live from the work of others.
String: 强盗就是群靠他人劳动过活的废物

OriginString: Killing them were one of the few good things adventurers used to do.
String: 消灭他们是冒险者少数做过的正经事

OriginString: I once had an argument with my old party because they wanted to negotiate with bandits.
String: 我曾因为队友想和强盗谈判而大吵一架

OriginString: I gave my opinion on that matter by simply putting arrows through the bandits' skulls.
String: 我的回应就是直接把箭射进那些强盗的脑袋

OriginString: ...Dear gods...
String: ...老天爷啊...

OriginString: "The Bandit King". What a load of bullshit!
String: 叫什么"强盗之王"。真是傻缺

OriginString: He could as well call himself the king of trash and it would make no differences.
String: 他还不如自称垃圾之王，反正没什么区别。

OriginString: I hope his next title starts with "The dead...".
String: 希望他下一个头衔以"死掉的..."开头。

OriginString: Just another disappointing person.
String: 又是个让人失望的家伙。

OriginString: You'd think somebody called the "Divine Messenger" would have morals that stands above others.
String: 还以为被称为"神圣使者"的人会有什么高尚的道德准则。

OriginString: But I was completely mistaken.
String: 看来我完全想错了。

OriginString: Nothing good comes out of talking about it...
String: 讨论这个不会有好结果...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...Wait.
String: <?whiteFlash>...等等。

OriginString: Is that why you didn't want to talk about your former...
String: 这就是你不想谈论你前任...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I DON'T WANT TO TALK ABOUT IT!
String: <?shakeScreen>我不想讨论这个！

OriginString: I don't see any point in having her in the dungeon.
String: 我看不出把她关在地牢有什么意义。

OriginString: If it were up to me there would be already arrows sticking out of her skull.
String: 要我说算的话，她脑袋上早就该插满箭了。

OriginString:
Please, don't do anything stupid.
There's still a lot I need to ask her.
String:
"拜托，别干傻事。
我还有好多事要问她呢。"

OriginString: If you think that'll help.
String: 如果你觉得这能帮上忙的话。

OriginString: Have you been with the Adventurer Guild for long, Astrid?
String: 你在冒险者公会待了很久吗，阿斯特丽德？

OriginString: Is this supposed to be a social conversation? Don't waste both of our times!
String: 你这是想闲聊吗？别浪费我们俩的时间！

OriginString: For better or worse I'm the Guild Master, here. I should know the people working for me.
String: 不管好坏我都是这里的公会会长。我该了解为我工作的人。

OriginString: Do you honestly even care?
String: 你是真心在乎吗？

OriginString:
I do.
I care because Fran would have cared.
String:
我愿意。
我在乎是因为弗兰也会在乎。

OriginString: ...Fine...
I actually started here as an adventurer when the Guild was still in its infancy.
String: 公会刚成立时我就以冒险者身份加入了。

OriginString: Honestly, at first I had no intention to join the Guild.
String: 说实话，最初我根本没想加入公会。

OriginString: I was already an adventurer at that time for some years and I already know how many of them really are.
String: 那时我已经当了几年冒险者，很清楚他们多数人的德性。

OriginString: I could only imagine the Guild as a hotpot of thugs and ruffians.
String: 我以为公会就是个恶棍流氓的窝点。

OriginString: Why did you change your mind then?
String: 那后来为什么改变主意了？

OriginString: ...I had a falling out with my own adventuring party at that time.
String: ...那时我和自己的冒险小队闹翻了。

OriginString: They wanted to do a Quest I simply couldn't agree to, so we went our seperate ways.
String: 他们接了个我无法苟同的任务，我们就分道扬镳了。

OriginString: It wasn't until much later I heard that things went wrong for them during that Quest and they all ended up dead.
String: 后来我才听说他们执行任务时出了意外，全死了。

OriginString: I'm sorry to hear that.
String: 听到这个我很难过。

OriginString: Don't be. They were bastards and deserved to die.
String: 不必。那群混蛋死有余辜。

OriginString: The only reason I worked with them was because I didn't think they would stoop so low.
String: 当初和他们组队只是没想到他们会这么下作。

OriginString: I was actually thinking about returning and killing them in their sleep, myself!
String: 我甚至想过回去亲手在睡梦中宰了他们！

OriginString: In any case, an adventurer without a party was just more likely to end up dead than one with. But it wasn't easy to find another party.
String: 总之，独行冒险者比组队更容易送命。但找新队伍也不容易。

OriginString: In the end, it felt like I had no choice but to check out the Guild if I wanted to improve my survival chance.
String: 最后为了活命，我只能试试加入公会。

OriginString: As it turned out, the Guild was actually different than I thought and I ended up in a party I could work with.
String: 结果公会和我想的不一样，我还找到了合拍的队伍。

OriginString: I did Quests for the Adventurer Guild for many years but it ended when I lost my eye.
String: 我为冒险者公会做了多年任务，直到失去这只眼睛。

OriginString: After that...incident, the previous Guild Master offered me a job as an instructor and I accepted.
String: ...那件事之后，前任会长让我当教官，我就接受了。

OriginString: Now, we're here.
String: 然后，就到今天了。

OriginString: And what happened to your old Adventuring Party, after you stopped?
String: 那你原来的冒险小队后来怎样了？

OriginString: I do not want to talk about them!
String: 我不想提他们！

OriginString: Don't ever ask me about them again!
String: 别再问我关于他们的事！

OriginString: Need something?
String: 有事？

OriginString: So...about you and Falken...
String: "所以...关于你和法尔肯的事..."

OriginString: Huh? Don't tell me you have been eavesdropping!
String: 哈？你该不会一直在偷听吧！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-it wasn't on purpose! I just wanted to make sure nothing happened.
String: <?shakeScreen>不、不是故意的！我只是想确认没出什么状况。

OriginString: ...What do you want?
String: ...你想说什么？

OriginString: Nothing! I just thought it was weird that you blew him off because I was sure that you...also had some feelings for him.
String: 没什么！只是觉得你拒绝他很奇怪，因为我明明觉得你...也对他有好感。

OriginString: It won't work.
String: 不会有结果的。

OriginString: Why would you think that?
String: 为什么这么想？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>I know very well that I'm difficult! 
<?shakeScreen>I-I just can't help it! There is so much anger in me and I don't know where to direct it!
String: <?shakeScreen>我很清楚自己有多难相处！

OriginString: ...I don't want to direct it at Falken.
String: ...我不想把怒火发泄在法尔肯身上。

OriginString: ...But do you like him?
String: ...但你喜欢他吗？

OriginString: ...I don't hate him.
String: ...我不讨厌他。

OriginString: (Rejoice Falken! There might be hope for you yet.)
String: (高兴吧法尔肯！你说不定还有希望。)

OriginString: If you say so.
String: 随你怎么说。

OriginString: Anything else?
String: 还有别的事吗？

OriginString:
Gods, damn it! How often do I have to tell you?
That's not how you shoot an arrow!
String:
天杀的！我说了多少遍了
你那是射箭吗？！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-I'm s-sorry, m'aam!
String: <?shakeScreen>对、对不起，长官！

OriginString: Hold it like this! Now try it again!
String: 像这样握弓！再试一次！

OriginString: Y-yes! <?fadeOutNPC>
String: 是、是的！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (Whoosh....the arrow missed the target by a mile...)
String: (咻......箭偏离靶子十万八千里...)

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><b>Are you trying to piss me off?
String: <?shakeScreen><b>你是存心想气死我吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Yikes! N-No, m'aam!
String: <?shakeScreen>呜哇！不、不敢，长官！

OriginString: Do you like kittens?
String: 你喜欢小猫咪吗？

OriginString: W-what?
String: 什、什么？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><b>I SAID: DO YOU LIKE KITTENS!!!
String: <?shakeScreen><b>我·说：你·喜·欢·小·猫·咪·吗！！！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Y-YES! V-VERY MUCH SO!!
String: <?shakeScreen>喜、喜欢！超喜欢的！！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><b>THEN MAYBE I JUST GET A WHOLE BUNCH OF THEM AND PUT THEM EVERYWHERE BUT THE TARGETS!
String: <?shakeScreen><b>那我干脆弄一群猫崽子来，把它们挂满靶场——除了靶子！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><b>MAYBE THAT WILL MOTIVATE YOU TO HIT THE DAMN TARGET!
String: <?shakeScreen><b>这样你总该有动力射中那个该死的靶子了吧！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><b>NOOOOO!!!!!!!
String: <?shakeScreen><b>不要啊啊啊！！！！

OriginString: (Dear gods...)
String: (老天爷啊...)

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Whoa there! I think this is enough training for today!
How about we just call it a day and continue tomorrow?
String: 要不今天就到这里，明天继续？

OriginString: Y-yes! Thank you, sir!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 好、好的！谢谢您，长官！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Hmph! Look at how fast she can run when it's not laps around the field.
String: 哼！看看她不用绕场跑圈时能跑多快。

OriginString: Astrid...how often have I told you that it would be better if you were just a little bit nicer to the adventurers?
String: 阿斯特丽德...我说过多少次了，如果你对冒险者们稍微友善一点会更好？

OriginString: I think I was perfectly reasonable.
String: 我觉得自己完全合情合理。

OriginString: ...Really?
String: ...真的吗？

OriginString: The whole kitten thing was reasonable? Did you even hear yourself?
String: 拿小猫当人质也算合情合理？你听听自己说的什么话？

OriginString: Hey Falken...
String: 嘿法尔肯...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Oh, Guild Master!
String: <?whiteFlash>哦，公会会长！

OriginString: You saw all that, huh?
String: 你都看到了是吧？

OriginString: Pretty much.
String: 差不多吧。

OriginString: *sigh*...I don't think you two have met yet. Guild Master; let me introduce you to Astrid. The Archer Instructor.
String: *叹气*...我想你们还没见过。公会会长，让我给你介绍阿斯特丽德，弓箭教官。

OriginString: Astrid; this is the new Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild.
String: 阿斯特丽德，这位是冒险者公会的新任会长。

OriginString: Are you also here to tell me how to do my job?
String: 你也是来教我该怎么工作的？

OriginString: Normally I wouldn't...
String: 通常我不会...

OriginString: ...but, I do think threatening to take kittens as hostages...goes a bit too far.
String: ...但用小猫当人质威胁...确实有点过分了。

OriginString: ...Fine! I won't take kittens as hostages.
String: ...好吧！我不会拿小猫当人质了。

OriginString: ...I would have never thought that something like that was even on the table.
String: ...我从没想过这种事居然还能讨价还价。

OriginString: Ah bandits. The perfect antagonists to the start of any hero's journey.
String: 啊强盗。任何英雄传奇开篇的完美反派。

OriginString: This could be very well the opening act of the glorious story of the Adventurer Guild's rise to fame.
String: 这很可能成为冒险者公会崛起传奇的精彩序幕。

OriginString: Ah! I already have a wonderful title in my mind! I need to write it down fast!
String: 啊！我已经想到个绝妙的标题了！得赶紧记下来！

OriginString: ...This is the most upbeat reaction I got from the bandit situation yet.
String: ...这是目前为止我听到关于强盗事件最积极的反应了。

OriginString: Oh, the Bandit King! What a wonderful antagonist for the Adventurers' Guild. A man whose cruelty knows no bounds, and only the heroes from the Adventurers' Guild can stop his dastardly plans!
String: "哦，强盗王！冒险者公会最完美的宿敌。一个残暴无度的恶徒，只有冒险者公会的英雄们才能阻止他那些卑鄙的阴谋！"

OriginString: ...What plans? He's a bandit...
String: ...什么阴谋？他就是个强盗...

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Shush, Guild Master! Inspiration has hit me!
String: <?whiteFlash>嘘，公会会长！灵感降临了！

OriginString:
In a land of danger and strife,
A bandit king ruled with an iron life.
His cruelty knew no bounds,
And his tyranny weighed heavy on all around.
String:
在这片危机四伏的土地上，
强盗王用铁腕统治四方。
他的残暴毫无止境，
暴政的重压让众生难当。

OriginString:
But the Guild of Adventurers came to the fore,
With bravery and skill, they vowed to restore,
The peace and justice that had been denied,
By the bandit king and his wicked pride.
String:
"但冒险者公会挺身而出，
以勇气与技艺立誓要收复，
被强盗王与其邪恶傲慢，
所剥夺的和平与正义之路。"

OriginString:
They send brave adventurers to the bandit king's lair,
The heroes found him ready, with his minions, to ensnare,
But they fought with all their might and main,
Until the bandit king was defeated, his power waned.
String:
"他们派遣勇敢的冒险者直捣强盗王的老巢，
英雄们发现他早已布下天罗地网，爪牙环绕，
但众人奋力拼杀，使出浑身解数，
直到强盗王败北，权势尽消。"

OriginString:
With the bandit king vanquished, the people rejoiced,
Their freedom and hope now fully voiced.
And the heroes returned, to a grateful land,
Their bravery and sacrifice forever etched in sand.
String:
"随着强盗王的覆灭，人民欢欣鼓舞，
自由与希望此刻尽情倾诉。
英雄们凯旋，回到感恩的故土，
他们的勇气与牺牲永载史书。"

OriginString:
The Adventurer Guild first unbeknown,
now rose in fame, their valor shown.
Thus ends the first chapter of their story,
in their neverending quest for glory.
String:
冒险者公会初时无名，
如今声名鹊起，勇武昭彰。
他们故事的第一篇章就此落幕，
永无止境的荣耀追寻仍在征途。

OriginString: So, what do you think, Guild Master?
String: 那么，您觉得如何，公会会长？

OriginString: I guess, it wasn't bad. Just one thing I like to point out.
String: 还行吧。不过有件事我得指出来。

OriginString: Oh? And what is that, Guild Master?
String: 哦？是什么事呢，公会会长？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>It probably won't be the Guild that deals with the Bandit King. There is already a subjugation force being formed to attack the bandits. It's very likely we won't have any part in it.
String: <?whiteFlash>讨伐强盗王的任务很可能轮不到公会。已经有人组建讨伐队去剿匪了。我们八成插不上手。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-wait you can't let that happen! How would my story sound when someone else besides the protagonists deals with the villains? It would be awful!
String: <?shakeScreen>等、等等！不能让他们抢功啊！要是反派被主角团之外的人解决了，我的故事还怎么编？那也太糟糕了！

OriginString: Nothing we can do.
String: 无能为力。

OriginString: *Sighs* I guess, I'll just skip that part in my story.
String: *叹气* 看来这段剧情只能跳过了。

OriginString: Can we talk about changing your name now?
String: 现在能谈谈给您改名的事了吗？

OriginString: No.
String: 不行。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I just want so little!
String: <?shakeScreen>我的要求明明这么简单！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>The Divine Messenger?!
String: <?shakeScreen>神圣使者？！

OriginString: To think that the day would come where I might lay eyes on the Divine Messenger herself!
String: 没想到有生之年竟能亲眼见到神圣使者本人！

OriginString: You seem awfully excited about it.
String: 你似乎异常兴奋啊。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Of course I am! How could you not?
String: <?shakeScreen>当然兴奋！您怎么能不激动呢？

OriginString: She is the chosen of the gods! If there is any person, who could be considered a main character in life, then it would be her!
String: 她可是神选之人！如果说这世上真有天选主角，那非她莫属！

OriginString: I need to prepare a song for her! Something fitting for a person of her stature.
String: 我得为她准备一首赞歌！要配得上她尊贵身份的曲子。

OriginString: I know! I'll write a song that describes her transcending beauty and her infinite wisdom.
String: 有了！我要谱写她超凡脱俗的美貌和无穷智慧的诗篇。

OriginString: Can you do that when you've never seen her?
String: 你连她面都没见过，这能写出来？

OriginString: Unimportant details, Guild Master!
String: 这种细节无关紧要，公会会长！

OriginString: How marvelous! After defeating the dreaded Bandit King the Adventurer Guild has now subdued the Witch, a servant of the demon lords!
String: "太棒了！在击败可怕的强盗王之后，冒险者公会现在又降服了恶魔领主的手下——那个女巫！"

OriginString: With this my song about the Adventurer Guild is nearly complete!
String: 这样一来，我为冒险者公会创作的歌曲就快要完成了！

OriginString: Nearly?
String: 快完成了？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Of course!
I still need a third act! A third enemy the Guild can vanquish!
String: <?shakeScreen>当然！

OriginString: Something even grander than defeating the avatar of the demon lords!
String: 要比击败恶魔领主的化身更宏大的事件！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I know! The Adventurer Guild needs to...
String: <?whiteFlash>我知道了！冒险者公会应该去...

OriginString: If you suggest challenging a demon lord, I might just have to smack you over the head.
String: 如果你建议去挑战恶魔领主，我可能会忍不住敲你的脑袋。

OriginString: Fine...I won't suggest it.
String: 好吧...我不提这个了。

OriginString: I think you just gave me an inspiration for a song.
String: 我觉得你刚刚给了我写歌的灵感。

OriginString: It's wonderful to meet you again, Guild Master!
String: "能再次见到您真是太好了，公会会长！"

OriginString: I'm still all ears, Guild Master!
String: 我洗耳恭听，公会会长！

OriginString: So if you wanted to write a story about the Adventurer Guild, why didn't you come when the Adventurer Guild was at their peak?
String: 既然你想写关于冒险者公会的故事，为什么不在公会鼎盛时期来取材呢？

OriginString: A wonderful question, Guild Master! Albeit, one that I can easily answer.
String: 好问题啊，公会会长！不过这个问题我很容易回答。

OriginString: When the Adventurer Guild was formed, the world was still a darker place for I still wasn't the bard I am today.
String: 冒险者公会成立时，世界还很黑暗，因为那时我还不是现在这样的吟游诗人。

OriginString: By the time I finally was, the Guild was already known far and wide. And with that my opportunity was already gone.
String: 等我终于成为诗人时，公会早已声名远扬。我的机会就这样错过了。

OriginString: There was simply no beauty in writing the story of the Adventurer Guild when I've never witnessed its ascendance.
String: 我从未见证公会的崛起，写它的故事就毫无美感可言。

OriginString: Nor was I particularly interested in writing its downfall in the following years.
String: 而我对记录它后来的衰落也提不起兴趣。

OriginString: But then I heard that out of nowhere, a new Guild Master has emerged to lead the Adventurer Guild once more.
String: 但后来我听说，一位新会长突然出现，重新领导起了冒险者公会。

OriginString: Every fiber of my being told me that the appearance of a new Guild Master was no mere coincidence.
String: 我全身的细胞都在告诉我，新会长的出现绝非偶然。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>No! It was fate. 
A sign from the gods that I was always meant to write an even better story:
String: <?shakeScreen>不！这是命运。是神明在暗示我注定要书写更精彩的故事：

OriginString: The resurgence of the Adventurer Guild!
String: 冒险者公会的复兴！

OriginString: And you my dear Guild Master will be the main character of it.
String: 而你，亲爱的公会会长，将成为这个故事的主角。

OriginString: I'd rather if you leave me out of it.
String: 我宁愿你别把我写进去。

OriginString: Oh, that's good! Modesty is a trait the audience will love!
String: 噢，这样很好！谦虚是观众会喜欢的特质！

OriginString: But we still have to do something about your name. Have you read my list with name suggestions yet?
String: 不过我们还得处理下你的名字。你看过我列的建议名单了吗？

OriginString: I threw it away...
String: 我扔掉了...

OriginString:
You were right to do that, Guild Master!
Because my second draft is even better!
String:
"你做得太对了，公会会长！"
"因为我的第二稿比之前精彩多了！"

OriginString: I guess you're not really interested in guild affairs are you?
String: 我猜你对公会事务没什么兴趣吧？

OriginString: To be precise, I do not have any interest in the Adventurer Guild at all.
String: 准确地说，我对冒险者公会毫无兴趣。

OriginString: (That's a good start into the conversation...)
String: （这对话开头可真顺利...）

OriginString: My main interest lies in the study of the ancient empire that preceded the nine kingdoms we know today.
String: 我的主要兴趣在于研究现今九大王国的前身——古帝国。

OriginString: Anything outside of that is of no concern of mine.
String: 除此之外的事都与我无关。

OriginString: Then how did you end up in the Adventurer Guild?
String: 那你怎么会加入冒险者公会？

OriginString: Are you asking out of curiosity or is this just a misguided attempt at a casual conversation?
String: 你是出于好奇，还是只是试图闲聊的拙劣尝试？

OriginString: Just please answer the question...
String: 请直接回答问题...

OriginString: Very well then.
String: 好吧。

OriginString: It was about five years ago when I came upon an ancient artifact that was sold by a simple merchant.
String: 大约五年前，我在一个普通商人那里发现了一件古代文物。

OriginString: It was one I've never seen before and I asked the man where he found it.
String: 那是我从未见过的类型，于是我询问那个商人从何处得来。

OriginString: He told that the Adventurer Guild has sold him the artifact and so I travelled to the Guild to see if they had more.
String: 他告诉我冒险者公会卖给他的，于是我就来公会看看是否还有更多。

OriginString: It would be an understatement to say that I was surprised when I saw the dozens of artifacts the Adventurers Guild had just lying around in their storage room.
String: 当我看到冒险者公会储物间里随意堆放的数十件文物时，说"惊讶"都是轻描淡写了。

OriginString: Apparently, adventurers are quite inclined to find such artifacts during their quests.
String: 显然，冒险者在任务中很容易发现这类文物。

OriginString: (I guess they do. I've also found severals during my time as an adventurer.)
String: （确实。我当冒险者时也找到过好几件。）

OriginString: (They're usually hard to sell, so most of the time I threw them away.)
String: （通常很难脱手，所以大多时候我都扔掉了。）

OriginString: (I probably shouldn't tell her that.)
String: （这事还是别告诉她为好。）

OriginString: It was then that I made an arrangement with the Guild Master at that time.
String: 于是我和当时的会长达成了协议。

OriginString: While not as meaningful as my knowledge of the ancient empire, I was well versed in the practice of the arcane arts.
String: 虽然比不上我对古帝国的研究造诣，但我也精通奥术技艺。

OriginString: I offered to teach adventurers that knowledge and in exchange I would be the only one to whom the Guild could sell their artifacts to.
String: 我提出教授冒险者这些知识，作为交换，公会只能将文物出售给我。

OriginString: An agreement I hope you intend to keep Guild Master.
String: 希望现任会长你也能遵守这个协议。

OriginString: I guess, I don't see anything wrong with that.
String: 我想没问题。

OriginString: Wonderful. With that you also answered my only question for you.
String: 很好。这样你也回答了我唯一关心的问题。

OriginString: ...so you're saying that you're not interested in anything else about me.
String: ...所以你对我其他事情都没兴趣。

OriginString: It's refreshing to see that the current Guild Master is quite fast to grasp the situation.
String: 现任会长能这么快理解状况，真是令人欣慰。

OriginString: A topic I very much lack an interest in.
String: "我对这个话题毫无兴趣。"

OriginString: Banditry is just a common problem that has persisted throughout time and is proof of our inadequacies as a society.
String: 盗匪横行不过是贯穿历史的顽疾，正是我们社会无能的明证。

OriginString: During the time of the ancient empire when human prosperity was at its' highest, the crime rate used to be accordingly low.
String: 上古帝国鼎盛时期人类繁荣昌盛，犯罪率自然相应低下。

OriginString: Unfortunately, since the collapse none of the emergent kingdoms has managed to reach the level of law and order of the empire.
String: 可惜自帝国崩塌后，新兴王国没一个能达到昔日的法治水平。

OriginString: So....you're saying that everything used to be better in the old times?
String: 所以...你是说过去什么都比现在好？

OriginString: Do not treat what I said as a jest. I was merely stating the facts.
String: 别当我在说笑。这些不过是客观事实。

OriginString: A meaningless title for a man of little importance.
String: 不过是给庸人加冕的无谓头衔。

OriginString: Whatever that man hopes to achieve with that kind of title won't come into fruition.
String: 那人妄想靠这种虚名成事，终究是痴人说梦。

OriginString: History has shown us kings that have suffered demise with a firmer foundation to stand upon.
String: 历史上根基更稳的君王都难逃覆灭，何况是他。

OriginString: I can say that she is a person of interest to me.
String: "可以说她是我感兴趣的人。"

OriginString: I earnestly wish I could get an opportunity to speak with her. Or to be more precise, an opportunity to speak with the gods through her.
String: 我真心希望能有机会与她交谈。更准确地说，是通过她与神明对话的机会。

OriginString: I feel like there are more fun conversation partners than gods.
String: 我觉得比神明更有趣的聊天对象多得是。

OriginString: *sighs* Of course it wouldn't be a conversation to exchange pleasantries.
String: *叹气* 当然不是为了寒暄闲聊的对话。

OriginString: My primary focus lies in their profound understanding of the ancient empire, specifically their knowledge regarding the circumstances that led to its demise.
String: 我主要关注的是他们对远古帝国的深刻理解，特别是关于帝国覆灭原因的知识。

OriginString: Well, you're nothing but consistent.
String: 好吧，你还真是一如既往。

OriginString: ...I do not see myself as a fighter, Guild Master.
String: ...我不认为自己是战士，公会会长。

OriginString: And that night made it painfully clear to me that I never want to be.
String: 而那个夜晚让我痛苦地明白，我永远都不想成为战士。

OriginString: It was the first and it will be the last time, I ever used magic against people.
String: 那是第一次也是最后一次，我对人类使用魔法。

OriginString: It's fascinating to think there's a wellspring of knowledge about the ancient Empire so close by. If only she were more inclined to share it.
String: "真有意思，关于古帝国的知识宝库就近在咫尺。要是她更愿意分享这些就好了。"

OriginString: I guess you had no better luck since last time?
String: 看来你比上次也没取得什么进展？

OriginString: Regrettably not. It seems she is not even willing to acknowledge my existence whenever I visit her.
String: 很遗憾没有。每次我去拜访时，她似乎连我的存在都不愿承认。

OriginString: It's truly a shame.
String: 这实在是种遗憾。

OriginString: Why are you so interested in something that has been gone for so long?
String: 你为什么对已经消失这么久的东西这么感兴趣？

OriginString: My initial fascination with the empire was sparked by an educational lecture that I had attended during my younger years at the university.
String: 我对帝国的着迷始于大学时代听过的一场学术讲座。

OriginString: The subject matter was of such enthralling nature that I found myself engaged in discussions with any academician possessing even a modicum of expertise in that area.
String: 这个课题如此引人入胜，以至于我后来逢人就要与那些稍有研究的学者讨论。

OriginString: It's remarkable how so many mysteries surrounding the empire continue to elude us to this day, despite leaving so many marks on the world.
String: 令人惊叹的是，尽管帝国在世界各地留下诸多痕迹，至今仍有无数未解之谜。

OriginString: Even to this day, we still uncover remnants of the ancient empire in areas that has been long reclaimed by the forces of nature.
String: 直到今天，我们还在那些早已被大自然吞噬的地区发现着古代帝国的遗迹。

OriginString: (I guess I never really thought about where those ruins actually came from.)
String: （我好像从没认真想过这些遗迹的来源）

OriginString: Merely based on that, it can be inferred that our current infrastructures fall short to even reach half the scale the ancient empire posessed.
String: 仅凭这点就足以推断，我们现在的基建规模连古代帝国的一半都达不到。

OriginString: Ancient manuscripts reveal to us a society that has been thriving, an empire the size of which would dwarf any known kingdom today.
String: 古籍记载那是个繁荣的文明，其帝国疆域能让当今任何王国都相形见绌。

OriginString: And most astounding of all, it lasted more than a thousand years before it finally collapsed.
String: 最惊人的是，它在最终崩塌前延续了千年之久。

OriginString: How did it collapse?
String: 它是怎么灭亡的？

OriginString: That is one of the great mysteries scholars were never able to find out.
String: 这正是学者们始终未能破解的重大谜团之一。

OriginString: Despite exhaustive researches, no conclusive evidence has ever been uncovered to shed light on the root cause of the empire's enigmatic disappearance.
String: 尽管研究详尽，至今仍未发现能解释帝国神秘消失的确凿证据。

OriginString: No signs of plagues, no signs of invading forces and no signs of a natural disaster.
String: 没有瘟疫迹象，没有外敌入侵，也没有自然灾害的痕迹。

OriginString: For all we know everything was fine until they were not.
String: 就我们所知，一切都很正常——直到突然就不正常了。

OriginString: However, given the limited progress in our technology and scientific understanding since the time of the empire, coupled with the vast expanse of unexplored territories, it is evident that a momentous event must have transpired.
String: 但考虑到自帝国时代以来我们在科技和理解力上的有限进步，再加上广袤的未探索区域，显然发生过某种重大事件。

OriginString: Something that resulted in a significant loss of life, leaving only a small group of survivors to undertake the arduous task of reconstruction.
String: 那场变故导致大量人口消亡，只留下少数幸存者艰难地重建文明。

OriginString: That kinda sounds...terrifying.
String: 这听起来...有点瘆人。

OriginString: No. It sounds like a captivating enigma eagerly awaiting our discovery and unraveling.
String: 不。这是个令人着迷的谜题，正等待我们去发现和破解。

OriginString: I shall return to my studies then.
String: 那我这就回去继续研究了。

OriginString: You require my attention?
String: 你找我有事？

OriginString: As you may already have surmised, my son has followed me in my scholarly footstep and delves into the very same subject as I.
String: 想必你也猜到了，我儿子追随我的学术脚步，研究的正是和我相同的课题。

OriginString: He really seems to look up to you, seeing as how he talked about you.
String: 听他的言谈，似乎真的很敬仰你呢。

OriginString: ...Originally, I thought that his intentions for doing so, were more...unpleasant.
String: ...原先我以为，他这么做的动机要更加...不堪。

OriginString: Huh?
String: 嗯？

OriginString: Guild Master, based on your knowledge of me thus far, do you perceive that I possess the qualities requisite for a commendable mother?
String: 公会会长，根据你目前对我的了解，你认为我具备一个称职母亲应有的品质吗？

OriginString: Well, I don't really have a good role model to compare to.
String: 这个嘛...我实在找不到合适的榜样来作比较。

OriginString: ...In my younger years I have dedicated a substantial portion of my existence to the pursuit of knowledge. As an avid seeker of wisdom, I embraced the mantle of a scholar.
String: ...年轻时我将生命的大部分时光都献给了求知。作为狂热的智慧追寻者，我披上了学者的外衣。

OriginString: During that time, my thoughts were guided predominantly by intellectual pursuits, and my heart was steadfastly loyal to the realm of academia.
String: 那时我的思想主要由学术追求主导，心灵始终忠诚于学术领域。

OriginString: Indeed, the notion of starting a family has always eluded me.
String: 确实，组建家庭的想法从未出现在我脑海中。

OriginString: Nonetheless, as you can see my life has diverged from the path I once envisioned.
String: 然而如你所见，我的人生已偏离了曾经设想的轨道。

OriginString: As much as I loved my boy, I never could give up on my studies and I must confess that as a result I neglected my motherly duties throughout the majority of his life.
String: 尽管深爱我的孩子，我却始终无法放弃研究，必须承认这导致我在他成长过程中长期疏于母亲职责。

OriginString: So you thought...?
String: 所以你当初以为...？

OriginString: I assumed he attempted to surpass my own accomplishments in the field most important to me. To show me how little I really accomplished at the expense of our relationship.
String: 我以为他是想在我最重视的领域超越我的成就，以此证明我牺牲亲子关系换来的成就有多么微不足道。

OriginString: Well, in the end it was different than that, wasn't it.
String: 但最终事实并非如此，不是吗。

OriginString: Indeed. Nevertheless, I feel that I need to try harder to become a mother that my boy deserves.
String: 确实。不过我觉得自己应该更努力，成为这孩子应得的好母亲。

OriginString: Don't forget being a grandmother now too.
String: 别忘了现在还要当个好外婆呢。

OriginString: Do not even start on this one. I am still having a hard time processing this revelation.
String: 别提这茬。我到现在都还没能消化这个事实。

OriginString: Is there more you need to discuss?
String: 还有别的事要谈吗？

OriginString: Our adventurers fought against a bandit who had a strange tattoo on his face. From what they told it seemed like the mark gave him some strange powers.
String: 我们的冒险者遇到一个脸上有奇怪纹身的强盗。据他们描述，这个标记似乎赋予了他某种诡异的力量。

OriginString: Because it seemed related to magic I was wondering if you maybe knew what they were.
String: 因为涉及魔法，我想也许你知道那是什么。

OriginString: Can you describe the appearance of that tattoo?
String: 能描述下那个纹身的样子吗？

OriginString: The adventurers made a sketch of it. Here look.
String: 冒险者们画了张草图。你看。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: Fascinating!
String: 太有趣了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>This mark! It's the mark of a demon lord.
String: <?shakeScreen>这个标记！是恶魔领主的印记。

OriginString: I don't like the sound of that...
String: 这听起来可不太妙...

OriginString: How very interesting. There have always been people trying to make foolhardy pacts with demons but this is the first time I see a mark from an actual demon lord.
String: 真有意思。虽然总有人鲁莽地与恶魔缔结契约，但恶魔领主的印记我还是第一次见到。

OriginString: So, what does it actually do?
String: 那么实际效果是什么？

OriginString: It acts like a blessing. The wearer is granted a small part of the demon lord's power and that can manifest itself in a plethora of different ways.
String: 它像是一种祝福。持有者能获得恶魔领主的部分力量，表现形式多种多样。

OriginString: *sigh*<waitfor=0.5>As if bandits didn't already cause enough headache. Now you're saying that the bandits are making deals with literal devils.
String: *叹气*<waitfor=0.5>强盗已经够让人头疼了，现在你告诉我他们居然在和真正的魔鬼做交易。

OriginString: It isn't as simple as that, Guild Master.
String: 事情没那么简单，公会会长。

OriginString:
Demon lords are far different from the ordinary demons you might know of.
They could be considered on the same level as the gods.
String:
"魔王和你认知中的普通恶魔可大不相同。"
"他们的存在几乎与神明比肩。"

OriginString: The rituals required to make contact with them are only known as fairy tales to a few. They weren't considered real.
String: 与它们建立联系的仪式只存在于少数人的童话故事里。没人当真过。

OriginString: Until today at least.
String: 至少在今天之前是这样。

OriginString: Then how do these bandits know them?
String: 那这些强盗是怎么知道的？

OriginString: That's the question indeed. Unfortunately I do not know the answer to it.
String: 这正是问题所在。可惜我也不知道答案。

OriginString: (Bandits and demons. Ugh...I got a bad feeling about this.)
String: （强盗和恶魔...啧...我有种不祥的预感）

OriginString: Bandit attacks were the best when I was travelling.
String: 我旅行时最喜欢遇到强盗袭击了。

OriginString: Sure the fights were mostly lackluster and most of the time they already went down after a hit.
String: 虽然打斗大多很无趣，而且他们通常挨一下就倒。

OriginString: But they usually had stuff with them I could use or sell. Even better when they had booze with them.
String: 但他们总带着能用的东西或值钱货。要是还带着酒就更棒了。

OriginString: Sometimes I would travel up and down a road, hoping to get ambushed.
String: 有时候我会在一条路上来回走，就盼着被伏击。

OriginString: I'd like to say I'm surprised but I'd be lying.
String: 虽然想说很意外，但那样就太虚伪了。

OriginString: That Bandit King sounds like my type of a guy.
String: "那个强盗王听起来挺对我胃口的。"

OriginString: Really?
String: 真的吗？

OriginString: Yeah, the kinda guy I could beat up and don't even have to feel bad about it.
String: 对啊，这种家伙我揍起来完全不用有负罪感。

OriginString: You feel bad about the people you beat up?
String: 你打人还会有负罪感？

OriginString: Of course. I pity them for being so weak!
String: 当然。我可怜他们太弱了！

OriginString: The Divine Messenger? Who's that?
String: 神圣使者？那是谁？

OriginString: You've never heard of her? The one chosen by the divines as their speaker?
String: 你从没听说过她？神明选中的代言人啊。

OriginString: The Divines?
String: 神明？

OriginString: The seven gods? Those who most people worship here?
String: 七位主神？这里大多数人信仰的那些？

OriginString: Never heard of them.
String: 完全没听过。

OriginString: ...Maybe your village has other gods. What do you worship in your village?
String: ...也许你们村子有其他神。你们村里供奉什么？

OriginString: I dunno. I think a dragon or something like that?
String: 不知道。好像是条龙之类的？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>How do you not know?
String: <?shakeScreen>这都能不知道？

OriginString: Cause it's boring! Booh!
String: 因为太无聊了嘛！略略略！

OriginString: I'll start worshipping a god if they can win against me in a fistfight.
String: 要是哪个神能打赢我，我就开始信仰他。

OriginString: (...Great. Now I have the image of Bai fist fighting a dragon in my head.)
String: (...完了。现在我满脑子都是白和龙对打的画面。)

OriginString: She seems tough. She kinda reminds me of some of the old people in my village.
String: "她看起来挺强硬的。让我想起了村里的一些老人。"

OriginString: The ones who look like they have tons of experiences in real battle. For some reason it even feels like she has even more experience than them.
String: 就是那些看起来身经百战的长辈。但不知为何，感觉她比他们经验更丰富。

OriginString: It's strange you'd think that.
String: 你这么想倒是挺奇怪的。

OriginString: Just saying how I see it. She just feels older than anyone I've ever met. Stronger too.
String: 实话实说而已。她给人的感觉比我见过的任何人都要老练，也更强。

OriginString: It makes me want to exchange some blows with her if I ever get the chance.
String: 这让我想找机会和她过过招。

OriginString: ...So, age doesn't matter to you when it comes to beating people...
String: ...所以对你来说，揍人和年龄无关是吧...

OriginString: When we first met you told us that you left your village to find students for your Martial Arts Style.
String: 初次见面时你说过，离开村子是为了给你的武术流派招收弟子。

OriginString: You mean "My Fist in your Face"-Style.
String: 你是说"我的拳头问候你脸"流派。

OriginString: ...Yeah.
I was wondering if everybody there wears clothes like yours?
String: 我好奇你们那儿的人都穿你这种衣服吗？

OriginString: It seems kinda...foreign to me.
String: 看起来有点...异域风情。

OriginString: Well..., I think my old folks said something about our ancestors coming from far away and founding that village...
String: 这个嘛...好像听老一辈提过，说我们祖先从很远的地方来建立了村子...

OriginString: ...but I didn't really listen.
String: ...但我也没认真听。

OriginString: Who cares, anyway? Not like the people inside my village and those outside differ so much.
String: 管他呢？反正村里人和外面人也没啥区别。

OriginString: They all suck at taking a punch.
String: 都经不起我两拳。

OriginString: So, you're also like this at home...
String: 看来你在老家也是这副德性...

OriginString: My old man always said that people talk with their fists.
String: 我家老头总说拳头才是最好的语言。

OriginString: But lately when I communicate with my father he's always quick to shedding tears.
String: 不过最近和我爹"交流"时，他总是一打就哭。

OriginString: I guess old age made him emotional. Bwahahaha!
String: 估计是年纪大了变得多愁善感。哇哈哈哈！

OriginString: (Sounds more like his lessons have backfired on him.)
String: (听起来像是他教的道理反噬了自己。)

OriginString: Good! I needed a drink anyway.
String: "太好了！我正想喝一杯呢。"

OriginString: Yo, what's up?
String: 哟，怎么了？

OriginString: You mentioned your father before. Is there anyone else in your family?
String: 你之前提到过你父亲。家里还有其他人吗？

OriginString: Of course there are. My mother for example, duh!
String: 当然有啊！比如我妈，这不是废话嘛！

OriginString: ...is she like you?
String: ...她和你像吗？

OriginString: Nah. Unlike me, she occasionally gets beaten up by the old man.
String: 不像。她偶尔会被老头子揍。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>(Domestic Violence?)
String: <?shakeScreen>（家暴？）

OriginString: But sometimes she does get a few good hits back.
String: 不过有时候她也能还几下手。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Huh?
String: <?whiteFlash>啥？

OriginString: I guess her track record against my old man is about 40 to 60 perhaps?
String: 我估计她对阵老头子的胜负大概四六开吧？

OriginString: Are you saying that your parents usually fight each other?
String: 你是说你父母经常打架？

OriginString: Course they do! How else would they determine the head of the family?
String: 当然啦！不然怎么决定谁当家做主？

OriginString: (So I guess the whole family is like that, huh?)
String: （看来这一家子都这样啊...）

OriginString: Of course, by the time I was 16, I was able to beat both their asses and became top dog of the house.
String: 那当然，我16岁就能把他俩都打趴下，成了家里老大。

OriginString: After that they never got their position back! Not even when they tried to ambush me together! Bwahahaha!
String: 之后他们再也没能翻盘！就算联手偷袭我也没用！哇哈哈哈！

OriginString: I also had an older brother who tried to put his hat into the ring for the position of the house head.
String: 我还有个大哥也想竞争家主位置。

OriginString: But when his five-year old sister was able to beat him up, he disappointedly gave up and started farming instead.
String: 但当他被五岁的妹妹暴打后，就失望地放弃去种田了。

OriginString: (He was probably like "Screw this shit! I'm out of here!")
String: （他当时肯定在想"去他妈的！老子不玩了！"）

OriginString: He actually married the neighbor's girl. The two of them have been multiplying like rabbits. They probably have their 12th kid right now.
String: 他后来娶了邻居家姑娘。两口子像兔子似的一直生，现在估计都第十二个孩子了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>(Is the girl alright?)
String: <?shakeScreen>（那姑娘还好吗？）

OriginString: I actually wanted to take all my nieces and nephews as students but for some reason my older brother was so much against it.
String: 我本来想收所有侄子侄女当徒弟的，不知为啥我哥特别反对。

OriginString: Well, whatever! Maybe next time when I'm back.
String: 算了算了！下次回去再说吧。

OriginString: (I think the world isn't ready for Bai and a horde of miniature versions of her running around wrecking places.)
String: （我觉得这个世界还没准备好迎接白和一群迷你版她到处搞破坏的景象）

OriginString: Are we done? I'm getting hungry.
String: 聊完了没？我饿了。

OriginString: So you and Shen are childhood friends?
String: 你和申是青梅竹马吗？

OriginString: No. Me and Yu were childhood friends.
String: 不。我和玉才是青梅竹马。

OriginString: Aren't they the same person?
String: 他们不是同一个人吗？

OriginString: No.
String: 不是。

OriginString: (That 'no' sounded like if I say otherwise, she's going to punch me.)
String: （这个"不是"说得好像我再说错她就要揍我似的。）

OriginString: You really don't like Shen, do you?
String: 你真的很不喜欢申，对吧？

OriginString: Do you know how long it has been since I last saw Yu?
String: 你知道我上次见到玉是什么时候的事了吗？

OriginString: In the beginning he just wore the mask a few times during his training. But slowly he has started to wear it more and more often.
String: 最开始他只是训练时偶尔戴戴面具。但慢慢地戴得越来越频繁。

OriginString: Until most of the time I would only see him while wearing that stupid mask.
String: 到最后我见到他时，十有八九都戴着那张蠢面具。

OriginString: No one in the village seemed to mind it. They say it gives Yu confidence and he becomes a better fighter with it.
String: 村里人好像都不在意。他们说这能让玉更有自信，戴着面具时他格斗表现更好。

OriginString:
...But that's not Yu.
It's Shen.
String:
...但那不是玉。
是申。

OriginString: I'd smash the mask to bits but it would only upset Yu.
String: 我恨不得把那面具砸个粉碎，但那样只会让玉难过。

OriginString: So, yeah. I do not like Shen.
String: 所以没错，我就是不喜欢申。

OriginString: So what can you tell me about Yu?
String: 关于玉，你能告诉我些什么？

OriginString: Yu? He's a big wuss. Probably the biggest I know of.
String: 玉？他是个大怂包。可能是我认识的人里最怂的。

OriginString: There are often these kid tournaments between all the martial art schools in my village and Yu was usually one of the first to lose.
String: 我们村里的武术流派之间经常举办青少年比武，玉通常都是最早被淘汰的那批。

OriginString: My first impression of him was really horrible. I thought he was just some uninteresting weakling with a girly face.
String: 我对他的第一印象糟透了。觉得他就是个无趣的弱鸡，还长了张娘们唧唧的脸。

OriginString: Then how did you end up being friends?
String: 那你们后来怎么成为朋友的？

OriginString: Well, one time I saw him training on his own on his blade skills and there I saw him do a really awesome move. It was so fast and precise that I doubted that I could dodge it. That's when I started to get interested in him.
String: 有次我看见他独自练习剑术，使出了一招特别惊艳的动作。又快又准，我都不确定自己能躲开。就是从那时起我开始对他感兴趣。

OriginString: I wondered what it would be like if he used that technique on me. In my excitement I immediately approached him and attacked him!
String: 我想知道他用那招对付我会是什么感觉。一兴奋就直接冲过去袭击他了！

OriginString: However, he went down crying easily without even using that move.
String: 结果他连那招都没用就直接哭唧唧地趴下了。

OriginString: (It sounds like you just bullied a poor kid.)
String: （听起来你就是在欺负可怜小孩啊。）

OriginString: I asked him why he didn't use the move from earlier and he told me he couldn't do it in front of other people.
String: 我问他为什么不用刚才那招，他说在别人面前使不出来。

OriginString: I was kinda frustrated that I wouldn't be able to fight him at his best so I offered to help him train until he could fight me properly.
String: 不能和他全力对战让我很郁闷，就提议陪他训练直到能正经跟我打为止。

OriginString: How did he answer?
String: 他怎么说？

OriginString: He ran away.
String: 他跑了。

OriginString: However, mama didn't raise a quitter so I chased after him every day, demanding him to train with me.
String: 不过我娘可没教过我要放弃，所以我每天都追着他要求对练。

OriginString: I ambushed him when he was alone, sometimes beat up his bullies and even watched him pee that one time.
String: 趁他落单时埋伏他，有时候还揍他的跟班，有次甚至偷看他上厕所。

OriginString: (...wait. What was that last part?)
String: (...等等。最后一句是什么情况？)

OriginString: Eventually, he finally caved in and we started training together.
String: 最后他终于妥协了，我们开始一起训练。

OriginString: We fought often and every time I would just beat him up. But I realized that there was a talent hidden behind all those awkward moves.
String: 经常交手，每次我都把他揍趴下。但我发现那些笨拙动作背后藏着天赋。

OriginString: Then, after a month or so he finally managed to use that one technique on me and I hit the floor.
String: 大概一个月后，他终于对我使出那招，把我打倒在地。

OriginString: He looked so happy when he did it. I was also really proud of him. I was so proud in fact that I stopped pulling my punches in the second round that day. Bwahahaha!
String: 他成功时高兴坏了。我也特别为他骄傲。骄傲到当天第二轮对练时就没再手下留情了。哇哈哈哈！

OriginString: Yu is a wuss but he's also kinda lovable. He always tried his best to live up to the expectations put on him and worked hard on himself.
String: 玉虽然怂但挺讨人喜欢的。他总是拼命达到别人的期望，努力提升自己。

OriginString: ...He would have eventually become the master of the Azure Blade Style if they've just given him more time.
String: ...如果多给他些时间，他本可以成为碧波剑流的宗师。

OriginString: Instead they put that stupid mask on him.
String: 结果他们却给他戴上了那个该死的面具。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>BANDITS?
String: <?shakeScreen>强盗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>WHERE ARE THEY? I'LL DELIVER JUSTICE ON THEM MYSELF!
String: <?shakeScreen>在哪？我要亲自替天行道！

OriginString: No, Zoldak! There are no bandits here!
String: 别激动佐尔达克！这儿没强盗！

OriginString: I was just wondering what you think about them abducting people.
String: 我只是想问问你对绑架人质这种事怎么看。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>THEY DO WHAT?!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>他们敢绑架人？！！！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I SHALL VENTURE FORTH AND FREE THEM!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>我这就去解救他们！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: Damn it! Wait Zoldak! WAIT!
String: 见鬼！等等佐尔达克！你给我站住！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>A Bandit King!????
String: <?shakeScreen><?whiteFlash>强盗王！？？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Now this certainly can't stand! When do we deliver justice to him?
String: <?shakeScreen>这绝对不能容忍！我们什么时候去制裁他？

OriginString: Eh...we don't. A subjugation force is already being formed to deal with him.
String: 呃...我们不参与。已经组建了讨伐队去对付他了。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Then I shall go and volunteer for that force of good!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreen>那我这就去报名参加正义之师！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen> W-Wait Zoldak!
(Ah! Whatever! I  doubt they'll let a man his age join.)
String: <?shakeScreen>等、等等佐尔达克！（唉！随他去吧。他们应该不会让这个年纪的人加入的。）

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>The Divine Messenger is coming here?!
String: <?shakeScreen>神圣使者要来我们这儿？！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We need to make sure that everything is safe before she arrives!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们必须在她到来前确保万无一失！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We have to put guards wherever we can! Investigate anyone who comes in and out of the Adventurer Guild!
String: <?shakeScreen>要在所有能布置的地方安排守卫！进出冒险者公会的每个人都要盘查！

OriginString: ...I should have known you'd overreact.
String: ...早该料到你会反应过度。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Overreact?
String: <?whiteFlash>反应过度？

OriginString: Do you know how dangerous the position of the Divine Messenger is?
String: 你知道神圣使者这个位置有多危险吗？

OriginString: There are many dark forces that want her dead.
String: 有无数黑暗势力想要她的命。

OriginString: There have been many Divine Messengers before the current one.
String: 现任神圣使者之前已经有过很多位了。

OriginString: And none of them died peacefully.
String: 她们没有一个是善终的。

OriginString: That's why, I will take any precaution necessary to protect the current Divine Messenger, Guild Master.
String: 所以公会会长，我会采取一切必要措施保护现任神圣使者。

OriginString: Well done, Guild Master!
String: "干得漂亮，公会会长！"

OriginString: With this deed, you have saved countless people from a gruesome fate and the witch will finally have to answer for all her crimes.
String: 凭借这个功绩，你拯救了无数人免遭厄运，那个女巫终于要为她所有的罪行付出代价了。

OriginString: Well, currently it doesn't seem like she wants to answer anything at all. And I still have so many questions.
String: 呃，目前看来她似乎完全不打算回答任何问题。而我还有一大堆疑问呢。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Aren't paladins supposed to be really charismatic and pretty good in convincing people? Do you maybe have any tips what I can do to get an answer out of her?
String: <?whiteFlash>圣骑士不是应该很有魅力、很擅长说服别人吗？你有没有什么诀窍能让她开口？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Of course! Just keep asking her until she answers! It's just a matter of endurance! Most people will crumble if you repeat the same question for a week!
String: <?shakeScreen>当然！就一直问到她回答为止！这纯粹是耐力问题！大多数人被连续追问一周就会崩溃！

OriginString: ...Forget I asked.
String: ...当我没问。

OriginString: Good. I'll continue my patrol then!
String: 很好。那我就继续去巡逻了！

OriginString: Guild Master! I'm happy to report that I have not seen any evil today!
String: "公会会长！我很高兴地向您汇报，今天我没发现任何邪恶迹象！"

OriginString: ...I heard the adventurers have defeated the Lich.
String: ...我听说冒险者们已经击败了巫妖。

OriginString: They did. I hope you're not angry that they did it without you.
String: 确实如此。希望你不会因为他们没带上你而生气。

OriginString:
...No.
I'm just angry at myself for being such a fool.
String:
...不。
我只是在气自己竟然这么蠢。

OriginString:
The boy was right. I would have just killed myself.
My own sins have made me blind to what truly matters.
String:
那孩子说得对。我本会就这样了结自己。
我的罪孽让我对真正重要的事视而不见。

OriginString: Your sins?
String: 你的罪孽？

OriginString: ...I presume Eden has told you that I was once sent with some of my fellow comrades to vanquish the Lich, hasn't he?
String: ...伊登应该告诉过你，我曾和战友们被派去讨伐巫妖，最后只有我活着回来，对吧？

OriginString: Yeah. He told me that you were the only survivor.
String: 嗯。他说你是唯一的幸存者。

OriginString: ...There is a reason for that.
String: ...这其中是有原因的。

OriginString: When we encountered the Lich, I...I fled.
String: "当我们遭遇巫妖时，我...我逃跑了。"

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>!!!
That's...hard to believe.
String: <?whiteFlash>!!!

OriginString:
And yet it's the truth.
When I stood in front of that Lich so many years ago, I felt a primal fear I have never felt before.
String:
"但这就是事实。
多年前当我站在那个巫妖面前时，我感受到了一种前所未有的原始恐惧。"

OriginString:
Before I knew it, I was already running away, abandoning my brothers and sisters.
Their deaths are on my hands.
String:
"等我回过神来，已经抛下兄弟姐妹们独自逃走了。
他们的死都是我的错。"

OriginString:
I was forgiven for my cowardice.
People around me said that it would have made no difference.
String:
"他们原谅了我的懦弱。
周围人都说，就算我当时挺身而出也改变不了什么。"

OriginString:
But yet not one day goes by where I wonder, if we would have prevailed if I had stayed.
My fellow paladins were great people. How many lives weren't saved because I let them die?
String:
"但至今没有一天我不在想，如果我当时留下来，我们是不是就能赢。
我的圣骑士同袍们都是了不起的人。有多少生命因为我的临阵脱逃而消逝？"

OriginString:
How many lives were lost because the Lich continued to exist because of me?
How many people have I doomed because I've let evil prevail?
String:
"有多少生命因为我的纵容而丧命于巫妖之手？
我让邪恶肆虐，究竟害死了多少人？"

OriginString: Is that why you never stopped being a Paladin?
String: 这就是你为什么始终没有放弃圣骑士身份的原因吗？

OriginString: I had hoped that I could find redemption, but at my age, I realized it's not that simple.
String: 我曾希望能找到救赎，但到了这个年纪，我意识到事情没那么简单。

OriginString:
Can a good deed truly make up for an evil deed?
Can I really be forgiven without the forgiveness of those I have wronged?
What good is it for those I've failed to protect if I saved others?
String:
"善行真能抵消恶行吗？
若得不到那些被我伤害之人的宽恕，我如何配得原谅？
对那些我没能保护的人来说，拯救他人又有何意义？"

OriginString: I have struggled with those questions my whole life.
String: 这些问题困扰了我一生。

OriginString: So I decided that all I can do is to do as much good as I can, until these old bones turn to dust.
String: 所以我决定，我能做的就是尽可能多行善事，直到这把老骨头化为尘土。

OriginString: ...Zoldak, I have known you long enough that I have a good picture of you.
String: ...佐尔达克，我认识你这么久，早就把你看透了。

OriginString: You're a stubborn old man, who far too often acts before he thinks.
String: 你是个固执的老头子，经常不经过思考就行动。

OriginString: That's...true but still hurtful.
String: 这...确实如此，但还是让人受伤。

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>But you're also a man who actually cares.
I've seen enough people who'd rather turn a blind eye to what they've done.
In my eyes, you're already a good man, and if you think otherwise, then you've gone senile, old man.
String: 在我看来你早就是个好人了，要是你不这么认为，那准是你老糊涂了，老头。

OriginString: ...Thank you, Guild Master. I appreciate what you said.
String: ...谢谢你，公会会长。我很感激你这么说。

OriginString: Now, how about we train some Paladins? Maybe we can have that army of Paladins after all.
String: 现在，我们来训练些圣骑士如何？说不定真能组建一支圣骑士大军呢。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Does that mean you've finally approved of my new Training Plan?
String: <?shakeScreen>这是说你终于批准我的新训练计划了？

OriginString:
You mean the one with the sharks and acid?
...No. Definitely no.
String:
你是说那个有鲨鱼和酸液的？
...不。绝对不行。

OriginString: How else can I help?
String: 我还能帮上什么忙？

OriginString: I heard from Eden you had a hard time settling down.
String: 我听伊登说你最近安顿下来很不容易。

OriginString: Hmph! That boy worries too much. I'm still perfectly fine!
String: 哼！那小子瞎操心。我好得很！

OriginString: Evil does not know rest, so neither do I!
String: 邪恶永不休息，所以我也不休息！

OriginString: Pretty sure evil has to rest too.
String: 我觉得邪恶也是要休息的吧。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Then that's even more reason not to rest!
String: <?shakeScreen>那就更不该休息了！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>We will not only catch up to evil! We shall overtake it!
String: <?shakeScreen>我们不仅要追上邪恶！还要超越它！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen> Then we'll trip evil, push it to the ground and beat it to an inch of its life!
String: <?shakeScreen>然后给邪恶使绊子，把它按在地上揍个半死！

OriginString: ...You do hear yourself, right?
String: ...你自己听听这像话吗？

OriginString: Can you really not tell me who "they" are?
String: 你真的不能告诉我"他们"是谁吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>What? No! Of course not!
String: <?shakeScreen>什么？不行！当然不行！

OriginString: Haven't you been listening to me before?
String: 你之前都没在听我说话吗？

OriginString: You don't even have to tell me the name of that group. Just tell me what exactly they're doing.
String: 你甚至不用告诉我那个组织的名字。只要告诉我他们具体在做什么。
