OriginString: Are they controlling the world from the shadows? Do they manipulate the weather? Is Three-Silver in reality not dead?
String: 他们是在暗处操控世界吗？能操纵天气吗？三银其实没死？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Stop it! This is no joke! Why do you even want to know?
String: <?shakeScreen>别说了！这不好笑！你干嘛非要知道？

OriginString: I feel like I can't take them seriously otherwise...
String: 我觉得不知道这些就没法认真对待他们...

OriginString: What?
String: 啥？

OriginString: All I know about them is that they're shadowy and powerful.
String: 我对他们的了解仅限于"神秘而强大"。

OriginString: I'd like to add evil but I feel like that would completely erase any amount of seriousness I had for them.
String: 我本来想加个"邪恶"，但感觉这样会彻底毁掉我对他们的最后一点严肃态度。

OriginString: They're so vague that I don't even believe that they will become relevant to us in any form.
String: 他们太模糊了，我甚至不相信他们会以任何形式影响到我们。

OriginString: That's a good thing! We want that!
String: 这是好事啊！我们就要这样！

OriginString: ..Maybe you're right.
String: ..也许你是对的。

OriginString: Just stop mentioning them. Otherwise I feel like a lot of people will get disappointed.
String: 别再提他们了。不然我觉得很多人会失望的。

OriginString: I admit that when I first heard that the bandits are acting up, I was suspicious whether "they" had anything to do with it.
String: 我承认刚听说强盗们闹事时，我怀疑过是不是"他们"在背后搞鬼。

OriginString: You think they do?
String: 你觉得是他们干的？

OriginString: Not anymore.
String: 现在不这么想了。

OriginString: I investigated it but "they" would be far more subtle in their approach.
String: 我调查过了，"他们"的手法会比这隐蔽得多。

OriginString: Well, it would have been weird in the first place if "they" just randomly had anything do with bandits.
String: 说实话，"他们"突然和强盗扯上关系本来就很奇怪。

OriginString: Don't underestimate their reach, Guild Master.
String: 别低估他们的影响力，公会会长。

OriginString: There are lots of things that seem unrelated but are actually influenced by "them".
String: 很多看似无关的事背后都有"他们"的影子。

OriginString: ...One day you really have to tell me who "they" are.
String: ...总有一天你得告诉我"他们"到底是谁。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Never!
String: <?shakeScreen>休想！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Then stop building "them" up!
String: <?shakeScreen>那就别老是把"他们"说得神神秘秘的！

OriginString: That's quite the fancy title for a dead man.
String: 对一个将死之人来说，这头衔可真够花哨的。

OriginString: What do you mean?
String: 什么意思？

OriginString: In my experience someone who calls this much attention to themself, won't live for long.
String: 根据我的经验，这么爱出风头的人通常活不长。

OriginString: I do not trust her, Guild Master.
String: "我不信任她，公会会长。"

OriginString: When she gave the former Guild Master their first Quest, we suspiciously lacked a lot of information about the enemy.
String: 当初她给前任会长发布第一个任务时，我们可疑地缺少了大量关于敌人的情报。

OriginString: We were only told that they were some sort of cultists, demon worshippers or other kind of fanatics.
String: 我们只被告知对方是某种邪教徒、恶魔崇拜者之类的狂热分子。

OriginString: But it's apparent now that they're too organized to be simply that.
String: 但现在很明显，他们的组织性远超普通狂热分子。

OriginString: And I'm sure the Divine Messenger knew that.
String: 我确定那位神谕使者早就知道这点。

OriginString: They're hiding something. I can feel it.
String: 他们隐瞒了什么。我能感觉到。

OriginString: My advice for you Guild Master: Take everything she says with a grain of salt.
String: 我给你的建议是会长：对她说的每句话都要保持怀疑。

OriginString: I'm sorry, Guild Master.
String: 我很抱歉，公会会长。

OriginString: What for?
String: 为什么道歉？

OriginString: I feel like I could have prevented the attack.
String: 我觉得我本可以阻止这次袭击。

OriginString: I already noticed that there were some suspicious behaviour amongst the adventurers.
String: 我早就注意到冒险者中有些可疑行为。

OriginString: But I was only preoccupied with my own situation and left it alone when I was sure it had nothing to do with "them".
String: 但我只顾着自己的事，在确认与"他们"无关后就放任不管了。

OriginString: I blame myself for what happened.
String: 我为发生的一切自责。

OriginString: If only I also thought about the safety of the Adventurer Guild, then maybe the former Guild Master wouldn't have died.
String: 要是我当时也为冒险者公会的安全考虑，或许前任会长就不会...

OriginString: ...You didn't know, Rogue. You couldn't have known what would happen.
String: ...你不知道的，罗格。你不可能预知会发生什么。

OriginString: ...I do not blame you.
String: ...我不怪你。

OriginString: ...Thank you, Guild Master. That...means a lot to me.
String: ...谢谢您，公会会长。这...对我意义重大。

OriginString: This whole matter with the gods stinks, Guild Master!
String: "公会会长，这些神明相关的破事儿真是臭不可闻！"

OriginString: It's obvious now that they're hiding something from us and the witch is the key to it.
String: 很明显他们在隐瞒什么，而那个女巫就是关键。

OriginString:
I agree with you.
Something is definitely off.
String:
"我同意你的看法。
这事儿确实不对劲。"

OriginString: Any tips on how to get some answers out of the witch?
String: 有什么办法能让那个女巫开口吗？

OriginString: I'd advise against any form of violence. It just gives you unreliable information.
String: 我建议不要用暴力。那样只会得到不可靠的情报。

OriginString: The most effective approach is to make them want to talk to you. Try to gain their trust or provoke them.
String: 最有效的方法是让他们主动开口。试着赢得信任或者激怒他们。

OriginString: Thanks for the tips, Rogue.
String: 多谢建议，罗格。

OriginString: Watch your back, Guild Master.
String: 小心背后，公会会长。

OriginString: It's safe to talk here, Guild Master.
String: "在这里说话很安全，公会会长。"

OriginString: So about Luana...
String: 那么关于露安娜...

OriginString: W-What about her?
String: 她...她怎么了？

OriginString: She mentioned you.
String: 她提到你了。

OriginString: W-what did she say?
String: 她...她说什么了？

OriginString: ...I forgot.
String: ...我忘了。

OriginString: Guild Master!
String: 会长！

OriginString: You're doing this on purpose, aren't you?
String: 你是故意的对吧？

OriginString: Maybe.
String: 也许吧。

OriginString: We should keep it short.
String: "我们长话短说。"

OriginString: Seeing you like this, I wonder if it's a trend in this Guild for people to hide their identities.
String: 看到你这样，我都怀疑隐藏身份是不是咱们公会的流行趋势了。

OriginString: I assure you that there is a perfectly valid reason for this, Guild Master.
String: 我向您保证这是有充分理由的，公会会长。

OriginString: You just might not like it...
String: 只是您可能不会喜欢这个理由...

OriginString: *sigh*. Alright, I'm listening.
String: *叹气*。好吧，我洗耳恭听。

OriginString: ...I'm in hiding.
String: ...我在躲人。

OriginString: There is a group of people...who are after me and they would stop at nothing to get to me.
String: 有一群人...正在追捕我，他们会不择手段找到我。

OriginString: To reduce the risk of getting found I can not let anyone see me nor know my name, lest it might reach "them".
String: 为了降低被发现的风险，我不能让任何人看到我的样子或知道我的名字，以免消息传到"他们"耳中。

OriginString: ...What did you do that you have to go hiding?
String: ...你到底做了什么需要这样东躲西藏？

OriginString: It isn't about what I did. It's about what I know.
String: 不是因为我做了什么。而是因为我知道什么。

OriginString: I'm a loose end and "they" usually don't let loose ends live for long.
String: 我是个漏网之鱼，而"他们"通常不会让漏网之鱼活太久。

OriginString: Who are "they"?
String: 他们"是谁？

OriginString: I can't tell you, Guild Master. It's better if you don't know.
String: 我不能告诉您，公会会长。您不知道更好。

OriginString: "They" do not like to be known and will silence everyone who do.
String: 他们"不喜欢被人知晓，会让所有知情者永远闭嘴。

OriginString: So, you're saying that a shadowy group of powerful people wants you dead.
String: 所以你是说有个神秘的强大组织想置你于死地。

OriginString: So powerful in fact,  that the mere mention of your name and your appearance could reach their ears.
String: 强大到光是提及你的名字和长相就会传到他们耳朵里。

OriginString: And anyone who might have an inkling of knowledge about them gets killed.
String: 而任何可能对他们有所了解的人都会被灭口。

OriginString: Y-yeah, that kinda sums it up.
String: 差、差不多就是这样。

OriginString: ...Either I've suddenly landed in some talentless bard's tale of conspiracy theories or Fran has gotten himself in quite the mess by taking you in.
String: ...要么我突然掉进了某个蹩脚吟游诗人的阴谋论故事里，要么就是弗兰收留你给自己惹上了大麻烦。

OriginString: How did he even become a part of this?
String: 他怎么会卷进这种事？

OriginString: It's my fault...
String: 都是我的错...

OriginString: He inadvertently got dragged in a situation where I got found out by my pursuers.
String: 他在无意间被卷入了我被追捕者发现的现场。

OriginString: He...actually saved me.
String: 他...其实救了我。

OriginString: When I gave him a roundabout explanation of my situation, he insisted that I could hide at the Guild.
String: 当我含糊地解释了自己的处境后，他坚持让我躲在公会里。

OriginString: Now that he's gone, I'm well aware that you have no obligation to let me stay here.
String: 现在他不在了，我很清楚您没有义务收留我。

OriginString: If you want me to go then I'll go.
String: 如果您要我离开，我立刻就走。

OriginString: You can stay.
String: 你可以留下。

OriginString: Are you sure about that? The people who are after me are to be feared.
String: 您确定吗？追捕我的人非常可怕。

OriginString: How am I supposed to fear something that is completely vague?
String: 我怎么可能害怕一个连影子都没见过的东西？

OriginString: And besides...I won't just revert a decision made by Fran.
String: 而且...我不会轻易推翻弗兰做出的决定。

OriginString: If he allowed you to hide here, then you can hide here.
String: 既然他允许你藏在这里，那你就留下吧。

OriginString: I see you're just like him. Thank you, Guild Master.
String: 您和他真像。谢谢您，公会会长。

OriginString: Now that you don't have to fear "them" anymore, you don't really have any reasons to hide your face anymore, right?
String: 既然你不再需要害怕"他们"了，应该也没理由继续遮着脸了吧？

OriginString: ...Maybe...
...You're still going to hide it, aren't you?
String: ...你还是打算继续遮着，对吧？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-it's nothing personal, Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>这、这不是针对您啊，公会会长！

OriginString: I-it's just that after knowing me for so long with my hood on...I'm kinda scared that you'll think differently of me when I reveal my face.
String: 只、只是您认识我这么久都看我戴着兜帽...我怕您看到我真面目后会改变对我的看法。

OriginString: I don't care if you're ugly or anything like that.
String: 就算你长得丑我也不会在意的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-I'm not ugly!
String: <?shakeScreen>我、我才不丑呢！

OriginString: A-at least that's what Luana said.
String: 至、至少露安娜是这么说的。

OriginString: (I have no idea how to process that statement.)
String: (完全不知道该怎么接这句话。)

OriginString: I-I just need a bit more time, Guild Master.
String: 我、我需要再多点时间，公会会长。

OriginString: Fine...I'll wait.
String: 好吧...我等着。

OriginString: Thanks, Guild Master.
String: 谢谢您，公会会长。

OriginString: Hello Guild Master.
String: 您好啊，公会会长。

OriginString:
<?whiteFlash>Hello?
...Is someone there?
String: <?whiteFlash>你好？

OriginString: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen>WHOA!
String: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen>哇啊！

OriginString:
Did you just appear out of nowhere?
Who are you?
String:
"你是从哪儿突然冒出来的？
你是什么人？"

OriginString: I'm Rogue, an instructor in the Adventurer Guild. I thought it was time we met.
String: 我是罗格，冒险者公会的教官。我觉得是时候和您见面了。

OriginString: Ah, I see.
String: 啊，这样啊。

OriginString: ...Why didn't you look for me in the beginning?
String: ...为什么一开始不来找我？

OriginString: That's because I've been observing you for the last few days.
String: 因为过去几天我一直在观察您。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>W-what?
String: <?whiteFlash>什、什么？

OriginString: I've also checked your background.
String: 我还调查了您的背景。

OriginString: Your name is {PROTAGONIST}. Gender unknown. You've started adventuring at the age of 13 with the previous Guild Master but have known each other for much longer.
String: 您的名字是{PROTAGONIST}。性别未知。13岁就跟随前任公会会长开始冒险生涯，但你们相识的时间更早。

OriginString: You adventured together for more than ten years until you two went your seperate ways.
String: 你们一起冒险了十多年，直到后来分道扬镳。

OriginString: You continued to make your living as adventurer for a couple more years but never joined hands with other adventurers ever again.
String: 您又独自当了几年冒险者，但再没和其他人组过队。

OriginString: Three years ago you retired after a stray arrow hit you in the knee. Since then you've been living on the money you saved up but it was barely enough to keep you afloat.
String: 三年前因为膝盖中了一箭而退休。之后靠着积蓄生活，但几乎入不敷出。

OriginString: Then about two weeks ago, the letter of the previous Guild Master arrived and you came here as the new Guild Master.
String: 直到两周前收到前任公会会长的信，您才来到这里接任新会长。

OriginString: ...That was pretty accurate...
String: ...相当准确...

OriginString: Now for the important question:
String: 现在有个重要问题：

OriginString: Why?
String: 为什么？

OriginString: I'm sorry Guild Master, but I had to make sure that you were in no way affiliated with "them"!
String: 抱歉公会会长，我必须确认您和"他们"没有任何关联！

OriginString: "Them?" Who are "them" ?
String: 他们"？"他们"是谁？

OriginString: I'm sorry but I can't tell you that! The mere knowledge of "them" is dangerous!
String: 抱歉我不能告诉您！光是知道"他们"的存在就很危险！

OriginString: Then how am I supposed to know if I am affiliated with them? Does any of that have to do with why you're hiding your face? Is Rogue even your real name?
String: 那我怎么知道自己是否和他们有关联？这和你遮住脸有关系吗？罗格是你的真名吗？

OriginString: All valid questions but I think it's better if we don't talk here.
String: 都是好问题，但我觉得这里不适合详谈。

OriginString: Come and meet me if you want to talk.
String: 想谈的话就来找我吧。

OriginString: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen>(...)
String: <?grayFlash><?shakeScreen>(...)

OriginString: (...Where did you even find these people, Fran?)
String: (...弗兰你都是从哪儿找来这些人的啊？)

OriginString: The last place I want you to visit is maybe the most important one in the entire Adventurer Guild.
String: "最后要带你去的地方，可能是整个冒险者公会最重要的场所。"

OriginString: And I'm not saying that just because it's my workplace!
String: 我可不是因为那是我的工作场所才这么说的！

OriginString: Hahahahaha!
String: 哈哈哈哈！

OriginString: ....Geez. Would it hurt you to try to be more sociable?
String: ....拜托。你们就不能试着友善点吗？

OriginString: This here is my domain. This is the training ground where we veterans teach the Adventurers all of our skills and knowledge.
String: 这里就是我的地盘。这块训练场是我们这些老人传授冒险者所有技能和知识的地方。

OriginString: Are you the only teacher here?
String: 这里就你一个教官吗？

OriginString: No, of course not. Adventurer Parties need to have many different roles. I might be good with a sword but I'm lousy with other weapons.
String: 当然不是。冒险者小队需要各种不同的角色。我可能擅长用剑，但其他武器就不行了。

OriginString: For that we have other instructors. We used to have dozens of instructors with different skillsets to teach. But unfortunately most have left the Guild since its decline.
String: 所以我们还有其他教官。公会鼎盛时有几十个不同专长的教官。可惜随着公会衰落，大多都离开了。

OriginString: I hope that we might gather new instructors again after our reputation improves.
String: 希望等公会声誉好转后，我们能重新招募新教官。

OriginString: But those who stayed with us are exceptionally talented people. Currently they don't seem to be here but you should talk to them when you see them. They're good people!
String: 但留下来的人都是特别有才华的。虽然现在他们好像不在，但你见到时应该和他们聊聊。都是好人！

OriginString: I do not doubt it. Fran always had an eye for good people.
String: 我毫不怀疑。弗兰看人的眼光一向很准。

OriginString: Well, there is one exception.
String: 呃，有个例外。

OriginString: Talking about yourself?
String: 在说你自己？

OriginString: Seriously guys. Didn't you say you haven't seen each other for 10 years? How could anyone still hold so much hostility after that long of a time?
String: 说真的，你们俩。不是说十年没见了吗？怎么能时隔这么久还这么大火气？

OriginString: It's
String: 这

OriginString: easy
String: 很

OriginString: if
String: 简

OriginString: it's
String: 单

OriginString: her!
String: 如果是她的话！

OriginString: At least I'll know who's responsible if either of you end up dead.
String: 要是你们谁突然暴毙了，至少我知道该找谁算账。

OriginString: Good work, everyone!
String: 干得好，各位！

OriginString: At this point you're all probably exhausted.
String: 到这会儿你们应该都累坏了吧。

OriginString: We should camp now to get you some rest. It's important to always know when to take a break and recover.
String: 我们该扎营休息了。懂得适时休整恢复很重要。

OriginString: It shouldn't be much further from here.
String: 应该离这儿不远了。

OriginString: If we follow the road, we should be arriving at the Guild in no time.
String: 沿着这条路走，很快就能到公会。

OriginString: Good to hear. This journey has been...exhausting.
String: 好消息。这趟旅程真是...累人啊。

OriginString: You got us lost several times and we had to pretty much run from every encounter we came across.
String: "你让我们迷路了好几次，遇到的每场战斗都只能狼狈逃跑。"

OriginString: Honestly, I'm surprised that we even survived this far.
String: 说实话，能活到现在我都觉得是个奇迹。

OriginString: ...Yes, sorry about that Guild Master. We haven't been adventurers for long...
String: ...是的，抱歉公会会长。我们当冒险者还没多久...

OriginString: (Guild Master...It's still weird hearing that.)
String: （公会会长...听到这个称呼还是觉得怪怪的。）

OriginString: I guess we didn't really show our best side so far, did we?
String: 看来我们到现在都没展现出最好的一面，是吧？

OriginString:
No.
No, you didn't.
String:
不。
不，你没有。

OriginString: (Geez! We really didn't start off on the right foot with our future boss, did we?)
String: （天啊！我们和未来上司的第一印象可真是糟透了，是吧？）

OriginString: (Time to butter up!)
String: （该拍马屁了！）

OriginString: I know we haven't been that great so far! But we're still young and learning!
String: 我知道我们表现不怎么样！但我们还在学习阶段嘛！

OriginString: I'm sure we'll improve in no time under your leadership!
String: 在您的领导下我们一定能很快进步的！

OriginString: Especially, when you're such a handsome m.<waitfor=0.3>.<waitfor=0.3>.
String: 特别是，您这么英俊的男.<waitfor=0.3>.<waitfor=0.3>.

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...eh...I mean pretty w.<waitfor=0.3>.<waitfor=0.3>.
String: <?whiteFlash>...呃...我是说漂亮的女.<waitfor=0.3>.<waitfor=0.3>.

OriginString: <speed=7><?shakeScreen>...good looking person!
String: <speed=7><?shakeScreen>...好看的人！

OriginString: Thank you...I guess?
String: 谢谢...大概？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>(What was that stutter just now?)
String: <?shakeScreen>（刚才那个结巴是怎么回事？）

OriginString: (I just noticed I can't tell if our Guild Master is a man or woman.)
String: （我刚发现根本看不出会长是男是女。）

OriginString: (What are you talking about? Of course it's a...)
String: （你说什么呢？明明就是个...）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>(a...<waitfor=0.5>ah....)
String: <?whiteFlash>（...<waitfor=0.5>啊....）

OriginString: <speed=2><?shakeScreen>(See?! You can't tell either, right?)
String: <speed=2><?shakeScreen>（看吧？！你也分不出来对不对？）

OriginString: (I have an idea.)
String: （我有个主意。）

OriginString: Guild Master! I noticed we never called you by your name.
String: 会长！我注意到我们一直没称呼过您的名字。

OriginString: I kinda feel bad about it. It makes everything so formal.
String: 感觉有点过意不去，这样太正式了。

OriginString: <waitfor=0.5>Technically, I'm your boss, so that seems just right.
String: <waitfor=0.5>理论上我是你们上司，这样很正常。

OriginString: <speed=2><?shakeScreen>Y-yes! Of course!
String: <speed=2><?shakeScreen>是-是的！当然！

OriginString: But it just doesn't seem right, if we don't at least know your name.
String: 但连您的名字都不知道，总觉得不太合适。

OriginString: So, could you tell us?
String: 所以，能告诉我们吗？

OriginString:
I guess there's no harm in that.
It's {PROTAGONIST}.
String:
"我想这也没什么大不了的。
是{PROTAGONIST}啊。"

OriginString: {PROTAGONIST}. Ah, I see!
String: {PROTAGONIST}。啊，明白了！

OriginString: Of course! Of course!
String: 当然！当然！

OriginString: (...You still can't tell, can you?)
String: （...你还是没搞明白性别对吧？）

OriginString: (...You think it'd be awkward to ask now?)
String: （...现在问会不会很尴尬？）

OriginString: <speed=2>(What d'ya think? <speed=1>For now let's just keep rolling with it and avoid the use of pronouns.)
String: <speed=2>（你说呢？<speed=1>暂时别用代词糊弄过去吧。）

OriginString: If you're done whispering, I have a suggestion to make.
String: 如果你们悄悄话说完了，我有个提议。

OriginString: As you said, you're still capable of learning. But I do want to reach the Guild in one piece, so here is my suggestion:
String: 如你们所说，你们还有学习空间。但我想活着回到公会，所以建议如下：

OriginString: For the remainder of the journey, let me take charge. I used to be an adventurer for more than half my lifetime and I'm sure that I can bring the best out of you.
String: 剩下的路程由我带队。我当了大半辈子冒险者，肯定能发挥出你们的最佳水平。

OriginString: I don't think any of us would have any issues with that.
String: 我们完全没意见。

OriginString: Good. Then follow me!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 很好。跟我来！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: (So,...<waitfor=0.5>what were their names again?)
String: （所以...<waitfor=0.5>他们叫什么来着？）

OriginString: (Pretty sure they told me.)
String: （肯定告诉过我。）

OriginString: (Also pretty sure they told me their life stories and traits...which is kinda weird to tell a stranger.)
String: （好像连人生经历和特点都说了...对陌生人说这些挺奇怪的。）

OriginString: (Maybe I'll find that info on their Character Pages(#KEY).)
String: （也许能在角色页面(#KEY)上找到这些信息。）

OriginString: Hey Guild Master! Good news!
String: 嘿，公会会长！好消息！

OriginString: Since our adventurers saved that village from bandits, people have been starting to talk about us again.
String: 自从我们的冒险者从强盗手中救下那个村庄后，人们又开始谈论我们了。

OriginString: Mostly good things!
String: 基本都是好话！

OriginString: And it's all thanks to you!
String: 这都多亏了你！

OriginString: Well, it's still too early to say that.
String: 现在说这个还为时过早。

OriginString: We're still nowhere near the reputation we used to have in the past.
String: 我们离过去的名声还差得远呢。

OriginString: Oh come on, Fiola!
String: 别这样嘛，菲奥拉！

OriginString: It won't hurt to say something nice for a change.
String: 偶尔说点好话又不会少块肉。

OriginString: (Now that's something I'd like to see.)
String: （这倒是我乐意看到的场景。）

OriginString: You...
<?shakeScreenWeak>Let's just get back to work!<?fadeOutNPC>
String: <?shakeScreenWeak>我们还是继续工作吧！<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: *sigh*...Good work, Guild Master.
String: *叹气*...干得好，公会会长。

OriginString: Someone ought to say that. Might as well be me.
String: 总得有人这么说。那就我来吧。

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master.
String: 你好，公会长。

OriginString: Oh hi, Majika. What can I do for you?
String: 哦嗨，玛吉卡。有什么事吗？

OriginString: I wanted to return this to you. I've completed my examination of its contents.
String: 我想把这个还给你。我已经完成对其中内容的研究了。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>A notebook? What is this?
String: <?whiteFlash>笔记本？这是什么？

OriginString: This is a notebook that was acquired by the adventurers during their expedition into the witch's sanctuary.
String: 这是冒险者们探索女巫圣地时获得的笔记本。

OriginString:
...<?shakeScreen> WHAT?!
Why wasn't I informed of this before?
String:
...<?shakeScreen> 什么？！
怎么没人早点告诉我？

OriginString: My apologies, Guild Master. It so happened that the adventurers placed it in my custody by chance. My initial intent was to bring it to your attention promptly, but...
String: 抱歉，公会会长。恰巧冒险者们偶然把它交给了我保管。我本想立即向您汇报，但是...

OriginString: ...I was drawn into its contents.
String: ...我被其中的内容吸引了。

OriginString: It was...captivating, Guild Master. Our knowledge of dark magic has been quite limited as few dare to delve into such a subject. This is the first written record I've come across that not only provides us with a basic understanding of this form of magic but also serves as a detailed manual on its usage.
String: 它...很迷人，公会会长。我们对黑暗魔法的了解相当有限，因为很少有人敢涉足这个领域。这是我第一次见到这样的书面记录，不仅提供了对这种魔法形式的基本理解，还详细说明了其使用方法。

OriginString: Wait...does that mean our adventurers could learn dark magic?
String: 等等...这是否意味着我们的冒险者可以学习黑暗魔法了？

OriginString: It's entirely possible. However, the theories outlined in the notebook are rather intricate, and the absence of a demonic patron will likely complicate the learning process.
String: 完全有可能。不过笔记本中概述的理论相当复杂，而且没有恶魔赞助者的存在可能会使学习过程变得困难。

OriginString: Only an exceptionally gifted individual would probably be able to grasp this magic.
String: 只有天赋异禀的人才可能掌握这种魔法。

OriginString: However,  if you happen to find such a talent, simply bring them to me, and I'll take it from there.
String: 不过，如果你找到这样的人才，只需带他们来见我，剩下的交给我。

OriginString: That's good to know Majika, although I'm slightly hesitant about the fact it's dark magic.
String: 这很好，玛吉卡，虽然我对这是黑暗魔法还是有点犹豫。

OriginString: Guild Master, please remember that knowledge itself is inherently neutral, devoid of any morality.
String: 公会会长，请记住知识本身是中性的，没有任何道德属性。

OriginString: It is the character and intent of the wielder that ultimately dictate its implications and consequences.
String: 最终决定其影响和后果的是使用者的品格和意图。

OriginString: Hmmm...I guess you're right, Majika.
String: 嗯...我想你是对的，玛吉卡。

OriginString: Naturally, Guild Master.
String: 当然，公会会长。

OriginString: So, the adventurers weren't able to capture the disciple alive.
String: "看来，冒险者们没能活捉那个信徒啊。"

OriginString: Unfortunately not. She resisted until her last breath.
String: 很遗憾，她抵抗到了最后一刻。

OriginString: However, the adventurers found this amongst the disciple's belongings.
String: 不过冒险者在那个信徒的遗物中发现了这个。

OriginString: What is this?
String: 这是什么？

OriginString: I don't know, but it looks magical.
String: 我也不清楚，但看起来像是魔法物品。

OriginString: And I know somebody who I can ask about anything magical in nature.
String: 不过我正好认识一个对魔法物品无所不知的人。

OriginString: You summoned me, Guild Master?
String: "您召唤我了吗，公会会长？"

OriginString: Perfect timing, Majika!
String: 来得正好，玛吉卡！

OriginString: Do you see this? Do you know what this might be?
String: 看到这个了吗？你知道这可能是什么吗？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString: How utterly intriguing!
String: 太令人着迷了！

OriginString: A functioning piece of a navigation stone. I had believed that such artifacts had vanished from existence.
String: 一块还能运作的导航石碎片。我原以为这类文物早已绝迹。

OriginString: A navigation stone?
String: 导航石？

OriginString: These are magical stones, crafted by the ancient empyreans.
String: 这是由古代天神打造的魔法石。

OriginString: Many have been unearthed during excavations, yet this is the first time where I witness one that appears to be in still operational condition.
String: 考古挖掘中出土过不少，但能正常运作的我还是头回见到。

OriginString: What do those navigation stones do?
String: 这些导航石有什么作用？

OriginString: They are imbued with an enchantment that eternally links them to a corresponding counterpart. One stone will always be attracted to another, permitting their holders to locate each other.
String: 它们被施予了永恒绑定对应石块的咒术。一块石头总会受到另一块的吸引，让持有者能互相定位。

OriginString: At least that's what the old records say.
String: 至少古籍是这么记载的。

OriginString: So, you're saying with this stone, we could find the location of its counterpart?
String: 所以你是说...用这块石头能找到对应石块的位置？

OriginString: If you had paid attention to my previous elucidation, you would have discerned that I referred to it as a piece of a navigation stone.
String: 若您方才认真听讲就会注意到，我说的是"导航石的碎片"。

OriginString: Regrettably, this piece, in isolation, lacks the capability to offer guidance.
String: 遗憾的是，单凭这块碎片无法提供指引。

OriginString: Could it be possible that the other disciples possess the remaining pieces?
String: 有没有可能其他门徒持有剩余碎片？

OriginString: That would make sense. Each one carrying a piece, and when they decide to return to their master, they meet up to rejoin the pieces.
String: 说得通。每人携带一块碎片，当他们决定回归师尊时，就集合重组。

OriginString: I guess we know now what to do next.
String: 看来我们知道下一步该怎么做了。

OriginString: Thanks, Majika.
String: 谢了，玛吉卡。

OriginString: It was nothing, Guild Master.
String: 举手之劳，会长大人。

OriginString: ...Her Holiness wants to see you.
String: ...教宗陛下要见你。

OriginString: Don't make her wait.<?fadeOutNPC>
String: 别让她久等。<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: ...Nice seeing you too.
String: ...见到您真高兴啊。

OriginString: Hello, Guild Master. Thank you for coming.
String: "你好，公会会长。感谢你能来。"

OriginString: Of course. How could I not? Your bodyguard always ask me so nicely.
String: "当然。我怎么会拒绝呢？你的保镖每次请求都这么彬彬有礼。"

OriginString:
Really? I'm glad!
I was afraid you two might not get along.
String:
真的吗？太好了！
我还担心你们俩会合不来呢。

OriginString: Y-your holiness...
String: 大、大人...

OriginString: (So, she does not understand sarcasm, huh?)
String: (看来她听不出讽刺啊...)

OriginString: Well, whatever. I'm sure you didn't call me just to discuss my friendship with your bodyguard, did you?
String: 好吧，说正事。你叫我来应该不只是为了讨论我和保镖的友谊吧？

OriginString: Yes, of course. You're right.
String: 是的，你说得对。

OriginString: I called you here because I wanted to let you know that we finally gained some information from the cultist we captured.
String: 我找你来是想告诉你，我们终于从抓获的邪教徒那里得到了一些情报。

OriginString: Does that mean we now know where the witch is?
String: 意思是知道女巫的下落了？

OriginString: ...No, unfortunately not. It seems that the witch is more careful than that. Most of the cultists have never met the witch and don't know how to find her.
String: ...不，很遗憾没有。那个女巫比我们想的更谨慎。大多数邪教徒根本没见过她，也不知道怎么找到她。

OriginString: "Most"?
String: 大多数？

OriginString: It seems the witch has disciples, powerful mages who wander the lands as her proxies. One of the few people with direct contact to her.
String: 女巫有几个门徒，都是强大的法师，作为她的代理人在各地活动。这些人是少数能直接联系到她的人。

OriginString: Do we know where these disciples are?
String: 知道这些门徒在哪吗？

OriginString: No. But they will most likely be much easier to find than the witch herself.
String: 不知道。但找到他们应该比直接找女巫容易得多。

OriginString: Can't the gods just locate them for us?
String: 神明们不能直接帮我们定位吗？

OriginString: Unfortunately, ever since the last quest, the demon lords have started to interfere with the gods' sight in the mortal realm. We have to find them on our own.
String: 很遗憾，自从上次任务后，恶魔领主们开始干扰神明对凡间的观测。我们得靠自己找了。

OriginString: *sighs* Of course, it wouldn't be that easy. I guess we have to do it the old-fashioned way.
String: *叹气* 果然没这么简单。看来只能用老办法了。

OriginString: Any ideas on where we need to look?
String: 有什么线索该往哪里找吗？

OriginString: It's very likely they will try to find more allies amongst the enemies of humanity, just like before. We should look if any of those groups show signs of demonic involvement.
String: 他们很可能会像之前一样，试图在人类的敌人中寻找盟友。我们应该留意哪些组织有恶魔活动的迹象。

OriginString: Alright, I'll send some adventurers to search.
String: 明白了，我会派些冒险者去调查。

OriginString: Thank you, Guild Master. Hopefully, not much longer, and we can put an end to the witch.
String: 谢谢你，公会会长。希望很快就能结束这场与女巫的对抗。

OriginString: (...Where am I?)
String: (...这是哪里？)

OriginString: (...It's so dark...)
<?whiteFlash>Hello Guild Master.
String: <?whiteFlash>你好啊，公会会长。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>！！！！

OriginString: Relax, Guild Master. I'm just here to talk.
String: 放松点，公会会长。我只是来聊聊而已。

OriginString: W-Where are we? And who are you?
String: 这、这是哪里？你又是谁？

OriginString: This is your dream, Guild Master. I'm merely using it as a way to communicate with you just as I did with your predecessor.
String: 这是你的梦境，公会会长。我只是借用这个方式与你交流，就像我对待你的前任一样。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Wait...Are you...?
String: <?whiteFlash>等等...难道你是...？

OriginString: Yes, I'm the Demon Witch. Chosen of the demon lords.
String: 没错，我就是恶魔女巫。恶魔领主们的使者。

OriginString: So, what? Are you here to kill me in my sleep?
String: 所以呢？你是来在我梦里杀掉我的吗？

OriginString: No, Guild Master. If I could do that, we wouldn't even have this conversation.
String: 不，公会会长。如果我能那么做，我们根本不会有这次对话。

OriginString: (Scary...)
I'm just here to give you a friendly warning.
String: 我只是来给你一个友善的警告。

OriginString: There is no reason for you to get involved in this matter between the gods and the demon lords. You're just being used in a proxy war.
String: 你没有必要卷入这场神与恶魔领主之间的纷争。你只是被利用在这场代理人战争中。

OriginString: So I advise you to stop interfering.
String: 所以我建议你停止干涉。

OriginString: Or else?
String: 否则呢？

OriginString: Or else this time we won't stop until there is nothing left of the Adventurer Guild.
String: 否则这次我们会彻底摧毁冒险者公会，片甲不留。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash><?shakeScreen>!!!
<?whiteFlash>!!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！！

OriginString: Your holiness?
String: 阁下？

OriginString: Divine Messenger?
String: 神使大人？

OriginString: Very rude bodyguard?
String: 没礼貌的保镖？

OriginString: (They're gone...Did we lose them somewhere?)
String: （他们不见了...该不会是在哪儿走丢了吧？）

OriginString: (...I guess we have no choice than to continue without them.)
String: （...看来只能继续前进了）

OriginString: Who would have guessed that there was an empyrean ruin underground? Majika is going to hate it that she isn't with us right now.
String: 谁能想到地下居然有座天界遗迹？玛吉卡要是知道她没跟来肯定会气疯的。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Focus Guild Master!
String: <?shakeScreen>集中注意力 公会会长！

OriginString: We're here to find the Witch and put an end to her and her cult.
String: 我们来是为了找到那个女巫 终结她和她的邪教。

OriginString: Not much longer and it's finally over.
String: 用不了多久就能彻底结束了。

OriginString: Let us move on!
String: 继续前进吧！

OriginString: We need to talk, {PROTAGONIST}!
String: 我们得谈谈，{PROTAGONIST}！

OriginString: ...Do we?
String: ...有必要吗？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Get serious! What are we going to do about the Witch?
String: <?shakeScreen>认真点！我们到底要怎么处置那个女巫？

OriginString:
It has been days since we've locked her up.
Why are we still keeping her here?
String:
"把她关起来都好几天了。"
"我们为什么还要留着她？"

OriginString: I don't know, and the only person who could answer the question has locked herself up in her room and hasn't come out.
String: 我不知道 唯一能解答这个问题的人把自己反锁在房间里不肯出来。

OriginString: So what now?
String: 那现在怎么办？

OriginString: I was actually planning on visiting the witch. There's still a lot we don't know about, and maybe she'll have the answers.
String: 我正打算去见见那个女巫。还有很多谜团没解开 也许她能提供答案。

OriginString: For example, why are the gods searching for a body?
String: 比如说 为什么众神在寻找一具躯体？

OriginString: Wasn't this whole conflict about the safeguarding of human souls?
String: 整场冲突不就是为了守护人类灵魂吗？

OriginString: I don't believe it's the whole truth.
String: 我觉得真相不止如此。

OriginString: *Sighs* Why can't things ever be straightforward?
String: *叹气* 为什么事情总是不能简单点？

OriginString: I'm actually going to see her right now.
String: 我现在就要去见她。

OriginString: ...I'll come too.
String: ...我也去。

OriginString: Suit yourself.
String: 随你便。

OriginString: I still can't believe we have one of these.
String: "真不敢相信我们居然能搞到一个这玩意儿。"

OriginString: This used to be a military fortress. So, I don't think it's out of place. I'm more surprised that you never discovered these before.
String: 这里以前是军事要塞。所以我觉得很正常。我倒是惊讶你们以前从没发现过。

OriginString: This fortress has more space than we actually use. There was just never a need to explore any more of it.
String: 这座要塞的实际使用空间比我们想象中的大得多。只是以前没需要进一步探索罢了。

OriginString: ...We're here.
String: ...我们到了。

OriginString: Hello, miss witch. Or do you have a name you'd prefer?
String: 你好，女巫小姐。或者你更愿意我们怎么称呼你？

OriginString: Witch, it is, I guess.
String: 那就叫女巫吧。

OriginString: Now, I have some questions for you, and I'd appreciate it if you'd answer them.
String: 现在我有几个问题要问你，希望你能配合回答。

OriginString: Who is this emperor the gods are looking for?
String: 众神在寻找的那位皇帝是谁？

OriginString: Why is it so important for them to find his body?
String: 为什么找到他的尸体对神明们如此重要？

OriginString: The silent treatment, huh?
String: 打算保持沉默是吧？

OriginString: You better talk...or I'll hurt you until you do.
String: 你最好开口...否则我会让你痛到愿意说为止。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>WAIT A SECOND!
You'll do nothing of that sort!
String:
<?shakeScreen>等一下！
你不能那样做！

OriginString:
The Adventurer Guild is not a place where we do anything like that!
Fran would never allow that!
String:
"冒险者公会才不是干那种勾当的地方！"
"弗兰绝对不会允许这种事发生！"

OriginString: ...Thanks for ruining it, Fiola. I was obviously bluffing!
String: ...谢谢你搅局啊，菲奥拉。我明显是在虚张声势！

OriginString: As if that would have worked!
String: 那招怎么可能管用！

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Well, sorry, but as an ex-adventurer, threatening people with violence is the best I can do in terms of interrogations!
String: <?shakeScreen>行吧抱歉，但作为前冒险者，审讯时用暴力威胁已经是我能想到的最佳方案了！

OriginString: What else do I have? Begging?
String: 我还能怎么办？跪下来求她吗？

OriginString: Hey, witch! If you don't talk, you'll see somebody at my age cry like a little baby! Do you really want to see that?
String: 喂，女巫！要是不招供，你就得看着我这把年纪的人哭得像个奶娃娃！真想看这场面？

OriginString: I'd actually love to see that.
String: 我倒是挺想看的。

OriginString: Oh, just be quiet! Or I tell everyone in the Guild how your first date with Fran ended!
String: 闭嘴！不然我就告诉全公会你和弗兰第一次约会是怎么收场的！

OriginString: Spoiler alert: It was unbelievably embarrassing.
String: 剧透警告：简直尴尬到令人发指。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>H-how do you know that?
String: <?shakeScreen>你、你怎么会知道？

OriginString: Wait...did you spy on us?
String: 等等...你该不会偷窥我们吧？

OriginString: Oops...that backfired quickly...
String: 糟糕...这下玩脱了...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I will **** kill you!
String: <?shakeScreen>我他*要宰了你！

OriginString:
Wait!
Can't you find it in your infinitely small heart...<?shakeScreen>ouch!
String:
"等等！"
"你那芝麻大的心眼就...<?shakeScreen>哎哟！"

OriginString: ...<?whiteFlash>Is this all just a joke for you?
String: ...<?whiteFlash>你们是把这当玩笑吗？

OriginString: (She's talking.)
String: (她开口了)

OriginString: You really have no idea what's going on.
String: 你们根本不明白发生了什么。

OriginString: ...Apparently, we don't. So why don't you tell us?
String: ...确实不明白。所以你何不告诉我们？

OriginString: Maybe I'd even be on your side if I knew what was going on.
String: 要是知道缘由，说不定我还会站在你这边。

OriginString: Although I highly doubt it, considering your side is kidnapping and sacrificing humans.
String: 虽然我严重怀疑这点——毕竟你们在绑架活人献祭。

OriginString: ...There is a reason for that...
String: ...这么做是有原因的...

OriginString: No kidding! And here I was thinking you were doing it for shit and giggles.
String: 废话！我还以为你们是闲得蛋疼才这么干呢。

OriginString:
What's the reason?
What could possibly justify what you're doing?
String:
"这是什么理由？
你做的这些事怎么可能有正当理由？"

OriginString:
Silence again, huh? 
Fine. I had enough for today, anyway.
String:
"又沉默是吧？
行吧，反正今天我也受够了。"

OriginString: We'll continue the conversation another day. I'll be sleeping soundly tonight, knowing people won't get sacrificed.
String: 改天再聊。今晚我能睡个好觉了——至少知道不会有人被献祭。

OriginString: Me being here makes no difference. Even without me, my comrades will continue to work for his...
String: 我被抓毫无意义。即便没有我，同伴们也会继续为{GENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}...

OriginString: ...For his what?
String: ...为{GENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}什么？

OriginString: *Sighs*. Let's go Fiola.
String: *叹气*。走吧菲奥拉。

OriginString: This was just a waste of time.
String: "这纯粹是在浪费时间。"

OriginString:
...Not entirely.
First, we know capturing the witch didn't stop the cult. 
Second, both the witch and the gods are hiding something from us.
String:
...不完全是这样。
首先，我们知道抓住那个女巫并没有阻止邪教活动。
其次，无论是女巫还是众神都在对我们隐瞒着什么。

OriginString:
I wonder if it's the same secret.
If it is, then it's strange how both sides are trying to hide it. One would assume that one side would benefit from revealing it.
String:
"我在想是不是同一个秘密。"
"如果是的话，那双方都想隐瞒就很奇怪了。按理说应该有一方会乐于公开才对。"

OriginString:
Well, no point in thinking about it with so few clues. We can only hope that next time she'll talk more.
Alright, I'm heading out, Fiola.<?fadeOutNPC>
String:
"唉，线索这么少，想再多也没用。只能希望她下次能多说点话了。"
"好了，我先走了，菲奥拉。"<?fadeOutNPC>

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Wait! I'm still not done with you regarding the spying!
String: <?shakeScreen>等等！关于监视的事我还没跟你算完账呢！

OriginString: Sorry! Can't hear you! I'm too far away already!
String: 抱歉！听不见！我已经走远啦！

OriginString:
Hnggh!!!
Come back!
String:
呃啊！！！
给我回来！

OriginString: I think it's time we talk with the witch again.
String: "我觉得是时候再和那个女巫谈谈了。"

OriginString:
Alright.
Let's go.
String:
好的。
我们走吧。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>Ah, greetings, Guild Master. And also to you, Miss Fiola.
String: <?whiteFlash>啊，幸会，公会会长。还有你，菲奥拉小姐。

OriginString: Majika? What brings you here?
String: 玛吉卡？你怎么会在这里？

OriginString: I've grown interested in your prisoner after hearing about her from the adventurers who captured her.
String: 我从抓捕她的冒险者那里听说了你们囚犯的事，开始对她产生了兴趣。

OriginString: Is it true that the gods were inquiring about an "Emperor"?
String: 神明们确实在打听一个"皇帝"的消息吗？

OriginString: Yes. I was there when it happened. Although, I have no idea who they might be referring to.
String: 没错。当时我就在现场。虽然我也不知道他们指的是谁。

OriginString: Guild Master, do you comprehend the full extent of the term "Emperor"?
String: 公会会长，你理解"皇帝"这个词的全部含义吗？

OriginString: Isn't it just another word for a king? A ruler?
String: 不就是国王的另一种说法吗？统治者？

OriginString: It's understandable that one would have such an interpretation of it in present time, given that its original meaning is not applicable to the current political landscape.
String: 在当今政治环境下产生这种理解很正常，毕竟这个词的本意已经不适用了。

OriginString: However, the term's origin lies in an era when the conventional titles of king or queen proved insufficient. This occurred during a period when an expansive empire necessitated a designation surpassing that of monarchs.
String: 但这个称谓起源于一个国王或女王这类常规头衔都不够用的时代。当时一个庞大帝国需要超越普通君主的称号。

OriginString: Such a circumstance arose only once in history.
String: 这种情况在历史上只出现过一次。

OriginString: The Empyreans...
String: 天穹帝国...

OriginString: Precisely. I trust you now comprehend the reason behind my curiosity with your captive. It appears highly probable that the cult has some ties with the ancient empire.
String: 正是。现在你应该明白我为什么对你们的囚犯感兴趣了。那个邪教很可能与古帝国有关联。

OriginString: I had hoped she might offer valuable knowledge, yet regrettably, she proves to be rather uncooperative.
String: 我本希望她能提供有价值的信息，可惜她相当不配合。

OriginString: I wanted to talk to her anyway. Maybe she'll respond to me.
String: 我本来就打算找她谈谈。也许她会回应我。

OriginString: One can only hope.
String: 但愿如此。

OriginString:
I see you've already met a friend of mine. She's very interested in the history of the Empyreans.
So, it would mean a lot to her if you could share anything you might know.
String:
"看来你已经见过我的一位朋友了。她对天人族的历史非常感兴趣。"
"所以，如果你能分享任何你知道的信息，对她来说意义重大。"

OriginString: ...Go screw yourself.
String: ...去死吧你。

OriginString: ...It appears her disposition towards you is no more favorable than it is towards myself. In fact, it seems to be even less so.
String: ...看来她对你的态度并不比对我更友善。事实上，似乎更恶劣些。

OriginString: Thanks for the helpful insight, Majika...
String: 多谢你的精辟分析，玛吉卡...

OriginString: I don't think she will be sharing whatever connection the cult might have with the Empyreans.
String: 我觉得她不会透露邪教和天穹帝国之间可能存在的任何联系。

OriginString: Regrettable. However, I do harbor a theory I wish to expound upon.
String: 真遗憾。不过我倒是有一个理论想阐述一下。

OriginString: A theory?
String: 一个理论？

OriginString: Indeed. Firstly, are you certain that the gods posed the question, "Where's the Emperor's body?"
String: 正是。首先，您确定神明问的是"皇帝的尸体在哪"吗？

OriginString:
Hmmm...Yes. 
I'm very certain that's what they said.
String:
嗯...没错。
我非常确定他们就是这么说的。

OriginString: So, they did not specify a particular name?
String: 那么他们没提到具体名字？

OriginString: No...Not that I can remember. Does that matter?
String: 没有...至少我不记得。这很重要吗？

OriginString: It does, Guild Master. In all scholarly examinations of the Empyreans, it is evident that their empire endured for over a millennium.
String: 很重要，公会会长。根据所有关于天界人的学术研究，他们的帝国延续了千年之久。

OriginString: Therefore, it stands to reason that numerous Emperors ruled over their realm.  However, the gods referenced only the title as though the identity they're refering to was self-evident.
String: 因此按理说应该有多位皇帝统治过。但神明只用这个头衔代指，仿佛所指对象不言自明。

OriginString: That does seem weird...
String: 确实有点奇怪...

OriginString: Perhaps less so for scholars well versed in Empyrean history. Across all found records, the Emperor is never denoted by name. Scholars theorized that this convention may have been rooted in tradition, possibly as an act of reverence or respect for the imperial title.
String: 对熟悉天界历史的学者来说或许不然。在所有现存记录中，皇帝从不用名字指代。学者推测这可能是出于传统，或许是对帝号的尊崇。

OriginString: However, I have an alternative hypothesis.
String: 但我有个不同的假设。

OriginString: What if... there was never a necessity to differentiate? What if there existed only one emperor throughout the empire's existence?
String: 如果...根本不需要区分呢？如果整个帝国时期只存在一位皇帝呢？

OriginString: Wait...You cannot be suggesting...
String: 等等...你该不会是说...

OriginString: Indeed, Guild Master. What if, throughout the empire's duration until its mysterious disappearance, it was governed by a singular ruler?
String: 正是，公会会长。如果在帝国存续直至神秘消失的整个期间，都是由同一位统治者执政呢？

OriginString: It would also serve as an explanation for the unusual stability of the Empire despite its size. An absence of instability due to the transfer of power.
String: 这也能解释为何如此庞大的帝国能保持超常稳定。没有权力更迭带来的动荡。

OriginString: But a person like that would be hundreds of years old! No one could possibly live that long!
String: 但这样的人得活几百岁！根本不可能有人能活那么久！

OriginString:
This is where the involvement of demon lords becomes apparent. 
A pact with demons for immortality seems entirely characteristic for them, does it not?
String:
"这正是魔王们插手的明显证据。
为了永生与恶魔签订契约，这完全符合他们的作风，不是吗？"

OriginString: ...But aren't deals with demon lords paid in souls? Does that mean the Empyrean Emperor has been sacrificing souls of people to...
String: ...但与恶魔的交易要用灵魂支付吧？难道天界皇帝一直在用人们的灵魂...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Don't you dare say it!
String: <?shakeScreen>你不敢说出来！

OriginString: (It seems like we hit a nerve.)
String: （看来我们戳中她痛处了）

OriginString:
I guess Majika really hit close to home, didn't she?
So how much about what she theorized is true? Maybe everything?
String:
"看来玛吉卡的话确实戳到痛处了，是吧？"
"所以她推测的那些事有多少是真的？说不定全中？"

OriginString: Did the emperor made deals with the demon lords and sacrifice...
String: 皇帝是不是和恶魔领主做了交易，还献祭了...

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>He never forced anyone! They all volunteered!
String: <?shakeScreen>他从来没强迫任何人！他们都是自愿的！

OriginString: ...Volunteered? To be sacrificed? You can't actually believe that, do you?
String: ...自愿？自愿被献祭？你该不会真信这种鬼话吧？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>They did! Each of them did!
They...they...
String: <?shakeScreen>就是自愿的！每个人都是！他们...他们...

OriginString: ...Why are you talking about that as if you were there? Don't tell me you're also...
String: ...为什么你说得好像亲历现场一样？别告诉我你也是...

OriginString: Of course! It stands to reason that the individual directly chosen by the demon lords could negotiate for immortality.
String: 当然！既然是被恶魔领主直接选中的人，自然有资格谈判换取永生。

OriginString: Could you perhaps be the link between the emperor and the demon lords? The one who brought him their powers?
String: 你该不会就是皇帝与恶魔领主之间的纽带吧？那个为他带来力量的人？

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Shut up! Shut up!
<?shakeScreen>You know nothing!
String: <?shakeScreen>闭嘴！闭嘴！<?shakeScreen>你什么都不知道！

OriginString: ...I think we're done for today.
String: ...今天就到此为止吧。

OriginString: Majika, I think you can mark your theory as very likely to be true.
String: 玛吉卡，看来你的理论十有八九是真的。

OriginString: How fascinating. I need to re-analyze everything I thought I knew about the Empyreans in light of this new revelation.
String: 真有意思。根据这个新发现，我得重新分析所有关于天人族的知识了。

OriginString:
Well, we now know who the Emperor is. 
But we still don't know 'why'.
String:
"好吧，我们现在知道皇帝是谁了。
但还是不知道'为什么'。"

OriginString: Why are the gods looking for the body of a man who has existed such a long time ago?
String: 为什么众神要寻找一个存在于远古时代之人的躯体？

OriginString: ...It looked like the Emperor was an important person to her.
String: ...看起来皇帝对她而言是个很重要的人。

OriginString:
It seemed so...
Maybe I can make use of it next time we're there.
String:
"看来是这样..."
"下次去那儿的时候说不定能派上用场。"

OriginString: It's time again, {PROTAGONIST}.
String: 又到时间了，{PROTAGONIST}。

OriginString: *Sighs* Alright. Let's go.
String: *叹气* 好吧。我们走。

OriginString:
Alright, another day of interrogation.
So? Are you feeling like talking today?
String:
"好吧，又是审讯的一天。"
"怎么样？今天想开口说话了吗？"

OriginString: Of course you don't.
String: 我就知道。

OriginString: Last time, you seemed quite defensive about the emperor, although I have no idea why.
String: 上次你似乎很维护那位皇帝，虽然我完全不明白为什么。

OriginString: An immortal Emperor who ruled over his lands for over a thousand years, sacrificing his subjects to extend his own life? That sounds like a tyrant to me.
String: 一个统治了国土千年的不死皇帝，靠牺牲子民来延续生命？在我看来这就是个暴君。

OriginString: ... That's because you know nothing of him.
String: ......因为你根本不了解他。

OriginString: Then enlighten me. What kind of person was he?
String: 那就说给我听听。他到底是怎样的人？

OriginString: ... He was the greatest man I've known. In all my years, I've never encountered another person like him.
String: ...他是我认识的最伟大的人。这么多年来，我从未遇到过像他这样的人。

OriginString: There was a time when the lands were split into hundreds of small kingdoms and tribes constantly warring with each other. The people suffered greatly in those times.
String: 曾经这片土地分裂成数百个小王国和部落，彼此征战不休。那时的人们饱受苦难。

OriginString: The emperor was the one who put a stop to it. A young conqueror, not driven by greed, but a vision to end his people's suffering.
String: 是皇帝终结了这一切。这位年轻的征服者并非被贪婪驱使，而是怀着终结人民苦难的愿景。

OriginString:
He was a kind-hearted man, often putting his life on the line for the people under him. 
And in response the people followed him with unwavering loyalty.
String: "他是个心地善良的人，常常为了手下的百姓豁出性命。\n而百姓们也以坚定不移的忠诚追随他作为回报。"

OriginString: How did you meet him?
String: 你们是怎么相遇的？

OriginString: He conquered my tribe, or to be more precise,...he destroyed it.
String: 他征服了我的部落，或者更准确地说...他摧毁了它。

OriginString: Strange way to start a relationship, but go on.
String: 真是奇怪的相识方式，继续说。

OriginString: My tribe was... evil. They worshipped the demon lords and did horrible things to smaller tribes. They just reaped what they sowed.
String: 我的部落...很邪恶。他们崇拜恶魔领主，对其他小部落犯下暴行。这只是自食其果罢了。

OriginString: What about you? How come you were spared?
String: 那你呢？为什么你能幸免？

OriginString: ...The emperor said that he could see that I wasn't like them. That I never wanted to be part of any of that.
String: ...皇帝说他能看出我和他们不一样。说我从未想参与那些暴行。

OriginString: ...Say that to your recent victims.
String: ...把这话说给你最近的受害者听听。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>If I had any other choice then...
String: <?shakeScreen>如果我有其他选择的话...

OriginString:
...I followed him from that day on.
When I realized how great of a man he was, I swore my loyalty to him.
String:
...从那天起我就追随在他左右。
当我意识到他是何等伟岸之人时，便立誓向他效忠。

OriginString:
I was by his side when he was still just an upstart conqueror. I was there when he defeated his last enemies and united the lands.
And I continued to be by his side in all those centuries he ruled over the empire.
String:
"当他还是个初出茅庐的征服者时，我就陪伴在他左右。他击败最后一批敌人、统一这片大陆时，我也在场。"
"在他统治帝国的数百年间，我始终如影随形。"

OriginString: ... Were you two a couple?
String: ...你们是恋人吗？

OriginString:
... Don't be foolish. We were both from completely different standings. He was the emperor, and I belonged to a tribe that worshipped demons. 
He married once in his lifetime. Only once however...
String:
"...别犯傻了。我们本就来自天差地别的世界。他是高高在上的帝王，而我来自崇拜恶魔的部族。"
"他一生只娶过一次妻。仅此一次罢了..."

OriginString:
He sounds like a great guy.
Certainly not like a guy who would make deals with demon lords.
String:
"听起来是个不错的家伙。"
"完全不像会跟恶魔领主做交易的那种人。"

OriginString: But he did, didn't he?
String: 但他确实这么做了，不是吗？

OriginString: There was... no other choice. None of his children had the same leadership skills as he, and they were close to tearing the empire apart in a civil war.
String: 当时...别无选择。他的子嗣都没有他那样的领导才能，帝国即将在内战中分崩离析。

OriginString:
That's why...I told him about the way to extend his life. 
...I told him about the demon lords.
String:
"所以...我告诉了他延续生命的方法。
...我告诉了他关于恶魔领主的事。"

OriginString: He was reluctant to do it, but he did it for his people. Many loyal servants sacrificed their lives so he could rule the empire longer.
String: 他很不情愿，但为了子民还是这么做了。许多忠诚的臣民献出生命，只为让他能统治更久。

OriginString:
And he responded to it. 
His whole life was dedicated to his people, doing everything in his power to lead the empire to everlasting prosperity.
String:
而他回应了这份责任。
他的一生都奉献给了子民，竭尽所能带领帝国走向永恒的繁荣。

OriginString: But in the end, the empire still perished, didn't it?
String: 但最终帝国还是灭亡了，不是吗？

OriginString: How did that happen?
String: 这是怎么发生的？

OriginString: And all of that still doesn't explain why the gods are so interested in his remains.
String: 而这些依然解释不了为什么众神对他的遗骸如此感兴趣。

OriginString:
Don't want to answer anymore, huh?
Well, fine.
String:
"不想再回答了吗？
好吧，随你便。"

OriginString: Let's just treat this like an interesting history lesson and continue some other time.
String: 就当这是堂有趣的历史课吧，改天再继续。

OriginString: I'm starting to think this is getting us nowhere.
String: 我开始觉得我们是在白费功夫。

OriginString: ...You need to talk with the Divine Messenger.
String: ...你需要和神圣使者谈谈。

OriginString: I think only the gods have the answers we seek.
String: 我想只有神明才有我们要的答案。

OriginString: ...The Divine Messenger still refuses to come out. She still needs time.
String: ...神圣使者仍拒绝现身。她还需要时间。

OriginString: How much longer can we wait?
String: 我们还能等多久？

OriginString: I don't know why...but I have the terrifying feeling that something terrible will happen and we're completely blind...
String: 不知为何...我有种可怕的预感，感觉要发生什么可怕的事，而我们却一无所知...

OriginString: ...You're not the only one.
String: ...不止你一个人这么想。

OriginString: (I need to talk with the witch. It's better if I go alone this time.)
String: (我得去找那个女巫谈谈。这次最好我一个人去。)

OriginString: ...I know that you're trying to resurrect the Emperor.
String: ...我知道你试图复活皇帝。

OriginString: ...So the gods have told you everything.
String: ...看来众神已经把一切都告诉你了。

OriginString:
Yes. Although, I still don't understand your motivations for doing all this.
You're messing with forces that could doom us all.
String:
是的。不过，我仍然不明白你做这些事的动机。
你在玩弄可能毁灭我们所有人的力量。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>Oh come on! 
Now is not the time to stay silent!
String:
<?shakeScreen>拜托！
现在可不是保持沉默的时候！

OriginString: ...I'm not the one you should be talking to.
String: ...你该对话的对象不是我。

OriginString: (She reaches out a hand to me.)
String: (她向我伸出一只手。)

OriginString:
Take my hand, Guild Master.
He wants to talk with you.
String:
握住我的手吧，公会会长。
他想和你谈谈。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>He? You don't mean...
String: <?whiteFlash>他？你该不会是说...

OriginString: Take my hand.
String: 握住我的手。

OriginString: ...(I take her hand.)
String: ...(我握住了她的手。)

OriginString: ...Where am I?
String: ...这是哪里？

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>It's a space the demon lords have created for us to talk in private.
String: <?whiteFlash>这是恶魔领主们创造的私人谈话空间。

OriginString: ...And you are...
I'm the Emperor.
String: 我是皇帝。

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>!!!
String: <?whiteFlash>！！！

OriginString:
It's time that we talked. 
You and your Guild have proven themselves to be quite the thorn in my side.
String:
"是时候谈谈了。
你和你的公会已经证明自己是我眼中不折不扣的肉中刺。"

OriginString:
You've been formidable enemies. 
However, you don't have to be.
String:
"你们曾是难缠的对手。
不过，并非一定要如此。"

OriginString: I feel like I do, considering that what you've done could put the world in danger.
String: 恐怕必须如此，你的所作所为可能会让世界陷入危险。

OriginString: Because I've sealed one of the seven gods?
String: 因为我封印了七神之一？

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>!!!
String: <?shakeScreen>！！！

OriginString:
Be at ease, Guild Master. My deal with the demon lords forbids them from spying on me. And they never break a deal made with mortals.
That's the only commendable thing about them.
String:
"放轻松，公会会长。我与恶魔领主的协议禁止他们监视我。而且他们从不违背与凡人达成的契约。"
"这算是他们唯一的可取之处了。"

OriginString: Anything we discuss here, stays between us, and I also have a vested interest to not let them know about the gods' moment of weakness.
String: 我们在这里的谈话仅限你我之间。而且我也不想让恶魔领主知道诸神的虚弱时刻。

OriginString: Then you know about...
String: 这么说你知道...

OriginString:
Yes. I'm aware of the power balance between the gods and the demon lords.
As well as the ramification of the demon lords learning the truth.
String:
"是的。我很清楚诸神与魔王之间的力量平衡。
以及魔王们得知真相后可能引发的后果。"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Then why are you doing all of this?
String: <?shakeScreen>那你为什么还要这么做？

OriginString:
...
<?whiteFlash>Tell me, Guild Master, what do you think about the brokered peace between the gods and the demon lords?
String: <?whiteFlash>"告诉我，公会会长，你对神明与魔王们达成的和平协议有何看法？"

OriginString: What do you think about the fact that the gods are content with the fact that many souls will always inevitably end in the demon lords' hands?
String: 你怎么看待神明们对无数灵魂终将落入恶魔领主之手这一事实的漠然态度？

OriginString: The fact that they want our reverence and dedications, despite not willing to fight to save our souls from damnation.
String: 他们要求我们虔诚供奉，却不愿为拯救我们的灵魂免遭诅咒而战。

OriginString: The gods have failed in their duties towards humanity by buying a truce with human souls.
String: 诸神用人类的灵魂换取停战协议，已然背弃了守护人族的职责。

OriginString: That's rich coming from the guy who bought his immortality and now even his resurrection with human souls.
String: 这话从个靠人类灵魂换取永生、甚至复活自己的人嘴里说出来可真讽刺。

OriginString:
A sacrifice which pains me dearly.
But it will be worth it, because I plan to end it all.
String:
"这个牺牲让我痛彻心扉。"
"但这一切都值得，因为我打算彻底终结这一切。"

OriginString: ...What are you talking about?
String: ...你究竟在说什么？

OriginString:
If the gods aren't willing to fight then I will.
I will use the sealed goddess to become a god myself!
String:
"既然众神不愿参战，那就由我来。"
"我要利用那位被封印的女神，让自己登神！"

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>I-is that even possible?
String: <?shakeScreen>这...这怎么可能办到？

OriginString: You underestimate me, Guild Master, just like the gods. Their mistake is what brought them into this situation.
String: 你低估我了，公会会长，就像诸神一样。正是他们的错误判断才导致今日局面。

OriginString: There is nothing that I cannot accomplish.
String: "没有我办不到的事。"

OriginString: I will become the 7th god and start a war against the demon lords. I will break their peace and start the war that will forever free us from the clutches of the demons.
String: 我将成为第七位神明，向恶魔领主宣战。撕毁他们的和平协议，发动一场让我们永远摆脱恶魔桎梏的战争。

OriginString:
And when the demon lords are finally vanquished, I will subjugate the gods. 
They have proven themselves to be unworthy to lead humanity.
String:
"待魔王尽数伏诛，朕便要征服诸神。  
他们已证明自己配不上引领人类。"

OriginString:
No. It's only I who can become humanity's one true ruler. 
There will be no more pain, no more conflicts, no more damnations. Only prosperity and peace.
String:
"不。唯有我才能成为人类唯一的真王。"
"从此不再有痛苦，不再有纷争，不再有诅咒。唯有繁荣与和平。"

OriginString: Because I have willed it.
String: 只因这是我意志所向。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>That's...insane! What will happen to the world if a war erupts between the Gods and the Demon Lords?
String: <?shakeScreen>疯...疯了！若神明与恶魔领主开战，这个世界会变成什么样？

OriginString: The world will burn, but from its ashes, a new and better one will be born.
String: 世界将浴火重生，从灰烬中诞生的会是更美好的新秩序。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>Stop fighting me, Guild Master! I'm not your enemy. You have lived long enough to see this world's shortcomings.
String: <?shakeScreen>别阻挠我，公会会长！我不是你的敌人。你活得太久，早该看清这个世界的缺陷。

OriginString:
You should know that humanity deserved better.
Serve me and help me forge a world of greater virtue and prosperity.
String:
"你该明白人类本应得到更好的。"
"效忠于我，助我打造一个更美德昌盛的世界。"

OriginString: ...I'm sure even your old friend Fran would have agreed if he knew my true goals.
String: ...我相信就算是你的老朋友弗兰，如果知道我的真正目标，也一定会赞同的。

OriginString: ...Fran?

Yes. Despite our Opposition to each other, I remember the former Guild Master as a virtuous and noble soul.
A pity he died before he could learn the truth.
String:
"是的。尽管我们立场相左，但我始终记得前任公会会长是个品德高尚的灵魂。"
"可惜他在得知真相前就去世了。"

OriginString: However, I am convinced that if he had known, then he would have been on my side.
String: 但我确信，如果他当时知道真相，一定会站在我这边。

OriginString: ...You know nothing about him.
String: ...你根本不懂他。

OriginString:
He would have never agreed to any of this. We always knew how hard life could be.
Everyone deserved better.
String:
"他绝不会同意这些事。我们向来清楚生活有多艰难。"
"每个人都值得更好的。"

OriginString: However, they also deserved to not be dragged into your mad crusade!
String: 但绝不是被你拖进这场疯狂圣战的方式！

OriginString:
...How regrettable that you couldn't see reason.  But it matters little. 
My followers have nearly completed the deal with the demon lords and my resurrection is close at hand.
String:
"...真遗憾你没能明白事理。不过这无关紧要。
我的追随者们已几乎与恶魔领主们达成协议，我的重生近在眼前。"

OriginString: You will not be able to stop me then.
String: 到那时你们将无力阻止我。

OriginString:
<?shakeScreen>I will find where the goddess is hidden before that! 
I promise you that!
String: <?shakeScreen>在那之前我会先找到女神的下落！我向你保证！

OriginString:
I doubt that. 
My forces will come and destroy you before that happens.
String:
"我可不这么认为。
在那之前，我的军队就会赶来把你们碾成齑粉。"

OriginString: And your captive won't be able to tell you anything.
String: 而你们的俘虏也休想透露任何情报。

OriginString: <?shakeScreen>W-what?!
String: <?shakeScreen>什...什么？！

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>...(I'm back.)
String: <?whiteFlash>...（我回来了。）

OriginString: ...Is everything alright?
String: ...你还好吗？

OriginString: <?grayFlash>...
String: <?grayFlash>...

OriginString: <?fadeOutNPC>(She collapses to the ground.)
String: <?fadeOutNPC>（她瘫倒在地。）

OriginString: <?whiteFlash>I've done my best, Guild master. She might be able to pull through.
String: <?whiteFlash>我已经尽力了，公会会长。她或许能挺过来。

OriginString: What happened to her? She suddenly just started bleeding.
String: 她怎么回事？突然就开始流血了。

OriginString: It seems like some sort of curse was activated on her. Fortunately, you brought her here fast enough for us to remove it before any lasting damage could be done.
String: 似乎是触发了某种诅咒。幸好你们及时把她送来，在造成永久性伤害前我们成功解除了它。

OriginString: For now, she only needs time to recover.
String: 现在她只需要时间恢复。

OriginString: Unfortunately, time is the one thing we don't have much.
String: 可惜我们最缺的就是时间。

OriginString: I'm sorry, Guild master. But there is nothing else we can do.
String: 我很抱歉，公会会长。但我们已无能为力。

OriginString: ...Inform me immediately when she's in condition to talk again.
String: ...等她能开口说话时立即通知我。

OriginString: Yes, Guild Master!
String: 是，公会会长！

OriginString: Refuse her
String: 拒绝她

OriginString: Let her join
String: 同意加入
